name: Bohdan Khomutskyi
review_header: Price-performance is great, very satisfied customer for 7 years. I trust this provider with my data.
review_body: I have been using different Hetzner services since 2017: dedicated server, back then unmanaged VPS, then cloud VMs, storage share, storage box and web hosting for my personal projects. I am very satisfied with the service, and especially performance to price ratio, and was surprised to see so snappy disks on web hosting. I'm getting very good performance for the money, and the company is solid - located in Germany, ISO27001 certified, I'm not worried about putting data on their servers. I do highly recommend Hetzner to anyone looking for affordable services with good price to performance.

name: einfachToe
review_body: My Experience was made great by a very lucky soul in the support-team. 5 Kudos

name: Tin Nguyen
review_header: Definitely 1 star - worst service i have ever tried
review_body: I was searching for cheap kubernetes cluster for my apps, then I found a git repo with simple setup guide, it had an affiliate link to Hetzner. Pricing looks very good so I try to signup for an account. I gave them my real payment info in signup process. After over a day, they sent me an email said that "we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns". What the actual f***? For real? They just cancelled that without giving me a chance to verify. I then sent them an email asking for why, and they said like "we don't share details, we don't want you". Again, no option to send ID or passport or whatsoever. But they already have my payment information. Later I saw a small transaction on my card that I did not authorize or know about. I then had to lock my card. I demand them to delete my payment info out of their system permanently, but still did not receive a response. For me, this looks like a scam. Why ask payment first, before verifying an account? At very least, they should ask for ID or passport first before start collecting sensitive information, right? As the title, Hetzner is the worst cloud service i have ever tried. But lucky me, after the rejection, I found a better provider with both spot and on demand pools, which is a perfect solution for me. And more important, it's much cheaper. Ha ha, thanks God.

name: Quora Forum
review_header: I am a happy hetzner customer
review_body: I am a happy hetzner customer. They have some state of the art servers and hosting for every need and at very affordable cost. Best part is that there vps come with option of backup and a separate snapshot which is very helpful in our case. They have a very excellent hourly billing system. change server requirement any time and you will be asked to pay for only required amount. There server are very fast and now our website is getting consistent high traffic without any down experience.

name: –î–º–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–π
review_header: My account was stolen as a result of my‚Ä¶
review_body: My account was stolen as a result of my password being leaked. The Hetzner team quickly helped me regain control of my account.

name: Manwil Zaki
review_body: Great company, Great Support, Excellent Servers that are actually cheap

name: Matt
review_body: Don't trust Hetzner..... These internet scammers always come up with reasons for their systematic thefts and are not accountable to anyone. We had said several times that we didn't want to use this hetzner service and had deleted all the files. They had blocked our access so we could not cancel the service so they could easily steal money from our bank. Even though our service was stopped on August 21st and we notified them by email, they still withdrew money from our bank account for September!! And the response to this theft is not systematic. First, every month the money was withdrawn automatically for that month. Why did they withdraw money again for September?!!

name: D NV
review_body: Hetzner customer service 0/5 Website down and no reply from their customer service!

name: Vrytek
review_body: There is no Hosting/Data centre company that gives us so much satisfaction. Unmatched Cloud UI, nothing comes close. Auction dedis are so tempting cause they are priced well and don't get even get me started on the AX52 and AX102. Need to add 64GB RAM for a client? Took 30 minutes on a Saturday night 2:00 AM UTC. None better and hope they don't sell to Microsoft or some damn american company. Prost!

name: Vaggelis Tsagklis
review_header: Hetzner is my best hosting experience ever
review_body: Hetzner is my best hosting experience ever. I am developer and I need just security, performance, usability. I use Hetzner panel for more than 10 years for VPS, Dedicated and Storage absolutely not any problem.

name: Omar Eldessouki
review_header: Hetzner is the best DC for small/medium‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is the best DC for small/medium business

name: ozan Bayindir
review_body: I am happy to transfer my projects through Hetzner. High quality and excellent communication are always guaranteed.

name: Vitali
review_body: They are fricking weird. No more. I registered account, added a payment method and they are asking for a passport. They even don't allow to delete my payment information. They act more like a scam! They took my payment information and won't let me delete it: ```Manage payment details: You can only edit your payment information after we have verified your account.```

name: Z Kowlesar
review_body: It's the service high level, the flexibility, willingness to help and the clarity of documentation. I guess it's the overall experience. There will always be issues but the way in which these are approached is what changes my relationship with Hetzner. Thank you!

name: Maksym Popov
review_body: I have been working with Hetzner for a long time. Their auction servers are inexpensive. I really like their high-quality and prompt support. Recently there was a problem with the server hardware, but they quickly replaced it with an identical one with the transfer of disk arrays. The hypervisor worked as before. Previously, I had dealt with other data centers, but in the end I completely switched to Hetzner. One thing was disappointing - this year, servers with a hardware raid controller disappeared at auction (.

name: CUN
review_header: Support is always swift and accurate.

name: Kahoro Tech
review_body: They asked for IDs and alot of information only for them to cancel my account immediatly. Its either they are collecting our Data or they are incompetent

name: Wojciech
review_body: I created my account, gone through the whole confirmation process, and my account was removed because i allegedly provided wrong information, I did not even had an option to get to know what information I provided was incorrect, never had any similar issues with any other hosting providers.

name: Sinan
review_header: They just block anyone outside of‚Ä¶
review_body: They just block anyone outside of Germany I suppose. I created an account and they just rejected my account without asking anything.

name: Trinity Rocha
review_body: Excellent data center, I'm very satisfied. One suggestion is to include a live chat to communicate with the team, such as through Telegram and WhatsApp.

name: Robert Casstevens
review_body: Nah, bad experiences all around.

name: Ruslan B
review_header: Account with 6 purchased VPS was DELETED!
review_body: I used Hetzner for about 1 month, and today they sent me a letter that they are blocking my account without explaining the reasons. I am SHOCKED! When I try to log in to my account, they write that the account does not exist. And there were 6 servers purchased!

name: Nab
review_body: Quick support, excellent price. The best cloud provider for me.

name: Ethan Moore
review_header: Incompetent, Anti-Customer Onboarding That Wastes Your Time
review_body: I'm based in Australia. I signed up with my real information, submitted my driver's licence, waited three full days for their so-called verification process, and was still rejected without explanation. All I received was a generic email claiming my account was "suspicious" with no clarification. No reason. No appeal. No opportunity to correct anything. Just permanently blacklisted for something they refuse to disclose. This is not security. It's not fraud prevention. It's a lazy, opaque system that penalizes legitimate users without any accountability. If their internal processes are so fragile that they can‚Äôt distinguish between fraud and a verified customer providing government ID, then their system is broken by design. Their support does not engage. You get copy-paste responses and are treated like a liability, not a customer. There is no recourse. No transparency. Nothing. If you're outside the EU or using Hetzner for the first time, understand this risk. You could follow every rule, provide everything they ask for, and still get instantly shut out. You will get no help, no clarity, and no second chance. This was a complete waste of time and one of the worst customer experiences I‚Äôve had with any provider. Stay far away.

name: Malthe
review_body: Helpful & fast support, really like their storage boxes. Only downside is DDoS protection, but there are so many 3rd party providers of that in 2025, so that is not a problem.

name: Kol
review_header: 0 downtime, 0 lag, better DDoS protection than OVH
review_body: Even though they don't advertise a DDoS protection, my game server was able to handle huge attacks a lot better than OVH which is advertised as DDoS protected. Furthermore I had 0 downtime and 0 lag with them. Their server hardware also is top notch for the price they offer. Fully satisfied with them.

name: Fabin cole
review_header: Curse this hosting. Don‚Äôt even think of signing up, even by mistake.
review_body: If there‚Äôs a worst hosting company in the world, it‚Äôs Hetzner. If I had the option, I wouldn‚Äôt even give them one star‚ÄîI‚Äôd throw a shoe instead. This is the only hosting company on earth that asks you for a passport just for verification. I‚Äôve used SiteGround, A2 Hosting, Hostinger‚Äînever had this nonsense. Tried Hetzner once on a client‚Äôs request, and it was a complete disaster. First, their so-called ‚Äúverification‚Äù took more than 18 hours, and then they straight up rejected it with a vague line: ‚Äúdue to some concerns.‚Äù Concerns? What concerns? Will your mother come and explain the concerns? I literally only entered the basic details‚Äîaddress, number, email‚Äîand they demanded a passport like some airport immigration officer. Even worse, there wasn‚Äôt any reason at all for rejection, but they still did it. To top it off, my client (who actually lives in Germany) also tried‚Äîguess what? Same rejection after 24 hours. Absolute garbage system. Pathetic. A disgrace of a hosting provider.

name: Comercio Local
review_header: Worst experience I've ever had! Terrible service and support. Not recommended.
review_body: I contracted Hetzner's services through an affiliate link, expecting to receive a $20 credit. However, to my surprise, the company decided not to grant the credit and stated that I would have to pay the full amount. I find this unacceptable, as I was merely testing their services to evaluate whether it was worth hiring a more robust server. I opened a technical support ticket to resolve the issue, but I was informed that nothing could be done and that payment was mandatory. As a result, I removed all my websites from Hetzner and deleted the server I had contracted. I do not recommend Hetzner and do not intend to use their services again. Additionally, the average download speed on their servers was around 300 kbps, rarely exceeding 5 MB/s, which I found unsatisfactory. The company still has much to improve. Don't waste your time. Upadate: This company is fraudulent, and I have reported them to my credit card issuer to avoid any unauthorized charges. Despite canceling the service, they continue to send numerous messages demanding payment. I strongly advise against doing business with this company under any circumstances. They persistently attempt to charge you for services you did not receive, treating it as if it‚Äôs completely normal.

name: joab
review_body: I'm really enjoying using the services I had problems with my machine that was infected and made SSH attacks, but the support was very good and the unlocking was very fast.

name: Ahmed Raad
review_body: Hetzner disabled my account and cancelled my server over a $13.87 invoice I already paid, locking me out completely ‚Äî no server, no invoice access, no support dashboard. Worse, their only ‚Äúsolution‚Äù was to force a bank transfer ‚Äî no card, PayPal, or retry option. What kind of hosting company does this in 2025? I replied to their email pointing out their mistake and demanding access, but they never responded. You don‚Äôt shut down a customer‚Äôs account without a proper dispute process or even a reply. This is unacceptable and unprofessional. Avoid Hetzner at all costs ‚Äî unreliable, outdated, and careless with customer data.

name: eddy
review_header: After 4 Years of Loyalty, Hetzner Locked Me Out and Threatened to Delete My Data
review_body: I have been with them since 2021. Decent and cheap web hosting. But until some changes in their payment system. Just because my monthly bill is too small, they have merged 3 months into 1 payment. It is not always easy to monitor when the 3 months has done a roundtrip (appreciate the reminders) and when I should expect an invoice. Once it's received, I don't even get a month to react and I get threats that dept collector agency will knock on my door and request the 6‚Ç¨ I owe them. And top of that, my services were blocked and my business got disrupted. The 3 months period and then 2 weeks to get it cleared is unbalanced, locking out and sending threats is shocking. Before coming here, I did emailed them to get to the bottom of this, but the staff who's name I believe is [removed]. was not interested to look at my complaint. Shocking. Not even apologized for disruption of my business. I am rating Hetzner with 2 stars just because they have competitive prices, but the customer care is horrible. If someone from Hetzner is reading this - Do not ask me to follow you up with more details or anything, instead ask your staff who dealt with me and then work it out. You weren't interested to solve my complaint, so now I'm not interested to update this review. Have a great day! Thanks Edit: Name removed, ticket id supplied, star rating updated from 2 to 1. Thanks for treating badly your customers and disrupting their businesses - Hetzner is not a reliable provider.

name: Ali Jafari
review_header: Outstanding Service and Support ‚Äì Highly Recommended
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for over three years now, and among all VPS providers I have tried, Hetzner has consistently delivered the best performance by far. Their services are extremely stable and reliable ‚Äî I can confidently say that I have never experienced any downtime. What truly sets Hetzner apart is their exceptional support team. Every time I have contacted them, they have responded quickly, professionally, and with great respect. They have always been there for me whenever I needed assistance. Hetzner is, without a doubt, the best VPS provider I have ever worked with.

name: Bartek
review_header: I wanted to correct my details on my‚Ä¶
review_body: I wanted to correct my details on my invoices, so I called the customer support number, and a rude person on the phone told me that "two times I told you that we can't do that." Which isn't true because correction notes for invoices are regular business practice, so I don't know why she was so rude. German support...

name: David Bernal
review_body: The best team so far. This is the best hosting service you can find nowadays. I have been through many companies trying to find a good service and Hetzner is the one that I can recommend 100% at this moment. Support is quick and efficient always. Uptime is excelent and the tools in the client area the best I¬¥ve seen.

name: Cristina
review_body: I always do my best to recommend and choose EU-based service providers to work with. We are based in the EU and I want to support EU business. But companies like Hetzner are the reason that the US beats us in everything still. For background, we are a not-for-profit and need to have reliable service providers because we are accountable to our members. Believe me when I say the bad ratings you see here are real. I can‚Äôt speak for the quality of their servers because we never got to touch one. But, in all other fronts, Hetzner provides an inferior service. Their dashboard is so archaic and confusing that customers are forced to rely on outdated documentation. The alternative is an unreliable, arrogant support desk with limited office hours (ridiculous in 2025). To top it all off, the company engages in questionable tactics to get their invoices settled. We ended up paying this one single invoice but we didn‚Äôt even get to touch the server. In fact, we didn‚Äôt even complete the verification process of our domain. First, their support desk works only for limited office hours. And, by then, the whole experience was so negative that we felt very uneasy about transferring our not-for-profit to their servers. So, we gave up. Without completing the verification process, we had no access to the server, supposedly ready for us to use. But they still gave themselves the right to invoice us. It saddens me that EU businesses are still reliant on these primitive, dubious, unreliable service providers. We flushed ‚Ç¨79 down the drain from our not-for-profit. That‚Äôs a hard one to justify. At least, we now found another EU-based host that has provided us with 24/7 support, a top-notch service and peace, so that we can focus on doing good, which is what we‚Äôre here for.

name: Nadir Belhadj
review_header: After 2 Years of Loyalty, Hetzner Locked Me Out and Threatened to Delete My Data
review_body: I‚Äôve been a loyal Hetzner customer for over 2 years, paying hundreds of euros to host critical infrastructure for my business ‚Äî including our email servers, ERP system, GitLab instance, and client-facing applications. Due to a temporary issue with my payment method, I missed one billing cycle ‚Äî and that‚Äôs when everything changed. Instead of treating me like a valued client, Hetzner immediately locked my account, disabled access to all services, and sent me cold, automated messages demanding payment. I reached out multiple times asking the most basic question: ‚û°Ô∏è "Is my data still safe?" To this day, I never received a clear answer. They refused to confirm whether my servers or databases were still intact. Yet they continued pressuring me to pay ‚Äî with vague, threatening messages that my data could be deleted. It felt like blackmail: ‚ÄúPay first, then maybe we‚Äôll see.‚Äù Imagine hosting your entire company‚Äôs infrastructure on a provider, only to be shut out completely ‚Äî with no human explanation, no account access, and no assurance that years of data haven‚Äôt been erased. This isn‚Äôt just bad customer service. It‚Äôs reckless and unethical, especially from a company that knows how critical customer data is. For startups and small businesses, data is everything. üí¨ My Message to Hetzner: If you truly care about your customers, especially long-term clients, treat people with respect. Automating service cancellations and refusing to provide clarity on data status while demanding payment is the opposite of professionalism. I‚Äôm now warning my clients and partners to avoid Hetzner unless you're ready to risk your data over one small billing delay. There are plenty of hosting providers who understand that business relationships are built on trust, transparency, and human support ‚Äî not just servers and invoices.

name: Anoop Anand
review_body: I've used several Server Auction machines with Hetzner over the years. Always had a good experience with their uptime and service.

name: –î–º–∏—Ç—Ä–∏–π
review_body: Disgusting service. Found on the internet that it was cheap. Banned immediately after I created a profile.

name: Andrej K.
review_header: Very prompt reply and service from‚Ä¶
review_body: Very prompt reply and service from support personnel. Top-notch infrastructure for root servers; highly customizable and powerful tools available. Top-notch service.

name: Emilie Caroline Lydie Cubaud
review_header: Feels like discrimination against small developers or foreigners
review_body: I tried to rent one server from Hetzner, not for big business or mining or anything strange, just for my small backend project. I wrote what I do, I explained everything clear and honest. Nothing illegal, nothing hidden. And then, they just delete my account. No question, no warning, no way to explain more. I was very surprised. I really don‚Äôt understand what I did wrong. I only wanted to test some scripts and automation for my app.

name: Colbol
review_body: The service they offer is reliable, however I missed a single 0.64 cent payment because my card was compromised, and are now only allowing me to settle the debt with a direct wire transfer ($50 fee just to wire transfer). So a $50 fee to settle a $0.64 fee on a server I closed a month ago‚Ä¶ locked my account so I couldn‚Äôt pay it on my own and deleted my server and all data.

name: N K
review_header: Hetzner pretends to care about its‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner pretends to care about its customers, but as a matter of fact you should expect your account to be immediately permanently banned upon registration should you be located outside of EU. They seem to imply that you can contact them on Reddit or over e-mail with your info and that they will lift the restrictions. I had to send them my ID and proof of identity only for them to ignore both my e-mail and my Reddit messages. Upon asking my EU friend to register there, everything worked out in the end. For the issues I encountered using their services customer support was extremely lacking, shallow, and quite literally did not care about you in the slightest. Other than that, their servers work OK, and for their price, it's actually not that bad, but I would never keep anything serious on Hetzner.

name: Francesco Zimbolo
review_header: Outstanding Techincal Support for private clients
review_body: Hetzner has some of the best technical support there is for private clients. We requested a KVM remote access to our dedicated server due to some internal technical issues. We could not see anything on the console. When we contacted hetzner technical support about it, not only they replaced the faulty KVM equipment (it confirmed it was an issue on their end), but they also found a faulty CPU fan and replaced that too without prompt from our end, and free of charge. Any time we had issues, they were able to provide swift and thorough support. Will recommend to anyone searching for a reliable, affordable and supportive server provider

name: Gerrit
review_body: Watch out for these scammer Hetzner,tell you that they charge you 8 Euros for registration and 2,8 Euros a month for fee but when you cancel your Registration in 4 days because Hetzner takes too long to set up the server and security and you follow their 14 day refund policy they still want to charge 38 Dollars for 4 days use when you can buy a domain for 10USD.They charge 28 USD for a domain fee and 10 USD for set up fee. Be careful with the rat scammer German Company.Stay away from there scammers.

name: G.P. Grant
review_body: Customer for 15 years ‚Äî total account lockout for one missed service We‚Äôve been a loyal Hetzner customer for over 15 years, with dozens of active and fully paid domains and email services. But recently, due to a single missed renewal of a minor, unused service, our entire account was blocked. This included: ‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Suspension of all active and paid services ‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Inaccessibility of mission-critical email and domains ‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Complete lockout from the admin panel ‚Äî we couldn‚Äôt even log in to manage or pay for anything There was no grace period, no escalated warnings, and no way to resolve it without full account suspension ‚Äî a shocking policy for any serious infrastructure provider. Blocking access to essential, paid services due to one unrelated, unpaid item is an unacceptable practice. This approach puts businesses at unnecessary risk and shows a lack of consideration for long-term clients. We can no longer recommend Hetzner for professional use unless this rigid policy is changed.

name: Mikkel
review_body: I was simply trying to sign up in hopes of getting a cheap server setup, but they thought my details looked suspicious (I guess?) and thus asked for ID. I sent them my passport, and today I woke up and saw it had been rejected. Reason? Not stated. Action? Complete account suspension. If you don't want new customers, just say so on your website. This was a waste of time (And who asks for ID after signing up like this anyway? I find that really strange)

name: Arash Abinama
review_header: Quick and to the point reply.

name: Obbz
review_header: A Victim of Its Own Success
review_body: Hetzner offers a fantastic service with great speeds at a price that's hard to beat. I genuinely cannot fault the quality of their product. The problem, ironically, is that the service is too good for its price. This has led to severe availability issues. I was unable to order any of the VPS servers in my budget across Europe, yet I noticed that more expensive alternatives were always in stock. This forced me to move to another, more expensive provider. I hope to come back one day, but there's no clear indication of when their supply will meet the immense demand. Hetzner has baked a pie so delicious that by the time you get to the counter, there are only crumbs left. I, for one, have no pie now.

name: Daniel Nilsson
review_body: Newcomer to Hetzner here. I'm so far very impressed by the price/performance ratio and the few times I've had specific issues, support has been swift and efficient. The rather messy and unintuitive admin interface does detract a bit from the overall impression, but I do not personally perceive it as that big of a deal.

name: Claudio
review_body: Terrible Experience with DMCA Abuse Management I had been using Hetzner for several years without major issues, but my recent experience with their DMCA abuse management system was nothing short of disastrous and forced me to switch providers. The Problem: I received four identical DMCA complaints for the same article, all regarding an official 2018 Italian State Police press release: AbuseID:F9872F:1A - Claimant: citysunnews75 (Tumblr) AbuseID:FB3964:21 - Claimant: citysunnews75 (Tumblr) AbuseID:FEBC8B:20 - Claimant: citysunnews75 (Tumblr) AbuseID:1014B81:20 - Claimant: dispatchmetronews.blogspot.com Evidence of Fraud Systematically Ignored: I provided detailed evidence clearly demonstrating the fraudulent nature of these claims: Chronological impossibility: Claimants claimed to have published content BEFORE it was made public by police Official source: The article was based on an Italian State Police press release distributed to all media Widespread publication: The same content appeared on dozens of established Italian news outlets Multiple identities: Four claims for the same content from different sources showed coordinated fraud Inadequate Support Response Despite overwhelming evidence of DMCA system abuse: Completely ignored evidence provided in detailed English Continued issuing new abuse IDs for the same content Threatened IP blocking instead of investigating system abuse Failed to implement protections against multiple fraudulent claims Unacceptable Consequences After four cycles of: Receiving fraudulent DMCA claim Providing detailed response with evidence of invalidity Complete ignorance of evidence New IP blocking threat Hetzner ultimately threatened permanent IP blocking if I didn't remove completely legitimate content, forcing me to: Waste valuable time dealing with fraudulent claims Urgently migrate all services to another provider Endure stress and disruption to protect legitimate content Systemic Problems Identified DMCA system easily abused without validity checks Technical staff lacking understanding of copyright basics for public domain content No protections against coordinated multiple claims Ineffective appeal process that ignores documented evidence Threatening approach instead of customer protection Recommendation AVOID HETZNER if you publish content that could be subject to false copyright claims. Their system is vulnerable to systematic abuse and support is inadequate for complex situations. I migrated to Aruba Cloud which has (I suppose, it is less cheaper, but maybe because they have smart tech support): More robust DMCA claim verification system Competent support that understands legal issues Protections against system abuse Technically sound service ruined by disastrous DMCA management and inadequate support. Services used: VPS Main issue: DMCA system vulnerable to abuse + Inadequate support Warning to Other Users If you run news sites, blogs, or any content-based business, be aware that Hetzner's DMCA system can be easily exploited by bad actors. A single fake complaint can snowball into multiple threats and forced migrations, regardless of how legitimate your content is. The fact that they threatened to block my IP after I provided clear evidence of coordinated fraud shows a fundamental misunderstanding of both copyright law and customer protection.

name: mohammed abuabed
review_header: I have been a satisfied Hetzner‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been a satisfied Hetzner customer since 2007. Their pricing is highly competitive, and their network uptime has been consistently reliable at 100%. However, server management is entirely self-service unless you opt for their fully managed hosting solution. Overall, the value for money is excellent, offering a great balance of quality and cost.

name: Kim Nielsen
review_body: Been using Hetzners dedicated server hosting for over 10 years and have been super-satisfied all along. Whenever there been issues with hardware or whatever (and there have been suprisingly few) they have been resolved quickly and competently. Highly recommended.

name: D.
review_body: Support not exisist. I've been waiting 20 hours for the backup to be made. It's terrible. Something went wrong. And support isn't responding!

name: Bandit
review_header: Reliable Infrastructure & Fast Support ‚Äì A Professional Choice
review_body: Reliable servers, great performance, and responsive support. Had a minor network config issue, and the team resolved it quickly and professionally. Solid provider for anyone running serious infrastructure. Highly recommended.

name: Darren Revell
review_body: Shockingly poor service provider. Threatened to shut us down due to a font issue. We completed their forms, but they claimed we had not. We sent proof that we had filled out their form, and we asked them to contact our client; they failed to do so. Our client also filled out their forms, which they claimed our client had not filled out. However, we proved that our client had indeed filled out their form and demonstrated the ability to use the font under the Adobe license. Our client also wrote to the font owner and covered the use of the font via Adobe, which the font owner thanked our client for. The form they have you fill out does not permit attachments, but you are to attach proof of purchase. It's an utter shambles of a provider. Thank you for your cut-and-paste reply, which has zero bearing on my complaint and best underlines why you are a very poor supplier. My complain is NOT that you investigated it is that your process to investigate was and remains fundamentally poor, like asking a user to provide an invoice on a form that has no ability to attach and an invoice that is positively moronic. A form which you provide and then multiple times say has not been filled in, despite us sending you your own mail system email which confirmed the forms were filled in. It pathetic.

name: Matt
review_body: I was looking at some of their other offerings and trying to see what locations were available for a particular "konsole" server, I accidentally completed the purchase of a server. I tried to reach out to support to have it cancelled or reversed but got no response. I immediately deleted the server, but still received an invoice for the product that I never used. I tried to explain this to support but they said that they will not do anything and that if I don't pay it, it will get sent to collections. I paid it and deleted my account.

name: Jorge Cardoso Leit√£o
review_body: It just works. Support also great!

name: Sadji
review_header: Think Twice Before Choosing This Service
review_body: If you genuinely care about your data and your clients' data, avoid using this provider. They can disable your account without any explanation or prior warning. P.S. This is not related to any invoice or payment issue.

name: Ale
review_header: Good and cheap hosting. strict registration
review_body: i've been using hetzner for about 3 months now and I havent had any complaints. There is nothing wrong with the services. They have a very nice dashboard. I had the 4vcpu 8gb ram vps for a while but downgraded to 3vcpu 4gb ram after realising i didnt need all that. I also like the fact that instead of blocking email ports outright, they let you request it which stops a lot of email spam IMO. My only complaint is that my account got flagged at first. so I had to either show passport as identificiation or pay a ‚Ç¨20 deposit which I did. Also, for those of you who are worried about them having your passport data for verification , if they messed up with your data even once the german data authority or eu authority would probably shut them down without a second thought. So i'm not really worried if I have to provide kyc data at some point.

name: Danny Webb
review_body: Incredible prices and first-class customer support. Highly recommended *****.

name: Juxhin
review_header: Extremely Disappointed ‚Äì Discriminatory, Abusive, and Unethical Behavior from Hetzner
review_body: I‚Äôve been a Hetzner customer for over 4 years, hosting over 10 servers and hundreds of websites for my business and clients. Without warning, Hetzner terminated my account ‚Äî no real explanation, no clear evidence, no fair process. It all started when they blocked one server IP. I responded to their message expressing my frustration, and soon after: My entire account was scheduled for deletion. My servers were downgraded to PHP 8.0, without my permission, breaking many live services. I lost access to file management tools and faced difficulties migrating my data (over 500GB still pending). I began receiving fake abuse reports targeting my other healthy servers. Despite my professional tone and history of on-time payments, Hetzner refused to provide logs, explanations, or even comply with my GDPR access requests. I believe this was a targeted and discriminatory act ‚Äî as an Albanian citizen, I was treated with hostility and disrespect. No customer, regardless of nationality, deserves this. I am now taking this public: Reporting to EU data protection and consumer authorities Publishing the story on Reddit, YouTube, and industry blogs Sharing my experience with IT media and digital rights groups I trusted Hetzner for mission-critical infrastructure ‚Äî they violated that trust completely. If you value transparency, fairness, and customer support, I strongly advise against using Hetzner.

name: Connacht Ab√∫
review_body: Hetzner was mentioned to me as a Hosting option over 5 years ago. I host many sites with them and their response , support , uptime and communication is 5 star. All that said - their pricing is very competitive too , a pleasure!

name: Ber Bau
review_header: I have been a customer for more than a‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been a customer for more than a decade and had no issues at all. Support was always helpful and friendly (and reasonably fast). I have tried many others over time. Some of them have been a bit cheaper, but none of them had a better overall experience for me!

name: EDB Reviewer
review_header: Good services ruined by awful staff
review_body: Good services, just a shame the customer service staff are all so obnoxiously rude and completely ignore what you say. I‚Äôve asked to raise a complaint 4 times now - have they raised a complaint? No, of course not. I‚Äôve asked to speak to a manager - they have just closed my ticket. What a joke. Is this what passes for good customer service in the eyes of Hetzner? Edit: I‚Äôve since reached out on the ticket a further four times, and been ignored every time. This is regarding an outstanding balance and is totally unprofessional. How am I able to resolve the issue if you just ignore me? Ticket ref is 2025070203019681 but I don‚Äôt know if Hetzner will see this, because they don‚Äôt seem to use Trustpilot correctly and haven‚Äôt requested my details through the Trustpilot system, so this will probably go no where.

name: PULSARS QUASARS
review_body: This company discriminates people after registration. They delete your account while all the information is valid and authenticated with identity document ... Many people complain about this service on the Internet

name: Alex Voronin
review_body: The worst service ever! After 3 years of being client of hetzner and hosting Non-Profit Charity accounting software and data - they cancelled and blocked our account REMOVING ALL DATA INCLUDING BACKUP, due to delay with the payment for a month, saying there is no option to recover super sensitive and critical accounting and TAX reporting information. Just imagine - they not just blocked an account as a temporary measure giving chance to pay off the bill - instead, they totally deleted all company information that were stored on their servers for 3 years obtaining payments regularly, but just for a one month delay with the payment - we lost everything! Support refuse to help and recover data despite number of escalations It seems to be a fashism is deep in the hetzner company management team blood leaking out into the policy and approach for a clients.

name: Ivan Agliardi
review_header: Outstanding hosting with exceptional technical support
review_body: I‚Äôve been using Hetzner for several years now, and I can confidently say they are one of the best hosting providers in the industry. Their infrastructure is rock-solid, performance is excellent, and pricing is more than competitive ‚Äî but what truly sets them apart is their technical support. On the rare occasions when hardware issues have occurred (a disk failure or a memory fault, for example), their response has been impressively fast and professional. Within minutes of opening a support ticket, a knowledgeable technician was already working on the issue. In every incident I‚Äôve experienced, hardware was diagnosed and replaced within the hour, minimizing downtime to an absolute minimum. The communication from the support team is also clear, transparent, and proactive. They always keep you informed of what‚Äôs happening, what steps they‚Äôre taking, and when you can expect the issue to be resolved. In an industry where support often feels like an afterthought, Hetzner truly delivers enterprise-grade service even to small and mid-sized customers. Their dedication to efficiency, reliability, and customer satisfaction is unmatched. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a dependable hosting partner backed by one of the most responsive support teams out there.

name: Marek Zaworski
review_header: I've been a customer for 5 years and‚Ä¶
review_body: I've been a customer for 5 years and I'm still satisfied, but for about 14 days now, they haven't had a VPS at all. Because of that, I can't develop my business, and if I could, it would only be on the weakest VPSs - it's a shame... Plus, it seems to me that the VPS panel has been acting up lately and is buggy... Anyway, I hope there won't be any new "bugs."

name: chehrehnegar
review_header: 5-star review for Hetzner ‚Äì Truly the Best
review_body: I‚Äôve been a customer of Hetzner for several years now, and I can confidently say they are the best hosting provider I‚Äôve ever worked with. Their user interface and overall user experience are top-notch ‚Äî clean, efficient, and easy to use. You can find everything you need without confusion, and everything just works the way it should. In terms of quality vs. pricing, Hetzner offers the highest quality at the most affordable prices. It‚Äôs rare to come across such a perfect balance of performance and cost. Issues? Honestly, they‚Äôre extremely rare. But on the rare occasion something does come up, their support team is professional, fast, and kind. They don‚Äôt just solve problems ‚Äî they do it respectfully and efficiently. After several years as a happy customer, I can easily say: Hetzner is simply outstanding. Highly recommended.

name: Marcus
review_body: Cheap and powerful VPS provider Yes, they require ID (via a third party) but this shouldn't put off anyone legitimate - it's to keep spammers, hackers and those hosting bad content off their service.

name: Joao
review_body: Since June 09th, 2025, I started receiving a massive amount of spam messages on my email (more than the usual). After checking the headers, I noticed that all these email come from Hetzner IP addresses. I reported the IP's and they removed, which is good, but the spammers keep returning with new IP's (all from Hetzner). I kept reporting all IP's to them the entire month of June, and they kept banning the spammers who also kept returning then with other IP addresses. I'm tired... I'm seriously thinking about changing my email address because I'm tired of reporting spammers to Hetzner just to see they coming back again some days later. These spammers are using Hetzner IP address and sending messages trying to impersonate legitimate companies, such as Docusign with malware links (always hosted on Secureserver.net too). While I believe Hetzner did a good job banning the IP's I reported, I believe they are doing a bad job avoiding the spammers to come back and I'm tired of reporting, I'm not a Hetzner employee. These spammers have a pattern, their emails always come with cheap domains TLD such as (.cfd, .sbs, etc) and their emails always have a 'document01' on the from, but Hetzner can't do anything to block them. Edit 1: After my complaint to Trustpilot, the spam reduced a lot, I'd say it reduced in 90%, so I'll increase to 2 stars now, they seem to be finally blocking these spammers.

name: Danylo
review_header: Hosting sites that conduct fraudulent and illegal activities and ignoring reports
review_body: On June 2, I filed a complaint under the ticket number indicated in the review, to the site that sells Meta Quest 3 and claims that it is legal, but in fact sells without permission from Meta itself and delivers intentionally broken goods, while the site does not contain information about who the owner is or other legal information, as required by Ukrainian law. Unfortunately, the hetzner company is not taking any action against this site at the moment, despite my complaint

name: Armin
review_header: I lost access to all my data
review_body: They removed my servers and account without giving me a warning or giving me time to download my data.

name: BW
review_header: For account creation they require copy‚Ä¶
review_body: For account creation they require copy of e.g. passport. No one should ever send a copy of your passport to anyone! You have no guarantee the data is handle securely (i.e. deleted right after the ID verification) and is therefor a subject for abuse and a risk of someone take over you identity. So it's pretty stupid and unacceptable they ask for for this. Many countries has some kind of digital ID which can be used instead.....which by the is a much more trustworthy way of ID verification.

name: Rami Shawwa
review_body: Great support and proper security measures vs phishing and social engineering attempts. They immediately report any attempts of impersonation or take over user accounts.

name: Atakan
review_body: The future is ARM64 and I love their Ampere stuff. I just wish I also could get dedicated ARM CPU cores instead of just having shared ones. One note about an issue that I see people having is their account getting disabled even after submitting their passport. This is a real issue and I experienced it before. The company can be non-transparent but I am transparent. The reason is CGNAT pools. There aren't many ipv4 addresses left so ISPs will usually give several people the same IP address. I assure you multiple people already registered a Hetzner account and tried to take advantage of the 20‚Ç¨ credit with multiple accounts. That's why your account is getting deleted without notice. I got a static IP and my problems were gone. Some of the other comments do have me worry though, will Hetzner screw me after being their loyal customer in a couple of years?

name: Maxima
review_header: i am happy with server specs
review_body: i am happy with server specs, availability, support and web-config

name: Ivan Arkololovici
review_header: I have been a long time customer and‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been a long time customer and will continue to be that. Best hosting service in the world, great customer service and overall just great.

name: Piotr
review_body: I've tried at least four other VPS providers over the years, and Hetzner comes out on top in every area: reliability, pricing, support quality, product range, and geographical coverage. Their service is rock-solid, the pricing is unbeatable (no long-term contracts!), and the overall experience has been consistently excellent. Highly recommended.

name: Tjarko Rikkerink
review_body: Amazing service and awesome features on their Cloud Platform, it is truly topnotch and a treat to work with from a sysadmin point of view.

name: Flavio
review_header: Not User Friendly. UI and Customer Support needs improvements
review_body: I signed up with Hetzner after friends recommended them for performance and cost, but the experience has been quite frustrating. The User Interface is confusing and badly designed. Basic operations, such as accessing the site via a test domain (to test service functionality before linking the public domain) are hard to figure out. The test domain permalink is seemingly impossible to access without contacting support, which is generally slow and unhelpful. Hetzner is good for prices and performance on unmanaged servers, but loses many points in UI, user friendliness, ease of use, and Customer Support. I hope you can improve these areas of your service. Thank you.

name: ŸÖÿµÿ∑ŸÅŸâ ŸÉÿßÿ∏ŸÖ
review_header: Bad company, they already hacked by hackers
review_body: I bought a VPS for windows server, when I opened the server in next day before install or download any apps from internet, I found some text files contains Gamils and passwords, I removed the server and bought another server, after few months my server hacked by ransomware, I send it an email to Hetzner to help me they respond me ( we will not be able to assist you with recovery.), now I lose it my data in the server my business stopped also.

name: ƒ∞smail √á
review_header: Avoid Hetzner: Unresponsive Support and Unfair Billing
review_body: While I was planning to purchase a dedicated server from Hetzner, I mistakenly selected a managed server through their system. I was unaware that their payment model worked on a "use first, pay later" basis. As soon as I realized the mistake, I attempted to cancel the setup and immediately sent an email to their support team explaining the situation in detail. Unfortunately, I received no response, and the server was automatically deployed. I canceled the service immediately after the setup was completed. About a month later, I received an invoice for ‚Ç¨199.32 as a ‚Äúsetup fee‚Äù and was informed that the debt would be handed over to a collection agency if I didn‚Äôt pay. Despite clearly and repeatedly explaining the mistake, the support team showed no interest in addressing the issue. I was genuinely shocked by their indifferent, unhelpful, and customer-disregarding attitude. The responses I received were so automated and generic that it was difficult to tell whether they were written by a human or a bot ‚Äî and frankly, it didn‚Äôt feel like anyone was actually listening. This experience made it clear to me that Hetzner cares far more about issuing invoices and collecting payments than about customer satisfaction. Their insistence on charging for a service I did not use, their refusal to halt the process despite timely warnings, and their complete lack of a solution-oriented approach reveal a lot about how they operate. Therefore, I strongly advise everyone: steer clear of Hetzner. Their service quality, support responsiveness, and approach to customer communication are seriously lacking.

name: Antonios Bazakas
review_header: A big thank you to Hetzner!
review_body: A big thank you to Hetzner! I've been using their services for 15 years, and they have never let me down. Always reliable, stable, and professional. I highly recommend them!

name: cliente
review_body: Very unprofesional, Had some payment issue, because they activated a service that I didnt use the hole month, and after that they obligated me to pay for it ( That was a lot of money for a service that I never used and asked them to cancel).

name: George
review_header: They Shut Down My Account Without Warning ‚Äì Zero Support
review_body: Hetzner is by far the worst experience I‚Äôve had with any hosting provider. I had a payment issue (caused by their broken payment system), and I immediately emailed support explaining the situation and asking for help. Instead of responding or offering any solution, they permanently shut down my account ‚Äî without a single warning or notice. This directly violates Section 8.1 of their own Terms, which states: ‚ÄúHetzner is entitled to block services after prior notification.‚Äù No notification. No suspension. Nothing. Just immediate account termination. And when I asked them to reopen my account to fix the payment or at least recover my data, they refused. Their unprofessionalism cost my business real money. They ignored their own policies and punished me for their own system failure. Avoid this company at all costs ‚Äî they don‚Äôt care about customers.

name: Amirmohammad Pourmohammad
review_body: Good Experience ‚Äì Uptime and Pricing: Over the past four years of using the service, I had a positive experience in terms of stable uptime and reasonable pricing. Overall, it was satisfying. Bad Experience ‚Äì Support: The major issue was with customer support. After four years of active use, my account was suddenly restricted due to some technical issues. However, I never received a clear explanation about the cause. Despite sending multiple follow-up emails over several days, the only response I got was that the restriction was permanent ‚Äî without any reasoning or solution provided. The fact that support didn‚Äôt even attempt to resolve my issue after such a long period of loyalty was the worst part of my experience with the service.

name: John
review_header: North Americans if you care about your money, avoid Hetzner
review_body: I'm a tech industry veteran from North America with over 15 years of experience, and I‚Äôve seen a lot. From cloud cost horror stories to billing mistakes that got resolved with a single support ticket. But my recent experience with Hetzner was so poor I felt the need to warn others. With major providers like AWS, Google, or Microsoft, billing misunderstandings are common. But those companies often waive questionable charges because they understand the long-term value of keeping a paying customer. A perfect example: a Vercel client had a $25K bill slashed down to a fraction after negotiating with them. I‚Äôve personally seen companies get 5 and 6-figure cloud bills waived when it made sense because smart businesses know it pays off in the long run. Not Hetzner. Here‚Äôs what happened. I bought a small SaaS project and briefly took over the seller‚Äôs Hetzner account to get access to some environment variables. Turns out, the seller left their old servers running and Hetzner considered me the owner without any real notification. Weeks later, I found a bill in my spam folder. Less than $15. I contacted support right away and explained the situation. For context, I had an active Hetzner account paying around $50 per month. I politely asked if they could waive the old bill or, if not, let me pay it online. Their response? No waiving, no exceptions. And get this, the only way to pay the bill was with a wire transfer. That would cost me over $50 just to send a $15 payment that wasn‚Äôt even mine to begin with. Their only alternative? Debt collection. So I canceled everything with Hetzner, moved all my services to AWS, and closed my account. They can keep the $15. They just lost a $500 per year customer over an issue that most companies would have resolved in one email. If you're a North American company or anyone used to modern customer service, consider this a heads-up. Hetzner might seem cheap on paper, but when something goes wrong, you're on your own. No flexibility, no empathy, no basic online payment options in 2025. You get what you pay for. Editing my review since I got the generic response from Hetzner: I was in contact with Hetzner for a week. Their "customer service" team (if you can call it that) was nice enough to simply give me two options: wire or we start debt collection. So if you were looking for something cheap and had the bad luck of signing up with Hetzner - I urge you, transfer EVERYTHING out. Because at the first hiccup, you're on your own. The cheapness goes way beyond the servers and is probably what the company‚Äôs built on. Lastly, don‚Äôt take my word for it. Please go ahead and read the horror stories from REAL people in the comments - rude support, random deletion of accounts, blocking you from accessing your account, billing you after you canceled your account. If it‚Äôs a tech horror story, they have it in the worst way possible.... If you‚Äôre actually interested in setting up your company foundation or even a side hustle ‚Äì avoid Hetzner like the plague..!

name: Block
review_header: Hetzner is still billing me after‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is still billing me after disabling my account, meaning I cannot and have not been able to access the services (that I am already cant use) to disable or manage them for the time they are billing me for, cannot access the account at all to even pay the invoice they sent for a month that I never even had an account with them. I paid for services initially then they disabled my account and continue to bill me while giving me no way to pay, disable services or stop them. They are extorting me and not even allowing me to pay them to leave me alone which is all I want. You should not use them if you care about reliability, your data, your money or your sanity.

name: Volkan √ñzer
review_header: Extremely Unprofessional Support & Unethical Billing Practices
review_body: I‚Äôve had a terrible experience with Hetzner recently, and I feel the need to warn others. Due to a personal tragedy (the passing of a close family member) I missed a payment deadline. Once they warned me and I realized it, I immediately paid the outstanding invoice. Despite that, Hetzner blocked my console access and kept me locked out for weeks. Even worse; they continued to bill me for services I couldn‚Äôt use or manage in any way. This alone is unethical, but what shocked me most was the tone of their support team. Instead of assisting or showing any empathy, I was threatened with legal action in the end of conversation, i tried to manage situation with a soft approach. But support had no professional conduct, just threats. It's outrageous that a company would treat a paying customer this way. No matter how powerful or cheap the servers are, if you‚Äôre completely at their mercy when something goes wrong, it‚Äôs just not worth it. If you value respectful support and transparent billing, stay far away.

name: JJ
review_header: Simply great hosting provider - these guys know what they are doing!
review_body: Great so far. Very well priced for bare metal servers, good tools for starting, setting up and monitoring. It's not as super slick as some competitors, but these guys KNOW their stuff, which for me is way better than some crappy animated ajax heavy UI. Support wise, when I had a PSU die in the middle of the night it was swapped out in a matter of hours. Couldn't ask for more. After being let down by another supplier we're centralising all of our servers on Hetzner and a backup supplier as I know we can trust them.

name: Oscar M.
review_header: Fast and professional support ‚Äì very satisfied
review_body: I needed help with setting up my server and accessing it, and Hetzner delivered a truly great experience. Support was fast, professional, and communication was clear. The USB drive and KVM access were prepared without delay and I was kept updated throughout the process. It‚Äôs great to feel like more than just a ticket number ‚Äì you actually get real support here. I‚Äôm very happy with both the service and the performance. I would definitely recommend Hetzner to anyone looking for reliable servers and great customer support.

name: Nikolaj Sommer
review_body: Great cloud provider. I'd moved from Vultr to Hetzner. Their system is very nice. E.g. vultr didn't support download of snapshots - either couldn't i download DNS zone files. So i had to move it manually from Vultr to Hetzner. But the good thing is that Hetzner does support it, so in the future it will be much easier, tho I don't think i'll move from Hetzner.

name: Daniel Woffinden
review_body: Had a virtual server for years with minimal issues

name: Alex Brand
review_header: Good uptime and the easiest company I‚Ä¶
review_body: Good uptime and the easiest company I have worked with to get a dedicated server up and running without too much hassle. You could say the panel is outdated but in my opinion if it isn't broke... don't touch it everything functions as it should.

name: Jeff L
review_header: I personally have had a great‚Ä¶
review_body: I personally have had a great experience with them. They are direct and transparent. They take security seriously and have great systems setup. I wish they had an official partner program setup, I would partner my company with them.

name: Lennard Dorst
review_body: The good: The prices are good and very competitive. If you care about budget: Go for Hetzner. Really enjoyed that. The bad: The support is friendly but not helpful. As my account was deactivated due to unpaid invoices, I could not see the amount due on my account. I asked the support, but they gave me a wrong amount to pay twice. Could have been easily prevented with some thoughts. This is also the reason I have decided to change.

name: Arne
review_body: I have been a Hetzner customer for many years now, with well over 30 accounts ‚Äî including for professional use. These include small web hosting packages, domain registrations, and even a cloud server. I've always had excellent experiences with the technical support. Unfortunately, the support for domain-related issues leaves much to be desired. The staff there seem to be chronically overworked, responding only every three days with canned replies that lately haven‚Äôt been helpful at all. The responses from different support agents often contradict each other, which isn‚Äôt helpful either. In my case, I wanted to transfer a domain from one Hetzner account to another. The cancellation and transfer tools don‚Äôt allow for this. After a week of support emails, I was finally told that there‚Äôs apparently a PDF form I could print out and fax. According to one online support agent, I filled it out incorrectly ‚Äî while a phone support agent told me it was completely correct. Nevertheless, I had to fill it out, sign it, stamp it, and fax it multiple times from various places. It strongly reminded me of the infamous permit from Asterix & Obelix. And Hetzner isn‚Äôt even a government agency. I don‚Äôt even want to imagine how much support cost Hetzner has now invested into this single case ‚Äî which they certainly won‚Äôt recover anytime soon from a Level 1 hosting package for two euros a month. Finally it took more than four weeks all in all to move a domain inhouse from one account to another. My suggestion would be to make internal domain transfers possible using the registrar‚Äôs Auth-Codes and, most importantly, to increase support capacity for domain-related issues. As it stands, I no longer recognize the provider I once affectionately referred to as ‚Äúmy digital home.‚Äù Edit: I included ticket number, so your answer seems generated.

name: Jonny Carter Marechal Rondon
review_body: Hello. I have been a Hetzner customer for several years. I can only thank you for the services and security. Very polite customer service staff. Fast service. Very good prices compared to other data centers. Very easy to use website. Very well maintained equipment. Well, that's it. Thank you very much, Milton Teixeira da Silva.

name: EKO PLAM
review_header: Exceptionally high quality service for more than 12 years
review_body: Exceptionally high quality service and technical support. We have been using Hetzner services for over 12 years.

name: Cal C
review_body: They will not let you delete your account until an invoice is generated and they can charge you money. Absolutely horrendous platform and worse customer service. Extreme caution. Reply to their comment about post billing: I am aware of post billing. I have cancelled my account in April and you still don't allow me to delete it and I have a credit of 20 euro and you actually invoiced me for 0.01 cent which is ridiculous. I happily pay and use many other services with post billing. I have a problem with your customer service and your horrible platform, as you show here. TLDR: use Digital Ocean or AWS. Stay clear of them. They have no idea what they're doing and do have abslutely zero customer centricity as all the reviews online clearly show.

name: Grigol
review_body: I'm using Hetzner's service since 2015. Great experience and support.

name: Amine M
review_body: I signed up with Hetzner after friends recommended them, but the experience has been nothing but frustrating. On my first attempt, my account was immediately flagged for ID verification ‚Äî possibly because I‚Äôm from Tunisia. I submitted my driver‚Äôs license, only to receive an email days later saying my account was deleted because they didn‚Äôt accept the document. I gave it another try, this time using my passport. After a long wait, they asked for more verification. I completed their KYC process (passport + selfie), which clearly showed as verified. Yet, four business days later, my account is still stuck on ‚Äúpending‚Äù with no communication from support. After checking online, I saw many others reporting similar issues ‚Äî some even lost their data due to sudden account deletions. That was the final straw. I deleted my account and moved on. I‚Äôve never had such a difficult onboarding experience ‚Äî not even with free-tier services. Hetzner might offer competitive pricing, but the risk and support delays aren‚Äôt worth it. UPDATE: After Hetzner reply below, I can 100% deny their version of the story, there is no missing step and I‚Äôm sure they are just saying that. I‚Äôm an IT professional and I‚Äôm sure I got verification successful for the extra check (email with a KYC link)‚Ä¶ I can‚Äôt trust you anymore to not delete my account in the future without any warnings‚Ä¶ I will use another provider for sure.

name: Viacheslav
review_body: The services was providerd. But, when we faced with problem with outstanding payment with credit card expired they erased all our valued data without any chance to restore it even after payment. It`s all for the debt 8 Euro!. Those who fell for the benefits of low prices should be prepared for data loss and terrible customer support

name: Dzmitry Lahoda
review_body: things work with them and good prices, hope they reconsider their negative attitude to secured computations

name: Angelika Walder
review_header: Top-notch service, reliable performance ‚Äì highly recommended!
review_body: I‚Äôve been a loyal customer of Hetzner Online GmbH for many years, and I can honestly say their service is outstanding! As a web host for many of my clients, I‚Äôve tried several providers, but Hetzner has consistently proven to be professional and reliable in every area. There have never been any issues with server performance or availability. On the rare occasion that there were minor problems during a transfer from another provider to Hetzner (which unfortunately is not uncommon with some other providers), the friendly and knowledgeable customer service team was always quick to assist. Their response time is incredible ‚Äì most requests are resolved within just a few hours. What really sets Hetzner apart is the excellent price-to-performance ratio. They offer extremely competitive rates without compromising on quality. Additionally, the ability to make all server configurations yourself without facing constant limitations or extra charges for every small adjustment is a major advantage. This is something that many other providers unfortunately don‚Äôt offer. In summary: Hetzner is a provider you can fully trust. Fast response times, excellent support, and great value for money make this company an absolute recommendation!

name: An actual reviewer
review_body: Wouldn‚Äôt touch them again. Rude, unprofessional, and tried to hit me with debt collectors over ‚Ç¨9, seriously? For something I didn‚Äôt even use. That kind of threat could‚Äôve damaged my and my company‚Äôs credit score. Wildly irresponsible and frankly dangerous behaviour for a company over such a petty amount. Greedy, reckless, and not worth your time.

name: R G
review_body: Avoid, Rude customer service, Charge when not used. Unprofessional company. Will not be using them for any future projects.

name: LS
review_body: I had read some negative reviews about Hetzner, particularly about accounts being banned shortly after registration. Despite the concerns, I decided to give it a try. I carefully reviewed their terms of service to ensure I didn‚Äôt make any mistakes. I did everything by the book: I didn‚Äôt use a VPN, I registered with my real name and accurate address, and I used my personal credit card, with matching name and 2FA enabled for payment. To further confirm my identity, I also submitted my government-issued ID when requested. Despite all this, my account was still canceled. This was my first time using Hetzner, so there‚Äôs no reason my device should have been flagged or fingerprinted as suspicious. I understand the importance of fraud prevention and customer protection, I can't help but feel that Hetzner‚Äôs system may be aggressive or even discriminatory. Many of the negative reviews here point to the same issue: accounts being canceled with little explanation. From what I‚Äôve seen, if you can make it through the verification process or avoid triggering their ridiculous automated checks the actual services seem solid. Thanks!

name: Ed
review_header: Crap. Didn't bother to check who I'm.
review_body: Ordered service on 1st of May 2025. They asked me to upload scan of my passport. Used scan copy of one of my passports. No response. Today (5th of May) tried to login and system says account is disabled. They could ask linkedin profile for instance. Didn't bother. Not professional. Stay away.

name: Rafael Valiev
review_body: Amazing quality of low price. Happy to move from DigitalOcean to Hetzner

name: Packsfool
review_header: Close my account without reson and Even when I said I had the ability to fully re-authenticate!
review_body: I created an account on Hetzner a few days ago and did full authentication. Then I created a server to run cPanel. During the server configuration and in the final stages, I was suddenly sent an email stating that my account was closed and my server was completely deleted! They gave no reason for closing my account, despite me stating that I could re-verify completely and that I was a real person. I sent them several emails, but after two days they replied, "Sorry, your account has been closed!" without any explanation.

name: Alexander Grinevskiy
review_header: Account verification rejected with no reasons.
review_body: I've been using Hetzner few years ago, and everything was fine. Now I need new server and decide to go with hetzner. Registered account, as i have lost access to old one. Provide all details for account verification my local passport, long permit stay of other country where i resided currently. Driver license. Waited for two days and after that that send me a message that I' suspicious person (I suppose it nationality discrimination, originally I have Russian passport) , and no reason explained to me why is that. Don't waste your time on them.

name: Manolis Papadopoulos
review_header: Thanks from a VERY happy customer!
review_body: I would like to thank you for your prompt response and your patience, especially Mr Christer Karlsson, who was excellent!

name: Faisal
review_body: Account closed without any explanation. Their excuse is that they cannot give an explanation because of security reasons.

name: Rob van Heijningen
review_header: I have been using Hetzner‚Äôs cloud‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been using Hetzner‚Äôs cloud hosting services extensively and can confidently say they deliver exceptional performance combined with outstanding customer support. From the very beginning, the deployment of servers was incredibly fast, smooth, and reliable. The control panel is intuitive and allows for easy scaling of resources whenever needed. Their infrastructure provides excellent speed and uptime, critical for running professional applications and services without interruptions. What truly sets Hetzner apart, however, is their customer support. Whenever I had questions ‚Äî whether technical or administrative ‚Äî their support team responded quickly, clearly, and effectively. They demonstrate deep technical knowledge and genuine commitment to helping customers succeed. Issues are often resolved within minutes, not hours, which is rare in the hosting industry. In terms of price-performance ratio, Hetzner simply outperforms most competitors. You receive high-quality servers at a very affordable rate, with no hidden costs. Summary in points: ‚Ä¢ Extremely fast and reliable cloud hosting ‚Ä¢ Intuitive and powerful management interface ‚Ä¢ Responsive, knowledgeable, and friendly support team ‚Ä¢ Excellent uptime and performance stability ‚Ä¢ Best-in-class price-to-performance ratio If you are looking for a professional and dependable cloud hosting provider, I highly recommend Hetzner without hesitation!

name: Bart
review_body: I have been using Hetzner services for 8 years. Technical support responds quickly, during this period there were only three failures that affected my services for a dozen or so minutes. During this period I had dozens of VPSs, currently I have 8 of them, which work really well. I like the possibility of paying by the hour, when I want to test something or need an additional server for a few days. Servers are available within seconds of generating them in the panel or via API. I mainly use: VPS, volumes, private network. Soon I will probably expand with a dedicated server bought at hetzner auctions. I really recommend it!

name: Cristiano Moreira do Nasciment
review_header: I have worked with Hetzner for 3 years
review_body: I have been working with hetzner for over 3 years, I had 2 invoice problems and they were resolved quickly, 2 invasion problems and they were also resolved quickly.

name: David Berndtsson
review_header: I've used this service for a year and‚Ä¶
review_body: I've used this service for a year and I'm a big fan. Dedicated server 10G upgrade is reasonably priced and my servers have been running very stable! I wish you all the best!

name: EO
review_body: Amazing customer service and great prices

name: Mark
review_header: We moved from a provider that we had‚Ä¶
review_body: We moved from a provider that we had been with for more than 20 years. When I called the person was very polite and helped with my questions. They seem great. Pricing is very good.

name: YE
review_header: Dear Hetzner, you are flagged as suspicious
review_body: Dear Hetzner I used my Apple Keychain and autofill features to generate my email and password for me for security purposes (to protect from data leaks). All of my data is completely genuine, complete and correct. If you see it as suspicious - the problem is you have broken security checks. Please verify the correctness of it because looks like you loosing your customers because of it. There are many ways to check my address (bills, another documents), my bank credentials. For some reason you just decide to bounce a customer because you see it as "suspicious", but not to provide ways to prove his identity. Hope at least you catch some real threats by rejecting icloud relay emails and auto generated passwords.

name: Hayden Falzon
review_header: Great at getting the big picture right!
review_body: Hetzner servers are not the best... not even close to the best. But they are good. Yes they are a little dated in hardware. But if there is one thing I can depend on Hetzner for it is their dependability! They get the little things right and it adds up to a fantastic service! I have actually yet to need any reason to contact support for anything (Aside from signing up and sending a few documents over) I would recommend Hetzner over a lot of other players for their VPS shared (Anywhere) and Dedicated Servers (In Europe). I have been using them for nearly a year now! And I am so happy that I have found them. They are great. Do your self a favour and before you use DO or VULTR (Which I aslo like) try out Hetzner. The reason I am writing this, is despite being great, I have been on the hunt for a different product line namely a dedicated VPS with specific specs (NVME and modern CPU (They have AMD Epyc 7x and 9x for their dedicated VPS offerings, but no option it seems to get which ever, seems like draw of the cards) and have only found a dredge of armatures when compared to Hetzner. So I wanted to let people know that this is a great island in the sea of mediocrity.

name: Luca
review_body: Really a bad service. Everything on their online console is broken. After I bought a service from Hetzner my account was instantly flagged as fraudulent (although I paid and did nothing wrong except using Linux and Firefox, that combo seems to trigger their shitty fraud prevention system). I just thought that they‚Äôve banned my account. After some time I discovered that they continued to charge me (without sending ANY payments or overdue notification, since the account was, in fact, blocked) simple because I tried to contact them to find out why I was blocked and what could I do to restore my account (in order to try the service again). Not only did they not apologize for the disservice, but also asked me to pay the overdue payments of a service I was NEVER able to consume because of them.

name: Ahmad
review_header: From Frustration to Resolution: Hetzner Fixed My Registration Issue
review_body: After initially facing issues with my account verification, Hetzner took the time to review my case. Although my first experience was frustrating, I was pleased to see they reached out to help me resolve the issue. üôå They asked me to resubmit my documents, and once I did, everything was processed smoothly. I appreciate their attention to my concerns and their professional handling of the situation. I‚Äôm now a satisfied customer, and I‚Äôm looking forward to using Hetzner‚Äôs services without any further problems. üíªüí° While my initial experience was disappointing, their team showed they care about customer satisfaction in the end. Thank you, Hetzner! üòä Thanks to their professionalism and quick action, my account was verified, and I can now fully access Hetzner‚Äôs services. I genuinely appreciate how they handled my situation, and it‚Äôs reassuring to see a company stand by its customers and resolve issues when they arise. Thank you, Hetzner team, for your excellent support!

name: Puvipavan P
review_body: My account was instantly flagged during signup, and they asked me to provide proof to proceed further. When I sent my driving license, they rejected it and permanently disabled my account without any explanation. I followed up with their support, but they refused to reveal the reason behind the rejection. I suspect it might be because of my name. The morons handling the verification don‚Äôt seem to understand that different cultures have different naming conventions, and the names on official documents might not appear in the same order. They‚Äôre rejecting accounts as if we‚Äôre trying to use their service for free. Ridiculous. Therefore, I decided to switch to Vultr. Vultr offers the same affordable pricing while maintaining quality and providing a lot of location and services options. Bandwidth is the only drawback. But that‚Äôs a trade-off I‚Äôm okay with, considering how frustrating Hetzner‚Äôs process is.

name: proximity
review_body: My account got almost immediately deactivated after registration. I didn't even have a chance to go through the verification process or create any resources. They did not include any sort of information on why my account got blocked or if it's possible to appeal in the message.

name: Andrei Petrov
review_header: Moved to Hetzner VPS from IONOS
review_body: Migrated 3 of my projects to Hetzner already and the only difficulties I had was setting up the e-mail server (failed in the end, probably some ports locked on the global level as no visible issues on the server and all checks passed). Apart from that, works smooth, DNS and VPS management panel is good. As a results invoices are much lower, quality is much better.

name: Gerd Eden
review_header: Quick and competent answer to my‚Ä¶
review_body: Quick and competent answer to my question.

name: biili
review_body: I was a client from 2021 and recently had some problems with automated payment system they have, i don't have time to check all the bills every month that's why i have setup a automated payment , somehow the system didn't work and they canceled my account and lost all my data . Aldo i paid the unpaid invoice as soon as i new there is a problem with the payment still can get my data back :) Also what i don't really understand is why they are asking for a phone nr when you register and when is a problem with the account they chose not to call you to let you know , i believe is easier to send a e-mail that maybe ends in spam or you don't see it. Think twice bifore you decide to go with them , after 4 years of paing you might end up without your data :)

name: Kevin
