review_body: I don't get the negativity I have a managed server that I use to run quite a few websites. Never had any problems, customer service is FAST and Hetzner is CHEAP. Tried dozens of hosting providers, Hetzner beats them all.

name: Lakshay Behl
review_header: Not for actual real world businesses
review_body: 1-Star Review ‚Äì Do not waste your time with Hetzner if you‚Äôre an actual business owner Hetzner might offer good infrastructure ‚Äî but their automated identity system is absolutely broken and built with zero regard for real-world entrepreneurs. I was asked to verify my ID not because I failed anything, but because their system auto-flagged me for using a U.S. billing address. I‚Äôm a non-U.S. person operating a U.S. entity, which is a completely valid global business scenario. They prefilled ‚ÄúUnited States‚Äù and offered no option to change it. Then they rejected my identity document based on the country they forced me into. To top it off, their system won‚Äôt let you change payment method unless you pass ID verification ‚Äî and PayPal isn‚Äôt even supported in many countries. So the flow is: ‚Ä¢ You can‚Äôt pay unless verified ‚Ä¢ You can‚Äôt verify unless your ID matches the wrong country ‚Ä¢ You can‚Äôt change the country ‚Ä¢ You can‚Äôt reach a human It‚Äôs Kafka with a logo. I wasted 20 minutes and got nothing. I moved to Vultr instead and was live in 5. Hetzner might be good for hobby devs in Germany, but if you‚Äôre a global business building real infrastructure, stay away. They don‚Äôt deserve your attention or your money.

name: George
review_header: Refused my application and cancelled my‚Ä¶
review_body: Refused my application and cancelled my server purchase for absolutely no reason

name: Nelleke
review_header: Never regretted our switch to Hetzner
review_body: We have switched to Hetzner a few years back and couldn't be happier. Not only was it have the price of what we previously paid, but their support is extraordinary helpfull.

name: Aidan Sowa
review_body: nice!!!!! Very good.

name: Artur Torosian
review_body: They keep billing me despite i've deleted my account

name: Harsha Madhushan
review_header: Best place to buy your own server
review_body: Using the Hetzner server for almost 3 years and purchased a second one yesterday. The best thing about Hetzner is very competitive prices and support 24hrs available and it's responsive. The support team is understandable and helpful. The servers are powerful and also look solid. Nothing bad I experienced so far.

name: faysal sajeeb
review_body: You guys are terrible. I tried to create an account using my PayPal card, but the verification process failed. I tried to get verified with my NID and birth certificate. All I got in return was an email saying this: """ Dear Mr Md Faysal, After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team """ I also heard that you guys terminate services without any warnings, which will definitely incur losses for the people relying on your server for their business.

review_body: Happy with the products so far, and support is really helpful

review_body: We have been working successfully with Hetzner for several years. Excellent service and excellent support even on custom projects like ours.

name: Kadz Daman
review_body: scammer don't use, they even threatened to send debt collectors even though I asked them to cancel. Avoid them at all costs.

name: Frank Hartmann
review_body: I am totally satisfied with their products. What really stands out to me is their support. Hetzner has regularly answered any contact-request within a day, and every answer has been helpful and friendly.

name: Georgios Voudouris
review_header: Hetzner is one of the best hosting‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is one of the best hosting providers‚Äîcheap and reliable for the average Joe who just wants a dedicated server or to upload something to the cloud. The support and dedicated server delivery could be faster, and to be honest, the robot dedicated server management site needs a UI/UX rework. But after all, 5/5. I love them.

name: Ege Ugur
review_body: What a terrible customer service! After they imposed some changes in their servers, I decided to leave Hetzner and I transferred all my websites to OVH. After that, I didn't want to deal with messy interface, I sent a very very clear email that I want to cancel my subscription on a certain date. Usually this kind of email is enough for many service providers, however it wasn't enough for Hetzner. They sent me an email, which i thought of an automated response, that I can cancel my subscription myself. I thought my willingness and clear email should suffice and didn't check the response mail anymore. After a month, I received another invoice and customer support says one email wasn't enough to cancel, I should have sent the second email to confirm my first cancelation request. It doesn't make any sense! Eventually they cancelled my subscription (obviously cancellation via email was possible) but they require me to pay the past month for unused server. Truly disappointed!

name: Muhammad Waqas Ahmad
review_header: Beware ‚Äì Unfair Account Termination & No Data Access!
review_body: I have been a paying customer of Hetzner for over a year, using their dedicated servers for my business. Suddenly, without any prior warning, Hetzner terminated my account and shut down all my servers, resulting in the loss of my critical business and client data. I contacted them multiple times via email and phone, requesting access to my backups or a temporary reactivation so I could migrate my data, but they refused to cooperate. Hetzner's actions have caused me severe financial damage, and their customer support has been unhelpful and unresponsive. If you rely on your data, be VERY careful with Hetzner! I have now filed a GDPR complaint against them for refusing to provide access to my personal data. Think twice before trusting Hetzner with your business!

name: Rafael Gras
review_body: I recently signed up for Hetzner's online services, and my experience has been nothing short of frustrating. To start, I provided all the necessary information, including my credit card details and, also I found it rare..., I understood that my account was pending approval. I decided finally go for it, and as part of the process, I had to submit a picture of my passport to verify my identity. While I was aware that the review process wasn‚Äôt automatic, I waited patiently, trusting that everything would be handled smoothly. Despite having read complaints about their services, I decided to take the risk because their pricing was competitive. Unfortunately, that risk did not pay off. The following day, I received an email from Hetzner with my login credentials and instructions to access their platform. I was relieved, thinking everything had been resolved. However, just a few hours later, I received another email stating that my account had been deactivated due to ‚Äúconcerns‚Äù with my information. Along with this, they canceled all my existing products and orders. Just like that: "Dear **** After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team" To my surprise and dismay, there was no clear explanation or reasoning provided for this decision. I had submitted all the required information, had done nothing wrong, and yet, my account was abruptly terminated. This lack of transparency and accountability left me feeling incredibly frustrated and, frankly, disrespected. Not only did this experience waste my precious time, but it also made me regret trusting Hetzner in the first place. A company that handles sensitive customer information should at least have the courtesy to explain their decisions, especially when they affect their customers directly. Overall, I would not recommend Hetzner to anyone seeking reliable and professional online services.

name: hans
review_header: Been working with them for 15+ years
review_body: Been working with them for 15+ years. Fast, friendly and competent.

name: Consumer
review_header: Avoid at all costs! Fraudulent service!
review_body: Avoid at all costs! Their hosting service is mediocre at best, configuring it is not that easy and you require additional FTP services as they only provide a terminal option to navigate your server. The costs are unclear and the worst of it all, they do not charge you upfront and do not offer a straight forward solution to cancel the subscription! I chose to just not pay since I couldn‚Äôt stop the subscription and also was willing to pay upfront not when they please, and they threatened with debt collectors like theyre some kind of bank entity! I cant emphasize this enough: AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!!! Update: Oh I dont have contact proof do I? what about this? Dear Client, thank you for the message. We bill you only until the cancellation date. If you need further assistance, please feel free to contact us. Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üen / Kind regards Employee name Please help us to improve our processes (~10sec): id=eiIKzX&i=2025032403017738 Hetzner Online GmbH Industriestr. 25 91710 Gunzenhausen / Germany Tel: +49 9831 505-0 Fax: +49 9831 505-3 Register Court: Registergericht Ansbach, HRB 6089 CEO: Name For the purposes of this communication, we may save some of your personal data. For information on our data privacy policy, please see: hetzner/de/privacy-policy-notic 24.03.2025 12:23 - My name schrieb: > Sorry but do you speak english? I said delete my account not unlock it! > > Now I deleted my project but still can‚Äôt delete my project guess why? Because once > more you force me to pay! Guess what? lets see your debt collectors, cause I > declare hereby that I refuse any further payment. As I declared in my previous > email I wanted the complete deletion of my account to avoid further charges, you > did not oblige to my demand and further went against my will and reactivate the > service so I will be charged once more. > > Read this carefully: I will not pay you anymore. I have blocked you on my bank! I have more :) also dont bother deleting your reply, i already screenshotted everything Edit2 since you are more responsive on a review platform than on email‚Ä¶ I ve explicitly asked for termination by mail and it didnt happen.

name: Konstantinos Katselis
review_body: Support was amazing, fast, effective, with a short narrative and straightforward. An issue that took me 6-7 hours of researching and experimenting was solved by the team in just 2 emails and in less that 1h, which would have been even faster if i didn't delay my answer to 1st email. Thank you for the support.

name: Henk uit Nederland
review_body: For a long time a Hetzner customer. Good support and very fair prices!

name: Patrick Kroog
review_header: I love hetzner and i'm customer since‚Ä¶
review_body: I love hetzner and i'm customer since many many years.. Just had contact to support for some account migration and they did the job perfectly! THANKS ;-)

name: Namee
review_header: Account is blocked with no reason
review_body: Account is blocked with no reason "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us." So yeah I thought the business is when you attract customers and take money from them but looks like I was wrong somewhere in my life Never seen a business that cancels customers like that lol So you enter you card information, agree to store it, and a second after you're banned. Super sketchy company. I woudn't trust a more or less production project to them. Most likely the card I've entered will be drained by them since I can't even log in and revoke it

name: Hadi iravani
review_body: I created an account, they asked me for documents, I sent them, they asked me to do KYC, and the system approved it, but the company staff rejected it!!

name: AJY
review_header: Very poor experience with technical support
review_body: First Hetzner support experience after months of smooth server use‚Äîutterly useless. One server has no internet (routing issue), while another‚Äôs fine. Support‚Äôs responses: 1) Support agent #1 sent a broken link 2) Support agent #1 claimed no issues despite obvious connectivity failure 3) Support agent #2 dismissed my gateway query with 'no changes, nothing we can do.' Detailed my troubleshooting‚Äîstill got 'can‚Äôt help.' Disappointing.

name: Mike Lvd
review_header: If not the best hosting provider
review_body: If not the best hosting provider, then certainly one of the best. I‚Äôve been using Hetzner‚Äôs managed services and dedicated servers for years, and I‚Äôve rarely needed support. However, on the few occasions I did, their response was incredibly fast, and the communication was excellent. Highly recommended!

name: Ioan Moldovan
review_body: Hetzner cloud offers great servers for an affordable price. Feature-rich with firewall and backups and everything else I need for my server. While the sign up required ID card & live verification it was all done in 5 minutes.

name: Patrik
review_body: Be cautious of this company, as they are involved in scams and are linked to a malicious actor from the Russian Federation. Over the past year, I have experienced more than a hundred phishing attacks all originating from their server and anonymized through Cloudflare. Their abuse team seems indifferent to the issue and allows this to continue. It‚Äôs the same scammer every time. This company even goes so far as to protect this loyal customer of theirs. I have reported this to the authorities and am currently pursuing legal action against them. Please be aware that if you hire this company, they will not safeguard you or your personal information. They are regularly violating German and international law as well as GDPR guidelines. RESPONSE: I have been sending you emails for over a year regarding your loyal customer in the Russian Federation who is using your services to conduct phishing attacks on my financial accounts. You either acknowledge my abuse complaints and take no action, or you ignore them completely. I have gathered a substantial amount of evidence, including emails from Cloudflare that identify you as the source, IP addresses, website screenshots, the original scam emails, and in some cases, the geolocation of the individual responsible. To date, you have done nothing to stop these attacks, and I believe that you may even be protecting this individual from law enforcement. Abuse ID: F52DF6:23

name: Erik
review_header: I think their service really good
review_body: I think their service really good, but there is scary reading about so many other reviewers having their production server just deleted. Is there any assurance you can offer to make sure my server are not just deleted?

name: ravi kumar
review_header: I Give them My ID proof
review_body: I Give them My ID proof, live verification, company documents, social media account and rest the other details too. But in the last they say we only allow trustworthy customer, I still didn't understand the meaning of trustworthy. When I give my all the documents then still they don't find the user is trustworthy and my friend he is from Germany he is just apply the account and they accept it without any excuses. When I ask the same question they block me.

name: Prince Rai
review_body: Working on bot. I try to signup there to scale my business even we share all the document and proof too but they kick us without a single reason

name: Mkc Tao
review_body: For context, I am not representing a business, I just need big dedicated servers for my hobbies, so I will probably be less inclined to notice specific issues that a business with support and configurability requirements would notice. I have personally had, quite literally, a flawless experience with Hetzner. Been hosting with them for 8 months, their prices are great, I never had a second of downtime, performance is great, latency is great, data throughput is great, it's just perfect for someone like me. I also really like their "cloud boxes" which I use for remote development since my PC can struggle running 3 different dev environments together, and it's been really easy to set them up, wipe their data, get new ones, remove old ones. BUT, I also know by second hand experience that getting in, can be a problem. I had people I know do the exact same as me and get their account flagged. It's a pain when it does happen. And they are very adamant on being as non-transparent on these issues, which is something that does not sit right with me. It's security from obfuscation. But nonetheless, if you get through the initial setup process, it's really just smooth sailing. If you don't, it won't be fun.

name: Randika
review_header: They blocked me right after signing up
review_body: They blocked me right after signing up, took my license and credit card details, but only sent a rejection email without any reason. They never confirmed if my details were deleted. Also, their emails are going to junk‚Äîsomething seems wrong

name: David Daniel
review_body: Incredibly good support - amazing services - high speed in response - and all for reasonable prices! I am a customer for several years already (don't remember how many) and I would definitely chose them again.

name: Xyvie lyons
review_header: They kicked and blocked me out of my account for no reason at all
review_body: They blocked me out of my account for no reason at all.I was a new customer planning to buy a hosting plan with them as soon as i created my account they blocked me out. Dont get me started on their support its horrible they didnt help me at all .They even didnt tell me what i had done wrong .

name: Kristian Hougaard
review_body: Excellent cloud provider. Quick response to tickets and excellent price, service and uptime. Happy customer for now more than 13 years. I run all my stuff on Hetzner :-)

name: Tonninseteli
review_header: Good for goods, bad for bads
review_body: I have used Hetzner services for several years. I am very satisfied with the operation, which is definitely the best of all hosting companies so far. Uptime is practically always 100% and the services are reasonably priced. The virtual servers I use are also efficient and I have been very satisfied with Hetzner's solutions. Hetzner has a strict policy towards all kinds of shady actors, which is only a good thing. 20% of customers usually cause 80% of the problems and if you can avoid such customers, it is only good for other, honest customers. I think this is the reason for the special score distribution here on Trustpilot. It is not really possible to explain otherwise that the reviews are either 1 or 5. I personally welcome the fact that those one-star reviewers have been given a pass to leave the service.

name: Vag
review_header: Unfortunaly they do not want to‚Ä¶
review_body: Unfortunaly they do not want to cooperate. If you want to work with a provider which does not want to assist you, go there. Edit: I ended up using Oracle cloud for anyone being in the same situation as me.

name: yan cary
review_header: Hetzner Shut Down My Account and Caused Serious Business Loss!
review_body: Hetzner suddenly closed my account without any warning or explanation, just like many others have experienced. They sent a generic email about ‚Äúirregularities‚Äù but refused to provide any details or allow an appeal. What‚Äôs even worse is that I purchased a domain through them, and now I am completely locked out. This means I cannot use my domain, which has directly disrupted my business operations and caused significant financial losses. Customers cannot reach my services, and my reputation has been damaged because of Hetzner‚Äôs reckless and irresponsible actions. This level of unprofessionalism is unacceptable. If you rely on your online services for business, DO NOT trust Hetzner‚Äîthey can shut you down without notice and leave you stranded. Stay far away unless you want to risk losing everything!

name: Mr Misael
review_header: Their attitude is bad and they don't‚Ä¶
review_body: Their attitude is bad and they don't respect the customer at all. I had several active servers on one account and they rejected my account after a week without any reason or any abuse. It was a very bad experience for me as a newbie and I just got to know this company. I hadn't done anything wrong and they didn't give me any prior warning. I had just started my career and their actions hurt me a lot ‚òπÔ∏è

name: Leebrimlow
review_header: it is one of the best web host companies
review_body: it is one of the best web host companies in the world. if it is not the best. i have 2 dedeciated servers and a cloud server and the business go very well. no problems at all. The support is co-operative and fast responding.

name: Customer
review_header: My account was rejected based on‚Ä¶
review_body: My account was rejected based on nationality.

name: Muskan Yadav
review_header: hetzner lock our account without any‚Ä¶
review_body: hetzner lock our account without any warning and provide genuine problem, without any problem and reason my account locked for order new products totally worst service and waste server provider no way to use hetzner for long time

name: Pan.D.
review_body: Solid, dependable hosting service The plans I use do not include "unlimited resources" which you never actually use and most other hosting companies offer. They also do not include many bells and whistles which again you don't actually need. But Hetzner hosting is solid, stable and uptime is the greatest I ever experienced in my 20+ years journey. Very satisfied!

name: Leonid
review_header: Hetzner is a poor company with‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is a poor company with unsatisfactory cloud services, poorly configured apps, and inadequate support. Try to find another cloud provider. In my case, I had significant issues with network performance and latency. Some of Hetzner's DNS servers work extremely slowly. The delays were more than 3 seconds on one server in the chain (spine15.cloud2.fsn1.hetzner.com)!!! I tried to change the network settings on my server, but every time it resulted in an out-of-service error and a problem logging in through SSH (due to very strange network settings). Hetzner support responded with significant delays (after many days...)! And the advice was always the same - go to the forum. But do not hope for help there either. Terrible service, it's better to look for something else.

name: Ricky Dani
review_header: Your response team are wild animals
review_body: Your response team are wild animals, for the last three weeks they blocked my account after I requested an increase in resources and gave me no response or opportunity to transfer my server data, that day my entire business was destroyed, I was not a debtor and had no security issues with your stupid company, but I was treated like garbage, interestingly, you are not responding to any of my emails anymore. Today I saw that you sent me an email that I am an invoice I'm in arrears because I haven't paid, you crazy people have blocked my account. Even if I want to pay this invoice, I don't have access to my user panel. Apart from this, with such behavior, why do you expect me to pay that invoice?! I'm really sorry for you

name: Mattia Zucca
review_header: They Closed My Account Without Warning. Stay Away!
review_body: Hetzner just closed my account without any warning or explanation. No prior notice, no chance to verify anything - just a cold, generic email about "irregularities." What irregularities? They won‚Äôt say. No appeal, no discussion, nothing. Just locked out and ignored. This is beyond unprofessional. If you value your data and reliability, stay far away from Hetzner. They can wipe out your account anytime, without reason or recourse.

name: –ú–∞–∫—Å–∏–º
review_header: You will lose service and data for no reason
review_body: My account was blocked for no reason, I just wanted to buy a VDS. They didn't like that my documents are Ukrainian and my IP is Spanish, it's not my fault that there is a war in my country and I am temporarily in Spain. And they called me a scammer because of that. I guess they just collect information and documents of people who want to buy a service from them. I just sent my documents to the Hetzner scammers and did not receive the service. Instead I got my account blocked. I have been working online for 10 years, I never hide my identity and I am ready to go through any verification, I buy different services, hostings, domains, software, but hetzner the smartest ones considered me a scammer and of course they "can't be wrong". Okay. Be careful! My recommendation to those who, like me, have been victimised by hetzner and had your account blocked for no reason. Look for servers by processor from other companies, just search on google for example ‚Äòamd ryzen 9 dedicated server‚Äô and you will find many companies with good prices and configurations. Hetzner are not the only ones on the market and with them you can't be sure that at any moment your account won't be locked for no reason. And you will just lose your data (RDP or Linux server with databases).

name: Alexander H.
review_body: I'm with Hetzner for almost a decade now. Great products, always fast and great service. I can't complain a bit!

name: Sad Dev
review_body: Terrible registration process on the video interview to buy a 3EUR server.

name: James Wallace
review_header: Hertzner Have been a great service‚Ä¶
review_body: Hertzner Have been a great service smooth and reponsive I fully recomend and SME enterpises wishing to use the cloud

name: Atif Ghaffar
review_header: Very good service at a reasonable price‚Ä¶
review_body: Very good service at a reasonable price and a no-nonsense product.

name: Jason Lucian Stile
review_body: Never sign up on this platform, they collect your data and then reject your account.

name: James Bradley Chadburn
review_header: This data center is a scam.
review_body: I have been using this data center for my company for 5 months, I pay its invoice every month, this month I sent a request to increase the server limit to 51, it was accepted. But 3 days later they asked me for documents and returned my server limit to 5! This company is really a scam, all the efforts I put into my account to increase the limit went to waste, do not work with this company at all.

name: Toni Marko
review_body: Scammers. I signed up to view their services but I didn't entered billing info. I didn't use any service, I didn't put my website or used any minute of server resources. Every hosting company activate service when you pay or enter billing info. I tried to connect by to server but without success. After some time they sent my invoice for service I didn't used. They don't wont to cancel invoice. If you don't pay the will sue you. If you don't pay, then they sell your debt to a debt collection agency and then you have to pay 1000 euros instead of 10 euros. Avoid this hosting!

name: KAROL KACPER IWANEK
review_body: Hello, good morning, Hetzner team. We appreciate your great efforts. But I have a question for your team. Why should an account that has been paid for 3 months without any problems be closed? I am a programmer. I have heard many friends praise your server provider, but it has been almost three days since my account was closed. I want to know the reason. What does this situation mean? All my projects have gone up in smoke due to the negligence of your colleagues. If there is a problem, please send an email. You will close the account without any warning. What does it mean? Who will be responsible now? My projects are not mine and have been destroyed.

name: JEVGENIJ VASILJEV
review_header: They blocked my account for no reason‚Ä¶
review_body: They blocked my account for no reason and they wouldn't respond to any emails I sent them, even though I was making payments and there was no problem.

name: Vega
review_header: Discrimination of customers and terrible attitude
review_body: They just blocked my account without giving a reason, even though I provided all the documents. They discriminate against me and suspect me of fraud. What can be fraud if I am just trying to buy VDS. Very strange company.

name: Alexandre Sousa Borba
review_body: Terrible service, especially the customer verification system, I tried 2 times to pass it but I failed!

name: R M
review_header: Awful company, won't do business with them!
review_body: I tried to purchase a server from them. They advertise minutes for setting up a server. During the registration process they even requested my passport, which I uploaded. A whole day goes by and by the end of the day the deactivate the account and block it out. I reached out to support, and they say they don't explain why they block the account. Terrible company! Don't do business with them. I ended up purchasing my servers from Contabo. It was setup in minutes. Imagine having Hetzner in production and they don't respond like human beings. Screw them!

name: imran dol
review_header: They keep sending me invoices for a‚Ä¶
review_body: They keep sending me invoices for a server I transferred to a client 3 months ago. I bet they're charging my client at the same time. I don't like it. Overall the pricing is good but why they're still charging me instead of just my client, and threatening to shutdown my services if I don't pay is beyond me. Edit: they replied to this review as if I didn't try contacting them first. Their support is not useful

name: Joseph Jared Lipson
review_body: Hetzner rejected my account without providing any reasons. I don't recommend dealing with them.

name: Daniel Mathiasen
review_header: Closes the VPS overnight and can't get‚Ä¶
review_body: Closes the VPS overnight and can't get it open again. The support does not want to open it because I can find errors on netscans, and the support comes up with solutions that cannot be done without internet connection via console. it has now taken 4 days, and they expect me to still pay for a product I do not get. Stay far away from this company

name: Marc
review_body: Very bad customer service, takes a week to reply and doesn't help at all (typically, reply is a one-liner, and doesn't try to help or address my problems productively). I closed my servers and services that I had (I ran multiple accounts for several businesses) and won't come back.

name: Michael Connors
review_header: Not what they used to be, will go elsewhere
review_body: I used Hetzner in the past (actually until very recently I had a VPS, but my credit card expired and they deleted it. My fault for not keeping an eye on it), but signing up for a new account seems to be impossible. I registered and was told my account required more info because it was high risk. They sent me to a third party to which I had to upload my ID and submit a photo. Driving license didn't work and passport card didn't work as either an ID or as a passport (wrong ID type submitted apparently). This is despite it requiring a human check, so presumably a human looked at both IDs and somehow was unable to determine that they were valid. The verification thing looked very scammy and now I am uncomfortable that I have provided 2 different IDs for no reason to this third party. I have deleted the account again and I will find an alternative. Edit: thank you for your response, I have decided to use OVH cloud instead though as I signed up in the interim with them and I am happy with their service.

name: Alessio Pascucci
review_header: Not clear and mischevious behaviour. It's better to spend more and not get nuked randomly
review_body: I have been a client of theirs since 2021 and i payed thousands of euros of correct invoices.. This year i forgot to pay two months ( i payed them both on the expiration date of the second invoice) and 2 days after they just deactivated my account and closed everything. They cancelled all my data. Then they asked me several times to pay using the account i can't use because it's deactived.. I've tried to call the support via phone (wich is paid by you on charge by the way) and after like 20 minutes of waiting i just talked to a lady wich couldn't help me in any way if not by saying:"pay your invoice".. i replied: "i can't you've closed my account" and she said:" aww.. talk with the billing team"... spoiler: She WAS the freaking billing team.. it's the option i choosed on the phone.. i would rather spend more and have more customer care after two years than this.

name: Art
review_header: Scummy company that just collects your data and tells you to get lost.
review_body: The company only collected data, e.g. full name, credit card details, home address on registration and suspended my account after confirming that the credit card is indeed mine. For no reason at all, when I've asked the support what the reason is - they tell me that I have to provide the full name (I filled in the abbreviation of the last name) weird but ok. I've asked how to edit the data. Got the answer to recreate the account. Weird but ok x2. After I provided all the data correctly and double checked it, got to the cc verification step, and after that got my acc immediately suspended, bruh. Write to support about it, where was politely told to fk off, for no reason: "There is some information in your account that appears suspicious. Contracts based on incorrect, incomplete or suspicious account information are void. For that reason, we cannot accept your account." ¬© Customer Data Analytics of Hetzner

name: lixelv
review_body: Hetzner deactivated my account without providing any reason. I submitted my valid Estonian passport for verification, but instead of clarifying any issues, they simply blocked me. No explanation, no chance to fix anything. Terrible customer service and complete lack of transparency. I don‚Äôt recommend this company.

name: Maryia Nezeris
review_body: I have created a hetzner account and on the stage of verification it was rejected "because of some concerns we have regarding this information". When I reached out the service via phone - they said they cannot help, and when i wrote to the support got a response that account was considered suspicious, however not providing any reason and only depending on "some information from account", even though it only contains my personal information. I have seriously considered hetzner to store my data, however not sure about it anymore after being irreasonably rejected without any help from the customer service. My account was only rejected but not properly deleted so cannot re-create it or log in anymore. What am I supposed to do?

name: Adams
review_header: Keep your hands off my private data
review_body: They demanded a photo of my passport just so I could set up a $5 VPS? I'm here asking for a cheap place to put some HTML files, not entry into another country. They already have my credit card info, why do they need more? One thing that I've learned from the likes Facebook who do the same thing - when a company grossly overestimates its value and starts pushing you the customer around, it will always take liberties with you.

name: Alexander Dicartio
review_header: The worst service in my opinion
review_body: 2025-01-24 15:29 - Hetzner completely deleted my account without even giving me a chance to retrieve important data, but fine, whatever. They didn‚Äôt even refund the money I had in my account as credits!!! I demand that you immediately return my money, or I will take legal action against you!

name: Andrej
review_header: My favorite provider for many years
review_body: My favorite provider for many years, good ratio price/performance, great for personal projects. Administration development doesn't stuck. There are quite enough notifications even if I had issue with invoice payment setup. UX is fine, never had an issue finding something.

name: Hostplus_Biz
review_body: We have been using Hetzner's cloud and dedicated services for more than 5 years. During this time, we have not faced any problems such as downtime, blocking, etc. even once. The speed is at a very high level. Technical support is always there for you with adequate answers. We recommend it to everyone. Thank you Hetzner team !!!

name: Eric
review_body: Excellent quality at a reasonable price. I have used Hetzner for years now. All services are fast and reliable, be it regular hosting, a managed server or storage box. The KonsoleH contol panel is very easy to understand and use, while at the same time giving all flexibility and options that one needs.

name: Ivan Vyoral
review_body: Reasonable price, easy setup, good manuals and documentation. Best for small project.

name: Christos Aposkitis
review_body: Been with Hetzner for 12+ years. Professional handling of every request, fast responses, quick problem solving, 99.9% availability without charging extra, and unbeatable prices. I wouldn't change them even if God asked me to do so.

name: Masarib Rwanda MRW
review_header: The most things I love about Hetzner is‚Ä¶
review_body: The most things I love about Hetzner is the straight pricing without tricks and generous daily backup. Server performance is amazing.

name: Monica Yineth
review_body: This is a racist company, I'm from Colombia, but at the time of sending the documents, my account was rejected, I won't recommend them to anyone!

name: Samir Ahmed
review_header: My account was rejected twice for unknown reasons.
review_body: My account was rejected twice for unknown reasons, when I try to verify my account using the automatic verification I get the "Unknown error" every time I try to upload my passport, then the support team decides that my account should be deleted without giving the reasons or informing me to fix it if there is an issue, twice !!!!.

name: Artur Gevorgyan
review_body: I decided to rent a vds server from hetzner, I managed to do it, but an hour later my account was canceled, it seems that hetzner cannot afford to rent 24cpu

name: Michael T
review_header: Florian S came through on a new server‚Ä¶
review_body: Florian S came through on a new server deployment today, which really got us out of a bind. Thank you for the prompt service and for going above and beyond!

name: magpielover u
review_body: Out of nowhere, they announce that they will cancel Plesk license if the OS is not upgrade and OS upgrade will erase all the data. So basically, you need another day to get the backup, upgrade OS and restore everything. Probably an extra 5-10 hours of work, your valuable time because they couldn't automatise the process. Very frustrated...

name: Op Rewards
review_body: Customer Support sucks, didn‚Äôt help me, instead made it worse. They also deleted my account and I am unable to make a new one. I would definitely not recommend Hetzner, especially not their customer support, which they weirdly advertise.

name: Shwe Min Thar
review_header: The performance of Hetzner‚Äôs servers is‚Ä¶
review_body: The performance of Hetzner‚Äôs servers is outstanding. I‚Äôve been using them for over a year, and the uptime has been nearly perfect. Highly recommended!

name: Carlos Zamora
review_header: My exp. with Hetzner couldn't have been better!
review_body: My experience with Hetzner couldn't have been better. It's 5/5 stars! I've been working in the hosting market since 2005 and have worked for several companies on different continents. I can say without a shadow of a doubt that Hetzner is one of the best experiences I've had in almost 20 years of daily activity in the market. I manage a small hosting company for the websites that my company develops and I can say with confidence that having my clients with Hetzner means having the certainty of stability, accessible servers, very present support and, above all, very, very good prices. Hetzner is the partner we chose and today we have 100% of our hosting structure with them. I couldn't be happier. I recommend them to everyone on Trustpilot.

name: Jeff
review_header: High Quality & Great On The Budget
review_body: I've been working with several other hosting providers out there for many years now. One of my projects was perfect for Hetzner's server auctions, so I picked up a couple servers that were well spec'd for my application. While I could have sourced similar options and hardware "state side," the price, available technical options and flexible contract conditions (as in, no contract required) were quite attractive to me. I was also excited to finally work with Hetzner, a company I'd seen recommended in various venues many times. If you're coming from other providers, Hetzner does have some peculiarities compared to most other hosting providers. (e.g. no direct KVM access to your servers, 3 hour time limits for temporary KVM access) But, there's also a lot of good and things are well automated where most things I'd need or want are easily available to me. I've had to engage their support twice now for the server setups. Both experiences were top notch and I was able to get support in under an hour. They are definitely working hard to build my confidence in them as a provider. Looking forward to continuing to work with them in the future!

name: Yuriy Zaletskyy
review_body: I'm very happy with servers availability of Hetzner, on security measures they put in place, and pricing is unbelivable.

name: Joseph Budzinski
review_header: I recently moved web sites and cloud‚Ä¶
review_body: I recently moved web sites and cloud storage to Hetzner and am extremely impressed with their customer support and the performance of their infrastructure. Having done this type of work for 25 years, I can say Hetzner is as good as any hosting company I have worked with. Their prices are very attractive as well. Great company.

name: Carl Hjerpe
review_header: Hetzner defines bang for the buck
review_body: Hetzner defines bang for the buck while implementing what you need to make your own cloud (public and private networking, kubernetes controllers) with an unbeatable price. Performance is good and it's cool that they have both ARM and x86 offerings. For 8 euros a month I run what would be 100$ on AWS!

name: Richard McLachlan
review_header: I have recently set up two new servers‚Ä¶
review_body: I have recently set up two new servers with Hetzner. The first was set up within 15 minutes, the second there was some delays due to custom requests and identity challenges, but support was responsive and helpful and now I am good to go. 5 stars so far.

name: K0RR
review_header: They block your account without any reason!
review_body: I just had similar experience as the other user - my account was instantly blocked after the card verification. No explanation was given. I‚Äôm blocked from creating a new account.

name: Oleksandr
review_body: Hetzner blocked my account, and doesn‚Äôt let me to create another one. I created account, passed kyc. Few hour later I received e-mail, that my account was removed due to suspicious information. I used my real data, but their anti-fraud flagged my account as fake. Stu—Ä—ñd —ñd—ñ–æt, I didn't abuse service. Don't put templative answer here.

name: Leona Eden
review_body: I had a problem with a backup procedure. So after writing a message over the internal support system I got a quick answer which helped me a lot to solve my problem.

name: Peter Troxler
review_header: They closed my account allegedly due to‚Ä¶
review_body: They closed my account allegedly due to an unpaid bill. However, said bill never arrived in my inbox. And of course they *claim* they sent those invoices ... Their support only tells what I found out myself: they closed the account without proper notice. In a personal conversation with their CEO, I would call them liars. In a public review: beware of fraud.

name: Ahmad Foroughi
review_header: Hetzner's Uncooperative Attitude Made Me Regret Choosing Them
review_body: I've been using Hetzner for almost two years, and overall, their service is good. The prices are great, the performance is solid, and the network speed is impressive. I‚Äôve never had issues with uptime or reliability, which is why I‚Äôve stuck with them. But recently, I‚Äôve run into a serious problem. I can‚Äôt order any new services‚ÄîI‚Äôm only allowed to keep using the ones I already have. This really affects my ability to scale, which was one of the main benefits of choosing Hetzner. I‚Äôve contacted support multiple times, and each time I‚Äôve been given unclear or unhelpful responses and brushed off. I‚Äôve tried to cooperate and find a solution, but it feels like I‚Äôm being simply ignored. It‚Äôs frustrating and honestly disappointing because I expected better from a company like Hetzner. I really hope someone from Hetzner can reach out and help resolve this. I‚Äôd like to see this issue fixed so I can continue fully benefiting from their services, and I also hope Hetzner can improve their support, as it would lead to better customer satisfaction and loyalty, ultimately benefiting the company in the long run. Update: Since writing this review, the situation has only worsened. Hetzner has informed me that the restriction on my account will not be lifted, no longer allowed to order new services. This decision was made without providing any clear reason or explanation, despite my repeated attempts to cooperate and resolve the issue all my classifications nd questions were ignored and all I got was an two line response brushing me off. To add to the frustration, I‚Äôve recently experienced server faults, which have further highlighted the lack of support and cooperation from Hetzner. Their refusal to work with me or even clarify the reasons for the restriction has left me with no choice but to migrate my services elsewhere. I am deeply disappointed in Hetzner‚Äôs handling of this situation. Their lack of transparency, unhelpful support, and unwillingness to collaborate with a long-term customer have completely ruined my trust in their services. I regret putting my trust in Hetzner in the first place and wish they had been more cooperative in helping me resolve this mess. This experience has been a stark reminder of how important it is for companies to value their customers and work with them to solve problems. Unfortunately, Hetzner has failed in this regard.

name: Ali Hussein Ali
review_body: Hi, I'm using HETZNER services for about 5 years, and can say I'm very satisfied with hosting services, and can recommend with confidence to go with them if you look for a reliable and stable hosting with reasonable prices!. Maybe the only thing I wish HETZNER can improve is adding cPanel interface as a free default GUI addon without extra fees, as I still find cPanel is easiest way to control the service!.

name: Artur Yakymenko
review_body: They blocked my account, claiming I didn‚Äôt provide the right information. I‚Äôm never using this service again, and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it to anyone because they delete accounts without any warning.

name: Benedikt
review_body: excellent support and even better price/performance. regarding support: I had a small inquiry about the physical location of the storage boxes (which are by default available with most server instances) and got a detailed description within hours. Contrary to other reviews here our account was actually not blocked although our credit card had to be frozen and I missed to update the account with the new credit card information in due time - so we had an unpaid invoice for a few days but server was still running. Of course I got a strongly worded reminder, but updating details and paying the open invoice solved the issue immediately. That's a completely normal and expected behavior.

name: Mario
review_body: Support is excellent, timely, accurate, courteous and thorough. Price are excellent. Reliability of service is excellent. What else is there to say, I am a very happy customer.

name: Moris Sportelli
review_header: My Account Was Deleted for No Reason
review_body: Hetzner shut down my account claiming "incorrect data" even though I passed ID verification. They didn‚Äôt explain or give me a chance to fix it. Feels like they don‚Äôt care about their customers. Not recommended.

name: Yavuz Selim Bilgin
review_body: Although the support is not the fastest in the industry, the service is usually good enough that you don't need to contact the support team. The price/performance ratio is pretty good.

name: Shafaroodi
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for about 5 months. I have paid all invoices on time and have not had any suspicious activity on my account. Since last week, I lost access to my email account and sent a ticket to Hetzner support that my account email should be changed. Support said that you can change the account email. But as soon as I changed my email, they deactivated my account. I had 6 web servers on Hetzner servers and 5 databases that were very important for me. I lost all these when my account was deactivated. I emailed Hetzner and said that your support said that you can change the email, I even sent them a screenshot of the previous email, but they didn't pay attention to me at all.

name: Mike Dawson
review_body: Simple, cost-effective, unfortunately customer service is very disappointing. Like many others I have found that no matter how many years and how much I have spent with them; there is zero goodwill back. There will be no extra minute/hour/second on invoices: if you are one euro short, game over. The server rates are cost effective; the whole thing is a lot easier to use than the maze you get with AWS, Azure, and the like. Their server blocking job doesn't use realtime data: so it has happened that my server was blocked 5-10mins etc after an invoice was paid. No apologies for that from their side.

name: Matt
review_body: Used continuously since 2015 for own & client requirements. I miss one invoice, one email and ALL the data is WIPED OUT. Support unhelpful. Tricked into paying the last invoice thinking the the service would resume, then told to open a new account. Think twice before trusting Hetzner with your business and/or client data.

name: Christian K.
review_body: I have a small webhosting account with Hetzner, that I mainly use for E-Mailing. Everything really easy to set up and configure through self-service. In a recent interaction with their support through email and a phone call I was surprised to get very helpful answers within minutes from a friendly support member. Would recommend to friends.

name: Lillyfig
review_body: I‚Äôm a new Hetzner customer, having joined just a few days ago, and I have to say, I‚Äôm really impressed so far. The experience has been smooth, and their services are a pleasure to use. The standout for me is the Cloud interface. It‚Äôs beautifully designed, intuitive, and incredibly user-friendly. Navigating through it feels effortless, and it makes managing resources straightforward and even enjoyable. That said, exploring other sections like the dedicated servers and account settings has been a bit of an adjustment, as they don‚Äôt share the same polished feel as the Cloud UI. I think it would be great if the consistency of the Cloud interface could carry over to those areas as well. Overall, my initial impression of Hetzner has been fantastic. It‚Äôs been an exciting start, and I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing how things unfold as I continue to use their services.

name: Mousa
review_header: 10+ Years with Hetzner: Unmatched Performance and Reliability
review_body: After reading some negative reviews about Hetzner, I wanted to share my own experience. I've been using their services for over 10 years, with the last 6 being continuous. Their performance-to-price ratio for dedicated root servers is unmatched. I‚Äôve never found another provider that comes even close. Everything‚Äîpricing, service quality, network reliability, and support‚Äîhas been consistently great. It‚Äôs been a smooth experience overall, and I‚Äôm genuinely happy working with them. As for the negative reviews, I think there‚Äôs usually a reason or explanation behind them, but my personal experience has been nothing but positive.

name: Jason Norwood-Young
review_body: I've been using Hetzner Germany for years now. Uptime is good, and has improved over the years. I have a mix of bare metal and VPS. For price/performance, they can't be beaten. It's great to keep everything in Europe from a GDPR perspective too.

name: Ivo Gorkic
review_body: Prices are competitive, perfect uptime and good products.

name: Mon Saad
review_header: A few days after purchasing servers‚Ä¶
review_body: A few days after purchasing servers from them, I received this email: --------------- Dear Mr Mon Saad After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team --------------- I am unsure if this is a new scam or something else entirely.

name: Isaac Acosta
review_header: Requested a limit, got my account blocked
review_body: I was a Hetzner customer for two months, paying my bills on time and conducting legitimate business on your servers. As my project scaled, I needed additional powerful servers, so I decided to request a limit increase. After my first attempt, support denied my request. I then decided to request fewer vCPUs than before, but this time my account was blocked. When I saw the email, I was shocked and confused. Does Hetzner really treat clients needing additional resources with such skepticism? You be the judge. I haven‚Äôt encountered this kind of issue with Hetzner‚Äôs competitors. This incident has left me with nothing but negative feelings about the platform.

name: CJ
review_header: It's really nice to have a place like‚Ä¶
review_body: It's really nice to have a place like TrustPilot that you can go and find out whats really happening with a company. After getting my account deleted for no good reason, I find that this happens a lot with them. Their customer support won't tell you the reasons why either.

name: Paul
review_header: So far everything has gone well with a‚Ä¶
review_body: So far everything has gone well with a VPS in Germany and another in the US. DNS service was clear and simple to set up. Hopefully we don't have any of the issues I've seen from others, though I can tell some negative reviews are from people who don't understand how running your own VPS works.

name: Rene Romijn
review_header: My first experience with a VPS‚Ä¶
review_body: My first experience with a VPS provider. It took only minutes to spin up a cloud server. I use a CPX31 and more then happy with the performance. Have some services running on it, based on MySQL, Node.JS, Reverse Proxy etc. and must say i am very impressed with the performance!

name: Marius Pedersen
review_body: Thank you so much to Hetzner for reactivating my account after I forgot to make a payment. I paid right away, and they reactivated my account. Customer service 10/10!

name: Vecima
review_body: , I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the recent actions regarding our account. Over the past year, we have paid over 1,000 Euros for your services and relied on Hetzner for our company's infrastructure. However, without any prior notice or valid explanation, our account was suddenly suspended, causing significant disruption to our operations. This lack of communication and the abrupt suspension of our services has severely impacted our business, and we are now facing considerable difficulties as a result. Given this experience, we no longer feel confident in Hetzner's ability to support its customers properly. As a result, we are advising our partners and clients to avoid using Hetzner services moving forward, as it is clear that customer concerns are not given the attention they deserve. We request an immediate explanation regarding this matter, as well as a resolution to the issues caused by this suspension. Vecima

name: Francescco Fizzotti
review_body: I was unable to register on their website. After signing up, I received an email rejecting my registration. I don‚Äôt understand anything; perhaps they‚Äôre not welcoming to customers from the UK.

name: Thomas
review_header: I am there customer for many years
review_body: I am there customer for many years. Hosting my startup website. I am very happy with their support. Excellent technical knowledge and fast reponse. perfect.

name: Graham
review_body: This underhand German company allows clients to bombard your website with scans affecting your website. I have emailed their abuse department many times and they do not care as they say it's not illegal. They are on the blacklist of many discussion boards and have informed Shopify, Cloudflare and other websites of their abuse. DO NOT USE **post Hertzner reply. Waste of time reply as I have reported to them and have been in email convos with their abuse team many times. They do nothing about their clients as they are getting paid from them. Reporting abuse is a waste of time.

name: Endre
review_body: Been with Hetzner for more than 12 years now, with several dedicated and virtual servers, Nextcloud and storage boxes. There has been little to no downtime, probably just an hour or two in total for twelve full years (with the exception of a few, planned maintenance periods that we were notified about in advance). Prices has increased, though, and the reason isn't always logical. For instance, a couple of years ago, prices for IP subnets increased dramatically. They pointed at IP shortage, and that they had to recover the added costs for aquiring additional subnets for new clients. I don't really understand why loyal customers are responsible for financing new subnets for new customers. Yes, I do understand how businesses work, but this was a bad move. I have since moved some of my dedicated and virtual servers to one of their biggest competitors. In all fairness though, Hetzner has a much better infrastructure, and better services overall. I will probably cancel my last dedicated server in a few months, but I will keep some cloud servers, my Nextcloud account and a storage box. One thing I've hated since day one though, is their KVM remote console service. It's about time those Lantronix spiders were put to rest. The first 7-8 years I subscribed to a permanent remote console, to be absolutely sure that I would be able to reach the server whenever I needed to, without contacting Hetzner. However, that console was unavailable each and every time had to use it. Not even a single time was it up and running, so I had to ask Hetzner for a reset anyway. And even then, it would probably just be working for a little time (typically from 10 minutes to a couple of hours), then it would die on me again. I've experienced the same issues with on-demand remote console from Hetzner. Don't waste your money on a permanent remote console. And if you really need it, you should probably look elsewhere. All things considered, I have no problem recommending Hetzner, albeit with some reservations. Take account of sudden price increases and the fact that you may not always be able to reach the console on your dedicated servers on short notice.

name: Rechabd
review_body: Beware of this company! I've read multiple reviews online about them arbitrarily closing accounts, and unfortunately, I experienced the same. After submitting sensitive documents, my account was rejected without clear reasons. They also seem to have discriminatory practices, rejecting users based on nationality. Keep your data safe and consider other providers!

name: CaliPilot
review_header: I was shocked this is still possible in 2024
review_body: In the evening of Nov 14th at around 10:30PM(!!!) i was bored and sent a question to the Hetzner sales team if they could upgrade my server with 2 NVME drives. 10:39PM response from sales: yes, we could do it, please tell us when I could shutdown the server for 20 minutes. my response was: nevermind, whenever you are ready 11:10PM The technician was waiting with the drives and asked if I could shutdown the server 11:36PM The technician has completed the upgrade and the server was up and running again. Holy moly. I didn't thought that something like this could be possible in Germany in 2024. Thanks to the tech guys from Hetzner. No matter what, always on point and more than helpful. Oh and yes, sales guys, we love you too. <3

name: Olli-Antti
review_body: Used Hetzner for 5+ years. Solid, affordable, reliable. Even customer service is better than it used to be.

name: Joub
review_header: Avoid Hetzner ‚Äì Unjust Charges and GDPR Concerns
review_body: I've used many web hosting providers, but Hetzner has been by far the worst experience. I activated a service but quickly found the interface far too complicated for my skill level. Because of this, I didn't install or use anything on the service and canceled it just a few hours later. Despite my clear explanations to their support team that I never used the service, Hetzner refused to issue a refund and instead sent additional, seemingly unjustified invoices. I understand that setup fees are non-refundable, but nothing justifies being charged month after month for an unused, canceled service. Their responses felt automated and showed no evidence that anyone actually read or engaged with my support emails. To make matters worse, when I requested GDPR-compliant data deletion, they simply told me to delete my account myself,but stated I couldn‚Äôt do so because more invoices were expected. This refusal to comply with GDPR requirements further trapped me in a cycle of unjustified charges and account restrictions. Hetzner's opaque policies, lack of transparency, and disregard for GDPR compliance make for a highly frustrating and concerning experience. If you're looking for a provider with fair billing, a user-friendly interface, and responsive support, I strongly advise looking elsewhere.

name: BASIR HAFIZI
review_header: Crazy hetzner , banned my account for no reason
review_body: My 6-month old account, which I always paid my invoices on time and I had not committed any violations on it, was banned at once without any warning or reason, and its support did not give me any answer. Hetzner's data center is no different from garbage and does not care about its users at all, I suggest you do not get a server from it at all.

name: arcadia
review_body: Hetzner provides an excellent balance of performance and affordability. It‚Äôs an outstanding choice for developers, startups, and businesses that need reliable servers without incurring high costs. While customer support could be enhanced, Hetzner‚Äôs reliable hardware, flexible options, and sustainable practices make it a top-tier choice for cost-conscious companies.

name: Dennis Doso
review_body: My opinions regarding Hetzner are conflicting, let me explain. I appreciate the fact that if I delete a server before 15 days, I don't pay a single cent for it and I have never abused this thing but I admit that every now and then, I kept a server or two for a short time specifically to not pay for it, but over to this... the price for the quality of the hardware is very convenient and competitive and I really appreciate it, but the technical support only responds to you when and if it wants to do so, I never understood what that notification email from the German federation is , I asked for explanations but no one ever answered me, so I simply ignored that warning for over 2 years, it continues to arrive every month but I no longer care and I continually ignore it, it's a real shame that they don't offer dedicated servers located in the USA because they would be really useful for my business, in my opinion Hetzner is the best provider of dedicated servers in Europe and I continue to use a server in Germany but for the server in the US I had to try another provider and I can say that I am better off with the one there instead of Hetzner, I think i will also be moving Hetzner's German server to the new provider so as to pay only one invoice per month instead of two on two different sites

name: Eric
review_header: Missed an invoice of ‚Ç¨8.14: everything deleted and banned as customer!
review_body: Due to being on vacation, I missed an invoice from Hetzner. As a result, my servers and account were deactivated, after which I immediately paid the invoice. However, it turned out that my account had already been completely deleted, and according to Hetzner, the only option was to create a new account and set up and configure the servers again. I found this quite bizarre, especially since it was an invoice for only ‚Ç¨8.14! On the other hand I realized it was my own mistake, so I decided to create a new account, which then had to be manually reviewed and activated. After a few hours, I received a message saying: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information." So, because I missed an ‚Ç¨8.14 invoice, it seems I can never be a customer at Hetzner again. Fortunately, there are plenty of great alternatives out there. On the other hand, it's a shame because I was actually satisfied with Hetzner's services.

name: Johannes Hinterberger
review_header: Registering Domains in a very helpful and quick way
review_body: Thank you Magdalena for helping registering a lots of domains in a very proper way. Perfect.

name: Lyubomir Petkov
review_header: You're absolutely in the dark 99% of the time.
review_body: Ordered a server. They said the setup is basically instant (it wasn't). After completion I set up Ubuntu to be installed. No email, no nothing. It took me like 50 attempts until my password actually worked. After a simple restart it turns out all of my hostkeys and password have been refreshed. I found this out after being unable to log in another 50 times, cancelling the server out of frustration and AFTER THAT receiving an email about how Ubuntu is installed after the restart and my credentials are refreshed. Just be wary. If you think you have any idea what's going on in your server - you don't. You just do stuff and hopefully it works, if it does or doesn't, you'll probably receive an email 90 minutes after the fact. Ffs, I didn't even have a "server is online" indicator... I thought we mastered that technology years ago.

name: Hurly
review_body: Price to performance is good

name: Ahmed
review_header: One of the best hosting ever in the‚Ä¶
review_body: One of the best hosting ever in the world.

name: Lasse
review_header: The best vps hosting i have used
review_body: The best vps hosting i have used. Compared to other services, then hetzner is just better. Cheap and very stable and performent servers. I only have good things to say about hetzner!

name: Dimitar Dimitrov
review_header: Hetzner is one of the best providers we have
review_body: We are using Hetzner for many years: - dedicated servers - cloud machines - box storage - recently S3 storage They have perfect service, including: - reasonable and easy to understand pricing - very high reliability - very high speeds - good customer support - technical and other I recommended them to many clients and will recommend in the future

name: Thomas Tellier
review_body: I'm a customer since a few years, so far so good

name: pauls
review_header: We've been using Hetzner for over 10 years BUT
review_body: We've been using Hetzner for over 10 years, and many of our clients use it based on our recommendations. We were very happy with their service, until now! In October they changed their billing system. It did not bill my credit card and I received no notification. Then yesterday 21st Oct I received an email saying our account is in arrears and would be closed on 23rd! I immediately sent EFT to pay, but nothing shows on the account, Hetzner has not responded to any of our emails and tickets. Cannot phone them, and we are now faced with our account and all our systems going offline tomorrow. This is unacceptable and I will now be recommending all our clients move off Hetzner.

name: Axel Gruber
review_body: Realy good Infrastructure - for a REALY GOOD Price for the Dedicated Server System - The Cloud is a little bit overpriced but this depend on the own needs - the Support (especialy for the Dedicated Sytems) is great.

name: eli
review_header: I've been a Hetzner client since 2011
review_body: I've been a Hetzner client since 2011, and they've proven to be reliable with a highly competent technical team. With all my years of experience, they‚Äôre the only hosting provider I fully trust and recommend to all my clients.

name: Philo
review_body: I‚Äôve switched from AWS to Hetzner a few years ago for all my VPS compute resources and never looked back. Their pricing and performance is unbeatable. Great predictable billing instead of unexpected and complex AWS charges for dozens of hidden services you never heard before. Support is top notch as well. Highly recommended.

name: DR WILSON
review_header: Why do Hetzner Online GmbH's servers‚Ä¶
review_body: Why do Hetzner Online GmbH's servers hit my website and scrape the categories? Who are you and why are you doing this? I really do not trust companies such as this who scrape for data.

name: liuyi su
review_header: I had 4 year of happy experience with‚Ä¶
review_body: I had 4 year of happy experience with hetzner.com since my first invoice on Jul 3, 2020 They provide literally CHEAPEST server in the world. Nobody can price match them. But I really need a dedicated server in Ashburn, US. Because of lack of Ashburn dedi, I had to buy 30+ VPS from hetzner, and this is hard to manage. Please, hetzner, bring us USA location.

name: EM
review_body: Account creation is rejected despite providing genuine information as requested.

name: Janis Sascha Zesiger
review_header: I've been working with the Hetzner‚Ä¶
review_body: I've been working with the Hetzner Cloud for over 2 years now and can say that I couldn't do without it. The flexibility that Hetzner offers with this product is one of the best I have seen on the market. Together with the enormously favorable price compared to the larger providers such as AWS or Google, as well as the extremely intuitive and simple user interface. All in all, a very successful product that is constantly being updated and new functions added. I can only express my heartfelt thanks to the entire hetzner company for making the user experience of a developer so much easier.

name: Claus T√∏ndering
review_body: I use Hetzner for a few small web services. It works perfectly. Also, it is very convenient that I can rent a server for just an hour if there is something I want to try out in a virgin environment.

name: —é–¥–∂–∏–Ω
review_header: I like that their service is affordable‚Ä¶
review_body: I like that their service is affordable but during maintenance they sometimes have several hours of downtime. Most recently they had 4 hours of downtime that affected my business. Their customer service was kind of rude and just said that they informed that there will be downtime. Well, no one said it would be 4 hrs of downtime. Their customer service need to learn how to be polite and empathetic to customers. They didnt offer any credits to compensate for loss of business.

name: James Pannell
review_body: I've been using Hetzner's dedicated servers for nearly 15 years and cannot recommend them highly enough. They are a company that take this stuff seriously. I've had minimal downtime over the time I've been a customer and the times I've had to deal with their customer support, they have been absolutely brilliant. If you're looking for a hosting company that look after you - this is it.

name: Metaporn Pongdee
review_header: Limited IP Ranges on Germany Servers Hinder Scalability
review_body: I've been a loyal customer of Hetzner for over two years, and while their core services are solid, I‚Äôve faced a major issue over the past 8 months. Every server I create in their Germany location is limited to just two IP ranges: 91.x.x.x and 5.x.x.x. This restriction has caused serious problems for my project, including scalability issues and concerns about IP blocking, since these ranges are frequently overused. Despite multiple attempts to resolve this through Hetzner's email support, nothing has changed. It's frustrating that a hosting provider as large as Hetzner hasn‚Äôt addressed such a basic issue that is essential for large-scale hosting projects. The lack of diverse IP allocation in Germany significantly limits my business‚Äôs growth, and I hope they resolve this soon or I might have to look for other hosting options. If you're running a project that relies on diverse IP ranges, keep this in mind before choosing Hetzner‚Äôs Germany servers.

name: Waheed Atieh
review_header: I didn't make the payment at the time‚Ä¶
review_body: I didn't make the payment at the time of the invoice, but that doesn't justify permanently closing my account and leaving my customers without access to the server, risking data loss! They didn‚Äôt even allow me to take a backup. The emails they sent were unclear, and unless you opened the attachments, it was impossible to understand what they were asking for. As for me, I receive a lot of emails and have numerous accounts with other companies‚ÄîGoDaddy, Hostmonster, Bluehost, HostGator, Time4VPS‚Äîand none of them have handled a situation like this.

name: Petru
review_header: for the beginning of the working with‚Ä¶
review_body: for the beginning of the working with this company, everything looks good

name: Noa
review_header: Hetzner's been a decent choice for my‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner's been a decent choice for my hosting needs. I've used both their dedicated servers and cloud offerings, mainly for running a K3s cluster. The performance is solid, especially considering the price point. It's nice to see they've expanded to include USA-based servers for their cloud services. There was a hiccup when I first signed up - my account got blocked because I used a Gmail address. It was frustrating, but their support team handled it well. They guided me through creating a new account, which resolved the issue quickly.

name: Renan
review_body: I switched from some sea-themed competitor to Hetzner cloud and i've been quite happy. I went from 26$ to 8$ per month per server, for double the performance. When i needed to unlock the SMTPS port it was done instantly, no length review process. Just awesome.

name: RX
review_body: I'm a Canadian citizen. They requested personal information including copies of ID for verification which I provided. They said due to reasons they wouldn't disclose, they cannot provide me the service. I had already moved to another provider before they finish their verification. However, they would not delete my personal information from their database, don't allow me to delete my account (account is disabled), nor provide a date that they would do so. Edit: couple of days after the initial review, I got the response from Hetzner that my data will be deleted automatically "after" 14 days. Assuming they are true to their word, it's not anymore a major privacy issue. Still, it was a bitter experience. I have services from Google and Linode and tested a few other providers during the time I signed up to Hetzner too, none had such intrusive checks (well, except Google that knows me better than myself...) and they were mostly transparent on their practices. Important note to new customers: Check experience reviews in addition to their technical/pricing. There are plenty of stories from the people who got their servers shut down in addition to initial service rejection.

name: Webwizard - Gaming
review_header: By far the best infrastructure provider‚Ä¶
review_body: By far the best infrastructure provider online... I cant state how much better this provider is, and ive been quite a few places in my carrier as a developer... i saved money + i'm getting better infrastructure for a lower price, its an amazing company.

name: Showline Solutions
review_body: l tried buying the server , they did not respond , a lot of questions asked , spend about 4 days trying to buy , l ended up going back to contabo , the devil l know is better

name: Alan
review_header: The first obvious thing is the low cost‚Ä¶
review_body: The first obvious thing is the low cost of ownership for the HW available.; The provisioning time is very fast (well within the hour based on my experience, this may vary of course depending on your request). Their technical support was excellent and helped me out when we were stuck with a particular issue, even though it was not in their remit to do so.

name: Ege Deniz K.
review_body: I‚Äôve been using Hetzner services for about 5 years now, initially through a friend's account since I was underage. Now that I‚Äôm 19 and have my own account, I‚Äôve purchased an Ampere server, and the experience continues to be exceptional. In all these years, I have never encountered a single issue. Hetzner‚Äôs support has always been prompt and professional, and I trust their strict policies because they ensure a stable and secure service. If you stay within reasonable limits, respect their terms, and pay your bills on time‚Äîlike with any paid service‚Äîyou won‚Äôt have any problems. I highly recommend Hetzner for anyone looking for reliable hosting. They are hands-down one of the best providers out there!

name: Abdelkader
review_header: I was planing to migrate from‚Ä¶
review_body: I was planing to migrate from Digitalocean, I Signed up, uploaded my ID, got a rejection email without mentioning any clear reason Poor Service!

name: Amir iravani
review_header: There is a problem with Hetzner's account verification bot
review_body: Now that I am writing this text, exactly 14 hours have passed since my account was blocked in Hetzner. It has been a month since I created my account and I was waiting to receive the payment invoice. Apart from that, I have a website for selling servers.I buy servers from Hetzner and other existing datacenters and sell them to my customers at a slightly higher price. Today, Saturday, Hetzner is closed, and I sent them a request to increase the number of servers.It didn't take long, maybe half an hour after I sent my request, I got the email that the user account was deleted!! How is it possible that when the company is closed, my account is blocked just because of the request to increase the number of servers!!?I have sent them several emails but I have not received any reply yet, which means that the support team is completely on vacation and my account was blocked by their bot, that is, the decision of a bot!!Now I am left with a number of clients whose information and servers have been suddenly deleted and turned off!! Who is responsible?! Hetzner, please answer me, I will send you my user ID, just read this message

name: Airdrop GOLD
review_header: Poor Customer Support and Account Security Issues with Hetzner
