review_body: Hetzner abruptly closed my account without any prior notice, despite being a customer for several years with consistent payments and no issues. I have over 500 customers depending on the services hosted on this account. I even paid extra for their snapshot feature to back up my servers, but now that my account is closed, they refuse to give me access to my backups. After several days, they still haven‚Äôt responded to my messages. This has caused a massive loss to my business, and crucial data has been lost. They didn‚Äôt provide any explanation for the account closure, citing ‚Äúfraud prevention‚Äù without offering any details or warnings. It‚Äôs standard practice for service providers to give notice before shutting down services, but Hetzner failed to do so. If you‚Äôre looking for the worst cloud server support experience, Hetzner is the place. No commitment, no trust! Stay away.

name: Sonny Boy
review_header: Do you know how much time I wasted just‚Ä¶
review_body: Do you know how much time I wasted just putting in the password in the console to recover? You know how unintuitive it is? can you copy and paste the password in there? no one knows cause it doesnt show you any f*in input and half the time you type in something it comes out 3 seconds later and it's messed and garbled up. If it takes this long to get something done, imagine getting real work done on this terrible , terrible service. stay away from this service. just awful.. awful from a new user's perspective

name: Izabela Lojna
review_body: Hello, I made 2 servers for the app. Why did you delete my account for no reason? My account was verified. Why did you close it for no reason and delete my information? _____________ Yes, my account was verified Is it possible to get the account that you have approved and then close the account??? Go check for yourself and see that there is no problem with my account, it was only for the application that you disabled

name: Taras hatami
review_header: They place no value on your information.
review_body: Blocking my completely legal account without any prior notice and not even being willing to mess up my data and backup, I hate this datacenter.

name: Mykhailo Koziar
review_header: I am deeply dissatisfied with my recent‚Ä¶
review_body: Thank you for your response. Unfortunately, your explanation still lacks clarity regarding the exact reason for my account being suspended and my data being lost. I was not aware of any violation of your Terms and Conditions, nor did I receive any prior warning from your side. I expect this matter to be reviewed more carefully and that I am provided with a detailed explanation of what happened and why my account was closed without any prior notice. I still hope that this issue will be properly addressed.

name: Mahdi
review_body: I am extremely disappointed with Hetzner's service. They locked my account more than a year ago without providing any reason, and despite numerous emails and attempts to contact their support team, they refuse to unlock my account or explain why it was locked in the first place. During this entire time, I have continued to regularly pay the fees, but they still haven't unlocked my account. This is incredibly frustrating and unacceptable. Their customer service is unresponsive, and I'm stuck without any access to my account. I expected much better from a company like Hetzner. ------- Thank you for your reply. I would like to clarify that I have not violated any of your terms of service. My account was restricted because my server was hacked by an unauthorized third party who caused the issues you mentioned. I was not involved in any wrongdoing, and I have been cooperative in trying to resolve the matter. Despite explaining the situation to your support team multiple times over the past year, my account remains restricted. I have continued to pay for the services, yet I am still unable to fully utilize them. I kindly ask that you reconsider my case and lift the restriction on my account, as I am a loyal customer and committed to maintaining the security and integrity of my services.

name: Amirhossein Falahati
review_header: No Backup, No response, Account closed without prior notice!
review_body: Update: I sent two emails after their reply, It's October 16 and no response yet! Worst support ever. Hetzner closed my account without any prior notice, despite the fact that I had been a customer for several years with consistent payments and no issues. I even paid extra for their snapshot feature to back up my servers, but now that my account is closed, they refuse to give me access to my backups, and after 5 days, they still haven‚Äôt responded to my messages. This has caused a massive loss to my business, and crucial data has been lost. It's also interesting that they don‚Äôt explain the account closure, citing "fraud prevention" as the reason, without providing any details. If you're looking for the worst cloud server support experience, Hetzner is the place. No commitment, no trust! Stay away.

name: Gyaschool
review_body: Hello, The Hetzner data center has blocked my account despite the fact that I have always paid my invoices on time. They did this without any prior warning or notification, which prevented me from backing up the data I have on the servers. I have also contacted support via phone and email but received no response, except for an automated email. It is truly disappointing, and it's unexpected from such a large and experienced data center like Hetzner to suddenly block everything without providing enough time or opportunity for backup, and without offering any response. I have not received any response, email, or call from you. Please guide me on how to resolve this issue and have my account reactivated. If there is anything I need to do, kindly let me know. Thank you for your follow-up. Hetzner account K0701026724 Please look into this matter. Thank you.

name: –ê–Ω–¥—Ä–µ–π –ü–∞–≤–ª–æ–≤
review_header: Account Banned WITHOUT ANY REASON ‚Äì Outrageous!
review_body: I'm beyond furious right now! I woke up yesterday to an email from Hetzner informing me that my account had been banned, even though I‚Äôve paid every single invoice on time. NO WARNING, NO EXPLANATION ‚Äì just BAM, account gone! To make matters worse, ALL of my data was wiped out without a single heads-up, and my services were down for hours. Everything I‚Äôve worked on, GONE. How is this even acceptable?! You can't just pull the plug on people like this with zero communication or justification. In the same email where they told me my account was banned, they also said that I have no way to communicate with them and they wouldn‚Äôt tell me the reason! At the very least, give us a REASON and some time to react. I‚Äôve lost everything because of this. Unbelievable!

name: Slayer
review_body: The arm servers are great and fast for its price (hella cheap too!). Running a minecraft server with backups to a Storage Box without any issues. I only had a single day with whole server being slow, but rebooting seemed to help.

name: Lucas
review_body: The Support Team was very helpful on restoring access to my account safely and in a simple manner. Very awesome!

name: Argon
review_header: Best tier hosting for low price
review_body: I recently switched from contabo to hetzner and still don't regret it. The servers were created in no time and with a little luck you will get a short ipv4. The servers are lightning fast. I haven't had any problems with my servers hosted with you at the moment.

name: Evgeniy Varenko
review_body: The policy for handling complaints is completely inadequate. Anyone pretending to be a legitimate company can scam a server into being blocked by submitting 2-4 complaints. The validity of the complaints doesn't matter. Website was blocked for complaints to word "Bosch" mentioned on page where official store sell Bosch, Ariston etc. and other products (bought from oficial suppliers, of course - all documents are available)

name: Robin Holl
review_body: Great service, I have been a customer for many years now, both with a company server and privately, and have not had any major problems to date, 99% of the servers have not had a single outage since I ordered them! The somewhat high prices are totally justified. I can only recommend this provider.

name: Final
review_header: Good host With Great Support and Network
review_body: Good host, Using for years (2018+) no complaints cheap and easy just wish they would add crypto payments someday.

name: Denis Vizi
review_body: Currently hosting more than 30 Dell dedicated servers and more than 80 virtual servers, 5 storage boxes and storage shares) It happened that I had some problems (once a new dedicated server had faulty RAM modules from the start) and once the dedicated server just stopped working, their support reacted quickly and solved the problem in less than an hour) I am satisfied and I would recommend Hetzner

name: KoolBoy
review_body: I signed up for hourly billing, went through the longest sign up process ever, and then they locked my account. Here is a quote from their email to me: "We have noticed irregularities on your account, so we unfortunately cannot have a contract with you at the present time. We have therefore had to close your account. In general, if customers give us incomplete or incorrect information, we have to close their accounts. We cannot provide any information on individual cases. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards Customer Data analytics" But actually what I did was this: After registering for the lowest arm64 package to experience, I installed Flashpanel to manage the server, connecting via API account hetzner. and during the panel installation process, in the arm64 registration package option, I mistakenly selected arm86, so the installation process automatically registered a new cloud in my account, and then I deleted it. If that's the reason for them to ban my account, it's not satisfactory. I sent support to them but haven't received a reply. That was normal for all the other providers I used, but they didn't notify me in advance, just sent me an email terminating the service immediately. That made me feel disrespected. Do not recommend using this company's products! Updated on September 9, 2024, details of the incident

name: Sergei
review_body: UPD 09.09.2024: I got a response from abuse team: "Could you please provide detailed log files for every IP so we can look into this matter? Please send the information as plain text, and not as an attachment.". How do you imagine sending logs file of 60k+ IP addresses as plaintext? Are you guys kidding? As I mentioned before, dudes from hetzner welcome any malicious activity, but not legitimate business. Today my resource was subjected to massive DDoS attack using hetzner ASN. Dudes in their abuse report form suggest sending more than 60 thousand IP addresses "separately" one at a time. I'm sure this is done purposely to cover for the bad actors, since they ignore the abuse reports, and in their automated email they mockingly state ‚Äúwe cannot guarantee a personal response, or a particular outcome‚Äù. Lea, hi, how are things going with ID verification? For some reason your measures restrict exclusively legitimate businesses but not bad actors.

name: Q Wan
review_body: Been a customer for a few months. Their VPS is very affordable. The speed is also very good. Keep up your good work please.

name: Richard Lippmann
review_header: Virtual Servers, extremly flexible and self service
review_body: I have to take care for about 10 virtual servers under Debian OS. It was extremly fast and easy to create new servers. I love the simple packet-filter-firewall, creating a group "only-me-from-my-ip-addresses" to protect the servers before the setup. There are tons of reasons why hetzner is an excellent ISP for me, so this only the very core of reasons: * Easy API to create servers by script * Self managed packet-firewall with groups of rules to assign to all servers I like * strong virtual machines * easy adding of storage and resize that storage via Webinterface. * Free to choose where to locate the servers in Europe: Nuernberg, Falkenstein, Helsinki. Other places like US, Singapore etc are there (not interesting for my business though) * Creating own virtual private networks between my servers * Easy to setup backup-storage for restic, borg with a product called Storagebox which is sizeable 1TB start up to 20 TBytes!!!! Great in all details I have found, including 100 Subaccounts so every backup has its own space. * Very easy and supportive webinterface * Very friendly staff when I need them

name: Oliver Schmidt
review_body: seems this company doesn't want to have new customers. the register process is ridiculous even upload my passport picture (hope you delete it and not store it somewhere while getting hacked). Cannot recommend, there are many more better providers for virtual servers than hetzner

name: Tobias S√∂rensson
review_body: Becouse Contabo has had issues the last 6 month we have decided to move to Hetzner we orderd a shared vCPU and so far so good. Loved that the server came with IPv6 enabled by default. setup a ubuntu 24.04 VPS 16 GB ram. migrated a few servers to the service and so far it works as expected. if the test run gose ok (1 month) we will move a few more services to Hetzner.

name: Globe Gains
review_header: Hetzner sold defective server and ask to pay for it!
review_body: Hetzner sold defective server that i cannot login and now asking to pay for it. I don't recommend Hetzner Online GmbH. Cheap prices reflect poor quality. I ordered dedicated server, but could never login. Submitted support ticket and got response that it is due to defective drive! Support asked to submit another ticket to other department if i want defective drive to be replaced. I quickly cancelled this order, but now i received bill by Hetzner to pay. I asked support to cancel this bill due to not being able to use, but support refuse stating "You only pay for the time that the product has existed " so you have to pay for server "existance" regardless if you can use it or not! AVOID Hetzner Online GmbH BY ALL MEANS! Edit after response: to potential customer of this company - this is what you can expect from this company - rude attitude. I had multiple emails with different staff/ manager that this person fails to mention, and I asked to provide evidence that I used server, but they just repeat that you have to pay: "the server was still active, you have to pay .... It doesn't matter if you use it or not, but it was active." Can you imagine that you rent a car and upon collection you find out engine doesn't work and car rental would tell you that it doesn't matter - we brought you the car and you have to pay :D NOT A SINGLE HETZNER STAFF APPOLOGIZED! They try to downplay like it is normal practice at hetzner. STAY AWAY!

name: Alger
review_header: Hetzner Online GmbH doesnt respect costumers right
review_body: Hetzner Online GmbH, i wouldn't suggest to use their service, their support is not in the right path, they do not care for personal data leaked by their clients, they do not take action or protecting others.

name: Wolf
review_body: Very reasonable support! Storage Space is a good deal (value for money) anyway. But even the e-mail support was quick in response, informed about the problem and the advice provided was easy to follow and solved the problem. - what more can you ask for.

name: Beto Rubio Guardia
review_header: A great plaform to build your online business
review_body: We have been using Hetzner for over three years now. From cloud to dedicated servers to collocation services. The all around experience is wonderful. The support staff (specially the colocation service staff) is super efficient and great to work with. We have built a complete organization based on Hetzner as our backend and we plan on continuing to grow with them in the future. Ah, and the prices are unbelievable. Cheers. Roberto Rubio Guardia

name: Iyo Gantung
review_header: Close my account and lose all my data without warning
review_body: I opened account with them, and setup my server for my live site, after 24 hours, they sent to me "We have noticed irregularities on your account, so we unfortunately cannot have a contract with you at the present time. We have therefore had to close your account", WHY!! Which information is wrong? All real! Tell me, I will fix. OK, I agree, close the account, but my server? My data? My backup! I sent for them response to email just give me time to take my data, my backup, then close account, but they ignored my messages at all! All professional companies provide at lest 1 hour to take data, then close account in case there is a problem! Not directly lose all my data because you think that my information is not correct, don't buy from them, you will lose all work and data suddenly, I hope any support of them if they care to answer me here and explain how is legal to do such things for client Update 01/09/2024: More ridiculous, today they sent me an invoice asking me to pay it to the server, how will I pay it while my account is closed? And my server is deleted? And I lost my data? What is this strange system! How do you request something that cannot be accessed?? OK give me back my account and I will pay directly, no problem :-)

name: Nikolay Bronskiy
review_header: Affordable and Reliable Hosting with Hetzner
review_body: Recently, I moved all my servers to Hetzner, and the experience has been outstanding. As a web developer managing multiple servers, I‚Äôm always looking for a balance between cost and performance, and Hetzner delivers on both fronts. Their pricing is incredibly competitive, offering great value for the level of performance and reliability they provide. I‚Äôm also thrilled that they now have a US location for their servers, which has improved performance for my clients in North America. I was so impressed with Hetzner that I convinced one of my clients to switch their hosting to Hetzner as well, and they‚Äôve been equally satisfied with the move. Overall, Hetzner is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for affordable, reliable hosting solutions with a growing global presence.

name: alex
review_body: Competent support. I am working in the field of IT, specifically cybersecurity. So I just contact the support if I dont really have access to the informations I need or similar. Always had a competent responst within 24 hours. Perfect price value for me.

name: Monica
review_header: I can‚Äôt sing Hetzner‚Äôs praises enough
review_body: I can‚Äôt sing Hetzner‚Äôs praises enough! As a self-proclaimed female geek, I‚Äôve had my fair share of tech support nightmares‚Äîbut Hetzner? They‚Äôre in a league of their own! From the very start, Camillo Heller helped me choose the perfect web hosting plan, making sure it fit my needs like a glove. Then, when it came to navigating the tangled web of DNS settings, Jan Venzke was an absolute legend, guiding me through it all with ease (and a lot of patience!). And just when I thought I might hit a snag, Patrick Reichart swooped in with crystal-clear instructions on how to redirect a domain‚Äîso simple, even my cat could follow along (though she was too busy napping, but you get the idea!). The best part? They made everything so easy that I almost felt like a DNS wizard myself by the end of it! The whole process was smoother than a well-brewed cup of coffee. If you‚Äôre looking for top-notch support with a whole lot of expertise, look no further than Hetzner. Five stars simply aren‚Äôt enough‚Äîthese folks deserve a galaxy of them! Cheers to the Hetzner team, and a special shoutout to Camillo Heller, Jan Venzke, and Patrick Reichart for being absolute stars! üåü

name: Cory Wonders
review_body: So far so good.. I need hetzner to reply to me please.. I had an incident when I was gone.. So somehow someone changed my password then changed by email and took over my account.. Are you guys able to recover it for me quick ? Cause my payment is dew in a few days and I need go pay.. but need to get my account back asap.. is this A easy process? Thanks hope to hear from you. :) @hetzner

name: Rachel Kress
review_header: Strict security is great and at this price, I just can't bring myself to look elsewhere
review_body: I've had an account with Hetzner for 5 years and have found them to be reliable and helpful when I needed support. They have always responded clearly and assisted me when I asked questions, some of which are no doubt in the documention but as I new kid on the block I haven't known where to look. I'm a small customer, learning wordpress and backend ops, so I really appreciate their strict attitude to security and procedures. Who wouldn't want to both benefit from and learn from good practice when they're starting out.

name: Kevin Beck
review_body: I really love Hetzner! I've been using it for a long time, and it has never let me down. I've tried Vultr, DigitalOcean, Linode, OVH, and AWS, and honestly, Hetzner holds its own against them. Sure, for some specific cases, AWS can be handy‚Äîespecially if you need a complex infrastructure‚Äîor Vultr if you're looking for a specific location. But Hetzner has servers in the US, Germany, and recently Singapore, which is more than enough given their unbeatable pricing. Lately, I've been really digging their ARM Cloud machines; they've helped me cut down the costs of running websites a lot!

name: Giuseppe P
review_header: Yes, they are strict, but you won't find anything better
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for around 10 years and currently manage a few dozen of their root servers (and a few website). In terms of value for money, it's hard to find anything better. Their hardware is solid and their support is fast enough, as I always got the first reply within ~20m for server issues. Yes, they are strict with their rules, so if you want to enjoy their services, you need to be diligent: pay on time, avoid network abuses, and be prepared to provide any requested documents when asked. I've heard horrible stories about clients being shut down overnight, but when I took a look deeper (by reading on forums, etc), I found out the client was very fishy. Moreover I see that many 1-star reviews come from those whose account openings were rejected. I believe this should not be taken into account when evaluating the service, as Hetzner prefers not to do business with everyone. There are plenty of abusers they prefer to stay away from, and sometimes they might even reject legitimate users by mistake. I've had servers locked a few times, and on most occasions, it was my fault. When it wasn't, I reported the issue to a supervisor who addressed it. Remember, they are (still) human employees and can make mistakes. For now, I'm a satisfied customer, and I hope I won't have to regret this review in the future :D

name: Ana Tom
review_header: Worst server experience in 15 years of‚Ä¶
review_body: Worst server experience in 15 years of creating and hosting websites. Their support answers after 24 hours. We were trying to setup our wordpress migration to their managed server, and we faced some problems were we needed their advice. When you own an ecommerce store and you face technical problems, you need immediate answers and support. You can't have your website down for more than a few mins. How can anyone rely on a host that answers after 24 hours? We canceled our hosting package after 1 week of trying to setup the migration, and even though their terms state a 14 day refund policy, they refused to return the money.

name: Starfyre Tech
review_header: You would be better of use a toaster for a provider
review_body: So were does one start with this company. This is a company that does not care for its customers.. We moved domains to them.. Then they send us an extremely couple hundred dollar bill. We asked them to explain the charges and then they ignore us. They refuse to release our domains. Refuse to explain the Charges. Refuse to even respond to a ticket. Then they proceed to shut off one of the domains. We are reasonable people and just wanted them to explain how the bill was so high for 30 days and now the wont even respond. The are holding our domains hostage and shut one off. Them shutting this domain off is a loss of potential income. If you want a good and fair company this is not the one for you. Save yourself a hassle. Save yourself from them trying to strong arm you without explenations. This company holds your domains hostage to get money. That is what they are doing. They are being thiefs. Thugs and Crooks.

name: vinnij
review_body: Hello, I have been using Hetzner for 1 month now I bought a VPS to host my websites on, however at the end of the first month I went to pay the invoice and it was $220. It is for a domain registration however I already owned the domain and transferred it to there system, so I could have everything in once place. I have asked them why it is $220 when I owned the domain and I quote "please specify, why should this be wrongly billed?" I have now asked them for the AUTH codes for both domains and I am getting ghosted from them it has been 2 days since the last response and that was "of course you have to pay for the outstanding invoices till the cancellation date.". If you are thinking of transferring to them or starting with them don't. Save yourself the hassle and just go elsewhere. Thanks,

name: Tanja Vigdisdottir
review_body: I signed up for Hetzner as it came recommended by a colleague. I was notified during the registration process that according to Hetzner automated systems my account carried for unknown reason increased risk and a verification was required. I tried with my drivers license and it failed. I tried with my passport and it failed to. It seems the id verification company Hetzner uses is negatively biased against minorities which is not a surprise given Hetzner is a german company and Germany has a well documented history on their stance on minorities. I inmediatly created a support ticket in the portal requesting a GDPR SAR as I want to know what information Hetzner has on me but the ticket disappeared from the portal. I sent an email on Hetzner support but did not get any response. I even sent an email on the data protection officer at Hetzner, Alena Scholtz but have got no reply. This silence and the strangely faulty id verification process makes me worried about the integrity of the private information I have sent to Hetzner. Will Hetzner leak my highly sensitive id data and is it kept safe? In any case, Hetzner has 30 days to comply with my GDPR SAR request according to EU laws and in case of non compliance Ill certainly report Hetzner to the relevant authorities in Germany which in worst case will lead to an audit and possibly hefty fines and faceloss. Update I have received a confirmation for my SAR which is good. Now the 30 days are ticking and I expect Hetzner to comply with my request. The account has been verifed and the support team notes the problems were to a blurry image. That in itself is a valid point but begs the question about the software being used and the fact that the warning a human intervention takes 1 - 5 minutes is worthless as the reality is very different. The support team had the nerve to ask me to change my review which I find insulting. I am writing about a real experience in this review and it reflects what actually occured. The inital experience was horrible and that needs to be noted. That the company picks up on it through the review is positive but it begs the question about Hetzner support team. The online silence coupled with the support phone redirecting the customer to write an email points to problems with the support team which is not reassuring. I had to phone Hetzner in Finland to get any response and the very nice lady there relayed a message to Alena Scholtz to call me but she never did. Im thankful to Lea here on Trustpilot for acting swiftly and get things in order. Cudos to her but at the same time it feels strange a functioning customer support needs to go through Trustpilot instead of the designated support channels. Four stars on Trustpilot for Lea and her good work and change in subject header to reflect the new situation.

name: Charlie
review_body: Great support, and fast verification as long as you are truthful and forthcoming. I think it is great they verify users. Keep it up!

name: Kevin
review_header: Why need provide ID before use service
review_body: Why need provide ID before use service? Even big tech like AWS, Azure not doing this Edit: after verified I have satisfied with they service, cheap and always up

name: Ser Gio
review_body: The verification process its incredibly slow, I have recived a mail to a third party that wanted pictures of my id for verification and i'm suspecting that hetzner my just have leacked my mail, I dont even understand why they want my ID to beguin with, just take my money. Aside form that the main page is floded with "manteinacne" warning, i havent even started a vps and it looks like( at this rate I never will) but it looks like its gonna be constantly offline if I manage to gei it working

name: Giorgio
review_body: It's refreshing to use a cloud service from a company that isn't an oppressive corporation attempting to lock me into its ecosystem.

name: Olivier
review_header: Hetzner, a Web Hosting Provider of Excellence
review_body: After being with Pair Networks, a top-tier provider in the United States, from 2000 to 2017, I embarked on a quest in 2012 to find a European host capable of meeting my high standards. My goal was to bring my four e-commerce sites, running on CS-Cart, closer to my European customer base to optimize data transfer times. This search was not easy. For five years, while still hosting with Pair Networks, I tested a multitude of European hosts, looking for a service quality comparable to that of Pair Networks. It was finally Hetzner that stood out as the only one able to play in the same league. After this extensive search, in 2017, I closed my account with Pair Networks and transferred all my sites to a dedicated server at Hetzner. The experience has been remarkable ever since. The reliability, performance, and technical support have met my highest expectations. In fact, with my 24 years of experience in the field, I can confidently say that Hetzner's service quality surpasses that of all other hosts I've tested. Hetzner combines technical excellence with a deep understanding of e-commerce business needs. Their robust infrastructure ensures fast loading times and near-constant availability, crucial factors for the success of my online retail sites. For any European company looking for a world-class web host, I wholeheartedly recommend Hetzner. Their commitment to quality and performance makes them an ideal partner for businesses that don't want to compromise on the reliability of their online presence.

name: Markus Hinkel
review_body: Quick support, stable hardware, perfect pricing and unmatched featureset

name: Redcodi
review_header: Great hosting provider at a great price!

name: Domagoj Franc
review_header: Best budget hosting option you can find.

name: Will B.
review_header: Quite happy and surprised with Hetzner...
review_body: For the past few months, I've been using Hetzner Cloud and VPS products in an aim to get off my more expensive VPS with a different host. I have been repeatedly impressed with the quality of their self-serve web interface where I can set up almost anything I need including networking, firewalls, billing and more. Their prices are absolutely the best. I initially found Hetzner by doing price research and comparisons for offline backup storage. Their Vault product was absolutely within my budget and my home Synology NAS has been getting backed up with them for months now. For my Cloud instances, I'm using their America/Virginia datacenter. In addition, I have found their support to be top notch. They reply pretty fast, and don't give me a lot of grief over my questions. Most things I've found in their excellent docs, though. They offer both Windows and Linux. I definitely recommend Hetzner to anyone looking for VPS, Cloud or offline backup storage. I sent them a thank you email along these lines and they suggested I let others know how I feel with a review. Good idea! I think the negative reviews you see here have to be spammers and abusers. They DO ask for ID (criminals won't want to provide that and to privacy fanatics I say: there is no privacy anymore). You have to pay at least one invoice before they'll open any mail ports (this makes it a bad numbers game for scammers and spammers). Before you leave a negative review, ask yourself what you did. Don't just punish the biz with a bad review because they didn't play your stupid spam/scam/criminal games.

name: Shahid Mahmood
review_body: I started using hetzner cloud in February 2000 and am quite satisfied with the service. It is quality service at an affordable price.

name: Augure Zera
review_header: They try to lock you out and take you money
review_body: By illegally asking for a piece of ID which once again, is illegal after payment to access service, and a huge risk to your privacy.

name: Dino Memoviƒá
review_body: Great company, been usign them for more than 15 years and I always had good expiriance

name: Dmitry Ryazanov
review_body: Hetzner closed our business account (K0799618624) without proper reason, despite providing all required information. Our web development company relies on their high-performance servers. Now, we can't access critical backups. Very disappointed with their customer service. Support has not gotten back to us.

name: Utku
review_header: I just got rejected from registering‚Ä¶
review_body: I just got rejected from registering hetzner due to "some concerns". And you shouldn't be asking more verification documents until you say why customer got rejected. Hetzner might be a good provider but lost me with this attitude. Never seen a treatment like this from a hosting provider.

name: Andreas Eduard Hoeller
review_header: I'm a satisfied costumer for over 20‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm a satisfied costumer for over 20 years now. always happy with the service and incredibly good customer support!

name: Adam Brown
review_header: This is a very great company providing‚Ä¶
review_body: This is a very great company providing great servers Thank you guys Iam having great experience with you

name: Imran Aslam
review_header: Using hetzner since long and support is‚Ä¶
review_body: Using hetzner since long and support is at his best. Recommend to everyone

name: Cormac
review_header: Been using Hetzner's storage box for‚Ä¶
review_body: Been using Hetzner's storage box for storing backups of my data and it works very well. I am also very happy with the responses I got from support. I urge Hetzner to modify their fraud controls, it was the first time I was ever asked to verify myself when signing up for a service which shows the high stringency of your system.

name: Oliver Seidel
review_header: I am happy with Hetzner, it works great for me.
review_body: Support is always very quick and actually gets the problem solved. I had need for help on this Sunday afternoon and Hetzner helped me with everything that they could do for me.

name: Erlan Kuyubaev
review_body: Be careful with payment cards. They withdraw money even after refusing products. After I was blocked in their system, I paid the debt and asked to close all my subscriptions since I myself could not do this due to the fact that I could not log into my account. But despite this, a month later they charged my card again. Now I will have to transfer all the money from this card to prevent them from continuing to withdraw money.

name: Bjoern
review_header: Perfect Data Centre Services by Hetzner
review_body: We have been with Hetzner since 2010, utilizing their Managed Hosting and Colocation Services with up to 50 racks. Our experience has been nothing short of exceptional. Having worked with other hosting and housing companies in the past, we can confidently say that Hetzner is by far the most reliable. In 14 years, we've only experienced one day with reduced bandwidth due to an external incident where construction workers (not from Hetzner!) accidentally cut the fiber cables. This level of reliability is unparalleled. The Hetzner staff deserve more than 5 stars. They provide round-the-clock support and are available 24/7/365. Whether it's assisting with server installations at 4 AM or resolving support tickets within 30 minutes‚Äîeven when the task should take an hour‚Äîthey consistently exceed expectations. Lastly, Hetzner offers the best professional data center services at unbeatable prices. We couldn't be happier with our decision to house our servers at Hetzner! Happy to have our servers at Hetzner!

name: elaheh fathi
review_body: Hello good time I am a computer student So far, I have tried to create and verify Hetzner account several times, but unfortunately, I was rejected in all cases. I need a server for some courses. Don't you provide services to Iranians? Why are my efforts unsuccessful?

name: ali moutab
review_body: Hello I have had the Hetzner account for about 1.5 years and I pay the invoice every month My Gmail had a problem and I changed it Hetzner locked my account and asked me to verify my identity online. I did it and they confirmed it, but because I didn't create a new Gmail in my own name, Hetzner closed my account. I live hard and make a living with it. I wish you to return it. I don't even have money for room and board, and I make a living as a server Hetzner account K1130010122 my name is saeid bostani

name: –û—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–≤—Å—å–∫–∏–π –û–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞–Ω–¥—Ä
review_body: Internet channels and servers here are quite powerful, but artificial restrictions and deception nullify these advantages. Nowhere is it stated that the hosting has a limit on the number of files. That is, there may be plenty of space on the disk, but if there are many small files, they say to delete them. To change the main domain on the hosting, you have to order it again, and accordingly pay money for it. A bunch of ports, including the standard one for sending mail, are blocked. Support works very slowly. You can wait a couple of days for an answer.

name: Michael
review_header: There are no equals in performance
review_body: I've been using Hetzner for over 4 years. In terms of performance, DigitalOcean, AWS, and others don't even come close. In my web server tests, Hetzner delivers 70% to 150% better performance. I'm just waiting for managed databases and Kubernetes. The price is 4 times lower than DigitalOcean and 10 times lower than AWS. I haven't encountered any problems, there were a couple of downtimes due to network issues, lasting 2-3 hours per year.

name: Eric Amador
review_header: Its a great service and support

name: FeBit Bili≈üim
review_body: has some so strict rules but Do it's job goodd im using since 2010

name: Adrian
review_header: They are a nice company but a bit too sensitive
review_body: They are a nice company but a bit too sensitive in certain situations. Prices are fair in my opinion, services are reliable, performance is very good for the price. For average user with common needs, it will be perfect. Problem is that they are too sensitive regarding certain things, if you have a search engine and you crawl from a hetzner VPS, it will be terminated. If someone makes a complaint (legit or not) you will be asked to comply to random people's requests, if not, your servers will be terminated and you also risk for your contact details be shared with sketchy parties that initated the complaints. Just one example, on one of my sites I list domains (like a directory), no copyrigted text / titles or content; Random people come and ask me to delist "their" url without wanting to verify that they are indeed the owner (by file upload or meta tag) and Hetzner asks me to comply to these. Somehow understandable because nobody wants to spend time and resources mediating disputes, but it would be refreshing to see a web hosting company that allows freedom of speech (in legal limits) instead of avoiding any inconvenience at the expense of the clients. Sending client details to the people that initiate complaints is also not OK, unless it has a legal ground (court order, etc), because on one ocasion (similar to above situation) I had someone telling me that he will find me and "finish" me, unless I alter the content of my site based on his request. He had my contact details after he made an abusive DMCA claim without any grounds. The internet has become a nasty place and laws are only in place to protect corporations (DMCA, etc).

name: - Andr√© Rodrigues
review_body: I've been using Hetzner dedicated servers for the past 2 years and had 0 issues so far. The prices and support are really good.

name: Andrea
review_body: Hetzner suddenly decided not to refund server setups canceled within 14 days, as per European regulations. Their lawyers don't care, they will answer in court for their actions

name: Olaf Lederer
review_header: Fast and affordable VPS hosting provider!
review_body: I created my first VPS at Hetzner in 2020 and I liked it so much that more have been added in the meantime. The servers are very fast and, above all, extremely affordable (compared to the competition). Contact with support is quick (you must send your message via the panel). Hetzner's services are so good that I only had two questions the entire time, and these were answered to my satisfaction. I recommend Hetzner to customers and partners and anyone looking for a good VPS provider.

name: chris davis
review_header: Great support great service could not‚Ä¶
review_body: Great support great service could not ask for a better partner for my servers

name: Julian
review_header: Prices are not the best and very old‚Ä¶
review_body: Prices are not the best (but ok) and very old HDD/SSD (I got many servers with a HDD/SSD lifetime above 6 years). But fast support and 99,9% uptime!

name: pouria rastan
review_header: A company with inefficient and ridiculous rules!!!!
review_body: I want to write something about the Hetzner company so that you understand how ridiculous this company is and how unplanned and ridiculous its decisions are. I created an account about a week ago, and upon logging into my account, it asked me to verify my identity, and I uploaded my ID card photo, and after 24 hours, my request was rejected for no reason!!!! . This time, I applied with another email with my wife's identification documents. I applied again, which was rejected again. I asked them for an explanation and I said them (Is our European passport not enough for you)? They replied that I should create a user account with an organizational email to be approved. I spent a lot of time and money and created a domain in Namevheap and then created an organizational email and this time I put 2 European passports for confirmation. Guess what happened? Was rejected ? And now this is how I know Hetzner, a ridiculous company with illogical, unplanned customer management, people full of motivation to annoy others and.... I am the manager of several Facebook groups of over 20,000 people in Scandinavia. I will share my bitter and ridiculous experience with the members of my groups and I will try my best not to let anyone buy any service from this company with this stupid behavior.I know that maybe one of them will come and give me an answer under my comment that (..Dear, we understand you and we are sorry for your bad experience, but we prefer not to state our reasons to avoid possible abuses) and this explanation They are the most absurd and ridiculous of all. They have not yet understood the world of communication

name: Andr√©
review_body: I have been using Hetzner as my hosting provider, relying on their services for my projects. Recently, however, I encountered an issue that has made me question the transparency and customer support approach of the company. Without prior notice, Hetzner locked my account from making new orders following a routine check, citing unspecified red flags related to system policy violations, abuse complaints, IPs with bad reputations, and/or incorrect account data. They've informed me that I can continue to use my existing services but barred me from adding new ones for at least one month. After contacting support via the automated 'Robot' system, I was informed via email that my account had been blocked due to hosting three VPS for websites under development, which contained 404 errors and dummy data‚Äîcommon occurrences for sites in development. It's perplexing that developmental errors or issues are deemed problematic by Hetzner, especially since my site does not discuss these internally, nor are they relevant to the external operations. In an effort to resolve this issue proactively, I proposed to delete the server until the development is complete, demonstrating my willingness to cooperate and ensure compliance. This approach feels unnecessarily aggressive and non-collaborative, also the support team at email / phone are extremely agressive. I'm prepared to provide a full explanation of my project and submit any required documentation to clear up any misunderstandings. However, the support's approach, which I perceive as authoritarian, has made it difficult to engage in a constructive dialogue. Trust is crucial in business relationships, and I am committed to maintaining transparency and integrity in my dealings. I hope Hetzner will reciprocate this and offer a more cooperative resolution pathway. Accusing clients of scamming without substantive evidence also seems detrimental to your business's reputation.

name: gyuriX
review_header: Too much traffic usage causes bans
review_body: Hetzner blocks accounts with too much traffic usage. They offer unlimited traffic, but if you use too much of it, then they will ban you from using their services without even asking you to reduce your usage or telling you that they banned you because of that. This is a very bad business practice, and they should instead set clear limits, to avoid confusing people. Hetzner, please reply to this review with the actual traffic limit you have. What's the amount what won't get people banned let's say for auction servers bellow 40 EUR price? If someone wants to make a total of 1 PB outgoing traffic monthly, how many auction servers are needed for that to prevent getting banned? Reply to your reply: You ended your email with a sentence including this: "this decision is final and cannot be appealed". Why is that? Why can't you be more specific regarding what's the issue, so we could solve the issue instead of flat out scheduling account closure to end of July and guessing the issue was related to having too much outgoing traffic, after talking to your resellers. This makes no sense. They told me that 2 weeks ago you had a wave of bans, suspending a bunch of people for high traffic usage and now all those customers are coming to them and other providers.

name: Javad M
review_header: they may block your acoount without notice:/
review_body: they closed my account without notice.i didnt abuse or didnt do anything harmfull with my servers. i lost all of my data that was very important to me the cloud is great and top quality but the way they treat people and there information is wrong as a customer i need to trust the service i use completely.your data's not safe here

name: CSG
review_header: An honest review after 20 years of using Hetzner
review_body: I've been using Hetzner for around 20 years now and I feel like I have to give credit where credit is due. Regarding their dedicated servers line, I managed to satisfy all my clients needs with it. My company went from providing small IT services to full-fledged SaaS solutions. This success would haven't been possible without the reliability of their underlying infrastructure and the competitive pricing mode for its dedicated servers. I have also used other service providers over the years but none of them has come close to the quality/price ratio offered by Hetzner. I have also deployed some machines within their cloud offering, and I find it very competitive although I was expecting them to roll out more services following the AWS model. I'm currently in the process of testing their Terraform provider to convert part of my infrastructure to IaC. I will likely update this review once I have enough information to talk about it.

name: Ahmed Omar
review_header: They banned my account for suspicious‚Ä¶
review_body: They banned my account for suspicious when I ask the reason they say we don‚Äôt publish lol so bad

name: Ramon Rodriguez Alvarez
review_body: Everything just works. Simple and fast. And you pay only for what you really use.

name: A.A
review_header: Sheer Price-Performance Ratio - Privacy Friendly Cloud Provider
review_body: Ok peeps, I'm a Hetzner Cloud user since February 2020 and I'm not shy of being a Hetzner fanboy. Is it wrong? Not if logic aligns with fanboyism. Why? 1. The benchmarks and lowendtalk posts speak for themselves. I've personally benchmarked majority of their CX and CPX lineups since 2020. I am never disappointed. 2. Heck their ‚Ç¨3-‚Ç¨4 shared instances have a stable 1Gbps Down and Up. Plus, who on earth gives 20TB of FREE egress allowance? 3. Pure KVM virtualisation - nothing less. 4. They are strictly GDPR compliant. I'd rather deploy with them than AWS. I just wish they had S3 compatible Object Storage.

name: Alessandro
review_header: no one else is like Hetzner
review_body: I have been using Hetzner services for over 15 years, I started with dedicated servers and then moved to the cloud, and I can say that no one else is like Hetzner: fantastic service, extraordinary value for money.

name: Vince
review_body: The keyword for hosting services is "trustworthy" and these people know their stuff. Their 24/7 tech support is amazing. Highly recommended.

name: Jojo
review_header: Used other Hosting Providers for a long‚Ä¶
review_body: Used other Hosting Providers for a long time, always wanted to switch to Hetzner. I recently made the move, and well what can I say Its one of the Best for Dedicated Servers. Cheap and Great Performance. The Support is also awesome, fixed my Issues within one Hour. Anyone searching for a good hoster? Dont bother with other hosting providers, use Hetzner.

name: Sharukh Saifi
review_header: They will block you minutes after you give them your ID and credit card.
review_body: It's hazardous for anyone to work with this company, they can deactivate your account and delete everything without giving any explanation or chance to reverse the decision. They bait customers with suspiciously low prices so that they will try to register and get rejected without any reason. And when people talk about it online they will come and brag about their so-called fraud prevention thing. They are very arrogant. They do these things not only with new customers but also with the customer they have for years. This shows how incompetent this company is. When they didn't able to stop scammers from using their service they just decide to ban anyone with low value. EU always try to be a pro customer region they should do their thing and do something about companies like this. Since this company is violating privacy of people from around the world. Meanwhile, I will suggest people to use DigitalOcean. I am using it for years without any problem and they never asked for my ID. Edit after reply: Respectfully I don‚Äôt want to use your services even if you allow it. You guys are just running a racket to collect private information of your customers.

name: Janning Vygen
review_body: Hetzner is great! We are a costomer for 10 years. We run a very popular website and app with Millions of users and up to 100.000 request/s. Reasonable priced, top hardware, fast service. Hetzner rules! Can't say anything bad about it. Runinng a very popular website and App with millions of users and up to 100.000 req/s

name: Albert Douglas
review_header: I created an account on Hetzner and set‚Ä¶
review_body: I created an account on Hetzner and set up two minimal servers for my Chat GPT Telegram bot. However, in less than 24 hours, I woke up to find that my account had been closed without any explanation. As a result, I had to switch to another service. This experience left me with only negative feelings.

name: Ahmed El-kattan
review_body: Another case of an account deactivation without any justification and marking it *FINAL*. It appears to be common practice for Hetzner to deactivate old and new account on a bizarre patters, which seems to be strangely targeting Arabs in my opinion, but they will always reply with "No we don't...". This started to be silly and unreliable, specially for a company that should be trusted for reliability, while I did not get the chance to test this personally, some users got their servers down! I will not wait for a reply arrogantly claiming that this is intentional for some unreasonable policy, especially after submitting my personal information for verification, the least I expect is a reasonable response.

name: ninja
review_body: I've been with Hetzner for almost 3 years, had 2 dedicated servers and a couple vps, and I couldn't be happier with the service. The servers are reliable, offering exceptional performance at a very competitive price. I almost never needed to contact support because everything worked well. The uptime was great, and the setup process was smooth. Highly recommended!

name: Georg Hilgenberg
review_header: quick reaction and good hints for best‚Ä¶
review_body: quick reaction and good hints for best possible solutions.

name: B Barta
review_body: worst experience ever, they discriminate my country based customers reply: Really? First, you asked for a credit card. After I entered it and logged in, you then requested an ID. I am a citizen of the EU with valid documents, and after I sent them to you, you canceled my account without providing a reason. Is it normal for you to ask for people's credit cards and then cancel their accounts? We call this fraudulent behavior. Personally, I didn't even want your services; I am a long-time and satisfied user of Linode, but one of my clients asked me if I could help him with servers on Hetzner. So you know what? Keep your nonsense to yourself.

name: Alaa Ahmed
review_header: very bad company server got locked‚Ä¶
review_body: very bad company server got locked cause i`ve used windows remote desktop and and cost me 2 days to setup windows very complicated plus felt racist from their support cause im egyptian very bad exprince i did regret

name: Mounir
review_body: I signed up with Hetzner for a small project, but just one day later, they deactivated my account without explanation. They only had my ID and German address on file. This experience makes me question if it‚Äôs common for Hetzner to close accounts sporadically, or if they engage in some form of discriminatory selection during the account opening process.

name: Maks Poltoratsky
review_body: Hetzner is our server provider for 5 years now. Recently we had our RAM and NVMe drives upgraded, and tech support did an excellent job in short time. We received fast and professional service for every task we required.

name: Christian Stangerup
review_body: I've been with Hetzner for the past 4 years. Never had any serious issues, and the performance has been superb. They're also quick to answer support requests with straightforward resolutions - at least in my case. Truly a German powerhouse. Thank you Hetzner!

name: anas khan
review_body: After creating an account, I was dismayed when it got rejected. I emailed support for clarification and offered verification, but it's been three weeks without any response. This lack of communication and delayed support is disappointing. Needs to improve their customer service.

name: mojtaba alipoor
review_header: How can they block my account for no‚Ä¶
review_body: How can they block my account for no reason, which contains all the important information? I paid my invoice on the first day, and the customer should not be treated like this, I hope you will regret this. It is not really right

name: nove dam
review_body: Hello everyone I used to praise Hetzner a lot, but now I have no good memories of them They have closed my account after paying 200 euro invoice Without any reason Also, my friends messaged me that most of their accounts were also closed After a few months of use and invoice payment When you send them an email asking why it was banned and please return the account, they don't give any answer And without any warning, it will see your account and your servers will be disconnected, if you have important information in them, it will be very disastrous. I hope Hetzner cares more about his customers.

name: Mario Lawenstein
review_body: Many thanks to the great support team at Hetzner! They gave us fantastic support when we moved our domain and email accounts. Despite many enquiries, they always had an open ear and were on hand with help and advice. Thank you very much for your patience and expertise!

name: logic guy
review_header: After giving them my credit card they‚Ä¶
review_body: After giving them my credit card they wouldnt allow me to do anything on their site before verifying my passport or drivers licence, their interface for this however is broken and does not work on any of my installed browsers or on my phone, so as it looks i will be monitoring for false transactions and finding a different provider

name: Adam Micheal Jonkers
review_body: I'm the owner of a business and a company in my country and just interested in Cloud and hosting stuff. We applied for our account while we talked to them before but they rejected us and when we asked for the reason they responded with no make sense answer. We asked to double-check our case but they ignored us multiple times and sounded like they blocked us anymore. I'm very wondering why they act like this when we ask for their ToC and we agreed on all Terms & Conditions.

name: George
review_header: Fast & Professional Service Delivery & Customer Service
review_body: I became a customer @beginning of this year because my previous provider went belly up. I was impressed by the smooth and fast onboarding. It turned out that the reputation in the IT community was for a good reason. But even afterwards it is amazing how fast and committed they respond sucessfully to service requests. Mine might not have been to complicated and didn‚Äôt bring them out of their depth, but I had the impression I nevertheless got full attention. So far I can applaud Hetzner for its good performance and its customer service people! All @ a good price. Thanks for your service so far. Keep going!

name: Abo Motaz
review_header: Trash racist compilated site do not use‚Ä¶
review_body: Trash racist compilated site do not use this site

name: Stefan Boh
review_body: I've been customer for some months now and i can't find anything wrong. Server, Connection, Control panel and Docs are Great. Everything works how it should, like the ip adresses and subnets (Finally some professionals). The support is amazing, really ... Never ever in my life i've encountered this great level of support anywhere. Unfortunately my server crashed having some trouble with the CPU and without any problems i got 3 choices what i wanted to do. I picked the choice for a new server with old drives for a fast resolution and without question i got a new even better server within 90 minutes and everything is working fine again, i did not have to do a thing! No DNS change nothing and no price change. Thanks again!

name: Rudolf Zwicker
review_body: Hetzner is currently running several of my company's servers. Today I also moved my homepage, everything worked perfectly. So far I'm extremely satisfied with the service from Hetzner - they're true Franconians.

name: Alex
review_body: Extremely helpful support. They escalated the call to personal service rather than insisting on following protocols to the letter, once it became clear that my support call was an edge case that fell outside of standard protocol.

name: Ipaomtk
review_body: The badest hosting company on earth i have used for 4 months and paid all my invoices and simply the send me cancellation email that my account will be closed in 30 day and i have to move all my files to another hosting I have paid more than 2000$ just to setup my website file and now i have to move to another hosting and pay aging When I told hetzner support wy you will close my account the told me (Dear Client, Unfortunately we cannot provide you with any additional information regarding the cancellation of your account.) Ticket#2024042503005534 Do not use hetzner

name: Efdal
review_header: Truly masterpiece of a cloud provider
review_body: Using Hetzner for 2 years (dedicated server) and yes they earn a positive review for the reason that I've had a very good experience with them. I've had like only 1 outage in service that was coming from them, but were fixed in just like ~5-15 minutes. Completely managing my whole server my self, using Caddy (no hosting panel), Hetzner is the best cloud provider if you search for price/quality ratio. I have many applications being deployed, I secure them and program them efficiently and had never issues with any of my apps/services. I have status logs of a whole year with 99.6% uptime. A truly masterpiece of a cloud provider. Respect to those Germans for their amazing infrastructure and quality prices!

name: Enmanuel Torras Mata
review_header: i try Hetzner for last three years
review_body: i try Hetzner for last three years Personally, i thinks is the most better data center service i try in my 20 years in this market I love Hetzner, you too if you try

name: Jimmy Lawrence
review_body: Really nice hosting, using it for 15 years, no issues at all. Extremely good support.

name: Jimmi Nielsen
review_header: I recently purchased a dedicated server‚Ä¶
review_body: I recently purchased a dedicated server and have been experiencing ongoing issues with the Ubuntu installation. Despite multiple attempts to reach Hetzner's support team, the responses have been inconsistent and unhelpful. Initially, they insisted that the system should work as it functioned correctly in their test environment. Upon further contact, they acknowledged a problem with the boot sequence and advised me to attempt the installation again. After several attempts and no resolution, they claimed to have addressed the issue. However, when I followed up for a status update, I received no response for several days. When they finally did reply, they reverted to their original stance that there was no issue. This experience has been extremely frustrating. I have cancelled the server again; paid for a week and setup fee for a server that won't accept Ubuntu installation. Great job Hetzner...

name: Thomas Batham
review_body: I have been using this provider for the last few years, From cloud VPS to dedicated. I got a server off one of the auctions and the experience the whole way has been phenomenal. I just had a drive failure, and support pointed it out to me when I was having issues, they were able to point out to me that my drive had failed and caused my recent issues and continued <1hour I had new drives and a working system... free of charge! I am going to be a long time customer!

name: Alex
review_body: I'm a light, non-expert user of Hetzner hosting & email. And of course, I run into things that I can't solve myself ‚Äì and *every time*, Hetzner' customer support was great+!

name: brinkman it
review_body: For years I had my own dedicated servers and about 2 years ago started migrating to Hetzner. First a VPS, after that a few dedicated servers. So far, I'm very happy with the services offered by Hetzner. Upfront warnings of maintenance, quick and knowledgeable responses to tickets (only needed a few times). So, "so far, so good". The famous "German P√ºnktlichkeit" and very competitive prices for the great services they're offering.

name: Radim Marek
review_body: I have been using Hetzner both personally and professionally for over 15 years and have consistently relied on their services and support without hesitation. Their offerings are simple and straightforward, and they tend not to chase the latest trends. In the past, I used their dedicated servers, but recently I find myself increasingly relying on their cloud infrastructure. Having also experienced larger AWS and GCP deployments, I truly appreciate the personal support Hetzner provides when needed, which fortunately isn‚Äôt very often. The pricing is excellent, encouraging me to experiment more freely. Clearly, you get what you pay for; while their infrastructure is exceptionally stable, you still need to build resilience yourself. This is not a criticism, quite opposite. I am looking forward to taking advantage of their US cloud infrastructure offering soon.

name: Brean Trading Limited
review_body: I registered today for my company. after sending documents they rejected our account ! after then we've sent an email to them and explained that we are a legal company and we filled all forms correctly. and this is their answer :)) : There is some information in your account that appears suspicious. Contracts based on incorrect, incomplete, or suspicious account information are void. For that reason, we cannot accept your account. We do not share details about why certain accounts appear suspicious. Publishing this information would make it easier for people to create fake accounts and abuse our services. We apologize for the inconvenience.

name: Samer
review_header: best hosting partner ever , very professional support , competitive pricing
review_body: best hosting partner ever

name: VA
review_header: I switched from Contabo to Hetzner‚Ä¶
review_body: I switched from Contabo to Hetzner because their technology is on a different level, everything is automated and doesn't require customer support. I never had any problems with Hetzner. If you need a good and quality VPS, Hetzner is the way to go.

name: JOSEPH OTI BOATENG
review_header: Bad Customer service - Can't recover deleted account
review_body: I signed up for an account with my personal email and mistakenly chose that it was a company registration. After registering I realised the mistake and opted to remove the account. Later I need to create a personal account, and I cannot use my email to login, cannot recover my account (using lost option - claims account disabled), and there is no panel to recover deleted account. Not even an email was sent to me about disabling the account and how to recover it. I tried sending an email to customer support, and received no response.

name: Bernhard Mackert
review_header: Fast response time and great help at support
review_body: Having difficulties with domain transfers, the support solved it every time 100% in a very friendly way. I also contacted the support several times with other issues and they always made it work. I recommend Hetzner 100%!

name: Charlie Roberts
review_header: Hetzner rejected my account after half a month
review_body: Recently had my Hetzner account closed unexpectedly, citing 'irregularities', despite my adherence to all their guidelines. Disappointed with the lack of clarity and resolution options. Hoping for a more transparent and constructive approach in the future.

name: Shailendra
review_header: They have one of the highest quality servers
review_body: They have one of the highest-quality servers among all VPS providers. And their pricing is in fact on the lower side. I have been using them for a couple of years and not a single instance of downtime.

name: Michael Robert Lambert
review_body: Hetzner deleted my account citing "incorrectly provided data". The fact that they cannot or do not know how to fully verify the provided information for accuracy is their problem, not mine. Why should this concern me? Absolutely all the information provided during registration is accurate and can be verified by providing documents, but Hetzner didn't even do that. Apparently, it won't even be possible to contest their decision. Well, it's okay, I think there are still many alternatives.

name: David Henry
review_body: Solid servers, never fail. The only negative, support can take a while to respond, a chat service would really help.

name: artyom kocharyan
review_body: Very rude and unhelpful. I called with a question, the guy asked my customer number and then said "i don't see any problems in our system", and when I tried to explain my issue he start raising his voice and said "you are responsible for your website"!

name: Florian L.
review_body: I recently had a very disappointing experience with Hetzner customer service. After encountering difficulties configuring IP addresses on my hosted server, I contacted their technical support for help. Unfortunately, instead of effectively solving my problem, I was met with dry responses and a total lack of assistance in resolving my situation. I ordered additional IP addresses, however, I had taken the wrong ones. Their support responded very quickly, and invited me to cancel the IPs and order new ones. I paid a ‚Ç¨41.88 activation fee for 10-15 minutes of "use". They wouldn't refund the fee so I could take the good ones and pay the new activation fee. This attitude is simply unacceptable and shows a blatant lack of consideration for customer satisfaction. If they want to turn off new customers as soon as they arrive, that's their problem, but it's not a commercial way of doing things. It just drives the customer away, and that's my case. I strongly advise against doing business with Hetzner if you're looking for quality customer service and a fair sales policy. Sure, they have more or less attractive prices, but their lack of transparency and inability to resolve problems satisfactorily are alarming signs for anyone considering becoming a customer. I am deeply disappointed by this experience and would not recommend Hetzner to anyone.

name: Lauren Abigail Jones
review_header: I'll start with the fact that our‚Ä¶
review_body: I'll start with the fact that our impressions of the power and performance of Hetzner's VPS servers were exceptionally positive. Their hardware is indeed impressive and flawlessly handles high loads, which is a big plus for any business. However, our experience with account management left much to be desired. We recently encountered an unexpected closure of our account due to detected discrepancies, which came as a complete surprise to us. We apologize if we inadvertently violated any rules, although we carefully reviewed all the requirements before registration. We would like to emphasize that all the data we provided is authentic, which can be confirmed through our VAT ID. We highly value transparency and openness in any relationship and would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss and resolve this situation. Despite what happened, we still consider Hetzner one of the market leaders in terms of the quality of services provided and hope for a positive resolution of our issue.

name: GreekCrazy
review_body: Totally SHAME , i requested for the support to make a iso USB since morning 8 hours am just dealing with them and they keep saying to me none of the links is working . i share more then 6 links for downloading the ISO file and one of them was a google drive and they didn't want to make it for me instead of saying straight away sorry we are not here to help you just simple i wouldn't spend all the in front of the Computer and dealing with lazy support to do the work SHAME SHAME SHAME! Ticket number : #2024031803021728 PLEASE DONT USE THEM !!!! they don't want you to be happy customer !!

name: Aiden G
review_body: I've been working with Hetzner services since 2017. I'm very satisfied overall, the prices are unbeatable, I never had any issues and the customer service always assisted when I needed. The only requests I have is an updated website management panel, it is very dated and also a better Layer 7 DDoS protection, eventho claiming they do provide with a DDoS protection, it's not effective at all against Minecraft server attacks

name: allen williams
review_body: Okay, get the clich√© of German efficiency, precision, and privacy that imply their largely hands-off approach. Done? Then get ready for a great company ready to assist within their stated boundaries. Once you are in and you get it, they're the best. Been there over 10 years and not going anywhere. Americans should note that intercontinental latency has been nearly eliminated! So give it a try..

name: krushik
review_body: We've rented 2 custom physical servers for 6 years and everything was great, including occasional timely disk drives replacement. Then we switched to hetzner cloud and it got even better with no need to maintain the physical parts and virtualization. Servers and network are stable, performance is good. It's useful to mount an additional flexible network drive, and rent a StorageBox for Borg backups!

name: V. Kuznetsov
review_body: I am customer since 2016. It goes well

name: Philip Fj√¶r√•
review_header: Poor DDOS protection and support at critical times.
review_body: I've been a satisfied Hetzner customer for quite a long time. However, to truly judge a company you have to see how to react in case of issues rather than when everything is going smoothly. Unfortunately I've been targeted by DDOS attacks that quite seriously affect my business. Hetzner advertises their DDOS protection with following statement: "We are also able to flexibly adapt to other unique attacks and to reliably mitigate them. The above technologies support a high level of automation, which our technicians continually optimize step by step. We can improve the system by analyzing each attack and constantly adjusting our filters and responses." However, this is simply not true. I've been DDOSed almost a month now on various servers and there are no indication that Hetzner has any kind of interest in working with the client to improve their mitigation. Pretty much after a lengthy dialogue their response is "Go and buy external DDOS protection. We do not offer this kind of support." I am admitedly quite shocked with support on these issues has Hetzner in general seems competent and has offered great support. When I am truly in need, there is no help to be gotten here. I have over 40 dedicated servers spending well over ‚Ç¨6000/month on their services. So beware, Hetzner is not willing to help mitigate a simple 100K pps volumetric DDOS attack that most other providers would have no issues dealing with normally. The biggest shocker is that their mitigation CAN mitigate it, but they refuse to enable the mitigation because it does not meet their threshold, even though they in the past has done this so the capability is there...

name: Ralf V√∂lzke
review_body: Price & performance is top! I had questions about the process and received very detailed and competent help. Everything as it should be!

name: Efe
review_body: They asked for a certificate of incorporation and we uploaded it. Within minutes they rejected it and DELETED the whole account:) We are a VC-backed B2B SaaS company in the UK. Anyways, we right away started using one of their competitors, again, within minutes. It isn't worth the trouble trying them.

name: Biswajit Das
review_header: block my 41 VPS with out specify any‚Ä¶
review_body: block my 41 VPS with out specify any reason. i ask may time, don't able to explain why exactly block. i always pay on time. so its noting more then harassment. reply: I agree, but at least Hetzner should know and share why my account is being closed. Despite my repeated inquiries, no valid reason has been provided. I have been a loyal customer with 7 servers and over 40 VPS, paying $1500 USD per month without fail. I've even offered access to my servers for monitoring purposes, but unfortunately, I've only experienced harassment. Moving such a large number of servers to another provider is incredibly challenging. I urge Hetzner to reconsider their decision and provide transparency regarding the account closure.

name: N.A.
review_body: We had a problem accessing our account because the recovery keys we received were not working. The support we received from Hetzner was very prompt, clear and efficient, allowing us to solve our problem.

name: Sam
review_body: Hetzner has been part of my company's success for more than 12 years now. Started with several dedicated servers then cloud, DNS and storage. All stable and at a reasonable price with a friendly and fast support. They are constantly evolving with the ever changing technological challenges and customer needs. One of the few providers you can rely on.

name: Vlad
review_body: Terrible experience! Terrible support! Don't recommend!

name: Vikram R
review_body: Simply the best. Been with them for ages, but their new useful cloud features every other week make it so convenient. Can't do better.

name: Martin Butz
review_body: Good support, helpful, immediate and friendly.

name: Ste Bera
review_body: Hetzner has gone crazy. I've had my account for at least 5 years, and my account was closed over 2 invoices (a total of 6 euros) that were paid late, BUT the account was closed 20 days AFTER my payment. For not having paid those invoices. Yes, you heard right. The invoices had expired, and I paid everything on January 31st via PayPal (so the payment reached them immediately), about February 20th the account was closed, and moreover, they issue a new invoice (with the account already closed) which obviously I cannot pay. I managed to get my account unlocked to pay with PayPal after being required to pay through the bank, but despite having paid immediately, after 3 days everything is still blocked, and I was told that I need to pay all the invoices (which I had paid). Basically, they deleted my account and its content 20 days after I had paid everything, without even checking. I'm still insisting only to see if I can recover the VPS since I have many unsaved data as I trusted their cloud. Username: K0628541918

name: Gilad
review_header: I am using hetzner for two years now
review_body: I am using hetzner for two years now I am an amateur with few projects and I am renting few servers from them I have a great experience with hetzner only one time I had to contact support and got an answer very quick The interface is very good and I am very with the service For two I had no issues

name: Volodymyr Yushchak
review_header: Stable and Stable for over 10 years!

name: Adam Thompson
review_body: Hello. I registered an account, wrote to the support service asking them to explain how to go through the verification via Idenfy in the app. However, after that, they didn't even greet me and just deleted my account. This is the first time I've encountered such an unfriendly attitude.

name: fƒ±rsat kamp
review_header: They take credit card and ID information and block them
review_body: I was blocked 5 minutes after receiving my ID and credit card information. They said there was an irregularity before they even did anything. These are very dangerous things.

name: Nick
