review_body: I switched to Hetzner from Linode (glad I did now that Linode has been swallowed up by Akamai) when they introduced their Cloud service. Best decision I've made as a WordPress developer. Rock-solid, reliable service, and great value for money (the value for money seems to attract people intent on abusing Hetzner's terms & conditions, though, hence all the negative reviews). Can't recall ever having to contact support. A great company that deserves to be rated higher than they are on Trustpilot.

name: UNKOWN USER
review_header: The worst user experience I have ever‚Ä¶
review_body: The worst user experience I have ever had never use again I dont suggest to anyone

name: Abdoulaye
review_header: Exceptional Service and Unmatched Reliability at Hetzner
review_body: I have been a Hetzner customer for quite some time now, utilizing their server services, and I could not be more pleased. From the get-go, Hetzner impressed me with the quality and reliability of their offerings. Their server isn't just high-performing; it's also incredibly stable, which is crucial for my online projects and applications. What really sets Hetzner apart, in my opinion, is their customer support. Every time I've needed assistance or had queries, their team has been prompt, professional, and exceedingly helpful. It's reassuring to know that I have such responsive support to rely on whenever necessary. Moreover, the value for money is exceptional. The pricing is competitive, and considering the quality of service and server reliability, I find it to be an excellent investment. Hetzner also offers great flexibility in terms of server configurations, allowing me to tailor resources to suit my project needs perfectly. I highly recommend Hetzner to anyone looking for a reliable and high-quality server service provider. Their commitment to customer satisfaction, combined with the performance and stability of their servers, makes them an outstanding choice for professionals and businesses of all sizes.

name: AgilNature
review_body: Quick feedback and problem solving. I'm very happy with Hetzner.

name: ilker S√ºrmeli
review_body: Waste of time. Account rejected :)) Ordered managed server with a company. Our company is about 5-6 years and in EU. Send every document but still rejected. They don't even ask more about any thing. And they don't answer again once you are rejected. Calling them is useless.

name: Lee Ann Lane
review_header: I will try to write this review with‚Ä¶
review_body: I will try to write this review with restraint, although I am literally in shock. I have already expressed everything I think about them in an email. I registered for their service a week ago, and today I received an email stating that they cannot enter into a contract with me‚Ä¶ Seriously? Could you not have informed me on the same day when I registered the account? I advise no one to deal with this service if you value your time and nerves. It‚Äôs safer to work with competitors.

name: Albert
review_header: Not a good hosting provider for serious‚Ä¶
review_body: Not a good hosting provider for serious companies. They are quick to block your server in cases of disagreement or if they demand changes to be made to your website. It has happened to us, resulting in significant damage to our company.

name: Veli Uzun
review_body: You didn't even explain the violation. I gave me all the information you requested. Please review my account. Provide me with a return.

name: erkan
review_body: My Hetzner membership was new. After 10 days of use, I was canceled for violating the rules. I have no unpaid bills and I did not give false information about myself. After reading Mehmet Varcin's comment below, I felt the need to make this edit in my own comment because the comment below mentions that Hetzner's quality is not reflected in the rating on Trustpilot and that this is surprising. Hetzner will of course determine its customer policy itself. However, if there is a deficiency in the documents submitted for the membership process or a nonconformity that is later detected, it can be notified by e-mail and additional documents or verifications can be requested. Instead of doing this, accusing people of inappropriate behavior and canceling their membership causes customers who trust Hetzner to lose money, effort, time and trust. Hetzner states that it does this very intensively and in order to protect the rights of its other customers. They are outraged that the loss of customers is being ignored by canceling memberships immediately. This is reflected in the comments on Trustpilot. Epilogue A membership to be reactivated should not be canceled so easily.

name: Mehmet Varcin
review_header: My 3+ Years of Exceptional Experience with Hetzner
review_body: I have been a loyal Hetzner customer for over three years, during which I've utilized a range of services, including dedicated servers, cloud servers, and storage boxes. Throughout this period, Hetzner's team has consistently impressed me with their swift responses to support tickets and their efficiency in resolving any issues. Given my overwhelmingly positive experience, I find it surprising that Hetzner's reviews on Trustpilot do not fully reflect the high quality of service they provide. In my opinion, Hetzner deserves much higher recognition for their reliability, excellent customer service, and the value they offer. I am extremely satisfied as a Hetzner customer and would highly recommend their services to anyone in need of reliable and efficient hosting solutions.

name: Thomas Weber
review_body: We have been using Hetzner's managed servers and web hosting for our projects for many years. Their technology and support is excellent. All thumbs up for their dedication too.

name: Steve
review_header: Excellent support and value for money
review_body: Excellent support and value for money! Transfered many domains to them and in the beginning it is just figuring out. But the support team is very helpful!

name: Aleksandrs Matjusenko
review_body: Account closed suddenly for "irregularities" without prior notice or explanation. Unacceptable lack of transparency and fairness. Immediate clarification and decision review needed.

name: Akrom Numonov
review_body: I received a message stating that my account was deactivated due to concerns about updated customer information. This caught me by surprise, and I reached out to customer support immediately. While I appreciate the prompt response, the communication regarding the reasons for deactivation was not clear and I was ready to prove myself and all the information I gave was correct.

name: Best Workers
review_body: By far the best provider when it comes to dedicated hosting and cloud hosting. I‚Äôve been using Hetzner for almost 8 years now and so far I‚Äôm extremely happy with their service.

name: Nikola
review_body: I was searching for a hosting provider. I decided to try with Hetzner. Let me talk about their registration process: 1. During the process I was immediately asked for payment verification via CC or SEPA wire. Other providers also require this, so I guess it is OK. 2. Cannot use VPN during the registration. You will be able to register and go through the Name/address/phone and then CC payment and all only then to receive instant "We decided to close your account" in your mail. No mention of VPN usage, you have to figure that on your own. At least block the access to the website if using VPN, why are you wasting time? 3. After figuring out I should not use VPN and finally go about with your registration, then I needed to supply government-issued ID or passport. You cannot use your account before doing so. BTW, I am from an EU country, not really sure how that's considered a high risk. I provided the needed material. 4. Ultimately after 12 hours my registration was denied. No reason stated again, nothing blurry, nada. Nice, I had to provide more KYC information than most online banking institutions would require, mind you - for a HOSTING PROVIDER, and still get rejected. I do not recommend wasting time with them. Edit 07.02.24 - 3 workdays later, still no response from the support team. Only have received the automatic 'ticket received' response. Edit 13.02.24 - 7 workdays later I get the first response back with the reply below my review and it is a gentle "go away", again 0 information provided. I already had forgotten about it but thanks for reminding me about your service.

name: ukuzi ava
review_body: My friends and I are students and we really need a server for studying We tested with single documents for verification, but Hetzner does not even check the documents and immediately rejects them. We are 4 students and none of us succeeded in creating an account. We are ready to verify our identity online, but Hetzner does not allow it uziava@gmail. com

name: Russell Emmerson
review_body: I spent the entire day at work, and when I came home, I discovered a letter in my corporate email stating that my account has been canceled. In my opinion, the reason is absurd. It is stated that I did not provide complete information. I don't know what additional information they needed during the account registration process, as I had provided all the factual data about my company. I don't understand what Hetzner had in mind about this, perhaps they should have requested additional documentation by email if needed. Overall, I am very dissatisfied with this service, and I am switching to competitors.

name: Victor M
review_header: I beg you not to use Hetzner!
review_body: This company blocked my account and deleted all my data. No warnings or notifications! Now I don't know what to do. All my data in all databases is gone!üò≠ I have successfully used their services since 2011. Never delayed payment. Didn't cause any inconvenience. And now in some projects I was left without work for six months. In other projects without client data. Because of Hetzner, my clients are angry and want to leave me. They deleted everything completely! I beg you, stay as far away from them as possible!

name: Junior Durski
review_header: Take care if you stop to use it.. And Cancel the service
review_body: Service cloud is good. Problem came when stopped to use the service, so I stopped to pay.. Now they are asking for 2 month debt because I didn't canceled the service. I try to cancelled but now I have to pay first for something that I didn't use it for 2 month. I didn't see anywhere that you need to Cancel the service by yourself and also I never seen a service where keep charging even if yous stop to use the service. All of the services that I used in different companies, they cancel contract if you don't paid... Take care with this company! Updated 07/02/2024 They sent me an email with my Cancellation Order with an invoice and now I have to pay also this last month. TAKE CARE WITH THIS COMPANY AND DONT FORGET TO CANCEL EVERYTHING AFTER YOU USE IT. BECAUSE THEY ARE GONNA TAKE YOUR MONEY EVEN IF YOU DONT USE THE SERVICE AND THE CAN CHARGE DIRECTLY FROM THE CARD.... UPDATED AS I SAW THE ANSWER: LIKE MOST OF THE SERVICES ON INTERNET (NOT SUSCRIPTION ONES), IF YOU DONT PAY THEY DONT RENEW THE SERVICE. IF YOU DONT PAY NETFLIX. YOU DONT HAVE THEIR SERVICES. BUT THEY DONT KEEP "INNVOICING"... ANYWAY. 05/03/2024. AFTER RECEIVED IN FEB FROM YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE SAYING THE CONTRACT IS CANCELLED. TODAY I RECEIVED ANOTHER INVOIVE FOR "HOURLY SERVICES". ITS A JOKE? UPDATE: 19/03/2024 AFTER SEVERAL MESSAGES ASKING TO CANCEL ACCOUNT. AFTER THEY CONFIRMED THAT MY ACCOUNT IS CANCELLED THEY CONTINUE SENDING INVOICE FOR EXTRA CHARGES... AMAZING.. KEEP AWAY FROM THEM!!

name: Fail Radin
review_body: They left us with nothing. Yesterday they disabled our account and did not allow us to save a backup copy. We lost our entire project. They don't answer us. Nothing came by mail. We were just left with nothing

name: Ludvig
review_body: Been a customer with Hetzner for a few years now. Their support team is fast, servers are reliable and the pricing is insanely cheap. Would recommend :)

name: Konstantin
review_header: The account was rejected immediately after its creation without any reason
review_body: I created a new account and had not yet purchased any server. Then I found an email sent to me telling me ‚ÄúRejection of your account.‚Äù "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have canceled all your existing products and orders with us." What information caused concerns? I don't know!

name: A Schmid
review_header: I have Hetzner now a few years for a‚Ä¶
review_body: I have Hetzner now a few years for a couple of VPS and Storage Share, running a website and a few app servers. I never had any major problems, it's all been smooth sailing. I did have to contact support only 2-3 times and every time the problem was resolved in a short period of time. The incidents were mainly configuration questions. One time a server didn't come back up after update and reboot. I opened a ticket and within a few hours the server was running again.

name: Viktor
review_body: Stellar Performance and Great Customer Service! I've been with HETZNER for over 3 year now, and I can confidently say that they have exceeded my expectations in both performance and customer service. First and foremost, the performance of their hosting and cloud servers is nothing short of stellar. My websites load incredibly fast, and I've experienced virtually no downtime since I migrated to their platform. The reliability and speed of their servers enhanced the satisfaction of my audience. What truly sets HETZNER apart, however, is their exceptional customer service. The support team is knowledgeable, responsive, and always ready to assist with any issues or inquiries. Whether it's a technical glitch or a general question about server configurations, they have consistently provided prompt and effective solutions. Another aspect that I appreciate is the user-friendly interface of their control panel. Managing my hosting settings and deploying applications has never been easier. The intuitive design of the dashboard reflects their commitment to providing a seamless experience for users of all levels of expertise. In terms of scalability, HETZNER offers a range of flexible plans that cater to both small businesses and enterprises. This scalability has allowed my online presence to grow without any hiccups, as I can easily upgrade my resources as needed. Overall, I couldn't be happier with my decision to choose HETZNER. They've proven themselves to be a reliable and customer-centric partner, consistently delivering top-notch performance and great support. If you're looking for a hosting and cloud server provider that prioritizes both technical excellence and customer satisfaction, I wholeheartedly recommend HETZNER.

name: Jo√£o Grilo
review_body: Been using hetzner cloud servers for almost a decade, so far so good!

name: Theking Mahdi
review_header: Stupid hetzner company rejected my team‚Ä¶
review_body: Stupid hetzner company rejected my team account after four month what are you doing,?

name: Vickisalazar
review_header: Banned my account for no reason
review_body: I am from Ukraine. I registered an account in Hetzner. I bought a server and started using it. Of course, because I currently live in Finland. I entered with a Finnish IP. Two days later they banned my account. I even sent the documents by email, but they did not return. This is cruelty.

name: saei
review_body: ‚Äèsaei7377@gmail ‚ÄèBan my account after 12 months of payment for no reason ‚Äèsaei7377@gmail ‚ÄèAfter sending the ticket, they tell me to create a new account!!!! Hello Good time My order number is K1234769722 And the email I used to verify the account is the same email: saei7377@gmail .com I have been using the account for about 1 year until 2 weeks ago the account was hacked and I informed the support and they said to create a new account while my old account was with a limit of 50

name: Tigran
review_body: Good price, high quality services

name: Nico
review_body: I‚Äôm using Hetzner‚Äôs services for many years now with only positive experiences. Both the dedicated servers and auction servers are very well priced and provide the performance you would expect. Also the customer service is always very responsive and helpful when you need them. I read some negative reviews that I don‚Äôt recognize. Keep up the good work!

name: Tom Audenaert
review_header: Been a customer for years now.
review_body: Been a customer for years now. Hosting, managed (now abandoned) and cloud. Clear prices, easy to use system and losts of tutorials.

name: Alexoo Slovakia
review_header: Using it for few years now and the‚Ä¶
review_body: Using it for few years now and the price vs performance are good also the features like connecting physical servers with VMs in cloud (creating internal networks between servers) is super. And many other features.

name: Angel Valverde
review_body: I registered an account today ! In verification process I saw connection refused error ! I tested with my home internet and my 4g but problem not resolves ! So I send a ticket to them and described my problem to them. After sending ticket they rejected my account !! After that I send another email to them and told them that I will share my experience in trust pilot so they sent a fast response to me and wanted me to send my documents. After that I send my documents they said : Dear Sir or Madam, There is some information in your account that appears suspicious. Contracts based on incorrect, incomplete, or suspicious account information are void. For that reason, we cannot accept your account. We do not share details about why certain accounts appear suspicious. Publishing this information would make it easier for people to create fake accounts and abuse our services. We apologize for the inconvenience. "some information" "that reason" "We do not share details" These are Hetzner's excuses to drive away customers who don't like working with them! ‚Äã They are racist, they lie, they lie, they lie ...

name: Adrian Simmons
review_header: Had a personal VPS at Hetzner for 3‚Ä¶
review_body: Had a personal VPS at Hetzner for 3 years now and it's been rock solid. Moved my business server over to Hetzner Cloud in 2023. Performance is good. DNS service is free and the web interface quite slick. DNS API works well too so I've been able to automate much of the setup with Ansible.

name: Deva Bapat
review_body: Great price to performance Easy to get the cloud up and running

name: Nikitas Skemvris
review_header: My first choice for unmanaged dedicated servers
review_body: I have been a customer of Hetzner for almost 20 years now, maintaining between 1 and 5 servers at any time for personal use and work. I can't remember having issues with performance or reliability (it probably happened a few times but not even remembering is telling) and the few times that I needed to contact support they were quick, accomodating and effective. I have no experience with their other services, but for unmanaged dedicated servers, they are my first choice and recomendation for anyone technical and reasonable enough to understand what "unmanaged" entails.

name: Lucio Crusca
review_body: I only buy server auctions from Hetzner, so I can only comment on those, and, for me, they are well worth the money. I've been using those servers for about 10 years now. Also Hetzner support has always been fast and precise for me.

name: Bernardo
review_body: I have a dedicated server with them as well as a few cloud servers. Performance, reliability and availability have been excellent the whole time, and support requests (things which you cannot do yourself such as attaching a virtual console to a dedicated server) have been carried out quickly and correctly. I also find the prices fair, considering the hardware (real and virtual) you get. I can only recommend Hetzner!

name: Victor Lavrov
review_header: It is no longer a company that benefits your business.
review_body: I have been cooperating with this company for many years and throughout the entire period it has been degrading: terrible support that is in no way interested in solving the problem and will ask the same questions an infinite number of times, services that do not work, a KVM console that falls off for the fifth time, servers that do not restart, pointless customer bans, which many have already written about here... Love to check, recheck, recheck until your business closes while waiting for Hetzner's reaction. It is no longer a company that benefits your business. This is a company that delays your progress and is constantly degrading. Of course, I do not recommend starting any projects with Hetzner.

name: Tawfik Dukhan
review_body: I recently had a highly unsatisfactory experience with Hetzner.com, and I feel compelled to share my negative feedback. Upon signing up for their services, I expected to receive an order confirmation and relevant service details. To my dismay, I never received any such communication. After a month, I was surprised to find payment reminders flooding my inbox, demanding an 83 Euro charge. Bewildered, I immediately contacted their support, expressing my concern about the lack of order confirmation and questioning the validity of the charge. To my utter disappointment, Hetzner.com failed to provide a timely and meaningful response. Despite my attempts to clarify the situation, they continued to bombard me with payment reminders, showing a complete disregard for customer concerns and communication norms. The frustration of being repeatedly asked to pay for a service I never confirmed or received details about is beyond words. The lack of transparency and accountability from Hetzner.com has left me with a bitter taste, and I would caution anyone considering their services to be wary of potential communication and billing issues. It's disheartening when a company neglects its customers in such a manner, eroding trust and tarnishing its reputation.

name: Junior Sans
review_header: I just registered my email and my bank‚Ä¶
review_body: I just registered my email and my bank account and you keep charging me every month for something I didn't contract for. Authorization code 112247926

name: Rafal
review_header: One of the best hosting in Europe with‚Ä¶
review_body: One of the best hosting in Europe with which I was dealing with. Hetzner is not lagging behind, but creates IT trends. We have been cooperating for almost 15 years and I am glad that I am witnessing their development. I recommend!

name: DERIC
review_body: nice garbage ? They locked my servers for 12 days completly lost all ranking from my websites. LOST 3000 EUROS OF SELLS SH¬£TTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT GERMAN

name: Leonard Bell
review_header: My business account was rejected after a week
review_body: My dealings with Hetzner have left me deeply disappointed. Without warning or clear explanation, my business account was closed, causing significant problems for my business. I was left without important resources and support. Although I am willing to attest to the accuracy of all information provided, Hetzner chose to close my account without giving me a chance to clarify the situation. Furthermore, my attempts to contact technical support have gone unanswered and unhelpful, which has only made the situation worse. I urge Hetzner to improve customer service and provide more open and honest communication. The approach to handling customer inquiries and concerns needs to be more responsive and attentive, especially when it affects customers' business. My account ID:K1280089023 UPDATE 12.01.2024 02:38:52: The customer analytics department contacted me and informed that they had deleted my account due to incomplete information. However, this is not true, and I can prove it. Nevertheless, given their disposition, it's unlikely that they will allow me to contest this decision.

name: Mergenthaler
review_body: Perfect service. Support is always prompt and most effective. Employees are very supportive. We are 'first hour' customers and very satified with the service provided.

name: Albert L√∂hnertz
review_body: Quick response, perfect solution.

name: Ahad Dibafar
review_header: best vps provider of all time
review_body: ive been using hetzner for more than a year the quality is exceptional the web site is very user friendly modern and easy to use the customer support is amazing the reliability of the servers are great the prices are so cheap recommend it very very much thank you hetzner

name: Jo√£o Apar√≠cio
review_body: After years of switching servers (good ones, really), the combination of price, performance, stability, and predictability, I still haven't seen anything better. Now, if you're the guy who bothers the support all the time, this is not for you. (Cloud and Dedicated experience) Right now, 1yr+ and counting, which for me, is truly something that I'm not used to. Just put Plesk on it (it's cheaper on Hetzner than usual), and you will be fine.

name: Ladislav Varga
review_body: As a long time customer I appreciate fair prices and professional and fast support.

name: Mohamed Ebrahem
review_header: The account was rejected immediately after its creation without any reason
review_body: I created a new account and had not yet purchased any server. Then I found an email sent to me telling me ‚ÄúRejection of your account.‚Äù "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have canceled all your existing products and orders with us." What information caused concerns? I don't know!

name: Sam
review_body: I have been a customer with Hetzner for over 6 years by now, and was always pleased with the experience. A hardware failure happened only once and was mitigated quickly. In general, the support does a pretty good job with fast replies. Billing issues on my side were always met with generous extensions. Good prices were always a strong suit of Hetzner, and they continue to be. They have a good reputation among my technologically inclined peers here in Germany.

name: Ali Sunai
review_body: Trash company, taking you're information, keeping them then getting an email that says you're account was deactivated because of some concerns we have regarding this information. These guys make you give your ID just to ban you. Its pure racism at this point, how in earth i have european citizenship and you email me telling im suspicious?

name: Viska
review_header: they lock your servers very easily.
review_body: They give you unlimited bandwith and send you an email that we will delete your account for no reason and your servers will be locked. It is a very prescriptive company, definitely stay away for your important projects.

name: Micha B. aus W.
review_body: Since over 10 years BEST Support Experience til today ! As a designer I'm not an IT-profess. ‚Äì HETZNER helped me always with exact step-by-step soloutions and individual (!) deeper explanations.

name: Fadi Obaji
review_header: THE WORST company in the field.
review_body: This is probably THE WORST company in this field. What a joke sales support and joke email responses, it's just really really bad. They just don't care about customers. Period. I was looking for a dedicated server in a number of companies like OVH, Contabo and this joke of a company named Hetzner. So I found a nice server with a Ryzen 7900x cpu that caught my attention. Anyway I created my account to purchase(rent) this server, but noooo, there's a review process before you can do anything, so I waited for like 2-3 days for this review non-sense to finish, and during this time I emailed support asking them about a more powerful server with a 7950x cpu and I asked for a discounted price. They responded with a very vague and bad-taste response: "I'm afraid both options are not offered or available." Like did you get any training at all on how to speak to customers?! So I replied back telling him that the server is listed on the website so why are you saying it's not available? Of course he didn't reply. And remember the review process? I got an email telling me this: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information." So they didn't like my personal information and decided to delete my account! Can't believe I wasted 3 days on this garbage. WHAT A JOKE COMPANY

name: Fabian Bett
review_header: Hetzner - the reason we are able to grow our IT infrastructure
review_body: Since more than 10 years we are using multiple servers and racks at Hetzner. Hetzner is the reason, we are able to grow our IT infrastructure. If there was any kind of technical problem, because of: - an old hard drive, that had to be replaced or - any assistant needed for complex problems/requirements We all the time got a fast and competent solution. Which also includes an outstanding help directly at the rack to solve a connectivity problem (our fault) - within minutes after request.

name: anyok
review_body: scam host provider. a service perfect for spam sites and pirated websites. i tried to create a account and after creation asked for id proof for verification. i provided an authentic id but was rejected. after i read all reviews i understood what was really happening. hetzner just says they reject users because they want to fight spam but it is exactly the opposite all websites they host are spam. they have a failed verification service. it's actually quite ironic they try to block spam accounts and end up locking authentic users and suspending loyal customers. hetzner's ip reputation is worst and it will effect your website SEO badly. even Cloudflare blocks many hetzner ip's. i am actually thankful that they suspended my account. because i don't want my website to be unexpectedly suspended or get bad SEO because of their ip reputation. if you don't believe me take a list of piracy websites and file download websites list which are banned by US and UK and try to find server ip. these websites often use Cloudflare but you can find host ip behind it with help of some websites. almost all of them will have hetzner and use it as torrent server or stream server. i just don't know how all these spam sites get approved and real users don't. i highly doubt what they say. so stay away from this company. if you are still not convinced then get ready to face the worst experience and even serious reputation and money loss of your business.

name: A B
review_body: I was a Hetzner customer since 2019. Because of security reason my credit cards works ONLY with OTP, so I should enter OTP every time when I pay my invoice (and my credit card can't be charged automatically). Of course all my invoices are paid. Few days ago they just disabled to me the ability to pay by card, and support tell me that I can't use my credit cards.

name: chris
review_body: I received an email saying that my account had been deactivated due to 'concerns' BEFORE I'd even submitted the application form. This is really broken and I'd just stay away from this company.

name: John Ruathor
review_header: Can not even create an account in 2023
review_body: Can not even create an account in 2023? Upon creating account they want me to not only send them my ID but even do some camera verification (the 20$ method does not even show to me). I hate this time I wanna go back to 2013.

name: Johannes Heider
review_body: I needed some support with transfering of domains. The support was professional, very helpful and quick. What else would one need?

name: Gene Sem
review_body: Hetzner Online is NOT reliable webhoster anymore. They're cancelling their paying customers accounts by "political" reasons and just for using postal addresses in countries their self proclaimed "bad". p.s. I've been hosted with them for many years and always recommened them. But no more.

name: Daniel Abramowicz
review_body: It doesn't have to be said, just read any recent review, that Hetzner is now getting rid of their clients, seemingly on random, blaming them for performing "network scans". If you plan of making 100+ TCP requests a day to IPs of public services, expect them to blame you for port scanning, block your server and then terminate your account. Before Mr. Hetzner replies, no, I am violating the Terms & Conditions, I am not abusing resources, or the network. You just killed my servers after seven years. Big thanks!

name: Bj√∂rn Biege
review_header: Good support and features for this price.
review_body: We using managed Servers for a couple Projects. Most things are really uncomplicated and for the rest we get good and fast support.

name: Tema Studio
review_body: Probably a kind of Racism... only for german? K1278422023 your system verification blocked me! 4 days trying to contact you via all support forms and calls. Im a REAL person, can proof ALL OF DOCUMENTS ADDRESS and do ANY ZOOM VIDEO verification. You have a most worse system verification in the world! I think in 1 year you will have 1.5 rating here...

name: Palli Pavan Kalyan
review_body: They blocked my ip. They emailed me and i was offline for a while during that time as i have my trip about 5 day's.. Those fake dmca report leads to lock my ip and my site was dead about 3 day's.. Do not use this useless servers at all...

name: Jake Gallagher
review_header: Both drives died and no backups offered
review_body: We had data hosted by Hetzner using two drives using RAID-1. Somehow, both drives died at the same time and we spotted this before they did which means they were not monitoring this. Due to both dying, we were unable to take a backup for them to replace the drives. And to top it all off, they don't offer any backups or have any kind of disaster recovery plan in place for this kind of event. Thankfully, I made regular backups of the data myself, but I do not expect this kind of service from any hosting company.

name: Alessandro Amella
review_body: Honestly great. The prices are cheap, the web UI is incredibly well made and easy to use, cloud server was up and running in a matter of seconds... I really like this

name: Xuekai Xie
review_header: The account was blocked after 45 days
review_body: I had an email account at adm@xxx..., which hosted important servers. These servers were used by our operators to serve customers and to maintain the network infrastructure of our PANDA WOK LTD restaurant. 45 days have passed, and I received a letter stating that the account was rejected. Judging by the content of the letter, it was impossible to appeal this decision. I don't know what to say, but I highly recommend the German government to conduct an inspection of this company, as businesses should not suffer due to such irresponsible people.

name: Ted Yates
review_body: My business account at Hetzner (K1177729123) was deleted today by incompetent staff from the Customer Data Analytics department. Part of my business's infrastructure was deployed on their servers, and I am extremely outraged as this has led to additional costs during the work process. Thankfully, this happened before we finished setting up. As for this company, I cannot recommend it to anyone under any circumstances. I encountered a situation that is beyond the ordinary. How many companies do you know that delete your account without warning, not even giving you a chance to dispute their decision? Personally, I don't know any. In the past, I had dealings with Hetzner's competitors, and nothing like this ever happened.

name: Zikzak Plus
review_header: My account has been deactivated for no‚Ä¶
review_body: My account has been deactivated for no reason. It happened to several other individuals that I know as well. Several people lost their data. Stay away from it!

name: David CodeDev
review_body: I registered an account two months ago, and Hetzner decided to delete it, citing that they currently cannot enter into a contract with me. I lost important data that was on their servers. I strongly recommend thinking twice before dealing with such a company!

name: Andr√© Ribeiro
review_header: Account needs verification, but I needed to contact their amazing support
review_body: They require some document to verification, which is totally understandable due to the low price and bots from their network. But for some reason my account have been deactivated a few hours after sending my ID (?). Fortunately just by contact them on Twitter/X, they activated my account

name: Michael Johnson
review_header: I am extremely dissatisfied with customer service!
review_body: I assure you that I have never encountered worse and more irresponsible customer service before, even though I am simultaneously dealing with other cloud services that respond within a few hours. Here, I have to wait for entire days! My servers were locked on 28th November 2023 because I didn't submit the documents on time, but I have already done that. I contacted support when I didn't receive a response from Data Customer Analytics. Ticket ID: 2023112703012047, but I have not received a response from anyone yet!

name: Rana
review_body: Only for Germany! I'm using other hosting provider from Germany over the years with the same credentials. Again, with the same credentials. And with the same credentials i'm using namecheap, godaddy, ovh, cloudfare and also payoneer, facebook, google adsense and don't know what not for many years. So, don't give lame excuse. Because you are already 2.8 ratings.

name: GT
review_body: Affordable and reliable dedicated servers. In eight years, I have had only one problem, a hard disk failure that was promptly solved by Hetzner.

name: Ahmed Elhenawy
review_header: My order server was rejected more time
review_body: My order server was rejected more time

name: Doƒüukan Ayhan
review_header: Good price, best security and customer support
review_body: If you do not know Hetzner quality, you are losing a lot. If you are looking for a safe haven for your projects, you are in the right place. I will be happy to use Hetzner's affordable price policy, ease of use and customer communication. Thank you hetzner we love you.

name: Mr ANDROID
review_header: good and best prices, value for money
review_body: good dedicated servers, best prices, very quick auto setup mostly, but if you ask for extra 64GB RAM in finland then wait 2 days :/ overall happy with them for many years. often new cpus out for sale update may 2024 have 17 servers with them, buying more hourly billing is promising, gotta test more 15 sept 2024 have 25+ servers auctioned 5950x rarely but PSU dies, prompt replacement hourly billing is not good for my dedicated servers, capped at agreed max price during the purchase they are the best lots of love

name: –ö–æ–∫–æ –•–µ–∫–º–∞—Ç—å—è—Ä
review_header: Have been using the company since 2009
review_body: Have been using the company since 2009. when there was fastvps.ru then in 2011 we started on our own. and in 2015 they began to resell this company and already in 2017 they brought them 40 thousand euros per month, there were about 1000 servers in 40 accounts. after 2019, the number of hosting companies we created increased tenfold. everything was wonderful. Hetzner even overtook OVH, which in 2013 was cooler, but in 10 years it never developed normally, and Hetzner constantly developed and made a cloud, made a convenient payment method, made an anti-dos, caught up and overtook OVH, which in 2023 even closed the loyalty program because of my greed, everything is so bad there now. In total, we now bring about 300-400 thousand euros to Hetzner from all hosting sites. but some fascist who hates Ukrainians blocks a Ukrainian account for no reason, where there are only 5 servers, where in general the servers were used for ordinary virtual machines for clients who don‚Äôt even have cool projects. in the end, this fascist only created problems and we now need to write to several dozen people so that they migrate to new orders. more details *hetzner-acc-blocked-why-support-hetzner-company.ru* - it‚Äôs just very disappointing when you brought several million euros of goods absolutely free, and you, like the scum of society, are blocked even without a clear reason. This is exactly how Europe, which has gone crazy from war, works.

name: Timsta
review_header: Untl now i love it...really fast and‚Ä¶
review_body: Until now i love it...really fast and stable server...support is dedicated and very individual thanx so much!

name: tarik moussa
review_body: I created an account last Friday and I was waiting for my account to be approved, I noticed today Monday that the account was rejected without giving any explanation, I provided all the necessary documents to prove my identity, (passport, identity card, and driving license).

name: H√©l√©ne Guerrero
review_body: Hetzner are hackers and crooks! They have a dark side like ovh they send phishing emails all around they just want to steal your money DONT TRUST THEM! NEVER!

name: Carlos H.
review_body: Rejection of your account K1176186523... I wish I had read all these comments sooner and not wasted time or hope trying to create (for God's sake just create!) an account with Hetzner. The automatic verification process is rubbish to say the least and the (supposedly human) verification did not accept my well photographed legal documents and those of my face!. Even, I made the 2FA with my phone number. As others say here, it seems more like a matter of prejudice and racism than a verification process. Very bad for a European company, the American ones are still the best. I hate that I wasted my time and had to feel stupid and judged in an unfair process. ----------- UPDATE (30-11-2023) You said "respond to the last email from our team" and that is plain BS!! Because I have already done that on Wed, Nov 15, 12:07 PM !!! And you still don't reply!!! Don't lie on public posts, you HETZNER, are not taking care of all the people you are (biased) rejecting for new accounts.

name: tim.s
review_body: Have been using managed servers and webhosting from Hetzner for several years. What I appreciate most is the excellent support team, that almost every time provides helpful information (even if our wishes sometimes could not be solved directly). Besides, the backup system works reliable and is easy to use. Administration interfaces are mostly clear, only show useful stuff and the Hetzner team keeps improving it.

name: Lilian Astrid Geese
review_body: I had eMail problems (couldn't send mails to gmail accounts any more) and the "server not trusted" alert after every software update on my iPhone and iPad. Send an eMail to Hetzner helpdesk, got help within 2 hours, excellent explanation, "how to", did it, and it worked. Exquisite support! Thank you.

name: Tim ViePriv√©
review_body: I am compelled to share my deeply disappointing experience with Hetzner. Initially, I chose their services with expectations of professionalism and reliability, but what followed was a series of regrettable incidents that have left me feeling exploited and disrespected. Firstly, the abrupt and unexplained termination of services was not just inconvenient, but also completely abusive in nature. As a customer, I was left in the dark with no prior warning or justification for this action. This arbitrary decision by Hetzner not only disrupted my plans but also showcased a complete disregard for customer engagement and transparency. I LOST MONEY! Additionally, the billing practices of Hetzner are nothing short of predatory. Despite canceling my services, I was charged for the full period, a clear indication of their indifference to fair business practices. This is not just about the financial loss, but also about the principle of fair and transparent transactions, which Hetzner has blatantly ignored. The quality of service, too, was consistently below par. Technical issues were a frequent occurrence, and the lack of effective solutions only added to the frustration. A service provider is expected to offer reliable and efficient solutions, but Hetzner failed miserably in this regard. To make matters worse, the attitude of the employees I interacted with was appalling. Far from being helpful and polite, they exhibited a level of impoliteness and unprofessionalism that has no place in any customer-oriented business. It's disheartening to encounter such behavior when you are seeking support and solutions. In conclusion, my experience with Hetzner has been nothing short of a nightmare. I strongly advise potential customers to reconsider their options before engaging with a company that has demonstrated such a profound lack of professionalism, customer care, and ethical business practices.

name: Dimitrios Kosioudis
review_header: I was customer for 3 years using‚Ä¶
review_body: I was customer for 3 years using deticated server without any problem. My project was finished so i stop the service. After 1 years i decide to run my next project but my account was deleted. I was try to create a new one but i received the following message: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us." I am running services 20 years, but i never met such behavor. Not recommending.!

name: Anonymous
review_header: Although I have given all proper‚Ä¶
review_body: Although I have given all proper government approved information regarding my identity they still just declined my verification of account without explaining. I suspect they are just racist towards some countries including mine and use high risk as an excuse to justify it. Truly shameful acts, I thought Germans were better than this.

name: Nidal Awartany
review_body: I have been using online hosting since 1998, I have cooperated with a lot of providers such as (Godaddy, Yahoo, Hostmonster, DigitalOcean, and Ionos. I have been a customer of Ionos since 2006. This is the first time I cooperate with Hetzner and used their service, actually, I am disappointed and frustrated for below reasons: 1. Support: It is very bad, the way communication is very weak, not friendly, and taking a very long time (once it is 17:30 there will be no communication, also on Saturdays and Sundays there is no communication!!) 2. Invoicing: The invoicing system used is not clear and is complicated, this resulted in my service being stopped two times (18 days in total). 3. Billing: Credit cards and PayPal are available as payment methods when you purchase a service, but in case they stop your service for any reason they will not accept any payment method other than Wire transfer to the IBAN account!!

name: S Doesburg
review_body: Transferred my domain to hetzner. after 4 days i canceled the transfer because no normal transfer of a small website should take this long. Now they have my domain somewhere as a hostage. I cant seem to get either a transfercode to move the domain to a proper company or get the domain in my account to simply start doing business.. I can not recommend a business to do business with Hetzner. The support is ridiculously slow. It's been weeks and i still have no control over my own domain, its simply crazy the way business is done here..

name: Mick
review_header: 39% (621 of 1,592) one-star customer reviews tells the real Hetzner story
review_body: 39% one-star customer reviews ‚Äì this tells you everything you need to know about Hetzner. The one-star reviews are worth a read if you are thinking about spending your money with Hetzner. My story... I am not a paying customer. I am a member of the public who raised a spam abuse complaint with Hetzner after a known serial spammer migrated to Hetzner's services and started spamming me using Hetzner's services. Hetzner are very aware that that this serial spammer, who is now also their paying customer, has no legitimate or legal authority to send me that spam. The kindest word I can use to describe Hetzner's responses - "inadequate". I am getting more and constant spam from the same spammer as a direct result of Hetzner's inadequate response. I can only imagine how much worse it must be for all those one-star review Hetzner customers who bothered to leave comments and feedback here. These people paid Hetzner money, and they received exactly the same shoddy, substandard, lousy service. On the upside ‚Äì does mean Hetzner is consistent. On the downside ‚Äì means Hetzner is consistent at delivering shoddy, substandard, lousy service. So the question you need to ask yourself - do you want to pay your hard-earned money to Hetzner just so that you can also experience their shoddy, substandard, lousy service? ***Updated 30-Nov-23 For transparency ‚Äì Hetzner flagged this review with Truspilot on 9-Nov-23 because Hetzner did not think it was based on a genuine experience. I provided relevant evidence at the time to to support my review. That evidence included the ticket number in Hetzner's trouble ticketing system that Hetzner assigned to my complaint. It is now 21 days later and Hetzner are having another go at getting this review removed - again because they do not think that my report is based on a genuine experience. This latest attempt landed in my email in box a little after the response from Hetzner below. I just provided similar evidence again, this time to Trustpilot. I added copies of 3 of the 9 related emails I sent to Hetzner on this issue (each email had new spam evidence). The emails I provided tonight include Hetzner's own email sent by their trouble ticketing system when their staff created the ticket related to my complaint and copied and pasted some template response words to me. Hetzner will note that that ticket number is the same as I provided on 9-Nov-23 when I responded to their first takedown attempt. In my response to Trustpilot tonight, I also reiterated that: - I responded to Hetzner‚Äôs previous challenge on 9 November 2023. - I provided details of my communication with Hetzner in my original response. - When I raised my first spam abuse complaint with Hetzner, Hetzner notified the spammer of my details. Hetzner however never put my contact details on any suppression lists to prevent the spammer from emailing me while Hetzner was investigating. - After Hetzner notified the spammer of my complaint, the spammer started sending me spam more frequently from their Hetzner account. That continued until I received notification from Hetzner that they had locked the spammer‚Äôs account. - Notably, after Hetzner notified the spammer of my complaint, the spammer started spamming me using other services too, including a free email service. It is worth noting that when I raised spam abuse complaints with those other services, including the free email service, they appear to have immediately added my details to their respective suppression lists to prevent the spammer from emailing me. I rate those other services positively. But I see no reason to change my review about Hetzner.

name: mr rm
review_body: I own 2 servers at hetzner, lately 4 harddisks broke down after 15 years - after detailed checking one system also broke down one after each other giving me enough time to synchronise the data. 1. the system was fully replaced with a faster one 2. the harddisks were replaced with 2TB disks each The support did their part by fixing the HW, of course it was my task to have the software under control (raid1 was used everywhere) I'm a happy customer.

name: Darek G
review_body: Many years ago I used 5 or 7 different hosting companies before Hetzner, moving to next one after maximum 3 months. Then I've found Heztner, and In October I celebrated 11 years with Hetzner! During this time I upgraded my dedicated server several times. Servers connectivity through all these years was something like 99,9999999%. I used Hetzner support only few times. Response was always on time, and I can't say single bad word about it.

name: Mohamed Bourbiza
review_header: I am writing Disappointing Experience with Hetzner: A Word of Cautionthis review to share my‚Ä¶
review_body: I am writing this review to share my disheartening experience with Hetzner, a company from which I had high expectations but that ultimately left me feeling disappointed and disrespected. My journey with Hetzner started off smoothly, but quickly took a turn for the worse, leading to a series of events that I believe potential customers should be aware of. Order and Initial Setup: My interaction with Hetzner began when I decided to order a server from them. The first day went well; I successfully installed everything I needed, including cPanel, CloudLinux LiteSpeed license, and other essential tools like JetBackup. I invested not only my time but also a significant amount of money into setting up the server to meet my requirements. Request for Personal Documents: The troubles started on the second day when I received an unexpected email from Hetzner asking me to send photocopies of my personal documents. Wanting to comply and assuming it was a standard security check, I promptly sent a photocopy of my identity card. However, this was just the beginning. Further Intrusive Requests: The following day, Hetzner sent me a link connected to an app, instructing me to take photos of my documents and my face. Despite my husband‚Äôs concerns about privacy and GDPR rules, I decided to comply with their request, trusting that it was a necessary step to verify my identity. Unjustified Suspension and Poor Customer Service: However, my compliance did not lead to a smoother experience. Two days later, Hetzner suspended my server while I was in the middle of important work for my news sites. Feeling anxious, I contacted Hetzner's customer service via email. It took them a staggering 8 hours to respond, only to send me another link connected to the same app, asking me once again to take photos of my documents and my face, this time with a threatening tone. I was appalled and replied that I had already submitted the required documents and photos twice, and it was unreasonable for them to ask me to do so repeatedly. I emphasized that we are not dealing with the CIA, and such intrusive requests were a violation of my privacy. Conclusion and Advice: Based on my experience, I would strongly advise against doing business with Hetzner. This ordeal was not only a waste of my time and resources but also a blatant disregard for customer privacy and satisfaction. My husband had a similar bad experience with them years ago, and I have come to learn that four of my journalist colleagues have also had negative encounters with this company. In conclusion, I implore potential customers to think twice before choosing Hetzner, as there are plenty of other companies out there that respect their customers and their privacy. UP 2: you are based in Europe, me too. There is a privacy law in Europe. but I sent my documents twice via your app. why did you suspend my server without notice and also deleted all my sites and I lost hours of work and spent more than 180 euros on the license that I bought? and even ask for documents and photos of my face the third time in a rude tone. someday it will end up in court and I'm sure it will.

name: Tuga
review_body: Hetzner terminated my account without providing a valid reason, even though I had been a client for over 5 years. This action clearly demonstrates their lack of concern for their clients, as their support team treated me poorly. I strongly advise avoiding this untrustworthy company.

name: vovamod
review_header: Not passing verification due to providing UA passport
review_body: we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Oh my god... It's not only misserable for such a large company to ignore my emails for support 10 days straight, then it's also funny how they threat customers. I really would love to use their service. But since UA passport doesn't fit them AT ALL, then it has no sense or whatever My colleagues tried making an account on Hetzner via UA passport and NEVER passed verification. Only the ones that had other passport from other countries passed with no problems. why the hell? PS: 02.11.23 As of now no response from support to ticket/mail/twitter, current reply of Hetzner here is nothing than just to improve situation. I contacted some of my relatives from RU/KZ regions and they were approved immediately with no issues. This happens only in UA region as I see from now

name: Enrico Baravoglia
review_body: Hetzner technical support is really fast and responsive, actually focused on both tasks and questions customers submit. It's always a pleasure working with them.

name: Colby Combs
review_header: One of the cheapest and most reliable‚Ä¶
review_body: One of the cheapest and most reliable services around. We've been enjoying their dedicated offerings and have faced no major issues. Support is responsive, the hardware is excellent, and the prices are good.

name: Eric Voragend
review_body: Best Hoster ever Price amazing and everything else also, cant complain

name: Aar√≥n Barboza
review_header: Most of the 1 star reviews are from people who didn't even use the service
review_body: As a customer since September 2020, I can say that I continue to maintain my 5 out of 5 stars, I am here again sharing my experience with Hetzner, having already been a customer for 3 consecutive years. The majority of 1-star reviews are from people who did not even use the service so they did not even have a contractual relationship, this is because they were rejected before starting to use the service. Understand guys that a company like Hetzner must be careful of its infrastructure, having systems and filters that help mitigate the possible bad intentions of some people. By doing this, Hetzner demonstrates good security practices and the seriousness they take in avoiding possible bad actors, therefore customers feel quite safe using the service. In my case with the Cloud service and Storage Share I am very pleased. I continue to wish the entire Hetzner organization much success.

name: Wine Country Flix
review_header: The best company I have found so far, so very sad :(
review_body: I have been with Hetzner off and on for about 5 years. Just signed up for an account a couple months ago for a dedicated server, I was very saddened when plex decided to ban my account simply because I'm with hetzner so I sadly have to move to another company. I signed up for this other provider the server delivery took 3 days then nothing works and I had to contact support and it takes them 24+ hours to respond and they are very vague not really answering any questions. Hetzners server are delivered in maybe 2 hours at most their response time is never longer than about 6 hours and they are always willing to help. Makes me very sad to leave. My favorite company and I hope they can overcome this Plex BS and I will be back in a second.

name: Graham Hill
review_header: Worth Knowing you are a criminal if you don't live in Europe
review_body: Honestly, can't recommend them. Created an account and they wanted either a copy of my ID or a 20 euro payment since where I live I'm considered high risk. I will not use the services of a company that treat me as a criminal and I would recommend all others steer clear. Adding onto this since Hetzner flags accounts claiming they are high risk, refusing to allow service operation until either ID or 20 euro is paid to "authenticate." I will leave it at this, as I have used other services situated across Europe and none of them have requested me to upload documents to confirm "I am not high risk."

name: Mees
review_header: Great hosting provider with lots of potential
review_body: It has been a year since my last review on Hetzner and in the meantime a lot changed. Where I first only used their cloud services, I currently have used almost every product their offer. I feel like it's fair to reconsider my last review based on my experiences with Hetzner's other products. First of all, my opinion on Hetzner's cloud services remain the same. I still think they're absolutely amazing. For an amazing price you get a Cloud experience that no other provider in this market has been able to offer me. In addition to Hetzner cloud, I have used both their storage boxes and shares. Two fantastic products for a great price. With the storage boxes, my largest issue has been the security. It's only possible to get a randomly generated, (in my opinion) fairly simple, password. Setting your own password isn't an option. It's also not possible to configure any IP whitelists for connections to the storage box. This theoretically makes your storage box vulnerable for brute-force attacks and any unauthorized connections. The folks at Hetzner told me that these two features are things they fortunately are working on improving, which is good to know. For now, I'd recommend encrypting the files you store on your storage box, for example via EncFS. Storage shares do not have the problem as described above, but don't really work great in combination with servers as your only option is to use WebDAV mounts. On the other hand, I would totally recommend storage shares for people who are less tech savvy and are looking for affordable cloud storage. A product of Hetzner that I started using recently is their web hosting services. I must say that I do not recommend these services (for now), since it feels highly outdated. KonsoleH feels old fasioned and is slow (especially when loading backups) and difficult to use. The webmail interface also isn't any better. I currently still use their web hosting services, but solely for the email. Last product that I have (and currently still do) used is Hetzner's dedicated servers. To be honest, my first experience in January this year with this product hasn't been any good. Especially my experience with Hetzner's sales department was a horrible one that completely changed how I felt about Hetzner. First of all, the live support chat was anything but live. Replies between messages took around 15 minutes. The replies that I got primarily were snippets copy-pasted straight from their documentation website (which I have also read myself and asked further questions about in this live chat), causing my questions to be left unanswered. Last, the sales agent felt rude and disinterested in the products where I was looking for more information about. Even though this bad pre-sales experience I decided to order the dedicated server. The support I got from the data center technicians unfortunately wasn't much better. For example, my request for a KVM console with bootable USB stick got rejected because my desired ISO should also be available in their installimage tool. While this tool indeed works, it also destroys the pureness of the operating system as this tool pre-installs tools and pre-configures settings. This experience is also something I have read more complaints about on Hetzner's community on Reddit. Hetzner's data center technicians shouldn't be taking a judging approach in the customers' requests (as long as these comply with the terms of serivce of course), and thus should attach the KVM console and bootable USB stick regardless. Around 9 months later I decided to give Hetzner another chance and ordered a dedicated server again. This time I didn't ask my questions to their sales department but instead directly to the product team. This team has taken the time to answer my questions and did a much better job than the sales department did back in January. Thus, I decided to place the order for my dedicated server. This time, my KVM console with bootable USB stick got accepted straight away and the console got attached within around 20 minutes after my initial request, which is amazing and much better than what happened in my previous time of having a dedicated server at Hetzner. Now that I have my dedicated server for around 1 month, I can safely say this experience has been great so far. Both my experiences with their email and phone support have been good, and response times are always low, even during the weekends and nights. I don't have that much characters left, but last I want to say is that Hetzner has a lot of potential and after all still is a great provider for the price you pay. What I do think is that Hetzner should work on improving their support. For example by offering their employees better training and extending their support hours; after all, the internet never sleeps.

name: Taylor
review_header: Exceptional Service from Robin at Hetzner: Prompt Email Responses, Detailed Guidance, and Top-Quality Server Performance Surpassing All Expectations
review_body: I recently had the privilege of working with Robin from Sales and Product Advice at Hetzner. I couldn't have asked for better service. I needed to upgrade my infrastructure and sought a price quote along with recommendations. Having read about their custom solutions, I reached out and was paired with Robin. He clearly outlined what was required, explained the special ordering process in detail (required for my customizations), and provided exact pricing. The email support was so prompt, it felt like live chat; Robin responded within 5 minutes every time. As for the quality of the servers, they get an A+. If you're in search of a trustworthy hosting provider, Hetzner is the way to go. I have a feeling many of the negative reviews might be from competitors. I personally look forward to hosting with this provider for years to come.

name: Noorie
review_body: Ticket#2023100403030778 i already informed them past week ago to new card they not allowing me 24hrs active servers and i'm using Hetzner from past 2 years. i request you shutdown your Hetzner you don't understand my situation i'm applied new card.

name: Internet Imperialist
review_header: Alleged DMCA Request = Leave in 24 Hs
review_body: Alleged DMCA Request = Leave in 24 Hs Presumption of innocence: a bad joke for Hetzner. You gave me 24 Hours to Leave the Platform; With little time 'to prove my innocence'. Treating clients like criminals because someone said something. "Trust All Victims" (which maybe are my competitors pretending to be victims?) ANSWERING your comment: so, a mere accusation (with dubious evidence) equals to 24hs and you are out... you have INSANE policies. Your wording is terrible too, at no point you mention anything about 'it will stop if you answer' ... and again, 24hs is no time, things beyond our control might stop us from answering within 24hs or you assume I am a criminal "PROVE YOUR INNOCENCE".

name: MICHAEL DIJK
review_header: Great service, great hardware, and great pricing!
review_body: I've been with Hetzner now for about a month time. First off, their support is A+, I can't fault it for anything. The server support, support in general, it's perfect. Servers, are priced very well, and, everything that comes with it, is nothing more than perfect. I've used quite a few hosting providers, using servers, and, they all have some issues, but since I started using Hetzner, it's been nothing but great. I will move all my services over now, as I tested it with my personal servers, and, the support and dedication from the support team, has allowed me to make the decision to move my business requirements over as well.

name: SM Hosseini
review_header: Let me tell a horrible joke about Hetzner
review_body: Let me tell a horrible joke about this datacenter : I registered as a Iranian person in Hetzner. At the end of registration for completing registration I saw just option : Credit card ! As you may already know, international cards like the Master Card or the Visa Card aren't available in Iran. (Search it) So I sent a ticket about this problem , after I don't get any answer I called them. They transferred me to someone named : Robin (I think he is in account verification department) After explaining the problem he said : " We can't change that" Please someone tell me in Iran without any credit card issue , how I can get credit card :))

name: Alexander
review_header: The pricing of Hetzner is great
review_body: The pricing of Hetzner is great. Excellent support and best servers. I have managed to handle 3 million visits per month on a 90 $ dedicated server with minimal CPU usage.

name: Manolis Mylonakis
review_body: Really bad service. they suspended my account along with some domain names I had paid for (the remaining time was 6-8 months more). No explanations, only are asking for extra money for something I didn't have access to it, not even to suspend it. I don't even have access to the domains so I can move them in another provider... Stay away!!!

name: Mazen Msouty
review_header: Swift, agile, flexible, and amazing services and support!

name: Aaron
review_body: Fantastic customer service. Very helpful, thanks for your help!

name: Core Consult SA
review_header: Take it from a long term client
review_body: I have been a client at Hetzner for almost 15 years and have never had a single negative experience in all that time. I note some of the low ratings given here related to setting up new accounts, suspicious or missing information. I can attest that the sign-up process is rigorous and requires some effort and time. While I understand the frustrations, I applaud Hetzner for doing their job correctly by maintaining their high professional ethics and service. In my time as a devoted client the support has been fantastic. Responses to support tickets often within the hour, a few hours at worst. The quality vs. price is the icing on the cake. I cant remember the last time any of my client sites had an interruption in service or downtime. So yes, if you looking for instant gratification and getting a site online in minutes, be prepared to be frustrated. But if you are looking for a long-term, cost effective, reliable partner, I cant recommend Hetzner enough.

name: Juan Carlos Dominguez Lemoine
review_header: we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information.
review_body: Dear.... After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Only to approve me in another Email ?? At the end i stayed at Contabo. I can not trust this company, not that Contabo is great, very unstable and this is why I looked elsewhere..... Still need a solution but not Hetzner, Looking at Godaddy seem serious account open dedicated server setup and running, stable. Amazing service. Just a tad expensive but you need to pay to get service.

name: E.I.
review_body: I have been a customer of this company for nearly a year and have had consistently positive experiences with their support team. They have always been responsive and cooperative, and I have never encountered any communication issues. I understand that others have had different experiences, but I believe that there must be specific circumstances behind their encounters. I am sharing my own experience as a testament to the good level of support I have received, both on the technical and billing fronts.

name: David
review_body: Really bad. Cannot recommend anyone to use this company. Dont expect you can communicate with them. Find someone more trustworthy.

name: David Monrad
review_body: Cannot recommend. Should have viewed the other customer reviews before creating an account - stupid of me. Perhaps the next customer will read this review before spending time on this company? Find another provider and save your time for something else.

name: Teury Diaz
review_body: I sent a photo of my ID card. And my account was rejected, for no reason.

name: Mustafa Shaheen
review_body: I purchased a server through Hetzner's auction, and I'm thoroughly impressed with both its quality and affordability. I've searched extensively, but I couldn't find any other hosting provider offering similar specifications at such competitive rates. The support team has been exceptional, providing prompt and efficient assistance. What's even better is that there are no binding contracts, allowing you the flexibility to cancel at any time. Additionally, there are no interest charges on late payments, making their services even more appealing. Overall, Hetzner has been a fantastic choice for my hosting needs.

name: Panharith No
review_body: I registered 4 September on Hetzner and they want me do Face verify on Idenfy. my face was swollen due to a bee sting and sensitivity to bee stings so I wrote a ticket to them and attached all my documents and selfie : Dear Support Yesterday, my face was swollen due to a bee sting and sensitivity to bee stings. I attempted to authenticate at Idenfy and they rejected my request. After calling them, the operator laughed at me and hung up! I am very upset about this and I need a cloud server for my university project and I was introduced to Hetzner. I have attached my documents for you and please, please, please contact them and remind them about the relationship with the customer. Sincerely, Panharith after 3 days on 7th September nothing happened so I wrote second ticket to them : I sent this request to you 3 days ago and I haven't received any response so far, and your behavior really upsets me. After sending this ticket they're rejected my account with no reason and reply ! My account number : K0969662123

name: Warren Doble
review_header: I have been using Hetzner for over ten‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for over ten years because their service is brilliant and I will keep using them. They sorted out my problem very quickly. Thank you.

name: Iurii Telezhynskyi
review_body: Terrible. Do not even try them

name: JOHN
review_header: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST
review_body: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COST THEY WILL SCAM YOU I REPEAT, THEY WILL SCAM YOU THEY ARE BASED IN GERMANY, SO THEY DON'T HAVE TO PLAY BY THE RULES, AND THEY KNOW THIS. IF YOU'RE READING THIS BEFORE WORKING WITH THEM BE THANKFUL... YOU JUST DODGED A BULLET.

name: SpaceRoute
review_header: Why the hell did you reject my account
review_body: Why the hell did you reject my account? Please, unblock my account, and I can do passport check Update: I entered everything correctly, in addition, I was not even asked to verify my passport, there was a manual check

name: DeinHode
review_header: I am customer of Hetzner since about 10 years
review_body: I am customer of Hetzner since about 10 years. So far all my problems and requests have been resolved to my complete satisfaction. The servers are stable and if there is a problem, the 24/7 technical customer service always helps immediately. Once a Hetzer, always a Hetzer!

name: Ramon Freitas
review_header: Disappointed by Lack of Communication and Support
review_body: Dear Hetzner Team, I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to express my disappointment regarding the lack of response I've received concerning my recent inquiries about unblocking ports for my account. As a long-time customer, I've valued the reliability and quality of Hetzner's services, but I must admit that the recent lack of communication has left me frustrated. I understand that your team must manage numerous inquiries, but I believe that open and timely communication is essential to maintaining a positive customer experience. Unfortunately, my recent attempts to seek clarification and support have gone unanswered. As a dedicated user who has been loyal to Hetzner for several years, this experience has not aligned with the level of service I've come to expect. I hope that my concerns will be addressed, not only to resolve my specific issue but also to enhance the overall customer support experience. I trust that Hetzner values its customers and their feedback, and I hope that this situation can be rectified in a way that reflects the professionalism and dedication that I've appreciated in the past. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to a more positive interaction moving forward. Best Regards, Ramon Freitas

name: Ankesh
review_header: Hetzner came a long way from best hosting to one of the worst staffs
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for more than 3 years with more than 40 servers hosted on their infrastructure. They got some of the best people in industry those days but not now. I received a netcraft takedown through Hetzner abuse team. I have been complying with 100% of their requests but today when checking the abuse mail, I opened the netcraft link and it showed that the issue has already been resolved and it might be a false positive. I responded the same to Hetzner abuse team that it's a false positive and their response was "Even though Netcraft says it's false positive, remove the damn website or we will block your IP in the next 12hrs". This change in tone shows how Hetzner has evolved. I am a 100% sure I will be moving away from Hetzner within a month

name: Mike Wilson
review_body: asked for my id after being a long term customer. gave my id then instantly closed my account. i dont understand why they dont make people pay first before giving the server too. its just a hassle. they need better ddos protection too. would not recommend at all.

name: M.
review_header: Very good and reliable hoster with excellent support!
review_body: A very good hoster with an excellent support and reliable hosting solutions. With our software agentur we are hosting more than five hundred satisfied customers the last twenty years on the Hetzner managed servers. To all users with their bad ratings: no, it is neither a high end rocket science platform like a google tpu cloud, nor a discounter where cheaper is better. But it is a fair and reliable hosting partner with very good hardware, software, security and support!

name: Ollie Jacobs
review_body: I tried this cloud server: very buggy - crashing a lot, have to re-login over and over, and generally confusing back end UI. Sent them an email didn't get much compassion or understanding. Tried to close my account, thought I had deleted everything but because of the various confusing sections of Hetzner there were 2 products I missed so I continued to receive a bill which I missed for a good part of 5 months. Asked for a refund but hey refused in a one sentence email - Not checking my bank statement is my bad, but I'm annoyed I paid for a under average service that I didn't even use. In my experience generally Germany have good tech products but Hetzner is not one. AVOID.

name: Felipe H. Manso
review_body: Support does not respond. When they reply, they reply with a standard message.

name: Noah H
review_header: Reasonably priced but needs better DDoS protection
review_body: I have been referred to hetzner multiple times so I decided to try something. I got one of their server auction servers and it works great. But I would recommend if you get one of their servers and use it in a web application use cloudflare as DDoS protection isn‚Äôt great.

name: David
review_header: I tried to open am account....
