review_body: I tried to open an account. For the payment, I added a valid bank card. They then asked to take me through further verifications. I used my valid UK photo driving licence with my address on it. The associated App took my face photo. After 15 minutes of "manual check", it rejected the checks and asked me to provide an explanation as to why my verification had been rejected! Was that a wind up? Opening an online bank account is easier. If this is the way they handle new customer account, one should expect things getting much worse after that. I give up; off to another provider!

name: can gologlu
review_header: Asking for passport info for a cloud service
review_body: Came to check it out via a youtuber recommendation. Upon signing up and verifying my credit card, before I can create a Cloud Project, I'm told I'm supposed to send my ID/Passport info and wait for a day to be verified. Fat chance, you're not a fin-tech company and this is the first time I've been asked for gov't issued ID for a cloud service. Seems EXTREMELY SUSPICIOUS! Deleted account

name: Frank Rausch
review_body: Hetzner treat their customers like robots! They have great servers but there is some other problema you may need to pay attention before using hetzner I was using hetzner for several month I placed all of my data and customers on hetzner servers , i trusted hetzner I was having some abuse cases because thousands of people uses my server I do care about this issues and fix all the problems so no more abuse cases happened agian. But two days after i fix the problems they easily restricted my account for one month!!!!! i can't no more create a server or even take snapshot.... Now i don't know what to do with thousand of customers DO NOT TRUST HETZNER THEY DONT CARE WHO YOU ARE WHAT YOU DO THEY TREAT THEIR CUSTOMERS LIKE ROBOTS Im losing my customers and all of this is because of hetzner

name: Gloria
review_body: We've had a great experience with Hetzner. Their support team consistently helps us find solutions quickly, and we've had many positive interactions. The servers perform exceptionally well, and the pricing is reasonable. Overall, we're very satisfied with their services.

name: vijay
review_header: their server is off poor quality they‚Ä¶
review_body: their server is off poor quality they are not accpeting cpanel server after install cpanel server they are unable to boot and in cause by cance it will bot they are not fucntioning properly just a bad serives

name: Chris Stauffer
review_header: Less than optimal sign up process, great product
review_body: (I originally reviewed with 1 star due to the signup process: Hetzner has a signup process that makes you verify your account (fair enough). In the case of a company this is done by uploading e.g. a certificate of incorporation. I got rejected a short while after that. All they knew about me at that stage was that I'm an Irish company, registered a couple years ago, as well as my credit card info (3d secured card). If that's enough reason to reject me as a customer, I'd have appreciated it if they had done that straight away and not after I uploaded my companies certificate. After my 1 star review here, Hetzner re-evaluated my case and activated my account the next day. I understand why Hetzner has to protect themselves against certain risk, but if the verification process is so prone to keep out legitimate customers, there really should be a better appeals process than being a "Karen" and going to TrustPilot.) Having said all that, once you're verified, the ordering process is straight forward. I'm now using a StorageBox (smallest one for testing purposes) and the setup process both for access via SMB and FTP is straight forward, well documented and works perfectly fine. Performance and features are as expected, simple to use and perfect for my use case.

name: V√Æshvj√®ƒìt More Patil
review_header: I am creating account but disabled my‚Ä¶
review_body: I am creating account but disabled my without any reason and I am new user. Not used any resources and not used cloud services this bad bad cloud services a I can‚Äôt recommend any one I think admin is old person please change the admin. In fast and digital world working like that not use any one your services. Upgrade your system and simplify to work.

name: Claudio
review_header: I am very satisfied with Hetzner's‚Ä¶
review_body: I am very satisfied with Hetzner's technical support. The responses to my inquiries were very diligent and accurate. The support gave me the necessaries elements to make a decision about a technical choice about my cloud storage. I fully thank Hetzner for the service

name: JiBAL Mobile
review_body: The Hetzner team provided outstanding support during the migration of our products. Their execution plan was not only highly professional but also remarkably simple, ensuring a seamless transition that kept our business operations running smoothly. Remarkably, throughout the entire migration process, our operations continued to function without any disruptions. We sincerely appreciate your invaluable support. Thank you.

name: Waheed Ahmad
review_body: They are amazing, I love Hetzner Hosting because they delivered what they promised. Thank you so much :)

name: Michael Maass
review_body: Very efficient and dilligent! I am a long-standing customer and user of Hetzner's services and products. Some days ago a domain transfer from one account to another one didn't immediately proceed and the system told me to contact the support. Even though I had the auth-codes, they asked me for the original holder information. While that first seemed like a nuissance I had to agree it made sense, and just went to the trouble to look for and provide that information (even though there were no changes regarding the owner). It might have been somebody else who tried to transfer domains of mine. So I definitely appreciate any step they took to confirm the transfer is really legitimate and legally sound ‚Äî even if it takes time. Well done! :-)

name: Wqrld
review_header: Hetzner is the best provider that i‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is the best provider that i have ever had. The support is amazing, the hardware is amazing and the prices are amazing. I have been a happy hetzner client for years. Bonus points to Sebastian Leheis for taking the time to guide me through my last hardware issue and being of great assistance. You guys rock!

name: Nick Kolios
review_body: I'm with Hetzner over 7 yrs. I have two managed servers and one unmanaged for my clients. Servers price: 5+++++ Support: You probably won't need their support for a long time. Servers working as expected, but if you need it, here is the confusing part: Not sure if i talk with the same guys, but for root (unmanaged servers), the support is really helpful. For Managed servers, almost every time the server is unstable and slow they say is because of programming issues (and not the server itself) ignoring the fact that affects multiple sites with different configuration and software. This maybe going to happened once or twice per year, but yes when it happens, the managed server support won't help you that much.

name: Kai Schmidt
review_header: I was looking for a VPS service and‚Ä¶
review_body: I was looking for a VPS service and Hetzner seemed just right for my project. I was quite surprised to be asked to verify my identity with an ID document, which I accepted. Shortly afterwards, my account was suspended without notice. After a phone call to support, I was told that the combination of email and country had automatically blocked the account, so I corresponded with support requesting further details for activation. In the end I was extremely annoyed by these "security measures" and asked the support team to delete my account, despite several requests I received no feedback. I seriously wonder if a team got together and thought about how to make the customer experience as cumbersome as possible, I can't imagine it any other way. I have now moved my project to another competitor, I cannot recommend Hetzner at all!

name: Philipp Gottschalk
review_body: Friendly, competent and fast, no waiting times - personal recommendation !

name: Rob
review_body: Amazing provider, I use the ax102, ax52 and a few cloud servers including arm and amd epyc based ones. I have been with them for a little over 3 years now and I have had no issues, sometimes support can take a little while to respond but otherwise it's 10/10. The DDos protection while not perfect is nowhere near as bad as people say as its saved us a few times from bad actors. Their price is great too so if you can use them i'd highly recommend getting your servers from them. I do wish though if it's possible to get some lower end and slightly cheaper dedicated servers such as when I first started they had server auction machines for 25 euro I also would like upgrades to the lower end like the ax41 still being stuck on 3rd gen Ryzen (Ryzen 5 3600)

name: Panda Palle
review_body: All in all, I've actually been quite satisfied with Hetzner. The incident that changed it for me was a simple customer case regarding their email filtering option that took them 9 months to give me clear answer to. Several times they promised to reach out for further information and get back to me, but they never did so I repeatedly had to bump the case. The case was initially created in November 2022. The final response from Hetzner arrived a few days ago here in July 2023, after I had to bump the case again after waiting 3 months since our last conversation regarding the case. That's a total of 9 months treatment time for a simple question. This is totally unacceptable and after I told them this, no response at all. We have now taken the appropriate steps and decided to move all our domains and VPS instances to a new provider. Customer satisfaction and trust is so important and unfortunately Hetzner failed to deliver. Despite their cheap prices, the customer care needs serious attention. You can't expect customers to wait for months for an answer and if you promise the customer that you will get back with further information when available and you decide to commit to this, then either live up to it or don't promise anything at all. Thanks for now and good luck to Hetzner in the future.

name: Tom H√§rter
review_body: I cannot emphasise enough how exceptional Hetzner's services have been for our business. Without a doubt, they deserve a well-earned five-star rating for their outstanding support, top-notch products, and exceptional hosting capabilities.

name: Eduardo Flores
review_body: I used hetzner and never had problems, I don't know why so many negative comments, I used hetzner 6 months after canceling their services they started charging me ‚Ç¨11 without using any service which is strange, I closed my hetzner account for that reason, now that I want to open a hetzner account again, I was surprised that they deactivated my account, I don't know if you can give me an answer through this means to verify my account, I was satisfied with your services, I hope you will respond. account:K0765255523

name: Emir Zecic
review_header: I am very happy with their service
review_body: I have been a customer with Hetzner for one year, and I am very satisfied with my server and the customer support.

name: Samuel
review_header: The cheapest provider i was able to‚Ä¶
review_body: The cheapest provider i was able to find, the service itself is amazing and in these 2 years of being their client i never had any issue related to the hardware or the service delivered, the only problem that makes me put 4 and not 5 stars is the absent support, they reply only to the questions they want and when they want, i wasn't able to understand what was meant for the german federal government report emails i was receiving twice a month for all of my servers and how to stop it, i asked their support and they never reached me back about it, i just ignored it and nothing happened.

name: SerhiiA
review_body: We wanted to bought a dedicated server for our Minecraft vanilla SMP. Our eyes fell on the "AX102" AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 9 7950X3D. But after registering the account, it was immediately deactivated, so we wrote to tech. support. First, technical support does not work on weekends, so we waited two days for them to reply. Second, when we got a response, we were told that they could not disclose the reasons for the deactivation. Terrible service.

name: Alexi Ioannou
review_body: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! Moving my domain to another provider was such a mission! and a two-week episode.Moving the domain because I could not use the site properly due to its complicated dashboard. There are by far other sites that are easier to use. After I moved my domain to another site, about a month later I get an invoice that I will be charged for my domain ( that is not listed with them ). I have emailed support again, to ask them why I am being invoiced when I do not host the domain name with them ! OVER A WEEK OF BACK AND FORTH EMAILS TO HELP ME TRANSFER IT, as this process is absolutely confusing with them !!! and the date of renewal came . the transfer was done ....but i am being charged ! . USE GODADDY OR ANY OTHER SITE!

name: IndoS
review_header: Do not buy anything from this company
review_body: Do not buy anything from this company. They have many tecnical problems, almost every 2 months something happens. We opened server from this company. We have been customer for a year. 1) After 3 months server was down for many days for technical "hardware" problems. 2) 5 months ago they told that server is spamming. And they recommend solve this issue by ordering their expensive managed server. Hetzner made this tecnical problem them selves, just because they wanted to sell their more expensive managed server. According our tecnical staff there was not any spamming issue at all, this was only Hetzner staff story. => We wanted to close this server and move it to other company. Hetzner also closed the Cpanel and internet connection, and did not let move anything out. They just sent invoice every month and nothing was done. They are completely criminals. I noticed that other customer has similar problems with Hetzner. 3) - We also had cloud from this company. They told that someone had hacked this cloud server/service and sent almost 900 euro monthly invoice. Actually all login details showed thay that only Hetzner staff could do this themselves, because no order confirmation from new services never came. Never buy anything from this company.

name: thewz wozz
review_body: Hetzner scams and sues you. Check my story on Reddit (u/Even_Tour_8825) DON'T BUY!! GO WITH OVH!!!

name: ummar rahil
review_header: I Have tried creating account using my ‚Ä¶
review_body: I Have tried creating account using my gmail but each time they denial my account even after uploding all the document, I have also asked the reason by calling them . but they told to mail , even no response to mail

name: Salam Talukder
review_body: I have received mail from them that my account is cancelled. They dont have any support. I have submitted my passport and my card with their portal for my travel agency business software. But they cancel it. Anyone from hetzner support staff look into this please! Dear Mr Abdus Salam Talukder ID: K0763767423 After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team

name: Tim
review_header: Disables traffic and zero customer support
review_body: Hetzner will abruptly disable traffic to your server if their broken system or amateur network administrators think something is suspicious. They'll leave you offline for 2-4 days while they ignore your customer support tickets and possibly restore access. Pick literally any other provider than Hetzner.

name: C Base
review_body: Great price Hetzner, you advertise uptime and cheap services and that's what I got. Thanks!

name: Ellena
review_body: Unbelievable panel and support. You can count on them, I've 3 websites on their service and I'm a really happy user. It's affordable as well

name: Sascha H√§ndler
review_header: Great service at a great price
review_body: I have been looking after servers hosted by Hetzner for more than 10 years and cannot understand all the negative reviews. The price/performance ratio is simply unbelievably good and the support has always done an excellent job for me. For someone who wants a managed server, Hetzner is certainly not the right choice, but you never claimed that.

name: Sergio E
review_header: Helpdesk is ridiculously ignorant -- avoid at all costs
review_body: Real customer. Account K1144563419. Avoid at all costs. For more than 2+ years, I've been a customer of Hetzner. We are holding 17+ active servers with this company. Long story short. This morning, one of our vSwitches stopped operating. We immediately contacted support and the service guy advised that we reload the vSwitch via customer panel. Despite our attempts to inform this person that all his recommended steps were tried a numerous times with no success -- he kept repeating the same useless "recommendations" instead of real help. For a full 1 working day, our business is offline. We are loosing our customers and reputation. Helpdesk failed to provide any help. There was another support person who finally offered to reset the vSwitch. We immediately answered "Yes please go ahead" and imagine what happened.... The same first person once again took over the conversation and offered us the same useless B/S. RIDICULOUS. Do not trust your business to Hetzner.

name: ƒê·ªìng Ph·ª•c H·∫£i Tri·ªÅu
review_body: Hetzner Online's ARM servers exceeded my expectations in reliability and affordability. The new ARM64 CAX servers are a game-changer for my business, enabling easy cloud server setup and remarkable cost-effectiveness in just 3 months of use.

name: Dan Dulaney
review_body: I decided to give Hetzner a try despite the other low ratings here. Don't waste your time. I gave the benefit of a doubt and just wasted mine. I used my valid credit card, with full name and billing address as my linked payment method, and provided one of the types of acceptable photo IDs listed when asked to verify my account. All names and details are the same and correct. And not that it should matter, but US based, since I've seen complaints on here about certain countries being rejected more often. I received an email this morning within less than an hour of business opening, stating that my account had been rejected: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us." No options to submit additional documentation was given, and honestly after this experience, I can see why so many have issues with Hetzner. Account K0662754323 ---------------------------------- Edit after response: I do appreciate them reaching out to me, although it shouldn't take a site like this for that to happen. The email received asked me for the same information I'd already sent over, so I'm not sure if things would have changed or not (ID again). I had already decided to go another direction, due to my initial experiences. I've added one star to my rating (1 -> 2) since they did reach out here, but my recommendation of looking elsewhere first still stands.

name: Emanuel Casta√±o
review_body: I previously had an account, the delivery of the server was at the agreed time, after a few years I try to contract with them again and I find great discrimination towards Latin countries, I understand their anti-fraud system but how are they going to leave all the responsibility to this system, I am a great taster of dedicated servers but I give it a red tray because they think they have very cheap servers but for someone who knows where to get servers I would recommend raising the price a bit and providing better support and an anti-scam system.

name: P P
review_header: Terrible customer support with harsh behavior
review_body: They have HORRIBLE customer support with harsh behavior. They don't answer emails and they give weird answers on phone and connect you from this irrelevant person to that irrelevant person. They are just horrible. Don't get deceived by their cheap servers. There is a reason behind every cheap price! Update to their reply: "some of my information"? My Schufa score is hight and I have a clean history. The only information that could be deal breaker for you is my nationality which is clearly a discrimination based on nationality. You should be ashamed.

name: business man
review_header: They charge after services are cancelled!
review_body: They kept charging me after i cancelled all my services! They are scammers dont buy from them!!! they kept charging me for a cloud server which i cancelled and i have sentg them so many emails and they have any sent me automated replies, support is non existent!

name: Liam Cook
review_header: Billed weeks after cancelling for another month
review_body: Cancelled the service weeks ago and then charge us another 30 Euros for a windows licence and server hosting way past the dates of the month of the server/invoicing ending? SCAMMY refund the money, you had more than enough notice. They responded that we would be billed on the 30th etc and the servers are still accessible. The servers are NOT accessible from our account and the invoice was for a full month of cost for the servers. The dates of the billed server time are actually overlapping with the month that was billed right in the middle not even close to either side. Very scammy practices.

name: Suren Poghosyan
review_header: they charged me 2x of the price when i‚Ä¶
review_body: they charged me 2x of the price when i wanted to cancel my server subscription, and before that they increased the price from 34 euros to 37. they are expensive and not relevant, I rather to use any other hosting than hetzner .

name: Andrew Wood
review_body: I have been with them for a few years. I've had no issues at all. Good service and prices to match.

name: Reuven Neumann
review_body: I had technical difficulties and requested assistance. The resolution was SWIFT and PRECISE. It was helpful in a way that both resolved my issue and assisted me in better understand how to fix those and other issues in the future.

name: Luca
review_header: it's ok (but you need to put up with some lack of empathy)
review_body: UPDATE I'm glad (obviously) that after reviewing the account has been recovered. I understand their concerns about potential risks to be exploited, due to their relatively cheap offers and still high power machine, but I suggest a bit of communication and conversation beforehand won't hurt. ============ I've been with hetzner for a while, good cheap machines and that's it though, as of today I'm seriously thinking to close my account and move somewhere else, not for tech reasons, they're just horrible as support and I now found them seriously unreliable for business Here's the reason. Even if I have had servers with them for a few years, they closed down my new account for a client I manage the servers for without giving any explanation or engaging in some conversation about it to solve the problem (which problem though?). How can you do serious business with this bunch of toddlers? what's the point in paying people for a service if you're not sure you still have a server when you wake up in the morning? I'm also really worried about the past clients I suggested them, as I now fear something happens and I'm the idiot

name: Coffarm Wijaya
review_body: To whom who read this, Never use this company service provider, they never give you to unlock your domain when it will transfer, The service was really poor, don‚Äôt waste your time and money to this poor service provider company

name: Proluxline Inc
review_body: Absolutely the most disgusting company I have ever encountered. I have been a customer for 5 years, and there has been an excessive amount of downtime, resulting in nothing but financial losses for me. Thankfully, I have finally severed ties with them and I am thrilled to be transitioning to a more dependable service provider.

name: Reda El ghomari
review_body: Awful company. Deleting servers automatically, they are stupidly crazy. I wanted to support a European company but will now go back to GAFA as they don't engage in such awful practices.

name: Ddb de Bruin
review_header: Customer for years, great support, great prices
review_body: Customer for years, VPS and dedicated servers Last use case 13500 dedicated server. W2k19 does not support intel 13500 (full support e/p cores) (tried/Installed W11 ent(not supported by hetzner) KVM problems. They went all out with different KVM models which support high resolution. End of the day server is running with almost a day of support for free

name: Ahmed
review_header: Hetzner provides a good services but‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner provides a good services but didn‚Äôt suit me. When it comes to support it‚Äôs certainly good. Very fast response in business hours and better than competitors such as OVH. In terms of performance they are also competitive and provide good performance. In terms of the prices. Good but the ipv4 prices is super expensive. It led me to cancel 2 servers there with alot of IPs each. And their setup fees for the IPs is super expensive The thing that didn‚Äôt work for me was the DDoS protection. It‚Äôs good and they have tweaked it recently and it blocks the attacks with no significant downtime but there are few drawbacks to consider: 1-Slow activation time. It takes about 5 minutes to identify the attack and to route the traffic to their protection tunnels. That wasn‚Äôt the biggest issue for me but it was something to consider. 2-Interrupts the first connection TCP handshake which makes the websites that are using Cloudflare or any CDN, Reverse proxy goes down when there is an attack. (Biggest drawback to me) 3-Sometimes the attack doesn‚Äôt reach their threshold to activate the protection. Which makes the server goes down and the protection is never triggered. 4-No option to enable permanent mitigation. After contacting their support their wouldn‚Äôt be a possibility to do much customization here. Which led me to stop using their services after 3 years of use. However it‚Äôs recommended for people who aren‚Äôt getting frequent DDoS which wasn‚Äôt my case.

name: Robin Heaver
review_header: I'm surprised by all the bad reviews‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm surprised by all the bad reviews I've been using them for a long time, and they are great, never had an issue and are reasonably priced.

name: MeowCatto
review_body: I've been using Hetzner for more than 2 years, my experience so far is amazing, their network and hardware is very reliable and would recommend for enterprise workloads. I've also seen people complaining about KYC verification, for me and my friend that was really easy, we had no issues with verification. Hetzner support is extremally friendly and replies fast, had an issue with our drives Hetzner replaced them quicky, the prices are very affordable. We would recommend Hetzner for starters and enterprise businesses.

name: charaf eddine issabri
review_body: A nightmare experience I am writing this to alert some people of this awful company. Before deciding to deal with this company, you have to be really careful because they will cancel and delete your server and lose all your data suddenly because you are late to pay an invoice. My experience with Hetzner has been nothing short of a nightmare.

name: David
review_body: Everything going well before any problem, no way you get answer no action taken, seams like they don't care and I think they have some motto as lot you ask as slow they response!!!! Wanted to rate price higher but as you loose on each situation better get another server. Also all there hardware always fails and if this happens same thing they just don't care first answer is broad and maybe fast but after hell is starting!

name: Ricardo Molendijk
review_header: Extremely Disappointed with Hetzner: Unfair Disabling of Service and Unresponsive Support
review_body: I am writing this review to express my extreme dissatisfaction with Hetzner, based on the harrowing experience I had with their services. My frustration began when Hetzner falsely disabled my service without any valid reason, citing a baseless abuse notice claiming that we had changed the MAC address. However, in reality, all we had done was install an operating system called Harvester, which apparently triggered their misguided response. To resolve this issue, I initiated multiple contact emails with their support team, hoping for a fair and reasonable resolution. Unfortunately, Hetzner's support staff showed a complete disregard for our legitimate claims and stubbornly refused to acknowledge their mistake. Despite providing ample evidence that the alleged MAC address change was false and explaining the harmless nature of our actions, they turned a blind eye and seemed uninterested in understanding our side of the story. What is more disheartening is that instead of addressing our concerns seriously, Hetzner has taken the outrageous step of involving debt collectors in an attempt to coerce payment from our company. This heavy-handed approach is both unprofessional and alarming, considering the lack of evidence or proper investigation on their part. It feels like they are more interested in extracting money from their customers rather than resolving disputes fairly. Throughout our correspondence with Hetzner's support team, their responses were frustratingly unhelpful and disheartening. Instead of providing any meaningful assistance or addressing our specific concerns, they resorted to sending back generic and dismissive comments. Their lack of empathy and unwillingness to engage in a genuine dialogue is indicative of a company that has lost sight of the importance of customer service. As a customer, I made great efforts to communicate and work towards a resolution, expecting a fair and professional response from Hetzner. However, their actions have not only tarnished our experience but have also raised serious doubts about their integrity and commitment to customer satisfaction. I strongly advise potential customers to think twice before considering Hetzner as their service provider. Their unjustified disabling of services, refusal to accept responsibility, and involvement of debt collectors demonstrate a blatant disregard for their customers' rights and well-being. It is clear that Hetzner lacks the necessary customer-centric approach and fails to provide the level of service and support one would expect from a reputable company in the industry.

name: Reda
review_body: I am writing this to alert some people of this awful company. Before deciding to deal with this company, you have to be really careful because they will cancel and delete your server and lose all your data suddenly because you are late to pay an invoice. My experience with Hetzner has been nothing short of a nightmare.

name: Charlie Zhang
review_header: Bad support system and I cannot bare this awful service
review_body: Several days ago, I register Herzner account for buying ARM servers, according to their rules, I hand out my real information, but been rejected for no reason. So I send ticket for support. I thought it's an occasional mistake. So I register another account to verify again, but still been rejected for no reason. Till now, nobody would like to give a response except automated mail reply. And even more I cannot see the process of ticket. I am quite sure that they want to drive these potential customers away, their support center is really a mess. I cannot image that what will happen if there're issues on my servers and no one would like to support immediately.

name: John F.
review_body: I attempted to register for a Hetzner account with my real identity twice, only to have my account closed both times. Hetzner seems to believe they have sufficient justification for their actions. However, they fail to acknowledge any shortcomings in their verification process, most notably the complete lack of communication with their users. As a result, customers are forced to bear the costs of potential false account attacks that should be Hetzner's responsibility. What's even more absurd is that, despite my inability to register my account with my real identity, I can still easily purchase someone else's registered Hetzner account for as little as 10 USD (although I have not done so). If I had any intent on engaging in "suspicious activities", wouldn't purchasing an account be a more convenient option? Perhaps Hetzner's technical support is top-notch, justifying their title as a "Platinum Service Provider". But all of these benefits hinge on you being lucky enough to pass their verification system. A quick glance at other reviews shows that the number of dissatisfied users due to account verification issues is quickly approaching the number of satisfied users. In my opinion, Hetzner's account verification team is protecting their service's reliability in a self-destructive manner, killing a thousand enemies at the expense of losing their own 800.

name: Mark Genney
review_body: Our company buys domains from 5 different providers, so hopefully we have a broad enough experience of different companies and I am certain that that Hetzner is the worst one. I realised this week that the one .de domain we have with Hetzner is not working so I went to log into the console to find I don't have an account. After confirming client details with support. Hetzner confirmed the domain had not been paid and the account was deleted. So for a start. I don't know why they would delete a client account for this reason. They act like that is a normal thing to do. I am certain that were I to cancel all our domains with GoDaddy for example they would not delete my existence because I might want to purchase another domain. Hetzner has told me that I can reactivate the account by wire payment. That is workable. However they are apparently unable to send me the invoice. They simply keep repeating that they have send it to the email address I have on file. I have never received any emails whatsoever from Hetzner apart from replies to support enquiries. I have been charged annually to the company debit card. I have never received a notification that payment will be taken, an invoice, or confirmation that services have been renewed. Given the lack of comms, I was not aware the payment had failed, nor that I was due a payment, nor that the service had been suspended. I don't even know why the payment would have failed, our account has plenty of funds. Perhaps their payment gateway also does not work. Given the lack of invoice received when they insist they keep sending it, and the lack of communication of any kind over the previous 4 years. I have come to suspect that Hetzner does not even have the correct email for me on file. I did update it in 2017 in the console and I think that might have not updated their actual comms. Support is completely useless. They are now telling me "if you do not receive it you have to check your settings we can't do anything at this point." This has nothing to do with email settings. The email address works. I think the problem is that they are not sending the invoice or they have the wrong email address. I have asked them to simply attach the invoice to the email conversation. Apparently they are incapable of doing that. So Hetzner does not have access to its own invoices? This is definitely a waste of time and I am getting nowhere with them. Should you be in the market for a new domain name, do yourself a favour and use a provider that is less incompetent. UPDATE: 30 May 2023: Read the response from Hetzner. My review was about finding myself without an account and my domain name unpaid because I did not get any comms from them. They say they have sent the invoice, they say they have sent it again. Obviously I have not received anything because that is what the problem is. They have not offered to send the invoice as an attachment to the support conversation. They have not explained why they have deleted my entire client account. I am sure I would be able to see invoices there had they not done that. Thankfully just after my review the domain was released and I just bought it again via another provider. Happy to not have to deal with Hetzner ever again.

name: Khaled Assali
review_body: We have been customers since 2015. Has been an excellent experience. We have been upgrading to a new server every couple of years and have had excellent support. The only negative is that some network functions are not supported 24/7. Everything else is perfect: price, performance and uptime.

name: Marcos Pastor
review_body: Nice Cloud provider My company have been using Hetzner for 1 year and a half with almost no problems. If you are looking for a price competitive cloud service, this one can fit your budget. Pros: - Price - API available - ARM64 architecture support - 20 TB bandwidth included on each server Cons: - API is a bit buggy and sometimes tasks don't finish correctly - Missing features compared with big players like AWS or Azure (autoscaling groups, ...)

name: Muhammed
review_body: i've been rejected 2 times without any reason. At the first one i've uploaded my national id card for verification they rejected without any rhyme. At the second try i've uploaded my passport as it's international they rejected it again ridiculously. I think they collect necesseray information of our ids and could be sell or do any other illegal things. Edit: they acknowledge that they're using our secret information even they reject your application. Edit 2: they still didn't answer why they reject our application. They could be continue Hitler's Nazism idea as they reject without any information they have but our nationality.

name: ploteus
review_body: Crazy Hetzner abuse system We rent some servers from Hetzner. We are hosting providers. One of our customers uses their own mail server for correspondence. (it's not rented from me, nor from the hetzner, it's geographically in another place) The client's mail server was hacked and sent out about 1000 spam mails. The mails were not sent through our server, this is proven by the log attached by Hetzner. Now hetzner is threatening to ban us from the IP address of the server we rented if we don't declare the mailing. I have sent several times a statement that we do not acknowledge the problem as it is not our leased server that is sending the spam. The customer concerned has already resolved the problem to my knowledge. For over a week they have been messaging me and threatening me to admit to an incident that I had nothing to do with. It is appalling how unreliable this service provider is and the degree of uncertainty it exposes its own customers to, all without any legal basis. They give 24 hours for any response, but they do not reply for days.

name: FFO
review_body: I am very concerned!! Last week I spent close to one hour with a very polite Hetzner representative, discussiong the possibilities of me trying out its hosting services. He was great at describing some the benefits that I could expect and what I liked was his candidness about what was on offer and what was not. I proceeded to create an account the day before yesterday and was requested to provide ID for verification purposes. In spite of not liking to send my ID details across the internet, as a lawyer, I am aware of the KYC challenges that companies have with dealing with faceless customers, so I duly sent across my passport copy. I then received the following email: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team" I was aghast, thinking could this have been because I sent my passport details, which reveals a person of African origins. Surely not? But there was no other plausible explanation to draw from. They have enough info on me to do a simple search if that is in fact necessary. I note from the complaints that this is a common issue with Hetzner, if they are using some form of AI to filter their customer base, I request that they need to look at the algorithm, because it clearly has some in built bias that is harming their reputation. I have requested an explanation by phone and by email and have not received anything yet. I am forced to take this a little more public in the hope of receiving an explanation and a reversal of this absurd decision. I sincerely hope that this was merely a blip in your system - the account number in question is as follows: K0557498923 I await Hetzner‚Äôs response. I have just received a request from Hetzner requesting that I provide more details about this case for verification of who I am. This reference number - K0557498923 will provide you will all the details that you need. Afterall, your system was very able to take my debit card details and a copy of my passport. and you have my initials - I do not think it is wise for Hetzner to suggest that i am some kind of phantom complainant. Please get in touch by email as I have requested you to do. My reply to Hetzner's response. Again I am aghast at Hetzner's approach here. So I provide a non European name, together with my passport, which identifies the same said name that I used in opening the account and you dare to go public to say this is a fake name. This is a disgrace and I have no doubt that in good conscience you realise that too. I not only sent you my payment details (also highlighting my name, a copy of my passport, I then provided you with details of my public profile, which is significant as it shows me in the same light, same name, same business that I would have been using your services for and more over, it is an extremely well known entity; but of course your powerful computers and the algorithm it uses trumps all of this very weighty evidence, that in legal terms we would describe as incontrovertible evidence. If you think I would go to all this trouble to highlight this kind of treatment, you are wrong. But it is very clear that your reliance on tech without plain common sense is really beyond belief, and has the potential to wreck your reputation and business. Given your GDPR obligations I want an official email making it very clear that all the personal details that you have taken from me will be deleted and permanently destroyed - and I go on public by saying that if this is not done by the close of business today I will be taking this further. Many thanks, FFO

name: Sherri Sloat
review_header: Their verification process is very bad
review_body: Their verification process is very bad! we got a Storage server from them and our Account got deactivated even after we provided all the Details and Photo of ID.

name: Michel
review_body: I have been with Hetzner for a little over two years now. Never really had any issues. I am renting both dedicated and virtual servers. The panel(s) are very easy to use and navigation through the control panel is easy. Fair prices for good quality. I like the storage box option. What I really love about Hetzner is the invoice reminders, and overview. They are transparent with what and when you need to pay and they will send you plenty of emails before the expiration date. Would love to see an integration with iDEAL so I don't have to use PayPal all the time. As with any hosting provider you need to understand what you're doing, hence why some of the reviews here are bad.

name: pasindu pinsara
review_header: My Account got deactivated for no reason
review_body: Hello, am new to this Hetzner hosting provider i registered there site and go to order a server but they asked me to fill the verification process, I filled that and they deactivate my account for no reason, I just so confused right now because they don't give me any reason why my account got deactivated, also for new customers i think they are not giving access to use/buy there services. This is the first time having issue like this because i didn't get chance to use there servers like i don't know if there are doing this on purpose I'm a new customer but they don't accept new customers i don't know why i just want to get dedicated server my account K0557333423

name: Huguitis
review_body: I don't understand why people put negative reviews, the support is good and the machines are cheap and powerful.

name: Felix
review_body: Worst hosting, I funded my balance for 20 euros, ordered servers to work, after a week I see a notice that my account is blocked, I wrote them an email why and what about the money, in the end there was no answer, now I see a message in the mail that I received an invoice for payment and they took my money, I did not even have time to use servers for 20 euros!

name: Fredrick
review_body: Reading through the reviews motivated me to leave a product review. I recently became a customer because of frustration with business practices of USA based tech companies surrounding clean energy, data protection, etc... as well as all the ancillary costs incurred by setting up infrastructure on the big three cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) . After some research I settled on Hetzner and have been super happy with them so far. Their CAX VPS instances (of which I already have many) are an amazing value for performance and have also picked up a server from the server auction for less than ‚Ç¨60/mo that would cost me at least $300/mo elsewhere. Additionally, their support has been very responsive the few times I've contacted them. The community support for tools like terraform to manage infrastructure, dns entries, etc. was also great to see and a huge deciding factor when making my choice. Overall, I have been very happy with my decision to build our new product on Hetzner and will recommend them to others every chance I get.

name: arno sica
review_body: I use the storage share service, and first the service itself is great, much better than any other one i've tried (sync.com, pcloud, google, idrive, etc, and i had paid accounts with a few of them). Basing this on nextcloud is a very smart move as it works well and is constantly updated. Then when i had an issue, the support fixed it in one day moving around my 3Tb of data to a better server. So i'm really glad i found that company! I can safely sync all my important data and share it between 3 computers without worrying.

name: Francisco Dias Oliveira
review_body: If you want to store daily backups on their storage boxes, i don't recommend. I owned one, and when i started to use it more heavily, they started to rate limit me. Their support changed me from node, and even then it didn't help.

name: Al
review_body: I provided all my card info, name, address and even had to upload a picture of my driving licence only for them to refuse my custom.

name: Polina
review_body: Absolutely not satisfied, customer service is quick but not caring, several technical issues were resolved but they cancelled my account after payment delay. No recovery possible

name: FENG APP
review_header: Just tried to register an account and‚Ä¶
review_body: Just tried to register an account and its been rejected for no explicable reason! No Livechat, no uk number. Other numbers ring out. What a JOKE! Perhaps this is a blessing in disguise tbh.... Read your reply. "Protect others on the interneT... Is that a joke! and no personal call or email to explain in details?? Sounds like your CS team is just bots. How insulting can you get??! Asked what the reason was and still no answer. We've opened an account with OVH cloud/ They come far more recommended than you and thats no surprise!

name: Anoop Kumar
review_body: Always rejecting my account activation. i dont know whats their real issue with my details. my account details are K0454931623. its not activated. i already sent more than 1 available proof.

name: Andy P
review_header: Hetzner has been an absolute nightmare
review_body: Hetzner has been an absolute nightmare. They blocked both of my servers without any notification. Support admitted on the phone that it wasn't my fault, just their automated system. Now they're threatening to shut down the servers unless I send them verification, but the link to verify does not work. This company is an absolute nightmare to work with.

name: Tim
review_body: hetzner.com is trash service. I advise people not to use their services. They locked my account when i sent the authentication ID they can take that information and sell it to 3rd party this is a scam company. Update: 1 point for hetzner.com

name: John
review_body: This company is racist, prejudice against people from certain countries around the world. They do not base each case on its own merit.Very unprofessional and how a company can still be racist in 2023 is horrid *** Update *** Hetzener is trying to remove my review now by claiming it is not an actual customer experience. How very strange isn't it *** Update 1 *** I am not the only person from the United Kingdom of late to be rejected without reaching out, It has been the same for a while. Political and based solely on geo-location. Reporting to the eu trading regulators, strange how you also target Ukrainian websites too and you claim your company is not racist *** Update 2 *** The company claims it is security but they do not do the same checks on countries that are still members of the European Union, simply geo racism. They never reach out to people to discuss the process, simply see the customer's location and reject the accounts.

name: Jackson
review_body: My friend advised me to this hosting, as a result, I registered, then I was asked to verify the account, the choice were documents or to pay 20 euros, I decided to pay 20 euros, as a result of my account is blocked, for no reason, and the money is not returned, the tech support is not respond, about what quality service can we talk about, please respond

name: BK
review_header: DO NOT SIGNUP YOU LL REGRET IT
review_body: DO NOT SIGNUP YOU LL REGRET IT. THEY HAVE THE WORST CUSTOMER CARE I HAVE EVER COME ACCROSS ANYWHERE. I keep getting the same warning that my mac address from internal DHCP are visible to their network but NOT one single line about how to fix it

name: V. V.
review_header: I've been a customer for 10+ years
review_body: Great provider, excellent prices, everything works well. My previous review was negative (hence the reply), because they used to have a terrible verification system that basically denied everyone a new account. The new system seems to work well.

name: BloopBytes Apps
review_body: Really a very good company. I've never had any problems. I don't understand these hate comments. Great admin panel, instant server startup. One small suggestion to add Plesk to apps. If you add Plesk, I will transfer all my servers to you.

name: Cardei Catalin
review_body: Suddenly my account is blocked for something I supposedly did wrong but without any explanation. The truth is that I am very very disappointed with how they have treated me with this matter. I have sent several emails and called several times trying to solve this but I really do not understand how a company like this prefers to lose clients instead of communicating with them. Hetzner, please don't answer me "you understand my frustration", you can't understand it.

name: James
review_header: Hetzner does not care about their potential clients
review_body: I would write to you to tell you how bad their customer service is at Hetzner, but its non existent. Its been days and an entire weekend without any reply. We have never been able to send emails. That never works on the cloud platform. Their tutorial or help page is not correct. That does not work. And, so they waste days and days without any care in the world that we are not able to do the most basic of thing...which is to send emails. They just do not care. And, honestly what will happen is in about week or so, they will do the obligatory reply here acting like they care. They will ask us to contact them which we have done. And, that does not work. Like I said, I would say the custy service is horrible but in reality, there is none. Outgoing traffic to ports 25 and 465 are blocked by default on all Cloud Servers PAGE_CONTENT.LIMITS.REQUEST_FORBIDDEN.WARNING

name: evald ibrahimi
review_header: Hope you do not get an abuse report
review_body: This company is crazy. There are some false positives(abuse messages) stating that my servers are hosting phishing websites. I keep informing them that it is a correct website and the login page they see is from my erp system, but nothing. They keep threatening to close the service or to take down the service. They are really stupid and unprofessional. Stay away from them Edit on 19 of april: hetzner still sends today another false posiitive. What to say, these people should work in the fields to produce potatos and not deals with IT systems

name: David Paul
review_header: There is nothing wrong with Hetzner
review_body: There is nothing wrong with Hetzner, except maybe that they are charging high prices for every IPv4, although even that is understandable with the current situation. It adds up a lot to the cloud yearly cost. We normal users don't want to meet shady spammers and crypto bros on the same neighbourhood, so stay away and stop complaining because of being refused service.

name: Human not Bot
review_header: account disabled after sent document id
review_body: I'm from 3rb country, how i know this? because my country not on the list on this website company. my account have been deactivated after sending scan of my ID. I cannot login anymore to fix this issue so i just try to make other account, and yah it disabled again after sent document ID. After then I give up to register on this site. I realized that i just from 3rd country that maybe many of other people on my country use this service to do some illegal thing maybe so they just reject me again and again. Also, they say can accept paypal, but when I register i must use CC to finish the registration. even after i login (before sent document ID) there is only CC on the payment method. I dont know is my document ID will be delete or will always save by them, i regret to give them my data for nothing. So from my experience, if your account not on the list, I suggest think twice to join this site, but if you from EU or US maybe you will get easier to register

name: Fear
review_header: Hard to kyc for new cost
review_body: I'm a new customer but never get approve for KYC, okay because i look sus so i can't getting verify? I pay the vps when i can get verif, so please let me use the product

name: Osama
review_body: Worst company I've ever seen! This company is a piece of joke from account creation to the crappy support, I highly recommend to stay away from this fraud company!

name: Bodhi Facilities
review_body: The worst hosting company. We have two websites, digitalaakashsir.in AND nileshbodhi.online. Both are hosted on Hetzner Online Finland but the server is always down. I have checked another site, saptarshibanerjea.com, which is hosted on Hetzner Online Germany and this site is always up and running. So when we pay the same rate why Finland servers are always down and we struggle to keep our sites up and running as we always get one error, "This site can‚Äôt be reached. It took too long to respond." Please provide good services just like you do for German hosted websites

name: Flavio LCK
review_body: Hello, I strongly recommend this hosting company price and quality found nowhere in other competitors, and last generation hardware regarding Intel servers.

name: iF
review_header: They do not respect the customer
review_body: They closed my account after I opened within 12 hours I didn't get a chance to find out my account Number or ID to put them here, because I put different name on my account and the name is my website, So they noticed some suspicious information in my account, so I will expect at any moment to stop my services for a specific reason, this is a very strict policy that you stop my site as soon as I wrote the name of my site upon registration, it is necessary That there is a stage if I do not respond, so you have the right to stop the service. I have been seriously mistaken when I trusted them to leave my website without a backup copy and currently I do not have a copy and try to communicate with them, but there is no point where there is no one who holds them accountable for this. They did not allow me to make a backup copy of my site despite that, that is, a stupid policy, that they are wrong with what they do with their judgment on us. The Customer Data Analytics section is very stupid with their ruling on us, it is really a great loss to the company. The company must reconsider this stupid section as soon as possible. I will write about them in all review sites to show their reality, that I really are very annoyed with the loss of my data because of this stupid section and their stupid ruling. They do not respect the customer. ====================================== I did not use any account based on their response below that it is misleading and lying, and this company does not have its credibility

name: Benedict
review_header: Terrible company attempted to buy a‚Ä¶
review_body: Terrible company attempted to buy a server from them as I do not own a passport I asked what means of other verification I can attempt with them, 2 days later they closed me account and called me a scam? why because I don't own a PASSPORT the hells wrong with you.....

name: Jose Luis
review_header: They lied to me just to get a payment back.
review_body: If I could give them -10 stars I would. I had a vps for almost a year. I never requested support, the day I did it was a waste of time. I was sick for a long time and I could not access my server to pay for it and my service was suspended (something reasonable), I write to them and ask if I pay I can recover my information from the server and they answer me that I pay first and then we "resolve" that issue. I make the payment and then they tell me that I can only recover my account, but not the information from the server No. DISHONEST. I have been with DigitalOcean for more than 5 years and I have never had a problem (they did not delete my 5 servers, they only suspended my service, I paid and recovered everything), I wanted to give Hetzner a chance, but unfortunately it was a mistake.

name: Marx Ranaweerage
review_body: Hetzner's customer support is excellent, as they have highly knowledgeable staff working in support. I will remain loyal to them to help grow my business. Hetzner's server delivery time is impressively fast, and I always appreciate their services. I wish Hetzner all the best.

name: Sergi Garzon Orquin
review_body: Really good service. Any problem a quick call puts you on the phone with a tech guy in the center. Never had a problem before, just some questions about upgrading the servers Switched from 1&1 to them and saved some money and problems

name: Thibeau Maerevoet
review_header: They keep making the same bs about a‚Ä¶
review_body: They keep making the same bs about a few connections to unrouted IPs. Totally unnecessary.

name: muhammed idlibi
review_body: I was contacted by the account support department and the problem has now been resolved But I still think that some employees need more training In general, thank you

name: Tobias
review_body: Made an account, gave them my credit card details including bank approval then my password wasn't accepted anymore. Called support, was told to write an email. Since then no response! At this point all they've done is grab my credit card details. I highly recommend staying away from that company!!!

name: Adrian Lungu
review_body: Their prices are ok, but customer support is HORRIBLE. HORRIBLE. Not only their english is bad (how can a multi dollar company have people who don't really speak english?), in my case they are saying I had unpaid invoices when in my "invoices" menu all are always paid, they are all green. So they went ahead and deleted my website and my email server that i really fckn needed for work and now I have to deal with their incompetence. Cherry on top, I opened a ticket support, no answer, sent them a DM on instagram and they said they'd be looking into my case, AND NO ONE DID ANYTHING EVER. Stay as far away as you can from these german incompetents EDIT: don't give me "please pay" bullsht. Take a look at my account accounts . hetzner . com/invoice, it is all PAID. In german alles ist bezahlt. In what other language do I have to write that i paid everything, where are these mysteryous invoices that i haven't paid? Make them appear on the site and i'll gladly pay them if YOU FORGOT to publish them on my account. I asked to all warning emails WHERE are the invoices as they don't appear in my account, the reply? services closed. See this is exactly the kind of pathetic support they have. stay AWAY

name: Kevin
review_header: I have been working with Hetzner for‚Ä¶many years
review_body: I have been working with Hetzner for years now. They used to a bit more expensive than the competition but you got access to extremely versatile and competent technicians. You could mail them and they would reply quickly and often with very elegant and clever solutions. Unfortunately, over the last few years this has changed. Now they are just expensive, if you ask them for a small intervention, it can take days for them even to reply. Let alone actually do the intervention. If you call them the answer is always some variation on the same theme : "Computer Says No" After more than fifteen years I will slowly guide my customers towards other providers. I can think of no compelling reason to stay with Hetzner.

name: Andrej Tekel
review_header: This company is the biggest joke i ever‚Ä¶
review_body: This company is the biggest joke i ever saw. First of all i asked them to cancel my server like 7 times for me and they obviously did not do it cause of prolonging subscription, like this is unreal behaviour. Than i manualy canceled it/ did not use server for 3 month get cancelation server confiemation mail and yet they sent another invoice today. I am gonna do my work and let this joke company behaviour to my lawyer to at least report them to beaureau, because this was an unreal experience. Please stay away of these people with support and business model of criminals.

name: –ò–≥–æ—Ä—å –ü–∞–Ω–∞—Å—é–∫
review_header: I decided to try this hosting for the‚Ä¶
review_body: I decided to try this hosting for the test, paid the bill for 55 euros for the first month. I issued a service for my Polish company. I entered all the details of my company in order to receive invoices later. Then I get a message that I have to send my passport. I sent my passport, and seeing that I have Ukrainian citizenship, they canceled my account. Even if you find my company on the Internet, it says that I am the owner and about my company on many services. But after they saw my passport, they simply deactivated my account. It's just a terrible attitude

name: Sunset Daily
review_header: This was some of the worst customer service I have ever had in my life‚Ä¶
review_body: This was some of the worst customer service I have ever faced in my entire life. This company also uses parts of their fifteen minutes of fame holding the fact that they have servers in their control. They are rude people. They talk over you and then hang up when trying to talk to them and fyi, this is their business model. THREE (3) different people hung up on me and mind you, we are on speaker phone. There was never any profanity used. There was a day due to being in different countries. They did not like hearing a so called loud voice and the answer was to hang up three different times. They are not good people. They hate this work. Thats for sure. And, this is not even going into how the server goes down every 8 days. Thats the issue. Yet trying to get any help is pathetic. Its so bad. I would never call them again or deal with this company. I am ftp'ing out right now. This was a nightmare and all I did was go to sleep and wake up to a server not working and then I was hung up on three time because their little feelings got hurt. Meanwhile, my server is down and my account is locked because we could not get in to reset it but their feelings were so hurt because of a loud vocal that they hung up THREE TIMES rather than help. They actually talked about wanting to help. I kept saying instead of talking about wanting to help that they should just help but thats not a thing at hetzner. They would rather use part of their odd fifteen minutes of fame to use its power because they have control of your server. Its the exact thing to never do when being a host company. They are evil people. I am serious. They are downright evil to do this to people. You feel helpless and they know it. They take advantage of it. They use it. Like I said here, its part of their business model.

name: Manish
review_header: You Can Trust Hetzner For Production Server
review_body: I've been using Hetzner for about two years and have never had an issue or outage. They conduct some maintenance from time to time, but it's always properly communicated and organized. Here are my likes and dislike. Pros: 1)Good Pricing for Cloud and Dedicated Server 2)Almost 99.99% Uptime 3)Scalability Option 4)Snapshot Option Cons: 1) Provide your personal ID and photo as part of the account verification process. 2) The setup costs and additional IPv4 costs are excessive. 3) Dedicated Server Setup Fees 4) Invoicing System - They never stated the due date, as in my instance, the invoice was raised on the fifth of each month, so I always paid that day or the next day. I haven't spoken to the support personnel in two years, so I can't speak to that. I have used there Cloud, Dedicated Server, Storage Box and Volume services. Overall, I can suggest using them.

name: Meelis H
review_header: I have had a longer time smaller VPS‚Ä¶
review_body: I have had a longer time smaller VPS with hetzner and now another bigger. Despite of so much of negative reviews, I do not have much to complain, I think that price is really good, performance has been great, also excellent cloud "console" where you can scale your VPS up or down in seconds.. + more advanced cloud features when needed, "Storage Box" which gives you really cheap storage that can be attached to VPS's, networks speeds has been amazing.. only minus is their payment as you cannot pay upfront like for a year (as a company this is a bit hassle to make sure accountant gets that bill every month)

name: Will
review_header: Does not shut fraud sites down
review_body: I am a security consultant. I reported to Hetzner fraud and scam sites running on their platform; those sites were created by Russian scammers. I asked them to shut those sites down. Usually the response takes a lot of time and in the end those sites keep running using a different domain name but the same IP address. I explained to Hetzner it is very important to ban the site owner, but it did not happen. I believe we cannot reduce the amount of scam in the Internet, thanks to such companies like Hetzner.

name: Nenadd Chandorkar
review_header: We are working with Hetzner from last 1‚Ä¶
review_body: We are working with Hetzner from last 1 year, the cost is cheap and service is good. We were able to shutdown our phyiscal datacenter and move all our projects to Hetzner. Working with Hetzner is cool.

name: Nagui Bihelek
review_body: Worst experience ever. Horrible business practices. After trial period ended, the first payment with Paypal didn‚Äôt go through, and they cancelled our account and send us threatening email. I paid with seconds of receiving their email by logging into my account and paying the service invoice. Checked all was ok. But they had already started cancelation process, and later I found out that they deleted all our data even though we had paid for a full month on same day of notice. They showed no remorse or made any effort to rectify or compensate us, and despite being unable to access our data while we had paid in full, they did not refund the full amount and only partial refund.

name: Johan
review_header: Thanks for the good service Hetzner :)
review_body: Numerous products/services with Hetzner and super happy with the whole experience so far!

name: √û√≥rhallur √Årnason
review_body: Don't understand the negative reviews I just need to put it out there, I have been with Hetzner since 2018 (4 years at the time of writing this). They host a cloud server for me and I didn't have any downtime or problems with support or accounting + they have killer features.

name: Erkut Ozen
review_header: Their support is very bad and account is disabled.
review_body: Their support is very bad. I just became a member and they deleted my account without approving it. I wanted to create a membership with the right information and get the service, but it was very good to see these aspects. I think they only serve German citizens and look suspiciously at all other country citizens. Although it is recommended on many forum sites, do not be fooled! There are much better providers. Be sure to check out the complaint threads on platforms like Reddit. Not good hetzner, not good. Sorry for this comment, but before treating new customers as suspicious, remember that they can become customers and organize your support system accordingly. This will be better for the future of the company.

name: Europa PL
review_body: Another Disaster from this company. for the past month plesk activation key stoped working and we had to move our data to another server provider. we have requested cancellation. 4 weeks we tried hard for solution. Everyday emails to support and still they try to solve the issue. the funny about this is we have paid in advance for all services.

name: Pezhman
review_header: deleted my account without acceptable reason
review_body: They just deleted my account right after registration and uploading my proof without any acceptable reason. Please be aware simply this can happen for you too. Dont waste your time to registering and go for better company. This is what they emailed me : After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us.

name: markus
review_header: I had a terrible experience with‚Ä¶
review_body: I had a terrible experience with Hetzner when trying to open an account for web hosting. During the account creation process, I was informed that there were "inconsistencies" in my information and my account was not approved. To make matters worse, my email inquiries about the issue were ignored and the customer service ended the live chat without resolving the issue. I felt discriminated against and mistreated by the company. Based on my experience, I cannot recommend Hetzner to anyone.

name: Nika Dateshidze
review_header: Terrible company with a terrible support
review_body: As a programmer, I have worked with many services, but "hetzner" is the worst one I have come across, we have a tourist site and at the height of the tourist season, the server is turned off without warning, the support does not answer, does not explain the reason. do not even give the opportunity to pick up your files and database. several months of work is simply lost, as well as customers canceled orders. "hetzner" themselves are the worst of the worst,

name: McMelon Tube
review_body: Everything is just great. Never had any issues with them. Would 100% recommend and use again

name: Angry
review_header: Terrible company with a terrible support
review_body: I've been trying to delete my account for multiple months. Meanwhile I'm getting billed for a product I haven't used in a long time and the support team even has the audacity to be insulting. Haven't found a single support member who was willing to help or even be friendly and that despite multiple mails as well as multiple calls. I cannot believe that this scammy company is legal.

name: Alex
review_body: Once you get DDOS - you can change this "server" to something more reliable, with 24/7 support, because this "hosting provider company" (if it can be called so) gives such amazing servers which will go down after 5 IPs which doing parsing.

name: Omor Sarif
review_body: I've had nothing but negative experiences with this company. Their cloud dashboard isn't secure at all or they're running a scam company. They created a total of 5 servers without my permission and when asked the reason, they said it was because my password was compromised. Except it was 2 factor authentication. Despite this, they issued invoices and attempted to charge my cards despite contacting them. Totally a scam company and don't get fooled by affliates who are getting paid to promote these clowns garbage products. Not to mention that the servers are slow, sluggish and will be painful to deal with. I'd never touch these clowns' server and will never recommend to any of my clients.

name: KSR
review_body: Useless. The service was promised to work within minutes, but 3 hours later there is still nothing visible of my order on my account. It makes no sense for an online storage service to not be useable instantly. Update: The next day I received an email saying my account has been closed because of "concerns" with "my updated customer information". This, after I had provided my credit card info to them and my order had been accepted. I never did any "updates" to my information. And now they are trying to request more personal information about me from this review here too. I had to contact my bank to block them from being able to charge my credit card. Avoid this company!

name: dennis
review_body: no ddos protection constant liers, they dont let their servers boost clock and they overheat 24/7 if under load EDIT FROM HETZNER‚Äôs reply: no, you don‚Äôt have any protection, stop misleading your customers. i got my friends to test the most basic of ddoses, and you couldn‚Äôt handle it.

name: –Æ—Ä–∞ –í–∞—Å—å–∫–æ
review_body: Hetzner is definitely not a customer-oriented company. Communication with the Hetzner support team is just awful - the average response time for mail is 2 days. Also, the identity verification process is not clear. Hetzner just deactivates my newly created account without any explanation. I do not understand how is it possible to run a business in this way. Do not recommend this company.

name: Alireza
review_body: I've used Hetzner for hosting before however right now the Idenify system rejects my ID and passport even with 20 tries, I hate this, is this not enough of a confirmation for you? Update: after some emails I get to confirm the account but I stand by my word, the Idenify system is one of the worst passport verification services to ever exit, Hetzner you should try to confirm the identity based on OTP, Mail or paypal verification.

name: Walkaisa
review_body: The best VPS provider I have had so far. I have tried very many. From low budget to high budget. But the very best is Hetzner. The dashboard is unique, simple and very clear. The server runs top! No downtimes or similar so far. The internet speed is incredible. Up- and Download up to 15 GBp/s. (Location: Ashburn, USA). I haven't had any experience with the customer support yet, so my rating is only based on the server performance.

name: Guacanagarix
review_body: A good economic VPS, perhaps for slightly advanced users

name: Tanzil Hussian
review_header: Totally scam company don't waste your‚Ä¶
review_body: Totally scam company don't waste your money and time. I am using cloudflare load balancer with hetzner server where they detecting it as network scan and blocked my servers. I explained multiple time, given them my servers credentials for Audit that there is no malware software except cloudflare load balancer but they didn't accepted.

name: Trentos
review_body: Scam platform that steals precious time. We needed servers, I registered here, passed verification, added a card, I sit working with servers for a couple of days and then I was banned without explanation. Then the same story with a friend's account. And six months later, again with me, only this time they took 541 dollars from me and promise to return them within 7 days, but not 541, but 530.

name: sanad nabil
review_header: Don't waste your time with hetzner They don't have a support team
review_body: i'm trying to create account and activate it but its a mass for them completely garbage automated verification system and i think their support team doesn't exist worst support you will ever had i uploaded my id But verification step Faild i tried too many times to email thier support team but there is no response AT ALL. I even uploaded my id pictures and Emailed thier team with all Info they asked for and more. i told them to pay in advance before i can use any server but no response at all total waste of time i was moveing from contabo to hetzener after 3 years so i'm happy to pay DONT WASTE YOUR TIME GO TO OTHER HOSTING COMPANIES THAT RESPECT THIER CLIENTS They don't have a support Team Don't respect thier customers Total Waste of your time Dear Mr Sanad Nabil After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team

name: Willem
review_body: Have had my VPS running with them for 3 years. Never noticed any downtime. Billing was never a problem. Never needed to interact with customer support.

name: Houman
review_header: I'm really surprised about the bad‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm really surprised about the bad reviews here. I have been a customer of Hetzner for five years. Throughout this period, I had various dedicated and cloud servers with them. Our business would be difficult to run without Hetzner. Their servers are very fast and very well configured. You get a whole IPv6 64 subnet, which is also routed to the VM. Surprisingly, only a handful of providers can achieve such great server configurations. Hetzner handles abuse claims well and has overall an efficient customer service. The prices are good and you get pretty much unlimited traffic. There are only two drawbacks: 1) As you would probably expect from a German company, the customer service etiquette and friendliness are not their strongest suit. Instead of a robotic "Dear client", how about using the customer's name? 2) Hetzner is the only server provider that I have seen over the years with an anti-port scanning mechanism. This creates a lot of false-positives and a lot of headaches for the customer, especially if you run a VPN on the server.
