Sometimes genuine music apps scans ports, but that doesn't mean that this is a malicious act. Hetzner needs to rethink that. Overall highly recommended.

name: Mark Papa
review_header: not very happy have to restart server‚Ä¶
review_body: not very happy have to restart server again and again sometime

name: Jorge
review_header: Something really strange happened in a Cloud server from Hetzner
review_body: Something really strange happened. One day, my cloud server was unresponsive for no reason via ssh. I was able to connect via the console from the Hetzner website but I could not connect via ssh. I thought my server was hacked. i have been able to check user logs in using the console. I didn't find anything. Strangely, i could not ping from the server to the outside world. I tried to reset my server but there was no improvement. I only saw that there was many DHCP requests in the system log file from my server to the host system of Hetzner. So, to me it looked like the router of Hetzner was dead because these DHCP requests weren't answered by the router. At some point, I received a message from Hetzner that was displayed on my private dashboard, saying something like, your server is locked, some maintenance should be done on the host system. meanwhile, I restored the last backup. And then, everything came back to normal. My server was down for 10h00 and it started just after 00:00 I received no email from Hetzner but I am sure the problem came from Hetzner. Also, I checked the maintenance history of hetzner and nothing was mentioned. So, I think that Hetzner hides their malfunctions. My datacenter was nbg1-dc3 This happens on the 18th of November 2022 between midnight and 10h.

name: Rami
review_body: I was on their website and paid for them f thousands of dollars , I used a thousand servers from them, once I bought several servers from them and canceled after a week Because I finished my project and they didn't like it and blocked me from all their services, even though I was a good customer and paid them thousands of dollars, I asked customer service to check the issue again, and I asked for an answer as to why I was blocked and they didn't give any answers, they just said that they were afraid of losing money from more server cancellations

name: C S
review_header: Hetzner lost all data on my server !!!
review_body: Hetzner lost all data on my server !!! I was hetzner client for several years and collected my work, study, genealogy data there hoping I could travel and work remotely. Now I moved away from Russia to another country because of war , here I missed payment deadline ( I agree that it is my fault , but I was ready to pay all debts, also I was volunteering helping Ukrainian refugees ( I'm Russian ) and had difficulties paying with Russian banks' cars abroad due to sanctions, had to ask my friend each time ), and hetzner simply removed my server and lost all my data on it . Many man-hours of work were lost together with personal history . On its place I would better backup the server and give it back to client upon payment, but current hetzner policy neither motivates to pay debts, nor to use it's services anymore . All I want to say - please move to different services , if you don't want to encounter such an attitude.

name: Erik
review_body: Confiscated account balance without notice. After I confronted them they reluctantly agreed to transfer the balance to my bank account. Avoid at all costs!!

name: Tips
review_header: They send random invoices that have‚Ä¶
review_body: They send random invoices that have been paid for a long time! pure scammers! i would say be sensible and don't do business with this company, be sensible and choose OVH.

name: zuki
review_body: Terrible customer service, i ask to the agent "Tom" if CX11 give me access to SSH an then just response This is a product advice only chat. Unfortunately we cannot assist you. then closed the chat. - That's all.. patetic.

name: Guillem M
review_header: My account has been stolen, total exposure to the attackers.
review_body: My account has been stolen. I hasnt the 2-auth factor activated, but the attacker changed the email address of my account, without any confirmation from Hetzner, just an e-mail saying "My main e-mail address have been changed correctly". Isn't supposed to have some security steps in order to change the e-mail address of my account despite being without 2-auth? All the websites that I have an account, always ask you by e-mail if the change is legit. Not this time. Hoping the attacker don't use my account to create server because it was two weeks ago. In case they want to invoice me something, probably I would have to take legal actions against them.

name: shivam samdhyan
review_header: really good support and great services‚Ä¶
review_body: really good support and great services i never faced any issue using hetzner , my account got hacked twice and some unknown server got purchased which was really unaffordable from my side i checked it late and asked hetzner and they understood it and cooperated with me in that situation i really appreciate their work ,

name: Roy Sinclair
review_header: A once great company gone very bad!
review_body: We've used Hetzner for years and just upgraded one of our servers. They allow virtual MACs to be generated for additional IPs but not for subnets. Their technical documentation for the very specific and complex network configuration is out of date. They refused to help us, raising 'abuse reports' instead ...customer service? ...WHAT customer service! So we had to guess the network configuration that works with additional subnets. This took time - a lot of time - and their systems could not even filter out harmless ARP broadcasts. We have since implemented ARP firewalls to further block virtual MACs but on the very day they emailed to say that the 'abuse' problem had been resolved, they 'locked' the IP address which immediately caused our clients' most critical business apps, email and website services to go dark. This has caused us untold reputational harm and I am gobsmacked that any modern business could deem it acceptable to do such a thing. I am livid and right now, cannot possibly recommend the services of Hetzner to anyone.

name: Sharpshooter Gaming
review_body: best cheap dedicated service provider in the world , please relase two more feature cdn and ddos protection thanks

name: Mario
review_body: Excellent hosting provider for VPS and dedicated servers for business.

name: Amjid Ali
review_header: Sharing my experience after around 2 years
review_body: Sharing my experience after around 2 years. 1. Worst ever customer service i have seen in my 30 yrs of life. 2. They will never accept the fault on their end unless its hardware fault. 3. Servers not accessible throughout world most of the times.

name: James Lee
review_body: Server is perfect, everything so far is perfect and performing well within spec. The management panel is really feature rich compared to other hosts in similar price ranges such as Kimsufi, I'm not sure what everyone's complaining about re. support, they were super helpful when I requested a KVM and ended up not needing it, obviously you need a fair bit of technical expertise but for an unmanaged dedicated server I really can't find anything to complain about.

name: Alexander Novicov
review_header: SH** company with ZERO customer service.
review_body: I think giving them one review is more than they deserve. If you don't need support and just host one website that is not that important, it's okay. Their customer support is beyond s***. All my servers have been down for the past 2 days (12 websites) their support doesn't respond. They did respond initially, and I responded that we fixed the issue. Still waiting for an answer. I lost around ¬£5,000 because all our clients websites are down. They just don't care. A friend of mine recommended them to me but really I need to find another company that at least cares. I genuinely hate companies that are just for profits and S*** customer support. If you want bad service or just no service this is the company to go to. To YOUR RESPONSE: 24th October: I did respond within 30 minutes of your email and I didn't hear from you after 3 days! So please at least don't lie, it just makes you look worse. I have the email logs in my inbox to prove to you that within 30 minutes I responded and the issue was solved.

name: –ê–Ω–¥—Ä–µ–π –ï–∫–∏–º–µ–Ω–∫–æ
review_body: Thanks for the fast support. and that you go to meet your clients. It strengthens our cooperation prosperity

name: Andrea V√∂r√∂s
review_header: Wiped all company data. 3 years of work is lost
review_body: Have been a customer for over 3 years. Our credit card expired on the account over the last two weeks of holiday period in UK in August, we received payment reminders for 2 weeks and our account and entire data got wiped for failing to pay within one month of invoice date in total. 2 weeks of payment notification only! One could be in hospital or not have access to emails for that period of time, anything can happen! Whereas we understand we failed to make payment on time, to wipe all of our data is just not acceptable. Be careful when you sign with Hetzner and I hope you never do! Their terms and conditions are vague, they pretty much say they can cancel your account any time on non-payment without advising you a timeline ahead when you sign a contract with them. 3 years of data has been lost. Terms and conditions of course do not discuss ‚Äòwiping data‚Äô just cancellation of contract. You would understand if you do not have access to the account after a month of non-payment but to entirely wipe everything? Have you heard anything like that before? We did not have a back up! I have to also write about the customer experience. I have been treated with such disrespect, superiority, and arrogance in conversations. The experience was simply awful and inhumane. When I described the customer experience to the team leader I was told ‚ÄòI do not believe you. I hear every single conversation the team has‚Äô. (Bear in mind it is impossible to listen to every conversation simply when you have 2 or more team members even!!!) Perhaps he does not even realise himself what customer service means. Anybody with Hetzner, do look for an alternative hosting company with common sense. Lastly, no compensation was offered, not even one month of free hosting. All costs involved we must suffer as a company. How is this treatment possible in Germany???

name: Thomas
review_body: I have a cloud server on hetzner.de and everything works fine - Good uptime, good ping, and good prices! the server is very stable and the control panel is very useful. I'm very happy so far. Regards Thomas EDIT: - I have been a customer for some months now

name: Retly Hosting
review_header: Awesome quality with very affortable prices (Dedicated Servers)
review_body: I've been using Hetzner since January of 2022 and their service has been extremely good, specially compared to the one my last supplier provided. I was a bit scared about getting rejected (when creating the account) because of all the reviews, but I got approved, no problem. I have had some issues during these months (not many since their Robot machines are almost errorless), and they've been so much helpful. My customers have just been delighted with the service I'm able to provide thanks to Hetzner. The only "bad" aspect of dedicated servers in Hetzner is that there is non in the US, but that's a tiny inconvenient compared to the awesome service and price (other dedicated hosting suppliers usually have a 2x price at minimum for the same hardware). I plan to stick with Hetzner until my business dies, and I hope it will never die.

name: Mohamed Tarek
review_header: They are scaming people in tricky ways

review_body: One star is bigger than I want to give the company. I have two reasons to review the company: The first: poor support and their customer support is horrible and entirely unhelpful. The second: they don't care about your small business especially in the beginning and they charge me without give me full service as they describe. finally, they need just your money. I don't recommend Hetzner to anyone.

review_body: Complete waste of my time. They seem to be using outdated servers, many issues with our hard drives. Downtime is a nightmare. Stay away. Customer service is also not much helpful. They want to charge every little thing when doing rack setup.

name: Gahgooli
review_header: Use their service if you are desperate
review_body: First of all: They do not recognize that most of their customers are small businesses. and a small business means you are far from perfect. So it is very usual for a small business to make mistakes, or have faulty IT setups that lead to a bad IP reputation or even system hack. Instead of engaging with their customer, they only try to save their own ass and send this stupid emails saying "sorry we cannot give you any specific reason, but we are happy to immediately block your account. thank you for wasting your time and money here. come back if you are stupid or desperate enough". Absolutely no alert. Absolutely no engagement. Absolutely no transparency. We launched Zimbra email service on one of the servers. if was compromised and was sending spams. Hetzner immediately blocked the IP before informing us (they informed us using the email that they blocked and we could not access). and also locked the account for 1 month. we shut down the email server and moved to Zoho. but still no luck. they are happy to keep the account locked for 1 month. then they consider our request if they are in a good mood (literally). Hetzner, how much time do you need and how many bad reviews do you need to realize that your stupid abuse system is not working in your favor?

review_body: They canceled my placed order and deactivated my account for "some concerns we have regarding this information" But let me tell you, I'm so grateful that they deactivated my account, upon some research i found out they are a terrible company, and i feel lucky for not dealing with them! Thank you Hetzner for opening my eyes about how terrible a company you are

name: I fear nothing.
review_header: Change of policy without notice. Avoid.
review_body: Used to be perfect, but now they have extremely shady and non-transparent practices. Probably, some new management by a moody teenager. They don't even try to pretend they care. I have been customer for 7+ years. They sell servers with unlimited traffic. So we advertised our services on their servers with unlimited traffic. It happened that one of our services was using "a lot" of traffic, they sent a threat that we are abusing traffic and violating ToS and we might get banned if we don't reduce our usage. Please not it was only 1 server out of all my servers, in 7 years, that had a high traffic usage. Despite the lie of unlimited traffic, I clearly stated that a friendly notice would be enough and I am willing to reduce traffic usage. I started to reduce traffic usage after the message by 40% by adding a speed limit on my servers. Also, I was never asked to reduce traffic and refused it. When I asked, what solution they want me to do, they advised me to split services on more servers to balance things. So, I did, I ordered a new server to split things, but to my surprise my new order was not delivered for weeks and when I asked, I was told I am blacklisted from ordering. I explained the situation, but they choose to ignore further communication with me despite being willing to work things out with them in a friendly way. It is a bit painful after so many years for them to show 0 signs of caring about loyal customers. I feel bad and deceived for having recommended their services a lot in the last few years. Edit: unfortunately after the reply from Hetzner below, it seems Katie from Hetzner was curious about the issue as posted below and reached out to ask for my email. While I appreciate the attempt. but you say you don't want to talk it about it publicly "for privacy reasons", that's ok, but and when I contact your support privately they don't reply neither, you have been ignoring my emails for a while now. @hetzner/katie, you already have my email as provided few days ago, if you would like to help you can contact me it will be appreciated. Thanks Edit2 (26 sep): Finally, after a couple months of tickets back and fourth, I got an email from them informing me they removed the restrictions on my account. the trust in Hetzner is a bit broken, but still, it will make my life easier to have them on my list for serveral use-cases, naturally I will depend less on them from now on, or think twice before I buy, but at least I can use their services again.

name: Penkie
review_body: This is just great. The pricing is unbeated, it's hourly princing too so you don't have to pay in advance, and it's just works. 10 seconds to spin up a server as they say (it's actually less than that) is awesome too. I have no complain for the moment. I'll update my review if that change, but it's on a good run!

name: Olexander
review_body: Amazing customer service for years. Very cheap dedicated servers with new CPU models (like i9-12900K). I think Hetzner is the best hosting provider in Europe region

name: Long charmroeun
review_header: 2 days later after verify account got disable
review_body: After create account and verity, 2 days later my account was disable so i contact their support ASAP but their support answering me after a few days they said "We recently did some routine reviews of our customer accounts. We noticed some suspicious information in your account." and then i ask myseft what the hell is that why my information was got suspicious since i never use their service before but still luckily i didn't put production data in their otherwise haha, what do you think, bankruptcies is near ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

name: FD
review_header: Wont let me delete account and keeps charging
review_body: I started a startup in 2020 and my developer advised we use Hetzner services. As most startups, mine failed as well and I wanted to close my account at Hetzner. I made a mistake of closing the email address first which we used to sign up for Hetzner so I needed to request a new login from them. Hetzner didn't accept my details via email due to security reasons, so instead I had to print out, fill in by hand, scan and send back the same details in a random pdf document via email. Hetzner then managed to send the login details via snailmail to an incomplete address (so much for security). I had to reach out to them to mail it to the correct address. Once I could login again, I tried deleting the account but I was unable to as it said I still have active services running. I'm a non-technical person and the developer who worked with me is long gone so I had to reach out to Hetzner customer service again to ask where and what do I have to cancel. I followed the link they provided and closed whatever I found to be still active. I reached out to them for confirmation that everything's closed and whether I can delete my account now. They confirmed that there are no services running and I should receive one final invoice on 1 August 2022, then I should be able to delete the account. I received the invoice on 1 August, they charged my card on 2 August. On 9 August I went to their site to delete the account and guess what? I cannot because apparently I still have some active services running. So now I wonder if despite all my efforts to get rid of this scammy company will my card be charged again, for services I don't use and begging them to close for over a month. AVOID. Edit: The reply here doesn‚Äôt address my issue and they haven‚Äôt been answering my emails for over a week now but according to their website I still have active subscriptions. What a trash company, unbelievable.

review_body: Great service as always and very competitive pricing structures. Keep up the good work

name: Adrian
review_body: I'm their customer for more than 2 years. I've used both dedicated and cloud solution, no issues at all for me. Web panel easy to use, intuitive.

review_header: The best datacenter of the world
review_body: Excuse my poor English, but I can not let they without a greeting. Thank you a lot for your service. I am your partner since 2016 and always you give me a excelent service and today expecially I have a better solved issue from your team. thanks a lot!!!

name: Mark Roberts
review_header: Be very wary of charges after cancellation
review_body: I took out a small hosting plan with a domain for a possible project that did not take off. About 10 months later I cancelled the services. I then received notice saying that I hadn't transferred the domain out. I immediately contacted them and advised that I did not want it and they advised to log in and cancel the domain on their platform. I did this immediately. Today I receive notification of a bill for a renewed year despite the cancellation. There was not advance warning that the domain was about to be renewed - no contact from the company whatsoever. They did manage to send a notice when they have taken payment however. This is underhand. Having contacted their support, they provide no explanation for the lack of advance warning and just revert to their terms and conditions and state it is open-ended. Their business practices are deceitful at best and only notify the customer when it is to the benefit of the company itself. Best avoided. There are plenty of better services out there that are much more honourable. UPDATE: Having lodged a claim with my bank, I reviewed the dates of the service and the domain I have been charged for in July does not expire until November. Anyone with a domain with this company, please check your renewal dates urgently.

name: umbrellawaves
review_header: Great prices on cloud VPS. You get what you pay for.
review_body: Very cheap hosting on their cloud platform. Customer service is terrible and rented, dedicated servers have uptime issues, but the cloud VPS is a very stable product. Payments protip: Load several months/years of credit onto your account by overpaying an invoice via SEPA transfer to their IBAN account (list your account number, ask their customer support for more info). This will prevent you from running into payment issues if you have issues with your card payment as they'll just take money out of your "balance".

review_header: I feel really said that I found these‚Ä¶
review_body: I feel really said that I found these negative reviews so late. I have spent almost 2k EUR for server rent, and I wasn't very satisfy with it's performance, so I decided to cancel servers during first 14 days. That means they must refund my money back, no questions asked. But in reality they refusing to refund me back. They replied in my email that I need to open chargeback with my bank. Is this joke? Because my bank manager told me that in that case there will be 45 EUR dispute investigation fee and that it may take up to 10 business days to process my request. Basically, I feel that something really wrong is going on here. I am ready to start legal action, because I am absolutely sure that I don't need to waste my money to receive refund. Let's the authorities investigate it. That's not the way how to treat customers. Customer ID: K061820472 P.S Once I canceled server, they suspended my hetzner account, I am not even able to login into account. I believe this is on purpose, so I couldn't prove how much and when I paid?

As a result, not the SSH nor the emergency system work. I still get invoices (e.g.: Invoice R0016291404) despite asking for the cancellation of all products weeks ago. All payments are forced by debt collection agencies. I requested them to delete all my personal data immediately and permanently, but they made me run around in circles. For me, Hetzner is nothing more than an extortion company. I would never use them ever again.

review_body: Best Company to rent Dedicated Servers. I've been using Hetzner now for about 2 years with 100% uptime till now. I still suggest them to open a new DC other than in Germany like Singapore as we need points of presence and they are the only ones I trust the most!

review_header: Why i quit after two years using thier services.
review_body: I had an invoice of 45 euros and my card got billed 50 euros yet i still saw the invoice and they claimed they never billed my card when i contacted support. Support is very bad and very rude.

name: Joe Richards
review_header: Could kill everything you build at Hetzner at any time
review_body: Rejected account without reason. All details provided including mobile number, address, card which matched details. Got the classic: "After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us." Imagine if you had a whole cluster of essential services running at Hetzner and they just KILLED them all at once like that. Forget load balancers, forget backup servers, forget HA replication or virtualisation. You can't get away from the real danger: HETZNER ONLINE seem to be the single point of failure. I would avoid them like the plague and feel lucky to know straight off at the start about the danger our company could have faced being cancelled without any process, transparency or accountability. If you're actually planning to run business-critical services on these servers you'd be better off with a reliable company like Amazon Web Services, Azure, OVH, Vultr, DigitalOcean or Linode. Sure their servers seem cheap but can you afford to be cancelled with no notice or reason on same vague suspicion they have or might form at some stage? Wording on your website, an IP address you log in from, somebody looked funny at the person working in their "customer service" centre that morning and they decided to take it out on you?

name: William Nelson
review_header: Decent, could be better with abuse
review_body: Decent. I believe the VPS hosting has a lot of issues with bandwidth. It would randomly be super high CPU some days when my website wasn't getting any more requests than normal, leading me to believe they're not really monitoring what other people are doing causing bandwidth shortages. This makes sense, given I've heard a lot of stories about abuse by hetzner customers, and not much action being taken. I've personally reported several IPs for DDoSing my websites and get no response from their support. Other services provide more reliable VPS hosting, though hetzner is still decent.

name: TheDayson
review_header: What can I say after 1 month of using‚Ä¶
review_body: What can I say after 1 month of using hetzner (I take here 4 servers on amd 9 5950x and 1 on amd 5 3600). Pluses: Technical support is very fast and good. Best performance. Minuses: As for me, ddos protection should work 24/7, but on hetzner it does not work 24/7. As far as I understand, it is activated only with a long ddos, and this is a loss of 5-10 minutes of uptime. In general: Hetzner is a good hoster, but something needs to be solved with ddos protection. If Hetzner does it ddos protection 24/7, then it will simply have no competitors left. Do not ignore my request to make your protection 24/7 please.

Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us." Seriously? Without sharing any info? I am glad it happened because thats when I found reviews and such low rating. review_header: Don't even bother, just go elsewhere - I promise you'll thank me for it!
review_body: Looking at the other reviews, I can see why the company is now ranked so low. I created an account for my business and they closed it down on the first day while I was setting up my servers. When asking why they had done this, I was told that they couldn't share that information with me as it was private. Great help that is, right?! Judging from their customer service responses, I'm glad in a way that I haven't gone for this company. As a business owner, you need to trust in the companies and services that help power your business. This company certainly don't seem trustworthy and I would recommend you look into another supplier.

review_body: Canceled the service last year December after getting an incorrect configuration. I was unable to resolve it with Hetzner Online useless tech support, they were no help at all. It's May 2022 many months later... I am getting harassed by a bill collector, for a service I canceled many months ago. Stay far away from Hetzner Online.

review_header: They don't care about your data
review_body: Because of Hetzner.com, I lost the fruits of my work for several months because they just deleted my server without any notification or refund. I myself am from Russia and after the war started it was impossible to pay via PayPal, cards and other payment methods, so the server was transferred to a large reseller, where it was safely kept for two months. But because the prices there are unadequate (twice as high as the real ones) I asked a colleague from Ukraine to make an account and pay for the server, and I will transfer money to the crypto exchange for him. My colleague successfully registered, passed verification (there was no verification when I registered earlier), attached his bank card. I got an e-mail saying that my account was verified and everything was ok. I wrote to the reseller that I needed to transfer the server, he gave me the Robot key, I initiated the transfer and he confirmed it. At that point the server was up and running, was paid for 20 days in advance and nothing seemed to be going wrong. In the morning I couldn't connect to the server and I texted my colleague, to which he replied that he couldn't log in either. After contacting tech support it turned out that they deleted his account without explanation, and along with it the server. Called and the hotline, there is absolutely horrible tech support, who said to their faces that we do not care about your data, you violated the rules, but what we can not say, and we also deleted the server. In short, lost tens of thousands of dollars in information and code on this server, I recommend to bypass this office. They will delete all your servers without any reason, without the possibility of recovery, will hang up on the hotline, saying that they do not have time for you and they are very busy and so on. That's their customer service.

name: Lazar Sebastian Nicolae
review_body: I have been with Hetzner for two years and I had very minimal negative interaction with them. I own over 12 root servers from them and neither of those servers had me disappointed. Awesome prices, great bare metal experience and wonderful network speeds. Highly recommended if you need a lot of hardware resources for cheap.

name: Mateo G√≥mez-Plana
review_body: We use hetzner to run our cloud computing and so far, we are having a great experience. Great support and servers at affordable prices. That being said, the addition of a US location (for all of your services) would be appreciated by many of us. But the overall experience is great and we would highly recommend them to anybody in Europe.

name: Maisie Burges
review_body: Avoid at all costs. Omitting the current price hike from Eur28 to Eur40 (for some customers and not others) Hetzner is now trying to charge me for an extra month after cancelling my contract. The customer service is not really helpful either...

name: Bahman Pasha
review_header: Negative reviews make no sense to me
review_body: Negative reviews make no sense to me. Support is actually decent. I get responses to my emails within one hour. I can call them and they are patient and helpful. Hetzner is significantly better and cheaper than Bluehost and Siteground, BlueHost and Co are really bad since they charged me 13 dollars for a month, and the hosting by Hetzner is much better for just 2 dollars. I know the website and cPanel aren't as flashy as Siteground or Bluehost, but they work and I don't have to pay 13 dollars for the first year and 22 dollars the following year!

name: Akama Aka
review_body: Hetzner is one of the most poorly organized hosters I have ever seen. Also, their support is the worst I have ever experienced and yes. Their web hosting is way too overpriced even for the best subscription for these bad "benefits" and support.

name: Niklas
review_body: Disallow anything related to crypto currencies. Get out of the stone age Hetzner. Edit: I'm not talking about crypto currency payments. I was asked to leave Hetzner for running crypto currency related software (not mining) on the servers.

name: Dusan
review_header: SCAMMERS! ALERT! Do not buy their servers!
review_body: SCAMMERS! ALERT! Do not buy their servers! They suspended my servers, which I paid a lot without any warning! And deleted my account! I tried to buy it again and I cannot, this really needs to stop! Not to say their network sucks and they don't have any kind of Anti DDoS their server can easily go down with just a 2Gbps attack! Beware never buy servers here. They scam people around! Watch closely and be careful! Go to OVH Cloud (Best protection + Dedicated servers) or Contabo (Best price/performance ratio and value for money, I never had any issue). They are much much better.

name: Isaac B
review_body: They close your account and cancel any order for any reason. Not trust worthy

name: Ahmad Harb
review_body: I'm very happy to work with such service, their support is very nice and I ordered an item thinking it offers something that it didn't they refunded it very nicely not to mention their services are very good and fast, thank you so much. Happy to work with you.

name: D.G.
review_header: I am writing this review as I view this company with a lot of lack of respect to their customers and also which are trying to fraud anyone that comes into contact with them.
review_body: This is my experience with their customer service ... so far: I have tried to cancel my service with them prior to the end of the billing cycle, I was unable to find how to do that from my account so I have sent them an email with my request, and also explaining them that I was unable to find the cancelation option in their frontend. Instead of performing the cancellation request I have sent them they stated "helping" me with the secondary issue. I had made my request prior to any invoice being generated for the next cycle and at the end of that billing cycle, therefore by delaying the answer to my request their system invoiced me the next day. Although I have informed them of that, they declined to perform the cancellation of my service, and forced me to pay for that invoice so I can do the cancellation from their client area. I made sure I had remove any funds from that credit card, as I was sure they will try to withdraw that wrongfully payment, and I was right to do so as the next day I had received an message from them and from my bank that an withdrawal attempt has been made. Fortunate, we, me and Hetzner, are both located in Europe, and I will inform the authorities of this illegally procedure they are running. As in Europe all customers are protected by law for any online purchase for a longer period of time. If you intend to buy services from this company I would advise that you use an virtual credit card so that you can dispose of it in case you stumble upon this type of fraud. Also, If you are or had been in my situation I also advise you to alert the German authorities of consumer protection.

name: Lee Wisener
review_body: I have used Hetzner for well over a decade, excellent dedicated servers, amazing Cloud Service and great customer support. Highly recommended.

name: Paul
review_body: I've been with Hetzner for about a year now, using their CX21 cloud server and then rescaling to their CX31 offering. From a technical point of view, everything has been absolutely painless. The UI is clean and intuitive, and I appreciate the straight forward approach to their DNS offering. Their invoicing team is also great, sending extremely polite reminders on the few occasions that I've forgotten to pay the invoice in the first week. I've been using their services to host game servers, and performance has been phenomenal for my requirements - unless there are any major pricing or structure changes, I can't see myself ever using a different VPS provider.

name: epolit t
review_body: Stop war in Ukraine! No support ru

name: Grow ‚ÄúJack Cullins‚Äù T
review_body: Company keeps charging me and sending thread letters even after I cancelled everything over 2 months ago!!! STUPID SCAMMERS

name: Tanku≈ü
review_header: The best company I have worked for.
review_body: The best company I have worked for. The server infrastructure is great and hassle-free. technical support and response time is very very good. Wonderful...

name: Piers/Josef
review_header: Loss of competitiveness, attacked Ukrainian infrastructure during the Russian Invasion of Ukraine
review_body: Before I write about the negative aspects, I'll provide some positive points: - Excellent bandwidth availability - Traffic of over 30TB in a week without any complaints from Hetzner - Newly-added DDoS protection included free of charge - Reasonable customer support - Billing department helpful And now the reasons for the one star review: - With the unprovoked Russian Invasion of Ukraine, it would appear Hetzner has decided to side with the Russian regime. More information about Hetzner's unwarranted and unexplained attack on important Ukrainian infrastructure has been provided by the Ukrainian Government. As links are not allowed on this platform, please search for "german-hosting-provider-hetzner-online-gmbh-blocks-access-ukraines-key-online-platform-which-provides-information-international-community-about-russias-invasion-ukraine" to read a statement by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine. Had Hetzner not given the impression it sides with Russia through its actions, I would have left a 3* review. - Sudden price increases with little notice, claiming it's due to increased energy costs (which I understand and the increases aren't terrible), but then simultaneously running very expensive new advertising campaigns on multiple YouTube channels and with large 'creators' (10m+ subs). That sends entirely the wrong message. - OVH - a much larger company with sub-brands - is now more competitive than Heztner. - Some of those who have complained to Hetzner have reported (with verification/proof) horror stories of their experience, including Hetzner wiping their servers without notice. This is not an acceptable way to run a datacentre/company.

name: John
review_body: Happy to destroy a company by deleing servers without warning, I had even made partial payment before the invoices had been created. accused me of "suspicious information" even though their third-party ID verification company had been provided my ID and selfie photo. In discussion with view of taking legal action and reporting actions to the EU business conduct regulator **** Update ****** In the reply, Hetzner stated a possible fake account even though their ID verification company received my ID and a live selfie to verify the ID. How can an ID be fake if they have received a live selfie via the verification app and a photo of the ID showing the same person?

name: Darius
review_body: Good performance on CPX servers. Would recommend.

name: Matt
review_header: I WAS a customer at Hetzner.
review_body: I am a customer at Hetzner. I use their ROOT servers and Windows licensing. Support is phenomenal and their services are top tier for any business or a private person. ** THIS WAS A 5 STAR REVIEW ** After some time my server started to get DDOS-ed, I ask their network team to block access to the IPs (I sent them a list of 1.5k+ IPs and WireShark logs) to which they responded "it's impossible to block that many IPs". They also responded in their email to me that "we don't offer a permanent ddos mitigation to our customer. We only offer a ddos protection when a big attack is going on your server." which was infuriating, they don't mention this on their website. What this means pretty much is that if someone was to DDOS you, they need to send a huge number of smaller packets to kill the connection to your server - Hetzner "anti DDOS" will NOT pick that up and you are left to deal with this yourself (their network team told me to install a 3rd party solution on a Windows server to mitigate this), their "anti-DDOS" is very trivial and will only pick up "big attacks". I can recommend Hetzner ONLY IF: - You are hosting websites behind CloudFlare and your IP NEVER EVER gets leaked to public - Small personal projects - If you have money to set up a Linux box as a load balancer with NGINX and make your other servers work through that load balancer (if you are worried about DDOS) I do NOT RECOMMEND them for game server hosting if your only option is one server with them and you can't set up load balancing / iptables.

name: Alex
review_body: Not reliable! Canceling contracts without any explanations. The company supports Russia and the war in Ukraine!

name: Andrii
review_body: This service decided to require from Ukrainian users an upfront 3-month payment for their services. This goes against the policy that they have for customers from other countries. Such moves shows that they arw at least not customer friendly, and at most support war by making money on customers in need.

name: Vadim Rozov
review_body: Hetzner officially supports russia invasion of Ukraine. Don't recommend their services with blood on the hands!

name: Anton Zotov
review_header: Due to the Russian invasion to Ukraine
review_body: Due to the Russian invasion to Ukraine, Ukrainian companies are required to pay for their services in advance. Blatant cynicism

name: Slava Ukraini
review_body: Taking down war.ukraine.ua website without explanation,side by side with a war criminal DON'T TRUST THIS COMPANY

name: Roman
review_header: Two disks broke and all my sites‚Ä¶
review_body: Two disks broke and all my sites stopped working. I had to hire third-party specialists to diagnose it. Tech support didn't even want to see what was wrong with my server. Until I sent them proof that two disks were broken, they did nothing. Because of this, all my sites have been down for several days.

name: modir host
review_body: Poor Support . They lock ip server and i send request to unlock ip but after 4 days I did not receive a response !!!!

name: Madeleine
review_body: I have just tested the Service recently, I am satisfied so far, fast technical support which I did not see from my former Suppliers (...). I hope it will continue like this in the days and months to come. Good continuation to all the Support Team

name: Isac
review_header: With Hetzner for over 3 years now‚Ä¶
review_body: I've been using Hetzner services for app development for over 3 years now and never had issues. Uptime is solid and there are real people behind customer support!

name: Olsi Shehu
review_body: Worst service I've ever experienced from a hosting provider. Even though I had purchased an expensive cloud hosting from their company, I was not allowed to use mail service. I had no explanation for the reason! I would never suggest this company to anyone!

name: Love Crypto
review_body: Excellent in Service & Performance Have been Hetzner happy customer for seven months now. Hetzner has been responsive to any issues I have had and resolved them 100% in timely manner. I can recommend Hetzner service with full confidence !

name: coole nataphum
review_header: Do not buy servers from hetzner
review_body: I have buy here a server en after 2 days my account get closed en my servers deleted. And al lost al of my data.

name: SecurityJunky
review_body: Hello, I first got myself a 5TB storage box. (In the end, it will probably amount to 10TB). Actually incredible how cheap this is offered. I use it as a pure backup of my NAS. Especially the different protocols have convinced me. I also just wanted the storage. No front-end, no sharing, no nothing. Perfect. The only thing that almost made me cancel the box and order a new one is the fact that "rm -rf folderName" is not allowed. In the end, I was able to use FileZilla to delete the test data in just about acceptable time. My solution now is to take a snapshot at the very beginning. Should I want to start from scratch again, I can quickly "reset" the box. Recursive deletion would still be another plus (or did I miss something there?). I can blindly recommend the box to anyone who needs a pure backup or storage expansion of a server. I use it on a Synology NAS with Syncovery, Hyper Backup (both encrypted or not depending on the data), MacBook Air 2020 as a pure additional drive and small backup of important data using Syncovery (encrypted), as on the iPhone in Files (with FE File Explorer) and Koder. For me the perfect solution.

name: Mohammad Idlbi
review_header: Bad way of working. usurpation of our rights
review_body: I have been dealing with them for three years ago on the first day they shut down one of them under the pretext of violating property rights and on the next day they closed all the servers without warning and this caused great harm to us as our work and our clients stopped completely suddenly and they did not accept reopening the servers at all except from the console Which in fact can not be used practically because of its complexity What is also annoying is that they send me a bill and insist on withdrawing money from the bank card

name: Thomas
review_body: Service has been nothing but outstanding, maybe not best price to performance, but extremely good for managing a couple small independent servers for a node network setup, I do wish there was some UK Servers (Where i reside) but i have had good results with their Falkenstein based servers. Been using the service for roughly a month now. Keep up the great work guys! :)

name: Matt
review_header: I understand that when buying dedicated‚Ä¶
review_body: I understand that when buying dedicated servers, the onus is totally on you to know what you are doing and I 100% get that. However‚Ä¶ have being a customer of a very big competitor with 3-letters in their name for a very long time, I sadly had to ask for a refund, due to the hardware not being as advertised‚Ä¶. I am fighting that case as we speak‚Ä¶ I went over to the Hetzner site that I had bought before maybe 10 years back and the value for money now is unbelievable‚Ä¶. Sure, I didn‚Äôt want to leave the ‚Äúother‚Äù company just because of cash, it was more out of principle, but these specs and prices were insane. So I decided to speak to the web chat people at Hetzner as most companies dont list exact hardware like disk makes/models as they change‚Ä¶ and this is really a big issue for me if I get something not suitable. The guy was the most helpful guy ive dealt with in this field. I spoke to him for a good 30 mins asking about what disk / models are in each server, discussing PCI Gen 3 / Gen 4 in servers and many more things other companies support desks couldn‚Äôt even tell me. I have since bought a server and the performance is amazing, the networks are amazing and i love the imageinstaller from the network rescue disk and how much you can config your own partitions etc. Obviously I haven‚Äôt used support yet‚Ä¶ but in 20 years of running my own dedicated servers I only use support when there is a hardware issue or something is down in their network‚Ä¶ Or in a recent case, the company sold me pc/laptops disks and (not Hetzner) said were server disks. I hope I don‚Äôt need to use support anyway, but all i can say was website pre-sales was best I have ever had‚Ä¶ Server was delivered in maybe 3 minutes and price/performance beats all over company‚Äôs ive been looking at. ******* 3 Month Update ******** As I hoped I haven‚Äôt had to contact support about any issues. The hardware is rock solid and to be frank unreal spec and the network is super fast. I‚Äôm a bit of an IT nerd/lover so am always testing / benchmarking and the network/hardware network is literally is always 950mb/sec ++ both ways in real life tests‚Ä¶. which as the cards will never run much above that due to the network cards/cables etc‚Ä¶ To me it says that when Hetzner tell you you get 1GB dedicated connection WAN and They actually deliver this. 5 stars again

name: Rodrigo
review_header: Smooth customer experience and helpful when need
review_body: I have been a Hetzner customer for 18 months and I just want to say that everything has been running very smoothly from the beginning. Granted, I am a "simple customer" and I have simple needs, but everything just works and customer service was very responsive and helpful all the time.

name: Mark S
review_header: 10 year SaaS company.. instantly closed account without explanation
review_body: We're a SaaS company. Been in business for over 10 years. Never had a complain or issue.. ever. Signed up for an account to see if we might be interested in using Hetzner. I supplied all of our corporate formation documents and certificate of good standing. After documents were "reviewed", this was the response we got.. with ZERO explanation and no follow-up for any information. Dear Mr xxxxxx, After reviewing your updated customer information, we have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information. Therefore, we have cancelled all your existing products and orders with us. Best regards Your Hetzner Online Team .. because of "some concerns". I replied... "what are your concerns???" They NEVER asked for any clarifications or additional documentation. Just closed the account and that was that.

name: Turtle Sandals
review_header: Listen to all the reviews and don't use‚Ä¶
review_body: Listen to all the reviews and don't use this scammy service. I've had no projects and they've been sending payments to collection. I ended up paying so they wouldn't annoy me then a month later they send me another one. This one wasn't even in my account invoices. Scammy company. Please listen to the reviews and stay away. Please.

name: Mike
review_header: Highly recommended: reliable, inexpensive and "just works".
review_body: I am surprised by the negative reviews of Hetzner. I do understand that some people may have an unfortunate experience but thought I would offer some balance. I've been using the Hetzner Cloud service for almost two years and I've been very pleased with the quality of the service. The price for a small VPS is excellent, performance has been good and my servers have never gone down. Having had experience of numerous problems with other cheap providers, my experience with Hetzner has been perfect. I haven't had any need for support so can't comment on that, but the overall experience has been great and I can recommend them highly.

name: Jack Foster
review_header: How come they do fake excuse and damage‚Ä¶
review_body: How come they do fake excuse and damage our business like that way! Increase price, this is total BS explanation. Contabo never increase price. All of our clients migrated to conabo because of hetzner scam. Now they want to provide free setup for ex,ax server. But who will pay for the IP setup pricing. This is one of the biggest scam they have done. Now people will move to contabo for their insane activities. No one will pay for 10-12 years old cpu garbage with price hike. Nightmare experience with them.

name: Iliyan Dobrev
review_body: I love Hetzner, I have been using them over 10 years and they consistently deliver good services. Recently I discovered that they have been misrepresenting, in effect cheating, by misstating the RAM they provide on their Cloud offering - that is, where they state 8GB, they mean 8000MB - which of course is not equal, as 8GB=8192MB. I raised this with their support, where they arrogantly brushed me off and confirmed that while stating GB on their pricing list they in fact mean GiB. Shame on you Hetzner - own up and fix the misprint!

name: –û–ª–µ–≥ –î—É—Ö–æ–≤–Ω—ã–π
review_header: Their cloud servers do have 25 and 465‚Ä¶
review_body: Their cloud servers do have 25 and 465 closed and they refuse to open them. So you will be unable to send e-mail from your website.

name: Shan Yousaf Khan
review_header: We did cancel acount on hetzner but‚Ä¶
review_body: We did cancel acount on hetzner but they wont admit that we did that. they did not send us any bills but sent to dept collector and wont cancel the payment. we did close our deal few months ago because they cant handle ddos attacks!

name: Chuck Cavalera
review_header: Had a big (for me) problem when server‚Ä¶
review_body: Had a big (for me) problem when server got offline. First thing to try is to order KVM but it shows no video signal. I was told by Hetzner that fault may be caused by raid controller or mb. Then confirmed possible dataloss (I didnt had any other choice to try to bring server up). For my luck, replacing mb brought me to life. And Datacenter team was very rapid. Hetzner - thanks! Wish a reliable hw to all!

name: Customer
review_body: So far I've been impressed by the price/performance ratio of products that Hetzner offers. I can't comment on the quality of their customer support, but so far I haven't had any negative experiences with them.

name: Seyfettin Gokalp ITportal
review_header: Excellent Hosting Service - excellent quality/price ratio.
review_body: I have been providing hosting services to my customers since 2003. Hosting can be a real headache if you are not working with the right provider! Hetzner is a serious hosting company, and its quality/price ratio is excellent! Be careful when you work with them, no spam, no mess with the system, pay your bill in time, you will get fantastic quality and service for the best prices! They have also great and very clear documentation for almost their every service. Highly recommend them for cloud or dedicated services.

name: Gon√ßalo Gomes
review_header: Will delete your data at the first opportunity
review_body: Long story short, hetzner cancelled my contract following 2 months of unpaid bills and my data was subsequently deleted. Why did this happen? My credit card was compromised in an online scam, my bank issued a new one, which caused Hetzner to try for 2 months to issue payment on an old and no longer working card. As luck would have it, hetzner does not try to contact you by any form other than email, further to this situation, I had the hetzner emails being redirected to a specific folder due to their marketing spam, which culminated in me missing the notifications. Further to this horrible situation, When I contacted accounts to resolve the outstanding payments, the lady I spoke to on the phone showed zero sympathy to the fact I had lost data and was clearly disappointed, even pointing out how I had outstanding bills I should have paid, despite the fact I explained how I would have sorted it on day one had I read the emails or been notified any other way.

name: Scotspaul
review_body: I have 3 servers with this company but alas customer service is absolutly appauling. The way they speak to customers im surprised they are in business. Unfortunatly 2 of my servers are with a hosting company or i would move away Looking for alternatives Look at their reply, instead of offering help its just good luck. IF you worked for me id fire you. Anyone wishing hosting with that kind of support then good luck. I didnt give my account details for fear of having my account deleted.

name: Albert Ionut
review_header: This company has a super old mindset
review_body: This company has a super old mindset, apparently, the owner is 80 years old. The whole interface is, to put it mildly, old, it's from 2000. Each plan is quite limited as a function of the money that is paid.

name: YusufYaser
review_body: Very amazing and cheap servers. Hetzner is reliable and I recommend you using them. The only downside is the DDoS protection, it needs some improvement.

name: Kim Roger S√∏rensen
review_header: I wanted to order a server but then my‚Ä¶
review_body: I wanted to order a server but then my account got rejected. I didn't even have time to supply the verification step so they could see that I am real and want to use their service. I am trying to get connected with them so I can have a server to them cause they were cheaper than another hoster I use. Hetzner if you see this please contact me so I can be a customer to you guys. The bad rating will be changed if you guys help me. Edit i got registered again but awaiting to rent a server. Will update later.

name: kasra Jalilian
review_body: Best price and performance. Thanks for the great service.

name: Yuriy Burda
review_header: Account was disabled after sending passport photo
review_body: After sending my personal passport to verify identity my account was disabled, they can`t explain even why.. Update: But I think Hetzner have best servers on auction, so i don't need another provider :)

name: JAL74
review_body: After creating my account, Hetzner have decide to deactivate it without any explanation. I think that this company is not serious at all.

name: Tyler Jenkins
review_header: Absolutely braindead company with equally incompetent staff.
review_body: Our server was purchased through an external provider who collaborated with Hetzner. Over the past 2-3 weeks, our server has been offline. Through our provider, we were able to find out that some random dude called Hetzner, asked them to change all of the credentials, to wipe the machine, and then to also delete all backups of the machine. Without any authorization. For some stupid reason, a braindead customer service rep completely broke security protocol and authorized everything without HAVING AUTHENTICATED ANY CREDENTIALS. THIS TOOK A WEEK TO FIND OUT. THE NEXT WEEK WAS SPENT WAITING FOR HETZNER TO ACTUALLY PROVIDE ANY FOLLOWUP WHICH THEY FAILED TO DO. They had to be poked and prodded only to say "It's been escalated" in response. In present day, I have NONE of my data, NO backups to restore to, NO access to the machine, AND RECEIVED ZERO COMPENSATION, because Hetzner STRAIGHT UP REFUSES TO PAY FOR AN ACCIDENT THAT ONE OF THEIR ABSOLUTELY STUPID, NO-LIFE EMPLOYEES CREATED. I am INCREDIBLY angry, I DO NOT recommend this service, and I hope Hetzner sees this and reviews this incident so that they DO NOT REPEAT IT. Additionally, I hope the service rep who caused this whole fiasco steps on a Lego brick so hard that it becomes PERMANENTLY LODGED in their foot. Screw you, Hetzner, screw you random guy, and screw you stupid customer service agent. E: "What issue? I see no issue here!" is what I would say if I did not wish to disclose the glaring security vulnerability. Here's the thing, Katie; your security team has no idea what happened because it NEVER WENT THROUGH THEIR HANDS. It was some random customer service agent who completely broke protocol. There was NO SECURITY TEAM INVOLVED and THAT is the issue. Regardless of that, the server is not under my name. Our provider had to deal with WEEKS of escalations. Multiple times we were told that Hetzner has "no clue what happened" until 2 weeks later someone finally spilled the beans. It is great that your security team "couldn't find anything", but if you read the review, it should be very obvious that I & my friend (whose name the server is under) both knew that already. There is no silly Uno Reverse card to pull out of your ass. This is your issue, an agent failed to follow protocol, and now I have NO DATA, NO BACKUPS, and NO COMPENSATION. Even if it was a provider fault, I still have received NOTHING but refusal on your end to admit the problem and act accordingly. I look forward to seeing how you respond to this. It better be good.

name: Tilak
review_body: I am using hetzner shared hosting and my site gets traffic between 1000-1200 every day, Neither does it go up nor down. I am getting this limited traffic for the last 5 months, if I get more traffic in one hour, I get less in the next hour and make a balance till midnight(1K to 1.2K). Why does it happen? (I) Because the shared server sends limited traffic? (II) Should I have to move to another hosting plan? (III) OR the keyword on my site has limited search volume?

name: timy_g
review_body: Love Hetzner, Great Price to performance, Great Support, They reply within minutes or hours and kind staff! Very simple dashboard and more! Been using for 7 months or something

name: BB
review_body: They allow their customers to send spam and refuse to investigate. When this is reported to them, they are rude & unhelpful. Disappointing. Stay away. UPDATE: In their response to my review, Hetzner are pretending it's just a "backlog". This is incorrect. They have already processed the abuse reports sent to them and have refused to take action.

name: Filip F
review_header: HETZNER - Probably one of the best cloud hostings for the price
review_body: I switched from noez.de (avoid them) and was looking for another budget hosting. I remembered I have seen HETZNER before and decided to give it a go. So far, it has been outstanding. My tickets get resolved quickly, replies arrive few minutes or hours later, even on weekends or evenings. The dashboard is very clean looking, I would say it is the easiest I have ever used, while still having most of the features you will ever need. From what I heard, they are really strict on accepting new customers, but I did not experience any issues with that, but hopefully, they can adjust their automatic fake account detection in the future and avoid like 95% of the negative reviews they receive. I did not experience any attacks on my site, so I cannot comment on the protection and I do not break their rules, so I am not sure how quickly they terminate these malicious users, as many here try to defend themselves.

name: Drawrgon
review_body: Servers run good with few issues. Support is quick and mostly friendly. Traffic is unlimited, connection and speeds to the outside world are very good. Only negative is that they take automated "DMCA" notices from certain (troll-)companies very seriously and will have you to respond to them within 24 hours. Usually no issues with IPs being on blocklists.

name: Travis Newton
review_header: The WORST provider I have ever used!
review_body: A few days ago, I receive an abuse complaint from Hetzner. I quickly took care of my problem customer and Hetzner wanted a statement of what I did. I told them that a customer snuck though our fraud checks and they have been terminated and we have submitted their info to our fraud vendors. Never received a response back. I got another email a couple days later saying they never heard from me? Check your abuse replies!! And today they locked my account! Absolutely terrible and I‚Äôve never been treated so poorly by a provider. Now they‚Äôre bringing their terrible service to the US. Do not trust or use Hetzner!

name: Anton
review_header: I do not recommend this company
review_body: I do not recommend this company to anyone. They do not allow to create an account, and request your ID, and after they receive it, they send you automatically generated response that you are suspicious and block your account. I am 100% sure that before requesting your identity document, they ALREADY know that your account will not be opened. So they collect your identities for purposes that can only be guessed at ... So be careful with them. I read your responses to previously posted and I am surprised at your impudence, how you write without a shadow of shame on your face that, quote: "Yes, there are some countries that are "risky" countries" (--Katie, Marketing, Hetzner Online) Hey, hasn't history taught you anything? I always believed there are no suspicious or risky countries. There are suspicious and risky companies, like your one, that are trying to divide people per countries again and collecting identities only God knows for what purposes. Your "Katie" also answered to someone: "And let's say 8 of those people are so angry about it, they write a review here on Trustpilot. That makes our Trustpiolog page look pretty bad over time. But what people on Trustpilot don't see are the hundreds of actually fake accounts that we catch, and how much crime and abuse that prevents." Come on, take look at your ranking it is right now 3.4 of 5 stars. Also I would like to tell you that houndreds of angry people exist, but they do not want to spend their time because of 20-30 miserable euros, our time costs much more, people better go to DigitalOcean or Contabo and will buy VPS there, how for example I did. People, respect yourself, and beware of this company from good and non risky country... Today they ask for ID from those who are from "risky" country, and tomorrow they will ask your wearing a black or yellow ¬´winkel¬ª over your clothes.

name: Nebojsa Novic
review_header: I use Hetzner for more then 5 years now‚Ä¶
review_body: I use Hetzner for more then 5 years now for production and staging servers. They do not provide dedicated resources by specification. Right now during BF all of my staging servers are unreachable. Production servers are barely managing to work. All CPUs are 100%. They just can not provide resources you pay for.

name: Contact CentarNIT
review_header: I've been a loyal customer of Hetzner‚Ä¶
review_body: I've been a loyal customer of Hetzner for years. When I founded my own agency, I have Hetzner our business and that of our clients. Still, I continue to be disappointed time and time again by them. I asked them multiple times through this year for specific things like disabling or downgrading a specific service, they don't respond and just kept billing, very unprofessional, they didn't refund any of the charges that they have made and kept taking away illegitimately our money. This is the worst practice, they are reliable as a hosting but not for your money, terrible support, they don't know how to handle businesses and you will have issues if anything comes up.

name: Luk√°≈° Rafaj
review_body: Bad experience from the start. I'm using many server providers all around the world and never had any problems, some friends of mine recommended Hetzner as a solid provider running on renewable energy. My account was blocked right after I've uploaded my ID. No explanation from Hetzner, only that the account is suspicions. No feedback from their customer service that is not replying emails, when you call them they only say send the e-mail and when you do, nobody replies. I wanted to find what the problem is with my account and find a solution, provide any other document, or anything they need, but nobody was willing to help. Not recommended! Edit on Hetzner reply: It seems that many real people were blocked too. From what I've seen I think you block people from specific countries and this is a very weird behavior. And whatever you want to explain here, the level of communication is very bad, nobody willing to help or answer. Dear potential customers, avoid this company and their behavior. I'm a EU citizen and never experienced such treatment. I would be afraid they could even immediately shut down all your servers in a single day if someone re-review your account and find it suspicions for no reason. The overall rating here should be definitely much lower.

name: Laurentiu
review_body: 5 stars for performance, resources and price. BUT I'm willing to give 10 stars if they will introduce cPanel with / or nginx/varnish by default, to their shared hosting and managed servers

review_body: Reliable VPS within the EU and competitive prices.

name: Blake Shepherd
review_header: stupid pricing for ip's not even worth‚Ä¶
review_body: stupid pricing for ip's not even worth looking at them as a provider anymore

name: Andrei Simionescu
review_body: Blatantly ignored customer emails. I made an order by mistake and _immediately_ emailed them to cancel it (as they say you can in the order confirmation email). Next day, they went ahead with the order, then after a few hours emailed me to say that I can go fork myself -- joking, of course, but they might as well have, as they told me to just use the UI and they completely ignored my request for account deletion as per GDPR (as I'm a EU citizen). So yeah, I'm sticking with DigitalOcean, it's not worth putting up with German customer support.

review_header: Hetzner was a challenge for me and a‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner was a challenge for me and a step forward in professional and personal terms. It had the server at Contabo and had many problems with the delivery of emails, due to Contabo's IPs being associated with SPAM. Upon arriving at Contabo, everything was different, more demanding and this requirement is not always to our liking, but after this bureaucracy that exists to protect us and after having the server up and running, I have peace again with myself, my emails customers were arriving at their destinations. Now it's time to embrace another challenge and upgrade the server.

review_header: After been approved and verified by‚Ä¶

My only irregularity was that my name was not German. This really was a experience of discrimination that I couldn't manage and made me to write this review. They wasted my time first by approving my account, then by disabling it after I transferred my data. And all without giving me any reasons for the disabled account, except that they think I am a scammer. Their immature and unprofessional and uncivilized treatment made me feel very bad. Yesterday I sent in my application for changing my name. It is unacceptable to make others feel guilty about their being. In every court of law in every democratic country, this is not allowed.

review_body: Bad expierence with hetzner and setting up virtualizor. You cannot setup ipv6 vps's without being spammed about mac address abuse. But using them for game servers is fine. They could improve their ddos protection as well.

review_body: Their payment request went into email spam, so my payment was delayed by 3 days, they deleted the server were my website was and they told me that the server was impossible to restore, so they wasted all my work, not a great service.

name: Roland
review_body: Dear Hetzner, I have a service for you a vps or Dedicated Server service with you and a few other providers. (hetzner.com, atw.hu, ovh.com) Unfortunately, the protection of contabo and yours ddos ‚Äã‚Äãis very poor. We run game servers on the leased service and a $ 10 booter can completely shut down the system. Be it minecraft, fivem, mtasa, csgo or web server, unfortunately you and hetzner are not properly protected. They get 2 stars because the prices are good and the hardware is what they provide. I think if you don't have an advanced DDoS protection at a service provider, you shouldn't indicate that you have it, because with so much power on a 10-line iptables that filters packets you could already say you have DDoS protection (With poetic exaggeration). I think this is completely misleading the buyer. It would be better for you to buy packages from different DDoS stresser sites and test them on various services such as game servers. You have recently (about 1-2 weeks) had a phenomenon where we have been attacked by a small amount of DDoS on our server and are still being blamed for not setting up adequate protection. A small amount of DDoS attacks hit our machine and there were hours of downtime due to it. Ready to joke. Then don‚Äôt write that you have protection because it‚Äôs a very rudimentary something. We used to leave you with 400-600 euros, but all the machines had to be moved due to inadequate protection. So only the backup storage machine is left there, but if that doesn't change it will also go into the soup. They lose a lot of customers because of this. Why not develop advanced ddos protection which would cost + per month but provide normal protection? I hope there will be a change in the near future. Thanks Roland

review_body: Best dedicated servers. I am using multiple servers and they are great in performance. Also the support is quick and very good. Thanks

name: Tee Han Ming
review_body: Man, I just love this company. You use first then pay at the end of the month. Isn't that awesome? You could test everything first and make sure everything is set up correctly and make sure you have the server that you need. Most other companies are like.. "MEH PAY ME MONEY FOR 12 MONTHS THEN U CAN TRY" and then you realise the server suck. Not with this company :D

name: Jeff
review_header: Horrible Billing, Horrible Staff, Horrible Network
review_body: One day I could no longer log into hetzner. Reset password? Nadda. Contact support? You must do it from the customer panel you can not log into. Needless to say you cannot cancel the product. However Hetzner will keep billing your dedicated servers for 45-60 days after your due date. HEck. They turn you off on roughly day 45 apparently and bill you for 60. Every other webhost terminates service after 5 days max and begins the recycle process. Not these guys, they keep denying you access to the portal, continue to bill you, and then send a collections company after you. OH and the best part? The collections company wants about 25% more, they have some horrible exchange currency fees. They do claim the service is post-paid which is odd, because when you order, it collects your money up front. So in reality, the service is pre-paid but they always tack on an extra month of profit to cancellations. Extremely shady, but as a US citizen, I can find not any entity in Germany that will take a complaint because I am not a germen citizen. Now that I finished my billing rant. The network sucks, it is slow, you MIGHT see 50 mbps on the 1G connection, but don;t hold your breath. you often see 1-10 mbps. Support however says all is fine. UPDATE:9/13/21 Hetzner responded to my email and they demanded payment VIA Wire transfer only. So I need to spend $50 to send then $72. The funny part is their number is still not matching the collections agency which is over $100. This is a real SCAM here.

review_body: I recommend this hosting it's the best so far

review_body: All our client's eCommerce sites are on Hetzner. For us, it's the hosting provider that offers the best quality /price ratio.

The customer support is horrendous they only want you to pay, even though you didn't use the service. Totally not recommending this provider.

name: Customer
review_body: Won't consider the situation and evidence provided. Just pro-forma answers and protocol; "go to the back of the queue and wait two weeks." Well... have you noticed there are plenty of providers outside? Maybe I don't need to wait two weeks for your process to be pleased. Just think how they will threat you once you have ten servers with them and moving out will cost you a lot more than when you are just starting with them ... Comment to your feedback: spammers will open dormant accounts leave them doing something trivial, and use them later ... your policy of not accepting legitimate people, not letting them "prove" that they are "good people" (do I have to do that? prove that I am innocent?) and sticking to "Daz Rulez" is retrograde and out of touch with todays times. The next provider accepted me without this stupidity. Ah, and your firewall keeps blocking false positives. Bad network. Not a good product overall.

name: a user
review_body: very annoying price increases. Take Care if you plan to extend your hosting at hetzner, price increase by 100% for fees (servers, installation, subnets) in just some days, makes it not plannable to stay there. may you should rethink this again. (ax servers e.g) As you refer on ip4 subnets - whats their connection to mining? and also you can prevent mining on your hosts another way than this. E.G a short-time fee which users get's back if they use the server for more than 3-4 Months - i guess this should also shrink down miners, why should the rest suffer from those?

review_body: Good hoster with a nice cloud panel, price & uptime.

name: andreia macedo
review_body: Very bad... I got rejected after I send my id card and credit card details.. dangerous company.

name: Cuban Numis
review_header: Won't allow raising limits if your project has anything to do with "Blockchain"
review_body: This company does not know the difference between mining crypto and running a blockchain application that only uses the blockchain to register transactions. They automatically assume you are mining and won't allow you to raise your limits. Their customer service is also horrible. Any request will take hours as they only respond by email. Therefore, if something goes wrong with your server, you'll be down for a while. Considering blockchain is the future, this company won't be around long.

name: Marius B
review_body: Awesome provider! They only get better as the years pass! Their network now is honestly A+ for how little you pay!

name: Mihai Bucica
review_body: I thought I am the only one that got my account/servers closed 2 days after opening causing me loss of data and revenue! No mail ! No phone ! No warning ! Nothing ! The servers been powered down ...account closed ! When I ve discovered I ve call them by phone and they say can't speak the "issue" by phone ...and I ve should send them an email !!! WAW ! ...my servers are down and they can't speak the "issue" by phone?! Some hours later somebody from them sended to me an email with the copy/paste response they keep sending to everybody: "We recently did some routine reviews of our customer accounts. We noticed some suspicious information in your account. We have some concerns regarding this information and we have decided to close your account. We do not share details about why certain accounts appear suspicious. Publishing this information would make it easier for people to create fake accounts and abuse our services." For my account there are 2 possibility for closing : A) I am from Romania and they are just racist. B) They advertise for the product i buy to give 20 TB of free OUT bandwidth per month ( bcs IN traffic is free ) and it makes sense from a business perspective to just kill all the VPS servers that are going to use it all in a month The ideal client for them its the one that buys resources and dont use it . I was going to use all the 20 TB of out traffic and they could see it easy. There are so many other reviews like mine on internet. If you are ok with your account/servers being closed down without warning then buy Hetzner! Otherwise DON'T !

name: And_WRS
review_body: Until now I had a good opinion about the company, but yesterday's failure lasting about 24h showed a lot of incompetence on your part. Vague and selective (not informing about all the failures) messages on the status page, besides, lack of any communication from your side. It is the weekend, your network is down for almost 24 hours and you don't give a damn. Many of your customers were tearing their hair out, but what the hell, it's the weekend - time to relax at the lake. I am really disappointed with you, not to mention the fact that I lost a lot of money because of your network not working.

name: Quynh Nguyen
