review_body: Review Update: It took a few weeks but the hosting company has finally taken down the infringing material. Thank you for your attention to this important matter.

name: Luk√°≈° Antonick√Ω

name: SB
review_header: Avoid Hetzner Online.- Bad and very disappointed with the service‚Ä¶
review_body: I am very disappointed with the service and the people. Of course, they will reply with their standard "damage control" statements here. However, if you look at the reviews, it is almost fifty/fifty. I am guessing the good reviews are written by themselves. I strongly agree with all the comments made by others about their service at Trustpilot. There are plenty of other services which are really delivering what they promise.

name: Laur
review_body: Good services. Also fast and excellent support. Never let me down.

name: ZB
review_header: In my opinion the best cloud platform
review_body: In my opinion the best cloud platform. Superb performance, excellent network, best price/performance and a featue-rich platform. Only downside which you have to take into consideration is their DDoS protection. It is practically non-existence against sophisticated attacks. Against simple attacks it'll do fine, but you have a very slow detection time. Wish they improved it to match OVH Anti DDoS performance, but unfortunately it doesn't even come close to that. Other then that, there's nothing 'bad' to say about Hetzner.

name: qais ammari
review_body: Hetzner banned my account after verified by paypal and paid 20 eur and banned me next day without any reason, and after contact with support this message i received " We have some concerns regarding this information and we have decided to close your account. We do not share details about why certain accounts appear suspicious. Publishing this information would make it easier for people to create fake accounts and abuse our services." i didn't get warning, no email, how can big company like hetzner do that with the customer? my account id : K0774981321

Hetzner is awesome and so good ------------------------------------------------- Hetzner is easy and fast to operate, I like it very much, but there are no free snapshots. name: Niclas
review_body: The more features I try, the more I like Hetzner. The pricing is very fair. Especially the server auctions are great to get cheap root servers without any limitations or disadvantages. The cloud is experience is great. The VM Wizard is simple but very powerful so it even makes fun to spin up new virtual machines. Also they boost community tutorials which are very helpful from time to time. The FAQs are very good - there was no question I had which was not covered there. Another really great thing is the cloud api including cli tool.They even provide official go libraries and a CSI driver! This makes integrating Hetzner services fun because you don't have to develop everything on your own.

name: Lucien
review_body: Have been using it for years, great service.

name: Nadun Ranaweera
review_header: I have been using Hetzner services for over two years.
review_body: I have been using Hetzner services for over two years. Hetzner customer service is excellent. They respond very quickly to anything Hetzner Servers is very good I used it for two years without any problems I recommend the Hetzner service to anyone

name: Flo Vilmar
review_body: The promise instant activation of the cloud server and I expected that to be true. Nope. They ask you to upload documents like a freaking telecoms provider. In the end I got a rude auto rejection without apology or explanation. Wasted hours researching their products first. AVOID

review_body: My Favourite place to get servers at a best place.

name: –ú–∏–∫–æ–ª–∞ –ú–∞–∫—Å–∏–º–æ–≤—Å—å–∫–∏–π

review_body: Yesterday I paid for my servers, this morning I can't log into my account anymore! I was cheated for money, I provided my passport and real information about the residence Solve this problem and I'll remove the review! I am very indignant

name: JMV
review_body: I migrated some services (dedicated + cloud) to Hetzner after they where affected by the OVH fire (March 2021). From my experience, Hetzner provides great professional services as infra providers and they have a really good documentation for almost everything which is vital. The UI/functionality of some services (hi robot) is getting old but aside from that, its reliable. They are prompt detecting issues and fixing them (if its on their side, obviously) . Still not a huge huge company, which is not bad either. Would recommend.

name: G. I.
review_body: Hi Friends, Personally myself relation with Brilliant Hetzner Team has been started since 2008. Since then their professionals are always have been great providing the top-notch support as well as 100% of uptime for all the dedicated / cloud servers hosted by Hetzner. Let me express my deepest appreciation in regards of what ever might be going wrong with hardware failures (actually not depending on them) -- the Hetzner Team was always present at your disposal to get the down-time planned and sorted out as short as possible replacing failed hardware in no time. Just for your kind reference: -- the total cumulative downtime for 13 years of consistent & flowsly permanent run summed up ~ less than 7 minutes. Genuinely amazed without any sort of exaggeration. Glad to entering in our fruitful prospects for another successful years decade ahead. Bravo HETZNER Team! Always Yours, Ghenadi Iepuri

name: Che
review_body: We have more than 100 dedicated servers and also using cloud services of this exceptional provider already many years. We happy with them. All tools that we need having on API, everything is easy and professional. German quality. Absolute recommended.

name: Johnny
review_header: Easy, cheap, secure and just works everytime!
review_body: Hetzner is easy to use, delivers fast and secure solutions and everything just works. One of the very best alternatives to the (illegal) US cloud providers!

name: Dan
review_header: Hassle to create an account and rude service
review_body: I created an account with Hetzner and was sent an email requesting identification. I sent this and then received a generic email back saying my account had been closed. No proper explanation why and Hetzner were not willing to work with me when I tried to prove I was a legitimate customer, just sent back a rude email saying they did not want my business. I realise they need to be careful but this was rude and is not a good look for their company. Went with a competitor and had my server set up within about 10 minutes.

name: Ibrahim Al Abbas
review_body: I have been with Hetzner for 1 year, and the service is very good and also support are really nice and very helpful. Also, i remember one day we asked to upgrade our server, and we sent email to sales support to get more clarification , and they the support was really really nice with us even as good gesture they will discounted the remaining price of the old server from the new server. Thanks Hetzner ... please keep up the good work :) (5EDMAH) :)

name: Kevin Simes
review_body: It‚Äôs a scam. Bad people bad company took my money.

name: mike fast
review_body: Probably someone should clean up among the employees. Too many who feel they are irreplaceable

name: Alex K Ikejah
review_body: Very rude company, they terminated my account without a notice when i submitted my international passport. was surprised because i've used the id on companies like paypal, amazon and payoneer with no issue. I wrote them immediately and they coudn't give me reasons. I asked them to review my account and confirm whats wrong nd got no reply.. And i didn't mention i had a pendng order which i had to quickly cancel through pay pal, otherwise they would have stole my money!

name: Niek Schoemaker
review_body: Been using OVH for as far as I can remember, decided to try Hetzner out for a bit and never looked back. The panel is really easy to use, VPS'es are a blast to setup (basically OVH managed VPS but for a normal price) and are accessible within 10 seconds. Dedicated servers take longer to get but that's understandable and it's something they are very open about, never had to wait longer than their ETA on dedicated servers. Have a 5950X with a 10 Gbit NIC running myself, runs around 70C and the bandwidth is really cheap.

name: Peter
review_body: This hosting is the best I ever had. I tried hostings like Zap hosting and this is the best. Why? Firstly they are extremely cheap. 11$ for 8gb ram and one of the best processors on the planet. Secondly you have like 14 days to pay it and you pay it every 4th day in month and like i said you have something like 14 days to pay it so i really love it. I run a hosting company on this and everyone who tried my service is happy :) Keep up the good work

name: REZANANS
review_body: The server was bought, the invoices said what was paid for. A few days later, a notification about an unsuccessful write-off comes, and 3 accounts appear, 2 of them and both are unpaid. Money scams

name: damir.pro
review_body: I moved both my online business and my clients to Hetzners servers. Their server market is the best thing !

name: –ù–∞—Ç–∞–ª—å—è
review_body: I bought and rented an expensive program. I needed multiple servers. On one of the forums, I was advised by hetzner. Forum participants claimed that there you can quickly raise 2 or more servers. I'm not good at all this stuff, and I had to order administration services. I registered an account on hetzner. I immediately entered my card details. They demanded a passport (I had never seen such a thing before). The next day, my account was approved. The administrator I hired got to work and performed his task perfectly. But just the next day I saw that my servers were not working and I could not log in to my account. I started looking for information on the Internet. And now I see how wrong I was when I chose hetzner. Because of these scammers, I lost about 800 usd (because I paid for a month of license for the program and hired an administrator). Besides, I've wasted a lot of time. Hetzner - the real scammers. Never order services from them!

name: Polishcow
review_header: I love the performance of dedicated servers
review_body: I love the performance of dedicated servers! Recomending!

Usually when you make an account they will put a service in your account, after some time you will receive an email from them that they are sending debt collectors to you because you didn't paid. I deleted my hetzner account and i won't come back, you should do the same if you don't want to get invoices of about 300‚Ç¨ randomly and local police to your home. Edit: yeah, I already talked with some operators and I closed my account and paid for that invoice, the review won't be changed.

name: Ilya Shevraev
review_header: Servers are cheap, support is dumb and lazy
review_body: Servers are cheap, but support needs to be improved. They don't want to solve problems with complaints over their network issues. So if you're renting there, be prepared that some day you'll have latency issues which won't be resolved by your request.

name: Woolfy
review_body: Absolutely horrible company. Wanted to delete my account so I paid my bill, and tried to delete my server. Tried to close my account, but then get stuck with a $1 bill for the 'Server Usage' to close my current server. Now I have to wait a month to pay that and finally close the account. Would not recommend them at all!

name: Nikos Efthias
review_header: It works until theres a problem then you get no support
review_body: I am a 4-year customer and never experienced an issue until my last dedicated machine. Network basically becomes unreachable randomly. I tried ubuntu 20.04 18.04 and arch linux and the problem just keeps happening. When I write to their support their only answer is that this is a software issue and they do not support software cases. I am pretty sure this is not a software issue because I created a vps for the time being on Digital ocean with also ubuntu 20.04 and no network issues whatsoever. So my advice is to keep far away from them unless you are buying a server for some personal project because one day you'll upgrade or something things will break and you will get no support and loose your clients due to constant problems

name: Anonymous
review_body: Great servers, had no issues except one... Once upon a time I was running a login server of a game which I have developed. It was working fine for many months, however, couple weeks back the login server spontaneously stopped working... We spent good two days trying to figure out the problem and it appears that Hetzner has blocked 8444 port for its customers (not just cloud, but dedicated server too...). The problem isn't that they blocked the port, but because they didn't let us know. No email, no communication whatsoever. Unbelievable.

review_header: They withdraw the money and close the account. What This Means Fraud
review_body: I became a member of hetzner, I ordered 2 servers and then the money of these servers was withdrawn from my account. I wanted to order more servers 30-40 pieces. They Closed My Account. I Paid It. I can't reach the servers. It means fraud.

review_body: hetzner dedicated servers are unmatched. price, performance, network, flawless.

name: Tim K
review_header: Horrible! Changing terms on you without notice!
review_body: We decided to move our infrastructure to hetzner. We moved 2 of the servers and without notice they disabled customization of the servers, se we are not able to add NIC cards, can not connect our servers with fiber etc. They did it without notice for all customers (even existing). We already went thru the expense of the infrastracture move. When I wrote to management their reply was "we clearly explained it to you that it was due to increased interest and our backlog" here is our communication with the management. ---lol Tim K May 26, 2021, 5:26 PM (6 days ago) to Support Dear, mr -------- I looked at the link that you sent and the first item on there is "order a network card". Now I am really confused, I called an office and I was told that you are currently not doing modifications to servers because of high demand, but how can you do it to existing customers that already have an infrastructure with you? Disable that feature to new customers and not existing! I don't understand what I should do now, since we have 2 servers with you and we need additional equipment, that is just not right! Especially that we ordered custom equipment last week, but we made a mistake and cancelled it. Now we modified an order and we can't place it any more! We are willing to wait a little longer, but it's just not right to do it to existing customers. Please forward this email to your management, because I understand that you are doing what you have been told, but what are we supposed to do with our business that relies on your business. I don't understand... Support - Hetzner Online GmbH May 27, 2021, 6:11 AM (5 days ago) to me Translate message Turn off for: English Dear Tim This decission was made by management about 1 week ago. So for all new setups (no matter if new or existing client) we do not offer customized setup currently. The reason was clearly explained to you already. We know that not everyone is happy with that but we had to do that decission. Kind regards Head of Sales For the purposes of this communication, we may save some of your personal data. For information on our data privacy policy, please see: 26/05/2021 11:13 - Tim K wrote: On Wed, May 26, 2021 at 9:04 AM Support - Hetzner Online GmbH... Tim K May 27, 2021, 7:50 AM (5 days ago) to Support Thank you for "clearly" explaining it to me after we went through the expenses of moving some of our infrastructure over to your company and now we can not continue with our move. As head of sales it should be your responsibility to keep your existing clients happy and "clearly" communicate the time frames! As a client I don't want to hear about your problems with backlog, I want to hear timeframes so I can continue with my business! Frankly, the last thing I expected is this type of nonsense from a German company! Sincerely, Tim Dear Tim We are sorry to see you go, but can understand your reasoning. We have a customer protection policy which allows you to cancel the server within the first 14 days after it has gone online, and receive a full refund (including the setup fee if applicable) via your Robot interface: -> Servers -> click on the server -> cancellation -> cancel order. The two servers in your account have been online for just under 14 days. Please go ahead and cancel them. Kind regards Sales Needless to say we cancelled all of the servers today. (Please don't reply with we are sorry to see you go or sorry for the bad experience) because nobody in the company is sorry! This is not the way to treat your customers!

name: sneaky hub
review_body: Payment dates aren't very clear Support isn't fast at all and their servers aren't deployed fast they take your money and hold it for weeks. You'd have a better experience with OVH. Only thing hetzner has on their side is the price.

name: Kamui
review_header: Hetzner...you pay and they ruin without notice.
review_body: Many years a customer of the company. Their systems are solid and stable...their management and support the worst out there. One of my webservices was running on port 8444 and for some days now everything stopped. After losing 10 hours of trying to debug the problem without any luck I take my chances to ask for the not possible...their answer "there was the need to block port 8444 cause of massive mining use. block is done at our network" So because someone was mining crypto they blocked the entire network port and when I asked for a simple "why wasnt I get a notice beforehand my service is down for 10 DAYS!!!" They replied "the port is used by chia mining. A prior information was not possible." So rhey couldnt send a simple mail beforehand neither ever after 10 days. They just don't care. Finally I retorically asked the support who will pay for the damages and politely.....they stopped reply to my emails without a word. This is hetzner for you! Good job!

name: Nik
review_header: I tried some of their cloud servers
review_body: I tried some of their cloud servers, and I have a 4GB plan for two years now. if we consider the price their services are great. it's really great. about support, I sent some emails and they are responded back about one to three days later, of course it's normal for big companies like Hetzner.

name: A.H.
review_body: Hetzner is, IMHO (and I've maintained servers online continuously since the early 1990s) the best of the best these days. We've been there four months at the time of this writing so prices might've changed, but we were able to provision a really fast "bare metal" machine with an unmetered fast Ethernet connection for around 70 pounds/month. Ryzen 9, dual enterprise NVMEs, 128MB of ram, for high-load needs this saved us a huge amount of money over cloud provisioning. We've had 100% uptime, zero problems since. We were moving back to our own dedicated servers and away from fast-provisioned scaling cloud containers due to the staggering cost increases in cloud hosting. While we distributed some servers at great deals globally, most cost us more per month to colocate (let alone the hardware/shipping costs) than the entire server rental/bandwidth package at Hetzner. And we didn't have to go through the time/expense of purchasing, outfitting and shipping equipment. So we decided to just keep the one at Hetzner Vs. installing our own server in Germany... Hetzner's documentation is thorough and easily found, the one question I did have was answered quickly, accurately and professionally. To me, as a woman in tech, basic politeness really matters...

name: Max
review_body: Best prices for powerful servers. More than 7 years of using hetzner services for a highload project and no major problems.

name: Ole Michael Oldh√∏j
review_body: great company ... when they dont reject you :D

name: Mar
review_header: I have seen many bad services. But this is the worst of the worst.
review_body: I have seen many bad services. But this is the worst of the worst. The funniest is the support response. With this type of service, this company must receive financial assistance from the German government in order to survive. There is no other explanation. Ah, as they say in the comments below, they choose the customer to not have to say that the product or their purchase is without stock or unavailable. You find many websites with these same excuses. Today a paypal attendant said that paypal is increasingly identifying this type of company and banning it.

name: customer
review_header: Its not worth it. ..Hetzner is an unstable and not reliable‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is an unstable and not reliable business partner, when it comes to a guarantee of reliability of your infrastructure. Hetzner uses "At Will" account closures without prior warning. Hetzner will not provide any guidance, regulation, leadership or policy guidelines to fix problems with their support, but instead they will "Nuke Your Entire Infrastructure" and cause unpredictable collateral business damages. Hetzner is aware of their reputation as well as questionable business practice and counters with product discount offers at half of the price. Its not worth it.

name: Ali hossini
review_body: Hetzner scammer! During our daily inspections, we found that Hetzner had blocked our server We wanted to log in to our account to follow up, but they deactivated our account We asked them the reason for this through a ticket, but they did not answer We called them They easily told us that they do not back up or activate our account My data is now lost. I will follow up with them soon. I worked with Hetzner for almost three years and I did not expect such a thing!

name: Valentin
review_body: The performance & infrastructure is fine. BUT : Without any notice can block your services. No respond for open support tickets for three days seems normal...... Addition to reply : dear sirs no mining were done on vps, it is pure port forwarding & database. It‚Äôll be quite strange to try farming chia on 20GB disk..... but that or another way I think it is appropriate to first notice the client to get some feedback before blocking services. Looking forward for connecting me on open tickets. Thank you. update: 2021 may 13. Still no response from support....

name: Emanuel Abrahamsson
review_header: I dont recommend this hosting at all
review_body: I dont recommend this hosting at all. they use blacklisted ips , even their invoices comes into spam folder . Server has ben shut down several times because of this. No automatic subscription plans. And they can shut your server down anytime without understanding the urgecy of having a downtime. I lost 1000¬£ an hour , my server was down 27 hours without any info. Calling their data center didnt help as they reffered me back to their mail support because of "not having authority to do anything" . I will sue them for alot of misstakes . I want to warn anyone who plans to use these guys , Thanks

name: Thomas Williams
review_header: I was a customer of Hetzner for 9‚Ä¶
review_body: I was a customer of Hetzner for 9 years, but have decided to leave today for a number of reasons. Over the 9 years, I've had many server products and generally, my experience has been OK. Hardware has been relatively stable, and uptime was decent. However, within the last year, I experienced a network issue within the data center (90% packet loss). The issue seemed to affect comms between a Hetzner router on the route back from their DC to the UK and was impacting customers on BT ISP and associated ISPs on the OpenReach network. I raised a ticket, and was advised the team it was forwarded to would reply Monday-Friday. This is ridiculous because the network is advertised as being managed and monitored 24/7. I sent a DM via Twitter to complain and was advised they try to maintain a healthy work life balance and the technicians that are on site need to be reserved "to be doing very important and necessary work". Given this was affecting routes back to the UK, I was very surprised to receive the comment about them being reserved for "important and necessary work". When they responded the following day, they tried saying that the issue was with my ISP however the issue was affecting traffic from Hetzner --> UK, not UK ---> Hetzner, so it was on a return path they choose that was having the issues. They changed the return path route which resolved the issue but continued to mention they have no influence on the incoming route, which is not where the issue was present (it gave me the impression they were trying to shift blame). I was dissapointed in the way this incident was handled. The server I purchased was unmanaged and I have always accepted responsibility for managing the software on my server as agreed. As part of this deal, it is my understanding that Hetzner are responsible for the hardware, and also the network. However, I felt they didn't held their end of the deal in this situation and didn't care either. Secondly, Hetzner are performing IBAN discrimination and prevent customers from the UK paying via SEPA because their IBAN starts with GB. This is illegal under Article 9 of Regulation (EU) No 260/2012 (irrespective of the fact the UK is no longer in the EU). I pointed out to them this was illegal but their position did not change. I urge anyone facing a similar issue to make a complaint to the The German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority who are responsible for enforcing this. Finally, I tried setting up a new server order with Hetzner recently. I checked the service status page which provides a date your server will be setup. My server was not setup on the final advertised date and when I contacted them, they wanted additional business days. This wasn't acceptable to me at the time as resources had been put aside to perform the migration. I understand sometimes unexpected situations happen, but there are two things that I don't like here: 1) Firstly, you didn't contact me to mention there was a delay. I had to wait until the final day cut over and I had to contact you myself to find out what was going on. Why? 2) You set the expectation of your customers via your status page. You should factor in contingency into these dates to mitigate unexpected circumstances. I decided not to go ahead with the order due to the delay, and leave. The responses from Hetzner staff over the past few years seem to be getting more and more corporate and rude each day. I feel as a company they no longer understand their customers and I also get the impression they simply don't care. Given their inability to appreciate the impact of a 90% packet loss issue impacting UK visitors (along with the other issues mentioned) has made me lose complete confidence I can rely on them as a company when things go wrong. I held my end of the deal by managing my server within the agreement (not receiving a single abuse report within 9 years), but Hetzner seem to forget what they are responsible for. In summary, Hetzner are very cheap and competitive, but you should understand the risks to your servers when things go wrong. How Hetzner respond to these incidents concerns me and should concern anyone who is hosting servers that they are reliant upon. Even if you only host personal servers like I did, do you really want them to spend over a day before they even start looking at a 90% packet loss issue? The choice is yours.

name: Luka Raivisto
review_body: Great services. Cheap and reliable.

name: Fatih Juan
review_header: I'm using hetzner dedicated server more‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm using hetzner dedicated server more than 2 years and so happy to move my service from ovh company which is one of the worst company in the world. Support fees and services are the best. Thank you guys

name: abdou brahimi
review_body: I signed up, provided my credit card information and uploaded the required documents. A day after Hetzner rejected my account. Honestly I get that you are a private entity and have the right to reject accounts but can you please save us some time and tell us from the get go you don't accept accounts from certain countries ?. I don't care if you are trying to be hurtful or not honestly. I just want some transparency of why you may reject us. I spent quite some time reading your documentation and choosing bare metal servers, VPSs and load balancers. I wasted more than 4 days choosing what best suits us only to be rejected without a valid reason.

name: Jiri
review_body: Easy to use with good price

name: Sayed Elshemy
review_body: I am a customer who has had it for 9 years, a good response from customer service, and I hope there is an chat support service.

name: Mark Matus
review_body: Best on the market. Flexible, fast, reliable. Professional.

name: Michal Brichacek
review_body: I have had an absolutely terrible experience with this company. I used their services for a short period of time, then decided to close my account. I was not informed of any outstanding balances before doing so. The next day I was sent an invoice for ‚Ç¨7.54. The invoice states that the payment is due by PayPal. I only signed up for this company because they advertise as accepting payment by PayPal. When I click the link to pay the invoice however, it does not let me do so as my account is closed. The ‚Äúsupport‚Äù team has been rude and absolutely unhelpful. They have informed me that I am unable to pay by PayPal because I closed my account. I have asked them to reinstate my account so that I can pay my invoice. They refuse to do this because my account has an outstanding balance. One of their e-mails to me stated the following: ‚ÄúAs the account is disabled already, you have to make a bank transfer. There is no other option, and it's not our problem, you deleted your account, so disbaled it, before paying the invoice.‚Äù It‚Äôs not their problem? Are you serious? When I closed my account it didn‚Äôt show me an outstanding invoice. It didn‚Äôt give me any option to pay. I closed my account on March 31st at 12:02 PM. I was sent an invoice on April 1st at 4:14 AM. It seems to me like the problem is the way they run their system. They insist that I send an international wire transfer for ‚Ç¨7.54 to them. I have repeatedly refused to send an international wire transfer where the fee to do so will cost me three or four times what I owe. After all, they clearly advertise that they accept PayPal. I have on multiple occasions offered to pay by credit card. I have also asked them for an e-mail address that I can simply send a PayPal payment to. They have refused both of these and insist that I send them a wire transfer. They are threatening to send me to a collections agency if I do not do so. This behavior borders on extortion. I am actually trying to pay my invoice, but they are NOT giving me a reasonable way to do so. Again when I asked to pay for PayPal, one of their replies states the following: ‚Äúyou don't have the option to do that as YOU deleted the account.‚Äù My last four e-mails to them asking them for a PayPal address to send payment to have been completely ignored. I suspect they will soon send me to a collections agency (as they have directly told me they will do this) for not paying my invoice, which I have repeatedly attempted to pay. I have NEVER dealt with a company with such rude and appalling customer service. I recommend avoiding this terrible company at ALL costs.

name: Donovan Koch
review_body: Nothing to say just great service, great server, great support

name: Pierre
review_header: No sign of live @ Hetzner Support?
review_body: I felt compelled to write this review because of the abhorrent service from Hetzner. That is to say, there is no service. I have submitted several tickets concerning a simple legal question, I've also requested updates and tried to contact Hetzner, but we've received no response whatsoever. Not even an indication when we might expect to receive a response, or any sign of life. Perhaps someone should check if Hetzner Support is oke? If you want to run non-essential apps/programs: they are cheap and have an usable interface. But, if you're planning to do more advanced stuff and might, for whatever reason, require any support, whatsoever, I'd strongly advice to look for any other service provider. Trustpilot advices: give some constructive criticism. Oke, here we go: Hetzner Support, please give support to your customers. At the very least, acknowledge that your customers exist. (That would result in three stars right away). Also, Hetzner, don't just do damage control on reviewsites like Trustpilot, giving 'Helena' so much work to do! But actually invest some of your resources into your service. I think that would help.

name: Jossua
review_body: Bad service. Today April 30 2021. our website is down. We try to contacted Hetzner to find out what is going on. And a machine answer they are close. They must have a 24/7 customer support. I am very disappointed.

name: Yiƒüit
review_body: The Dedicated servers were excellent But... they're so strict about abuse emails, I don't like it. They wanted my site deleted for Spam emails. In short, although there are no copyright pages on the site (404), I'm dealing with copyright mail. The rest is great.

name: IMMA DED
review_body: The Dedicated server's were excellent ! :)

name: Julie
review_body: Very good service! Someone had posted information without permission and they took steps to have it deleted. Thanks Hetzner

name: Mohsen Hosseini Rad
review_body: "Hatzner Jogger!" I registered, I ordered a server, tomorrow was the invoice date, I paid, I ordered another server again, the invoice date changed me daily! I argued and said why did you change me and my company is not your joke! (It was a corporate account) Wrote to see if you cheated or not !? I also said that you did it unintentionally, you told me that you are a ridiculous scoundrel, ignorant, rude! And I stopped working with them! Tarzeh did not want to refund the cost of my first invoice Hatzner, you must know that I am complaining about you! I wanted to work with you! But your other backers change my invoice date one after another, and that's really ridiculous! I asked them why you change, he said to see if you are a scammer or not !? This is your work and what you are telling me, I am pursuing the scammer from the legal authorities! And the second thing is that you are bothering me, then I have to be in harmony with you? It's your job to play with my name and company! You made fun of me for 3 days and you do whatever you like! I also warned you several times in this ticket not to do these things, otherwise we will cut off my cooperation with you! There is no reason why every customer you register will see you as a scammer! This is rude to me! In the same way and the warnings that I gave, and I also told your previous supporter that they have called me several times with fraudulent words and I will stop cooperating with you. Also, when you give a cheap server, there is no reason to do whatever you want! When I have paid my first invoice, and I have given your SB69 servers to the customer, according to the invoice date, I give the customer time to pay, but when I see that you are playing a game and changing the invoice date day by day, I am questioned and all programs change and crash I am not your toy Refund the amount and you do not need to show me good faith! It was good faith to speak to me properly and not to harass me Not that you are telling me I am changing history to see if you are a scam or not !? The scammer will be revealed soon ... who I am or you who have been harassing me for 3 days now! Be sure to follow this work of yours.

name: The Modern Potato
review_header: I've had a ok experience with this‚Ä¶
review_body: I've had a ok experience with this host. Their sign up process is tough and support barely helped. I submitted the correct info but they declined me many times. It turned out it was a issue with my email which is kind of stupid. The servers were pretty powerful and cheap compared to many other hosts so that's a positive.

name: vok ExTa
review_body: Anyone can change your email without a confirmation!!! Dont give Hetzner your credit card data cuz its not safe!

name: Ibantxu
review_body: After three years working with them, I don't change. I have tried with all those that appear in the first pages of the search engines and I always conclude that Hetzner is still the most complete offer in the current market. They have always covered all the specific and sustained needs over time. Dedicated servers, VPS, extra storage, the console and the robot to manage all services, speed with the delivery of servers, updates and replacement ... Always good! It would be nice to reduce the installation times in the Helsinki Datacenter, but they are clear reporting the times ... The datacenters in Germany are very fast in everything ... And the customer service, great! I do not know how many Spanish-speaking clients but it would be good attention in Spanish. If they continue down this path, I am sure that I will continue working with them for a long time.

name: Febryan Valdo
review_header: One of The Best Hosting Company
review_body: Great pricing and customer support...

name: Riekelt
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for a little over 5 months now to host a large set of micro-services and public-facing websites and it has overall been a pleasant experience. Their Cloud CP is very easy to use, and their latest addition of a firewall only makes setting up new infrastructure easier. As for dedicated servers, the CP does look a little bit outdated style-wise but it still does it's job very well and their server auction is a good place to pick up a cheap server to do some testing on. I have not experienced any major outages in the time I have been hosting with Hetzner, and whenever I needed support I could count on them replying usually within an hour.

name: Nuclerio / UuraniumM_PROD
review_header: Account disabled for no reason + 20‚Ç¨ Stolen
review_body: Account disabled for no reason. I've paid 20‚Ç¨ to verify my account, 20‚Ç¨ that are supposed to be refunded, and 2h after, my account has been suspended. I opened 2 Tickets to have more informations, no response. I did not been refunded of my 20‚Ç¨. This is inadmissible.

name: Anton Egorov
review_body: A reliable IT partner, which constantly pleases with the best balance of price and quality.

name: Taha Zacholi
review_header: I have had a server since last year and‚Ä¶
review_body: I have had a server since last year and every support ticket I tried to open or create has not been responded to. I've had to resolve all the problems my self and I've had enough of it. My server got blocked this month and I explained to them what it was. They haven't responded for 2 whole weeks. They've updated their price listing for the server I had and called them up. They said to open a ticket and this was in January. Yeah that support message still hasn't been looked at as Ive had no response from them since. EDIT: I forgot to mention their support is trash

name: Abir Ahmed
review_header: You get what you pay BUT read the terms...
review_body: I've been a Hetzner client for more than a year now. I have an EX-42 server with them and ordered an AX-41 yesterday. I have never faced any downtime on a server, their network is stable, hardware performance is up to the job and calling their technical department (DC) resolves issues very quickly. There are many reviews here that indicates payment related issue or server deletion. I would like to say that I'm one of those clients who pays very late. My invoice generates on 3rd of every month but I often pay them at 19th or 20th of that month. I receive multiple invoice emails and in the pdf it indicates the last day to pay as well. Terms and conditions are there for a reason, if we fail to follow the terms, it's only our fault ;) In my opinion, no server is stable for people who are running business without any Server expertise or have their own system administrator. Hiring an expert would change their mind once the server is configured correctly. The control panel is easy enough to navigate around. While I have to wait for KVM, it's understandable given the low price range. It doesn't take more than an hour for a KVM to be attached to the server once requested. But I do love the fact that I can just call the DC technician directly and communicate with them about any problems regarding my server. At the end of the day, no hosting company is perfect. But Hetzner does a very good job given the relatively low price range of their servers.

name: Sohail Ahmed
review_header: I have been using Hetzner for more than‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for more than a year by now, I'm so much satisfied and happy with their flawless services. I assure you their customer support is so much responsive and their service plans are very cheap and affordable.

name: Eduards
review_header: Total ignorance - Hetzner deleted data without any notice!
review_body: Hetzner deleted my data on the account without any warning for a failed SEPA direct debit payment which was supposed to be automatic. Such ignorance in dealing with customer data is unacceptable from a service provider providing business critical infrastructure. I DO NOT recommended choosing Hetzner for even a small startup not even a bigger company, if they can delete customer business without putting any effort in resolving a very basic issue. UPDATE: How Hetzner actually deleted the server: April 9, Friday, 19:45 - send an email to customer informing that the automatic payment has failed April 10, Saturday, 09:01 - lock the account April 12, Monday, 09:56 - delete the account and all stored data One warning, total ignorance. Very bad experience. If you have to, keep a surplus balance in your account, so that mistake like this (which Hetzner sales representative do not see as a mistake) do not happen to you.

name: Keivan Ghasemi
review_body: CP is not user-friendly at all. You have to submit an application for everything because Hetzner is in Germany and German law is complicated. Web hosting is very slow. The support team is trying to make money.

name: —à–Ω—é–≥–∞ –±–µ–∫–±–∞
review_body: Worst support. If they locked up your nodes you will wait for response more then 1 week. And it is not a fact that you will get an answer

name: Halvnaken
review_header: Good prices and fast support - Bad ANTI-DDOS
review_body: Good prices and fast support. However the anti-ddos was very poor which forced me to change provider. I was very happy with OVHClouds anti-ddos, if it was the same here; this would be the absolut best hosting provider out there.

name: Alexey
review_body: Terrible technical support. I received a letter stating that it was not possible to pay for the services of the hosting provider. I solved the problem with the bank and wrote to technical support, with a request to repeat the payment request, since my account was disabled and I could not log into it. But I was never answered and my account is still disabled

name: H√† H·ªØu
review_body: I'm from Vietnam after submit to register they delete my account for no reason...

name: Fredrik J.
review_header: I've been using Hetzner on and off for‚Ä¶
review_body: I've been using Hetzner on and off for the past few years and I've had nothing but a stellar experience with all their services, especially considering the price they charge for their services. Unlike providers like OVH, Hetzner actually gets back to you promptly when submitting tickets regarding eg. KVM access or replacement of defective hardware. Right now I got an AX41-NVME and the performance for the price is absolutely great for my personal use. I can see there is plenty of negative reviews here regarding the billing, but again most of the people have not read the term they agreed to when signing up for the service. Just stopping to pay a bill is not seen as a cancellation and I doubt they would do the same with eg. utility bills - if you pay on time there is nothing to be worried about at all and even if you want to cancel it is 1 click away within the Hetzner billing portal. I would recommend Hetzner to others for sure and I have absolutely no complaints regarding the service.

name: kunde
review_body: I have used Hetzner for many, many years for dedicated servers, and recently also parts of their cloud services (VMs etc.). I am quite satisfied with their service level. I also work with competing cloud providers, so I know what level of service to expect, and Hetzner delivers quite good price / performance in most areas.

name: STEVE Mouris
review_header: I would be giving 5 if there were more‚Ä¶
review_body: I would be giving 5 if there were more locations, guz its getting crowded with 2 data centres, other than that good experience, got same performance than other dedicated providers.

name: Johanna Dawson
review_header: more location please maybe UK plant other than that brilliant
review_body: used them for a year, cant fault them if you follow the correct requirement, doing KYC all that, and people who keep giving bad comments, must be anonymous people, i like their billing policy best by far, been monitoring the system and its gives same performance as t2 AWS so hetzner by far the best for me and cheaper.

name: Sumit Kumar
review_body: Best experience with hetzner. I am using 3 dedicated server from this.

name: Julien Tinguely
review_body: Low prices, awesome and quick support, total availability.

Yeah and 24/7 support is not answering by phone, I just listened music for 20 minutes and then nothing. And yeah, I wrote about reboot problems 2 times and on the 3 time when server became unreachable they decided to make some tests. Great service! Highly recommend!

name: CryptoMancer
review_header: Don't buy your servers from Hetzner
review_body: Imagine the fact that you are forced to use the account of one of your colleagues or friends to buy servers from this company just because of the color of your skin. Because they are offering lower prices, they think they have the right to treat people like animals. What a shame.

name: Leifur Steinn
review_body: Pricing on pppppoint! just lacks the Anti-DDoS, I've had over 20 bare-metal machines with Hetzner in the last year and a half and never had a single network or maintenance related downtime, the DDoS attacks were a problem, mitigation systems either weren't detecting anything or were seriously delayed.

name: krq
review_header: After creating an account nothing stops‚Ä¶
review_body: After creating an account nothing stops you from creating resources that you're gonna get billed for. Even if you just created an account to check the UI, see how everything works... If you create a volume and delete it a few seconds later or forget about it, they gonna send you a bill even if you didn't use the resources.

name: Erik Schepers
review_body: Hosts nothing but frauds, website scrapers and other assorted internet scum. Avoid like the plague.

name: –ú–∞–∫—Å–∏–º –ê–ª–µ–∫—Å–µ–µ–≤–∏—á
review_body: My account was blocked and I did not receive a response from technical support to resolve this issue

name: Bruno
review_body: I am owning one VPS (CX11) and Dedicated Server from Outlet (SB28: i7-4770, 32GB RAM, 2x2TB softRAID1, Ubuntu 18.04LTS). VPS is working as HAProxy Balancer and Dedicated Server as Mail Server (Zimbra) Provisioning of both servers was pretty fast. I experienced one outage on Dedicated Server, but for unknown reason server hanged - not Hetzner fault. I am not sure why the Dedicated Server has problems with kernel updates. After upgrade to kernel 5.*, server stopped booting. I'm very satisfied with service.

name: Mihaly
review_body: I have been a customer for more than a year and a half now. I'm yet to meet a single difficulty or problem using their services. I ordered, they delivered exactly what they promised and on time. I'm very satisfied with the prices too.

name: Hassan Hashemzadeh
review_body: People hope, one day Hetzner become an company independent of US and perform itself rules not US.

name: Cos
review_body: User friendly provider. Everything is on top! Good choice of options, fast support and technical responces. Fast services allocation. 100% compliance with declared. In time notifications on scheduled tasks and faults (extremely rare faults, by the way)!

name: Gary Walker
review_body: Receive multiple fraudulent emails per day from Hetzner customers, have tried contacting their abuse department but responses have been poor, no action is ever taken and you have to jump through hoops to even get a response. edit: Have sent the details to the abuse alias multiple times but all I receive are responses telling me it will not be looked it. Seriously your abuse department is the worst I've ever dealt it. At least one customer has been running an phishing site claiming to be a large well known auction site for at least a month. edit2: Today has been a good day, only fraudulent emails from 6 separate Hetzner customers. edit3: Hetzner abuse address has once again refused to deal with what is an obvious scam.

name: Blockchain Evangelist
review_header: DO NOT USE HETZNER! DO NOT USE HETZNER!
review_body: So here is my story. I created my account a couple of days ago and setup vps for various services. After some days all my servers were not accessible anymore. Called Support and they said I was mining crypto, which I wasn't. I don't know if they understand what crypto mining is. Anyway, went on and ordered some dedicated server. Next day, all my servers were not accessible and my account disabled. Terrible experience. I guess cheap services come with a huge price tag in the end. I'd rather look for an expensive alternative. You can't be banning people without warning or notification. Not everybody is a criminal. And when I read similar reviews here I am mind buggled. I should have been here before.

name: Hendrik Demir
review_header: One of the best hosting companies I've ever worked with
review_body: I am shocked to see how many bad reviews this company has received in the past. I was recommended to take a look at Hetzner a week ago by one of my friends as I was looking for a good and affordable dedicated server. On a first glimpse, Hetzner's pricing looks amazing. They were one of the cheapest companies that one can find when comparing it to other providers, especially when you look at what you receive in return. They do charge a set-up fee which almost matches the monthly cost of your server, but that's fine. I also like that their prices don't change depending on how long you choose to work with them, someone that wants a server for a month pays the same monthly price as someone that wants a server for a year. At first I was a bit worried about their "verification" system, but it was fairly simple and quick. They have two options: one where you put 20 bucks on your account and one where you send them your documents. I first went with sending my documents, but since it was a manual process, I switched to putting 20 bucks on my account, as it is a bit faster. My account was immediately verified and I was able to order a server. Now, Hetzner has a page where you can find how long your order will take to finish. This was approximately 4 to 5 workdays when I ordered my server, but I already received it on Monday (ordered on Friday). To quickly summarize: I can genuinely recommend Hetzner to anyone looking for a reliable hosting provider with good pricing. They are fast, have amazing customer service (which is reachable from 6:30AM to 6:00PM) and have amazing prices. I have yet to experience the stability of their servers (for instance any downtime) and will update my review in a month. Also, I've learned a valuable lesson here: reviews regarding a hosting provider will never give you an actual "score" of the company. As you can see in the reviews, most are about the verification process of Hetzner which they created to prevent their servers from being used by bad people. You might have to wait a day or two to get verified, but what you get in return, is most certainly worth it. I hope to keep working with Hetzner and am grateful for what they've done for me so far.

name: Blue Softec
review_body: I asked to change my server IP and hetzner team did it with extra fees but since this moment everything is down and I can't reach my server and hetzner team answered my support tickets that everything is works but it doesn't true I can't reach anything on my server and Hetzner team do not want to check this problem or do their work completely and want me to resolve this problem myself technically despite it is their work to make everything running again on the new IP

name: dr. sc. Mate Kosor
review_header: Great for hobby, but not for critical business
review_body: They have great prices, give you extras (like storage for backup, private network, dns) and have decent admin panel. But if you hit their abuse triggers they will cut you off without explanations. They do not provide any explanation about what you did wrong. You have no grace period to get your data off their machines. They don't send you notice. Imagine you set up your web service, and after some time, suddenly customers start calling. You try to log in and there is no access. Upon email to their support you get few bare words and no explanations. You are left scrambling to set up your service again somewhere else. That happened to me. I hope they change their approach to customers. I understand that they can choose who to work with, but doing so in such an erradic manner will drive the legitimate business away. Right now they are not dependable.

name: OTG Zusiqs
review_body: great service but it did take kinda long to receive my server

name: Max V.
review_body: Hahaha, this is an outright shame! See what Hetzner representatives answer to the reviews. They humiliate themselves with their answers.) And my review is also like many others. Yesterday I registered an account (I even sent a photo of my passport), started the server. I didn't even have time to do anything. I just downloaded the archive with the files and unpacked it. Didn't do anything else at all. And today I see that my account is disabled. They went crazy there. They apparently have a persecution mania, they think that everyone wants to deceive them :)

name: Sergey
review_body: Oh, what a pity that I did not read the reviews before using Hetznzer. Yesterday was a non-working day (Sunday, day off). But I spent all day getting the server up and running, figuring out how it works and setting everything up. I went to bed in a good mood. But when I woke up in the morning, I was upset. I see that my server is not available and I cannot log into my account. The last opportunity to find out what is the reason is to write to technical support via mail. I wrote, but there is no answer. Now I see that there are a lot of people with this problem. Therefore, I regret that yesterday I wasted my day off on this terrible hosting, and today, on a holiday (in Russia today is a holiday not a working day), I will spend one more day to go to another hosting. I urge everyone to think three times before using the Hetzner.

name: Miro
review_body: Most reliable, performant and affordable VPS hosting. Included free DDoS protection good too. Been using their VPS products for over a year, and I can't say I have any complaints. Very clean user friendly interface too.

name: George Tarlas
review_header: Low quality dc with low quality servers.

name: Alin
review_body: They just blocked my account. There is no reason. I did not break the rules (I read the rules before starting the cloud server). No notifications or warnings came. I cannot create a ticket because the account is disabled. I wrote to them by mail, but there is no answer. My data is on the server, I can't even download it. Outright disrespect for the client.

name: Lam
review_header: Hetzner have charged me for advance‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner have charged me for advance while they have never stated that they can charge me for advance, and now my bill is 2x more amount and I am not sure if I can cover it since I always had enough money only for 1 month of invoice for each month, that's scummy and they just lost customer, they just put on debt collectors on people who couldn't pay for their invoices only cuz of their fault and I do not believe its legal at all, if anyone from Hetzner is reading my review, my ticket id is Ticket#2021030203062639 - I got threats to close my account too stating that my phone number is fake however its not at all Response to reply: my dedicated servers are few months old and I have 2 invoices of those dedicated servers, and support have said that it's for advance even head of sales said that, so reply doesn't make any sense to me. Hetzner is just charging people twice as much than it should even when customers paid for those dedicated servers for multiple times.

name: Doganay Cetiz
review_body: I created an account provided my goverment id for account verification and they just suspended my account. There is no answer to support e-mails and no other way to contact. Update : How is it possible to look suspicious when clicking an "Order" button. Yet my account suspension was after i sent the documents.

name: Louis
review_body: Sad to see so many negative reviews here of people either misunderstanding what unmanaged hosting entails, or misunderstanding how billing works. Hetzner offers great performance for money, and nice control panels. In the years I've been hosting with them I've only had to contact them once, when a hard drive failed. Some German efficiency later and the drive was replaced, so I could reinstall the server from backups (I had chosen not to use raid).

name: cubebuilder
review_header: Great prices fast and nice support
review_body: This is a very great host that offers cheap dedicated servers in germany and finland. The only issue is the DDoS protection it is not very good which is why I use a reverse proxy from another provider. Otherwise the support is great and fast. A suggestion is to add US locations. Anyways very great host.

name: Mohamed Saber
review_header: i gived them 5 Star Now Giving them 1‚Ä¶
review_body: i gived them 5 Star Now Giving them 1 Star! Be Awareeeeeeeeee! Be Careful. Last month i tried to renew my servers normally tried to paid with my card ( i'm client with hetzner for 5 months paid above 700-900eur) so i was going to pay my invoice. but found payment gateway broke give me errors. so i didn't had chance to pay. keept trying no luck and in same time i found my server is Dead!! there was issue called " Kernel Panic" Which Happen cause Hardware issue . i didn't touch my server settings for months it's just died. and i call them for help they told me it take 10 - 16 hours or more . and they won't sure if issue will be fixed so my data and work all is gone i stopped simply using them .and i didn't use the half month This guys Keept Runing Servers and send me invoice to pay. ( Even i didn't use them) and i can't cancel before 10 days at least i have to use them . .. aha so after 10 days i go ahead talk to them telling them " Please Close my servers and i want to pay only what i used " They Refused. They keept my servers runing for days and put a lock on it! So They Locked it . and refuse to cancel or stop . and telling me they will charge me then at the end they send me to Debt Collector . end of story! i will pay x2 double . the support is not helpful they ignore emails. they just don't care. be careful . don't even use them

name: Ben dev
review_header: I change manny hosting company and i‚Ä¶
review_body: I change manny hosting company and i use wordpress. After manny truy to find good hosting provider i finally find in hetzner! Thank you!

name: Koen van den Berge
review_body: My account was deleted 5mins after creating my account and did all validations (EU citizen). Called support and had the most horrible rude support rep on the phone you can imagine. My advise; see their reply below (says enough right). My advise; dont get burned, look elsewhere!, this company shouldn‚Äôt exist anymore post-COVID if they still treat (new) customers this way!

name: Alan Doherty
review_body: Despite frustrations which people take out on this page had a great experience with them. Their prices are absolutely the lowest in the industry, yet their support is acceptable for the price you pay. The rescue system provided is extremely efficient and easy to use, allowing me to quite literally setup my entire environment in 15 minutes. Unlike some other providers (*cough* OVH) the panel is decently quick and deployments are fast. At the extremely low price point I don't see how anybody could complain, really. I did have delays recently but this was made aware pre-purchase. Happy customer.

name: A reviewer
review_body: Bought servers from them a lot of times. High quality!

name: Abolfazl Karimian Shahri
review_body: I charged the account for 20$ and then they disabled my account. they are scammers. please don't use their services

name: Akash Saini
review_header: my account is not verifying even i‚Ä¶
review_body: my account is not verifying even i submitted original documents.

name: Sergey Kudich
review_body: Best prices, good locations, flexible options. Using provider services already more than 8 years and connecting our clients here as well.

name: Beedslol Kuntus
review_body: Honestly decent. I have got an Auction server and have faced no issue whatsoever. It has been running really nicely. Their network is not the best thing in the market, but it is alright for what it is. I honestly would see if they can get a better network and a more global presence around the globe like OVH, because that‚Äôs a very good competitor with very high prices too. But their VPS‚Äôs aren‚Äôt just VPS‚Äôs. They are cloud VPS‚Äôs means they are billed by the hour and have features like load balancing and block storage. All that flexibility for that little price for a cloud based environment is really amazing. I have been using both, but using the dedicated for more time. The pricing is really good for what it is, and I may seem to upgrade soon as as of writing this comment they have a 5950x for 120‚Ç¨. In all fairness, the only bad thing people hate is sometimes the ID card verification can be a bit of a pain in the butt for sure, but once you actually pass that it‚Äôs all just amazing.

name: Willow Smith
review_header: Support ignoring me and wasting my time
review_body: I had a hetzner server for a few months and it worked great, I decided I wanted to move off a dedicated root server platform so decided to cancel, I emailed support to do this and it was easy to do. However, support only removed about 40 of the 50 euro bill, so I contacted the finance department and they are absolutely awful, currently fifty emails back and forth and now they are IGNORING me! Unacceptable

name: Kenzi
review_body: Excellent prices, great support, and some very useful features. Very easy to set up a custom solution with switches and customised servers, their vSwitch technology is invaluable in setting up high availability, and their recovery systems are perhaps the best. Despite not having 24/7 IPMI on servers, their rescue system and vKVM does the job for just about anything. Used for many years, and I will continue to do so very happily.

review_body: Even though I have sent all the documents, my membership is constantly being closed. I do not understand what is wrong with this company.

review_body: On Hetzner since 2011 as another client's administrator, and since 2016 - on my own. 24/7 uptime, really fast hardware problems resolution (was like 2 of them for these 10 years, replacement of HDD was done in less than one work day since request and network card problem was addressed to kernel settings with resolution instructions in like 2 hours) and well-informed support.

review_header: Fantastic service and value for money
review_body: Hetzner offers probably the best value for money hosting service on the market. We have a managed server for our 1 mio unique visitors per month website. Very low downtime (can't remember when we had one), very fast server response times and on-the call service that is always able to help. We have had far more expensive solutions hosted in Denmark which didn't even come close to Hetzner's performance and good value pricing.

While I was looking for an independant company to host my data and my client data I choose Hetzner for the price and the Deutsche Legislation, I still impress with their services. I mainly use their Cloud and their StorageBox but I'll also recommend their hosting and email service.

review_body: Good and low prices for good products. Fast support with good response. Easy and manageable control panel to control your servers.

name: Alex
review_header: I am really happy with their service.
review_body: I am really happy with their service. No other service in any other service can compare with the solutions which hetzner is providing. I would recommend them, no questions asked.

review_body: great great great great great great great great great great great great great great great great

name: Nedim Had≈æiosmanoviƒá
review_header: The hardware and network speeds on‚Ä¶
review_body: The hardware and network speeds on Hetzner are fabulous! We have experience with Azure, GCP, AWS and multiple other premium platforms but seeing this performance in action and the prices made us plan to transfer everything to Hetzner. Beware, these are UNmanaged servers so you have to set it up, control it and secure it. Most of the bad comments here are because people expect Hetzner to fix their configuration and security issues. We had a problem that we couldn't solve and we were happy to pay Hetzner for additional support!

review_body: I am an hetzner customer from 1 year and half and I never faced a problem with them. I purchased a server in auction and then switched to a server with ryzen 3600x. I also used multiple time their cheap vps/cloud service for tiny project. All works without issue, network is perfect (1GBit) and price are probably the lowest on the net

name: Reinoud van der Hijden
review_body: Helpful datacenter technicians, fast reaction on 24/7 support, powerfull stable servers. We like Hetzner verry much. You cant expect help with server configurations, but the policy is quite clear about that. Fair prices and good uptime.

name: Trapson
review_header: People rate this company bad but ive‚Ä¶
review_body: People rate this company bad but ive had no problems for like 2 months now. people seem to not know how to use the company and complain i had ddos problems it was one click and it fixed the issue. before buying this service have some brain before going out and buying a server there is reasons why there low priced dedicated servers cause you need to manage it yourself what is not hard atall

review_body: I am using the hetzner VPS for 1 year and I can say that I didn't had any issue with them. I am hosting multiple sites and no downtime. Also the performance is really good and the price is quite cheap.

review_body: Hetzner its one of the best company servers on the world, i really recommend all at hetzner for best result

review_header: I'm with Hezner for more years I dare to remember.
review_body: I'm with Hezner for more years I dare to remember, as it means I'm getting too old. üòÅ During those years I upgraded to my 5th servers, and once the installation fee was even waved. However, nothing in life is 100%, and the same goes for web-servers. As such, I had the pleasure to find out when things went beyond my technical knowledge, but the Hetzner team always saved the day to get me out of a jam, even beyond what they had to do.

name: Tomas Smith
review_body: Hetzner are good in their Virtual Servers product range however when it comes to dedicated servers I was a let down. I purchased a dedicated server form their auctions, it had two HDDs. The one HDD was fine, no errors and was working perfectly. The second HDD had numerous errors and was about to fail, despite me contacting Hetzner regarding this they came back to me and said the drive did not need replacing. UPDATE: I have now returned to Hetzner, and my server is running better than before. Their staff are much more helpful also.

name: Murat Kara
review_header: Hetzner sends abuse reports without checking/verifying them
review_body: it's blame how do you handle abuse policy towards your customers. They send abuse reports to their customers without without checking/verifying them. Somebody has open on a abuse report from his gmail. It was reported that illegal content is being distributed on a domain (the clou is that this Domain is not in the Hetzner Network and also the resolved IP address is not in the Hetzner Network). They sent us this Abuse Report without checking beforehand whether the information in the abuse report is correct, they doesn't verify anything. It looks like the Abuse Reports are being forwarded arbitrarily We kindly reject this abuse report and point out that you should verfiy such kind of reports. Hetzner should urgently work on his abuse policy and train his employees in the abuse team much better. Kindly regards

name: Imran Isak
review_header: Used Hetzner for over a year for my‚Ä¶
review_body: Used Hetzner for over a year for my business And they are great - services are super reliable and fast, and the support is top-notch 100% recommend!

name: call 911
review_body: Cheap, Amazing support, Up-to-date hardware and software!

name: Steve Moore
review_body: Created an account using the name of the service I was going to run my game servers under but they wanted proof it is a registered organization so I told them to use my official content creator name as it is a registered business. 2 days later, no response, still can't use my account, and they don't even send an email just to state your account has been rejected. Ok fine, created a second account just an individual one, provide photos of my driver's license, front and back, and 24 hours later, no response, no access to my second account. My advice, they are not worth the headache. They don't have any integrity nor do they know what true customer service is. They can use the excuse they get spammer and scammers, people don't pay bills, etc but it's all lies. Hosting companies, very big companies at that, all over the world don't even require proof of business registration or scan/photo of ID's and they are still in business doing much more business than Hetzner. Save yourself time, use Digital Ocean, OVH, SoYouStart, even GoDaddy is better than this company. Worst company ever and I will not be contacting anyone else from this company to provide information for a solution because honestly, YOU ARE A TRASH COMPANY.

name: Rahil Sarwar
review_body: I started using Hetzner around an year ago. The service is excellent and the support queries are answered quickly. Currently I'm using both dedicated servers and cloud VPS servers and the cost/performance is good. Even though their networking setup is a bit complex to setup (if you use IP pools on dedicated hardware) but I never faced any issue once I configured it. I just hope they start some form of reseller program. Highly Recommended!

review_header: If you want happiness with your‚Ä¶

review_header: Happily with Hetzner for nearly 2 years
review_body: I have been using my Hetzner dedicated server for nearly 2 years. It is great value - rather than go for a standard server package I used Hetzner's brilliant value server auction. This is where, having updated servers, rather than throw out the older server they make it available a bargain price. My server is an Intel Core i7-3770 Ôøºwith 2 x 3GB hdd and 2x RAM 8192 MB DDR3 (and unlimited bandwidth at 1 Gb) for ‚Ç¨26.22/month (including VAT) - less than many VPS offerings from competitors. Yes, I know this is not a Xenon server processor with enterprise hdd setup - but these are available at a very good price. Would I recommend Hetzner? Yes. Have I encountered any problems with Hetzner in the time I have been with them? No

Scalable performance and storage, and extremely low costs. A side note: honestly, paying 20‚Ç¨ for account verification, or submitting my driving license, did not bother me a lot. I do appreciate what they're doing, to keep scammers away... Maybe it's just because I had bad experiences with other providers that performed no control at all. Anyway, my account was activated within MINUTES. Support always replied fast to my concerns. They do not offer "technical" support on your projects, but hey, I don't expect it for 5‚Ç¨ / month! :)

review_body: I have been a client of Hetzner for years. Until I forgot to pay a bill recently. Granted, they sent me emails reminding to pay it. But I was busy and forgot it. Consequence: instead of simply freezing my account and waiting payment they deleted all my data and cancelled my contract in no time. You can say everything you want about Amazon but they would never loose a client like that over 8 euros. It's ridiculous. But I guess I should have foreseen this. It's a German company so their straightforward minds are apparently unable to understand that the client is king. This is their financial loss though as they just lost a client that would have stayed with them for years over 8 euros. This is too stupid to be true.

Stay safe from ! REALLY !

review_body: The server division seems to be okay. but whatever you do make sure you do not buy or move your domain to these people because it will stop working and they will shut it down by acting as they are following ICANN portal call when in fact they are not. again after buying more domains through them I have the same problem. my business is shut down and hurt. the customer service really does stink also. they will always pass the buck and never get anything done. name: Zahid Sheikh
review_header: Best Server Provider of all times!
review_body: I have been using Hetzner since Sept 2016 and found them promising with their server network. We had a setup of +30 server to make a cluster and was looking for high end network connectivity with 99.99% uptime. Hetzner fulfil our requirements smoothly. The portal access they provide to their clients is easy to use and can have full access of the servers.

name: H D
review_header: Customer service? No such thing here!
review_body: I used to be a Hetzner dedicated server customer a couple of years ago, and I liked the service. I now signed up for their Cloud servers where I wanted to run a small e-commerce site. Sadly, their service has gone down the drain, and I would not recommend being a Hetzner customer anymore. Shortly after registering and starting up a server, I got an email with a somewhat reasonable demand -- they needed a photo of an ID document, supposedly for legal/antispam purposes. Fine, I sent them a photo of my national ID card. I got no reply from them whatsoever. Shortly after that, they disabled my account. I have been trying to reach them both via email and their support system for three days and got no response from them. In a way I'm glad this happened early on - I wouldn't want to have this happen to me while processing customer orders. Hetzner, your customer service is horrible.

name: Nader Zaatari
review_header: They bill you after you stop using‚Ä¶
review_body: They bill you after you stop using their service We have stopped using the service since July 28 when we moved to our website to Shopify. We get surprised to see that we have been billed August and September. Every other service terminates your contract after not fulfilling 1 Bill. The other thing is that they are demanding us to pay in bank transfer which we can not do due to capital control in the country. We can only pay in paypal. Plus, I do not get why they want to charge us for 2 months of none use, I would understand if they bill us for 1st moth.

name: Azri Devan
review_body: good so far, good guys staff support, cheaper price than other provider in the world! good performance, good network on dedicated server, although sometimes limit on cloud server. thanks so much Hetzner.

name: Gyulai √Åd√°m
review_body: good price, excellent quality!

name: Che
review_header: Best hosting provider in our days
review_body: Listen folk, Hetzner is the best hosting provider in our days, why? 1. Its German based, engineers are professionals, not dumb like US providers where working only Indians and dont know what is yes and no :), security and privacy is perfect (US based hosting providers selling your data!!!) and excellent support team!!! 2. Virtualization is KVM!!! My Linux machines performance is excellent, no latency, no bottleneck. (i am changed couple hosting providers, they are using VmWare and its terrible) 3. On my cloud console i have all i need, all tools, DNS settings (i can even add or change my PTR records), Console, ISO images, Volume etc. Excellent tools all in one (dark mode is the best :) ). 4. All firewall ports are open (even 25). 5. Unbeatable price!!! Folk, if someones account or data deleted its your mistake, no need to do fraud. If your servers or business is clear and there is no fraud or security incidents then nobody will close your account and delete your data!!! Only one minus -> there is no default OpenSUSE image :) how? Its German based hosting provider, opensuse is german Linux OS :) but all images available only via mounting and installing manually, i hope they will add this image to default images! also good to get minimal images! Minimal images no resource hungry. Hetzner team, thank you, keep good working!
