name: Francis Ashley
review_header: Termiantes servers, no reason given, see Terms of Use 9.2
review_body: Hosted websites with Hetzner for 3 years but they terminated all our servers due to a few invalid abuse tickets we receied from a competitor. They cannot be bothered to deal with reports, even though they allow this misuse of their 'abuse' ticket system. Hetzner terms: "9.2 The contract is cancellable without giving reasons by both parties at any time during a period of 30 days to the end of the month..." That means they can cancel all your services for no reason whatsoever. They can give you 24 hours notice - even at the weekend or public holidays. For this reason, it is unsafe to use Hetzner for any serious projects.

name: Lazar Milic
review_header: veri gud i will bui agen

name: Stefan Baronio
review_body: From the time I started using their services, Hetzner has taken action of many shady business practices. I missed one payment 2 days after it was due, and they completely disabled my account. They still demanded I pay the invoice by bank transfer, and I attempted to get access to my account so I would not have to pay a $100 bank transfer fee. After 10+ emails, it was clear that they were not going to give access to my account, so I paid in bank transfer and told them to disable my account as I did not want any further business with them. After I paid it, they claimed it was disabled, and I thought that would be the last time I heard from them. A few weeks later, I got an email claiming I owed them more money, even after I had paid their fees and $100 extra for the bank transfer fee. This time, I did not want to pay via bank transfer because I did not want to pay $130 for a $30 charge. I went back and forth with them hoping to get another method so I could pay them and be done with them forever, but they demanded I continue to pay them in bank transfer. I am debating what to do now as they continually charge me for transactions I do not authorize. I'm currently waiting for another reply from the customer support team confirming I do not owe them any more money and that this will be the last time I ever need to deal with their company. Their services may be cheap, but it is not worth the headache that you get from dealing with their customer support. The amount of extra money I have spent and the amount of hours I have wasted due to their incompetence makes their cheap prices completely worthless. You save more money by using more reputable services and less sketchy companies. Do yourself a favor, don't choose Hetzner and choose a company that cares about its clients. Ticket #2020100803016872

name: Aleksandr
review_body: Really worst service ever. We run (still but now switching to another provider) several dedicated servers with load balancer together. Load balancers crashed 3 times in 2 days. Hetzner people don't even respect their clients. They proposed 10 euros for such an inconvinience. They don't care that we lost a lot of our cliens. Don't lose your time with such a company.

review_header: Cannot believe how terrible Hetzner actually IS.
review_body: Okay, here is a honest review from a person, who uses few different networks for Game Servers and Websites. Hetzner has a damn good price when it comes to Dedicated machines and Cloud servers no doubt. When I made a request to their staff team i was gobsmacked, it IS terrible and by terrible i mean 98% of them don't actually have an idea what customer care actually is. You should be ashamed really, what is what i can say. I am a customer of a Bulgarian datacenter, where they use Voxility as their DDoS protection, which (not always detects an attack), but in order for them to solve my issues they have enabled always on mode on Voxility DDoS protection for my ip. I recently asked Hetzner about this, they have responded that there is NO WAY they can do that, because technical things. Dude... who do you think ur talking to? I get it you think your customers are stupid right, like there is no way for me to go into arbor's website and check that with every service they offer always on mode for their protection. Bottom of the line, use Hetzner ONLY for educational purposes. e.g. when your make yourself a website and want to see what an actual system administrator faces when trying to deflect DDoS. Your sensor mode setting suck hard... no joke there is no normal ddos protection, which takes 15 minutes to define traffic as malicious. 15 minutes?!. DO NOT USE Hetzner!!! As soon as i find a provider other than OVH (which i get DDoS-ed internally) i will change providers. Poor support. State of the nonsense DDoS protection. False advertising. Shady network management practices. Arbor is not a terrible DDoS protection, your incompetent network engineers team makes it to be that. Ticket#2020101303005721 Thats all on Hetzner's services for now.

name: James
review_body: I use there servers aleady many years from Dedicated to Cloud (before VPS) servers. The backend is very nice to use. Only pitty that they don't have there own free plugins for WHMCS systems.

name: Alex.E.
review_header: Be careful! Your account can be disabled at any time
review_body: I will never recommend hetzner to anyone. These guys are blocking servers without warning. They don't even send a message that the server (or accounts) is disabled. Like many others, i started the server, and the next day I got the error - account disabled. I DID NOT (!!!) get any notifications in my email. I was just confronted with a fact. My situation is very similar to one of the last reviews. My account was also blocked, and I CAN NOT even DOWNLOAD the DATA that was left on hetzner's servers!!! I wrote to support, but no one has answered me for several days. I don't know the reason why the block was made. I'm not interested. With this attitude to the client, I do not want to use this hosting, and the price does not matter. Hetzner, what prevents you from simply disabling Internet access on the server, or giving time for a client to download their data and leave you for another hosting service? It's sad that I didn't read the reviews before registering my hetzner account.

name: S M Mahmudul Hasan
review_body: I have been using a cloud VPS for a year now, recently created another server for another project. Good service, have no issue with the technical support as well, support emails have been always in time as expected. I would definitely suggest people who are looking for cheap servers for their budget projects, at least the Hetzner Cloud, which I have used and have personal experience with.

name: Cristian
review_body: I've using their services by a year now, even for reselling, and they are amazing. Not to mention the unbeateable price

name: Vladimir
review_header: Account disabled. No notifications. No support.
review_body: I have registered a Hetzner Cloud account. During registration, the hosting asked me for the card details to write off the verification amount. Then it asked for documents. I sent them too. Everything is successful, the account is ready to go. I bought a program that I wanted to use on the hosting. The license of the program is tied to HWID (I tied it to the Hetzner servers). I hired a freelancer to help me set up the servers. Wasted money and time. I started everything. The next day I try to log into the Hetzner account and see an error: "account disabled." What happened? Why is my account disabled? I have given you all the data. (card and passport) Why were there no notifications? I asked these questions to support of Hetzner via email. But nobody answers me. As a result, I was left without money, without servers, and I also cannot download my data. I can't transfer the purchased program to another hosting! If the hosting (hetzner) didn't like me for some reason, why weren't there any notifications? Why don't you give me time to transfer my data to another hosting? Why aren't you answering emails? Disgusting attitude towards the client!

name: √ñzg√ºr Ulusoy
review_header: Hetzners Account Cancellation without proving any evidence
review_body: We are Turkish based company and host web servers in Germany. Our hosting provider Hetzner Online GmbH. Hetzner allows their servers to be resold. We currently run around 60 customer servers. Sometimes we receive abuse reports from Hetzner, because sometimes customers distribute copy-protected content. But we also get Abuse reports for server ip's which was not assigned to our Hetzner account. Anyway in our terms and conditions, we expressly point out to our customers that we do not tolerate the distribution of copy-protected content and that it is expressly prohibited! In the case of an abuse report by Hetzner, we immediately suspend the corresponding server acceess. The server traffic is completely blocked. By the way we sometimes get Abuse reports for Server where the in and out traffic which was blocked by the Hetzner Firewall. This situation makes us think how reliable are the abuse reports that were sent to us by Hetzner by mail. From a legal point of view, for a valid copyright infrigment a letter must be issued by the local court. Which is unfortunately not the case with Hetzner. Anyway we forward the Hetzner Abuse Report to our customers, we also demand the clients to remove the corresponding copy-protected content immediately. We make mention of, that just only a few such cases. Regardless, Hetzner informed us by email that our account would be canceled at the end of November and all servers are automatically schedule to termiante to that date. This irresponsibly act of Hetzner towards its customers. In addition, this action brings unreliability towards Hetzner. We have a responsibility towards our honest customers, this irresponsible behavior by Hetzner leaves us embarrassed and in trouble with our client. Hetzner really has to work on how they deal with their business partners. They have to see the major customers as partners and work better with them. Here the original Text: Dear Mr XXXXXXX, Thank you for having chosen Hetzner Online GmbH as your webhosting partner. We appreciate the trust you have placed in us. Unfortunately, there are a number of issues with your account. This includes, but is not limited to, abuse complaints for your servers, and poor reputation of your IPs. As a result of this, your account KXXXXXXXXXXX and all services you have with us are going to be cancelled. The cancellation is being done in accordance with our Terms and Conditions (https // www hetzner . com/rechtliches/agb/). The official cancellation date is the end of next month, November 30th, 2020. If you would like to cancel the servers to an earlier date you are welcome to do so via your client webinterface. If by the end of this month any dedicated servers have not yet been scheduled for cancellation, we will automatically schedule them for cancellation to the end of next month. If we detect further abuse from your servers, then they will be blocked and not unblocked. Please make sure all abusive activities are completely prohibited and that there won't be any more issues. This decision is final and cannot be appealed. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards Your Hetzner Online Team

name: Antonio Rodrigues
review_body: I've been a happy customer for many years, first by purchasing a server via the the auction service and now using the cloud offering. Fortunately these days Hetzner provide cloud services, so I can attach load balancers and configure private networks in my cluster. For those who don't need to pay a lot more to AWS, this has been just an amazing supplier over the years.

name: Thibeau M.
review_body: They are an amazing hosting service at amazing prices but they are locking my server and keep locking my server even after telling them that the ips connect to are ours and have the permission to connect to them. They say there is no reason to connect to unrouted ips but it's a monitoring system, it exists exactly for the reason to catch errors like unrouted ips. I doubt "a segment of your network has been adversely affected." because of a few connections to unrouted ips every now and then... you are running a full datacenter. Would happily give the full 5 stars if they stop making a problem of it. Ticket#2020101003009465

name: YetAn0therUser
review_header: Solid service, good value. Used for years.
review_body: I have been using their servers for at least 5 years, I had dedicated servers and also cloud server/s. I think it is decent value for the price. Regarding cloud VPS i am now using, i think it is rock solid. I am not aware about downtime in months. It is fast. Management is ok, with some things i would improve, but i think they have their own head and rather not listed what i say. Support is decent, but offcourse this is unmanaged service.

name: Mohamed Saber
review_body: 3.7 Rate? Really!? This guys offer Cheapest Server i ever found , Best On market maybe support not the best ( No Live chat ) Just live chat for sales and interface is look very old ( For Dedicated Servers ) But still worth it i see many rates here angry cause they refuse to offer service to them and disable there accounts, it's sadly i know but it's not a reason to give them 1 start, they just doing there job Thanks For Hetzner For That HQ Service Hope You Change Site Looks Improve your Support Service cause atm it's not the best.

name: Moiz Izzy
review_header: Hetzner provides super fast servers at economical prices and amazing support
review_body: To be honest I had a dedicated server with hetzner and because I wanted to diversify my cloud hosting I tried aws azure and even linode and do but no one and I mean it literally no one could match the speed of the hetzner servers and the hetzner servers take it to the next level with its pricing. But even if you ignore that they are more economical their servers are just much faster due to the NVME drives and the better CPU. The one disadvantage though is that they don‚Äôt have as many Datacenter as some of the other guys, but I came back to hetzner after months of evaluating everyone else. Also they provide complete flexibility on what you want to run and have OS images that you can link to when you set up a new dedicated or cloud server. Their new load balancers are super cool and you can even balance you traffic between dedicated and cloud servers using the lb, how cool is that. And to top it off I was not expecting this but their support is very good, there are probably better support models in the market. But I have never had a critical reason to chat with support (that in itself talks about their reliability) but the few times I wanted some kvm attached or pen drive attached they were just super quick and friendly and to be honest this makes a difference you could have the best servers in the world but without a good support team serious clients will leave. Speaking from a bad experience I had before I came to hetzner.. but been with them for over 3 years now and it‚Äôs by grace of god been amazing

name: oti
review_body: I cannot use my account, because my "Account is disabled". I am sent the government issued (ukrainian) my ID card. One day, after sent my ID, i cannot login my account. Why? Whats happened, without reason? when i didn't do anything So I am stay in the DO yet.

name: Hans Peter
review_body: I have been a costumer since 2016 and here you have the best servers. The service is insanly good also the stability is just fantastic. I have several VPS servers and I also had 5-6 different dedicated servers. I ended now up on ryzen 9 with 128 GB Ram. Thank's for being the best!

name: M. Lange
review_body: Hardware was replaced literally within minutes with a very reachable and highly knowledgeable support from Hetzner. Servers feature excellent performance and they are highly cost effective. Resources are perfectly manageable, focusing on the essentials and skipping over-complications. Exactly what I need for fulfilling my requirements in the field of realtime earth observation and satellite operations. Highly recommended.

name: Tim Suchanek
review_header: I'm using Hetzner dedicated servers for‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm using Hetzner dedicated servers for over a year now in production and couldn't be happier.

name: LeapReturn startup
review_header: They had blocked the account just after‚Ä¶
review_body: They had blocked the account just after registration, no one e-mail to support was answered, just got automatic confirmations and ticket numbers. The support service representative told me on the phone that I'm not good enough to be their client, without any further explanations. And this how a public company must not behave in the 21st century.

name: Hostonio Internet Services
review_header: The most reliable DC in Europe

name: Kapil Soni
review_body: My friend recommended me Hetzner somewhere around 2012 when I was struggling with my hosting provider. Since then I stick to them. Although at start I had few difficulties with support as I was new to handle dedicated server and they don't software support for dedicated machines. They are straight forward with their policies. But, infect this helped me to learn a lot of things about servers and now I am handling my own server all by myself. I am hosting my own websites on one dedicated server (which is enough for me) and never had any issues with connection/order/hardware/support. They are very perfect with their service if you know what help you need to ask. I highly recommend Hetzner.

name: Konstantin Nikitin
review_body: After registration, the system asked for my ID, and I uploaded it. In 10 minutes I got a message that my account is disabled. So, the conclusion is: given a name, my ID photo, and my ID, it is enough for this company to disable my account. They are just racists. Happy not to support them with my money! UPD: according to the UK Equality Act 2010, you are not allowed to do this.

name: Stefan Schumacher
review_header: Reliable dedicated server are good value for money
review_body: As a customer for a few years now, I can say, dedicated servers are very reliable and value for money. I am using the cloud servers for tests and Minecraft servers too sometimes. I like the easy way to set them up or expand them on demand. I haven't tried shared web hosting myself, but from the given experience I referred a few customers and they all don't regret the decission to go to Hetzner.

name: Loay Aburas
review_header: I would like the Hetzner team for their support
review_body: I have been using their services for more than 6 years, I didn't face any issues, they are growing and adding new features like V-Switch and firewall. Keep it up.

name: Ed
review_body: Just plain trash service. No support at all. They asked for ID I sent it and guess what. They not only blocked account for NO reason they weren't bothered to send me a response.

name: Dean Martin
review_body: I had a server, repeatedly have sent emails since June to cancel the server, i used it for like 3 days, have nothing but issues, Support was also bad. Even after sending constant emails, they continue to take money from my bank to date (August 22 2020). Thats 3 months of constant emails to stop taking money as i had requested cancellation. Avoid at all cost - use a reputable company. Only way i got it sorted was by contacting by bank fraud team who are dealing with them.

name: Jake Adams
review_body: They do not care about their customers and make decisions solely based on what is convenient for them. When choosing Hetzner to host your important projects, remember this from their T&C's: "9.2 The contract is cancellable without giving reasons by both parties at any time during a period of 30 days to the end of the month, but at the earliest on expiry of the minimum contract period stipulated in the contract. " So Hetzner can cancel all your servers 1 day before they are due to renew. This could give you 24 hours or less to move to another service provider. They could notify you at 3AM, on a Sunday, or on Christmas Day. So only trust Hetzner with websites/apps/services where you are able to move everything within 24 hours. Don't trust them with anything important.

name: Sanel ve Tayfun ile Yeni Rotal
review_body: I am a client and they rejected my account without any reason. We are not a small company and can not confirm that type of behaviour. Arbitrary behaviours will effect your brand. We have the right to find a service provider and Hetzner is not only the one.

name: iOshawott
review_body: Even if you reach any problems with their dedicated servers, they'll make sure you'll be happy with it! There is a trial period, go and try it yourself!

name: Gerard
review_header: Best hosting company I've ever used
review_body: Best hosting company I've ever used - and I have been with a lot of different companies over the years.

name: Roman Sangemino
review_header: I have been using Hetzner for over a year
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for over a year now and I can't recommend them enough!

name: Vlad
review_body: Our company has been a client of Hetzner since 2012. We are in business of developing and hosting web and mobile applications for our clients. From simple company web sites, to full turnkey solutions and database information systems. Quality hosting is number one priority for us, and we found that in Hetzner. The primary products we use at Hetzner are dedicated servers, with some secondary use of cloud. Vast selection of hardware, from very cheap desktop grade machines, to quality enterprise grade Xeons and AMD, for quite affordable prices. Cloud offering is in its beginnings (compared feature-wise to other public clouds), but evolves steadily. The "Serverborse" auctioning of older machines is perhaps unique to Hetzner (haven't seen a similar offer in EU) and though old, at least Xeon grade servers are high quality and (re)usable in enterprise. Network is stable, power is stable, the only uptime busting happens when we reboot for kernel upgrades. Tech support responds reasonably fast, they're skilled and helpful. We only have positive experience with Hetzner, we have no complaints or plans to look for another provider and we recommend their services to anyone needing anything from hobby hosting through professional, enterprise grade hosting where it's critical part of your business.

name: hasanain
review_body: fast and reliable fast replays good live chat

name: Matthias H
review_body: Reliable, fast, helpful support and cheap servers! The only thing I miss is a better managed database service with mirroring of data and fail over.

name: Explorer of the WEB
review_body: I typically rent a server to pass all my traffic(legal) through an encrypted tunnel, for my privacy obviously, but i stopped as soon as i created an account since Hetzner requires an ID document to validate the identity of their customers...this simply defeats my purposes...not going to do this. maybe in the future if they change their policy.

name: Marcio Andr√© Avelino Do Vale
review_body: This a great datacenter ever, I buy in the last week, and it's a surprise to the services offered by Hetzner.

name: Christiaan V
review_body: Worst customer service I have ever experienced. I was late 2 weeks of paying an invoice of 2 euro's due to holidays and they send me a letter to say they are giving it to a debt collector and blocked my account. Then I receive a second invoice of ‚Ç¨1,31 which I'm not able to pay due to the blocked account. The communication following that with customer service is horrible. This was a small test project but I will never work with company again.

name: Vorname Name
review_body: I am new user, just configured my server this weekend. And it's soo fast comparing to strato vhost :D If the performance will be all the time like this, I'm very very happy to stay with you guys for a longer time :)

name: ravi yadav
review_body: I am using Hetzner from more than 9 years. And i am 100% satisfied with their support. Usually i get response within an hour. I have many Dedicated , and cloud servers hosted with Hetzner. They are very professional .. They do not provide software support or configuration support they are only limited to H/w support and h/w replacement support which they do very well much appreciated.

name: Dejan Krstic
review_body: If you provide a service 24/7 then you must have support 24/7. It is unacceptable that I send incident report at 17h today and you don't get to reply until 18h and now I have to wait until monday. I was just trying your services for a few days and wanted to move all my servers but I already bumped into show-stopper (lack of 24/7 support) so I will stay at Vultr (responds to support tickets within minutes at any time).

name: Erman G√ºner
review_body: I started work with Hetzner 2,5 months ago. We have 14 clouds and 6 dedicated servers on Hetzner. Everything was fine until today. Today I have requested KVM for dedicated servers. I have added note in KVM ticket that I need to Install Windows Server 2019 please restart the computer from network and start the installation (I have installed 4 servers, all operators restarted computers and started Windows Server 2019 installation from network). This time Mic *** S√§ *** asked ISO file from me then I informed him that "I already installed 4 computers on Hetzner and all operators started the computer from network. They started Windows server 2019 installation from your network" But he did not start the installation from network. After a lot of emails (23 emails) we could not soleve the problem. I can provide screenshots mails of your 2 different operators. 4 operators started Windows Server 2019 installation from your network and last operator sent us "we do not know what you mean". I waited in front of computer more than 2 hours and tried to explain it then we sent please take out KVM!!! Please let me know is this professionalism? After that how we can trust you? We have 63 servers on Google Cloud and 91 servers on AWS we did not hear "we do not know what you mean" from them!!! My ticket is Ticket#2020082603006611

name: Miguel Angel Diaz
review_body: After creating my account, creating my servers, charging 20 euros from my paypal ... they disable my account and delete my servers, I use many providers and this is the worst difference, 3 emails to support and no response, I already have filed the claim by paypal, if you are looking for a serious provider for this price use scaleway or take a look at the google or aws spots, they are a scam

name: Andr√© Timm
review_header: I rented a server at hetzner
review_body: I rented a server at hetzner. But but.. The server went down when installed OS. So i have overall nothing good to say about Hetzner. I also have escalated the refund case to PayPal. Sad sad. Plus there was No help at All to get from support.

name: Zsolt G
review_header: I sent my document and they cancelled my account
review_body: I have created an account on their platform. This has been followed by an email to provide my document as I am a high-risk customer. I have phoned the company to ask specifically what data to remain visible and what to blur/take out before uploading it on their platform. I have sent the requested document and after 2 minutes they rejected my application and deleted my account. I would expect from a hosting company to contact me with an email and ask to provide an alternative document or form of authentication before cancelling my account especially that they have been phoned before for this matter. I definitely do not recommend this company and I will express my opinion on all social media about them.

name: Wesley
review_header: Cheap and fast servers but don't expect good service
review_body: They will always try to blame you first so you have to deal with it on your own instead of properly investigating. Even when you try to explain they are at fault or responsible for the problem they just don't care and close your ticket. Reply: I'm off course not talking about the server itself but the network and environment.

name: Md Robi
review_header: I will Try 3 Time And Give Valid‚Ä¶
review_body: I will Try 3 Time And Give Valid Document But hetzner.com Rejected and Disable My Account Very Bad Service I didn‚Äôt expect it from them.

name: Sergej Dergatsjev
review_body: Excellent hosting provider. Good technical support. Take care of the technical side. I had a little problem that they sometimes base on admins personal decisions. Not long ago had a racist client who has been bothering me in all areas. That is complicated if you do not have a permanent manager or someone who can lead a certain issue. In all cases there are sometimes difficult situations for all major clients, which are resolvable. Hetzner shows his best side and professionalism.

name: Andrew Chemerys
review_body: Great and fast hosting, I recommend!

name: Priya Malik
review_header: Best ever service I used in my Life
review_body: Best ever service I used in my Life. I would like to recommend all developers & bloggers to use Hetzner Services for reliability & best support.

name: Alberto
review_body: They cancelled my paid subscription, I don't know why and they refuse to tell me why. I can't recommend

name: Koushik MS
review_body: Coding in the cloud I used a cloud based development env that I could live code in along with my colleagues and it was super responsive, accessible and easy to use.

name: Fed Up
review_header: Great if you are a Russian spammer
review_body: Great if you are a Russian spammer, not good for the rest of us. They used to deal with spam reports seriously but now just ignore it. Part of the problem no longer part of the solution

name: Y√ºcel Yavuz
review_header: I have been working since approximately‚Ä¶
review_body: I have been working since approximately 2018. I haven't had any problems so far

name: customer
review_body: I love Hetzner, these guys are so nice and great. GREAT Prices ! GREAT Proformance ! GREAT HARDWARE ! And lovely locations ! Thank you Hetzner.com <3 -Mason Matthew Hauk

name: Tolga Atilla
review_body: Monthly ip prices + terrible invoice system... I stopped using Hetzner because of those problems. I am using TL as currency, so can't keep up with their weird invoice system. But their hardware is good, got nice high performance servers, guaranteed bandwith is a big advantage if you need upload large sized files, Their support is kinda good , they are returning to your questions really really fast. Always putting new hardwares on sale, like ryzen and i9 .But like i said, i stopped using because of that horrible, terrible "bulk invoice" system.

name: bayilyas
review_body: Provided documents for verification. They blocked account without any information provided, no emails, nothing. Strange company.

name: Saief H.
review_header: I provided them the scanned copy of my‚Ä¶
review_body: I provided them the scanned copy of my passport and linked my credit card but they have disabled my account saying "We have decided to deactivate your account because of some concerns we have regarding this information". I can't even login now to remove my credit card and personal document. I have already emailed them but no response! If they allow customers only from specific country/region then they shouldn't allow others to register at the first place and steal customer's credit card and passport info. So don't even think of registering with this shi*ty company.

name: New Partner in UAE
review_body: It gave business confidence by Stability, Availability & Security measures.

name: Jean Tankred
review_body: We wanted to buy a cloudserver at Hetzner but made the unfortunate mistake not to read the first mail properly, which asked for ID confirmation. This was amended a few days afterwards, supplying Hetzner with the desired information alongside with an apology. We also filled in a contact form. After a week we‚Äôre still waiting for a reply from either. This is a shame because we really wanted to join Hetzner, as we know their servers are actually good, but if you freeze out potential customers just like that because of a minor error, which was subsequently rectified, I sadly cannot recommend the company at all.

name: a.w.
review_header: Good products for a good price
review_body: They offer a variety of product to a very good price. I have dedicated servers and then run since years without problem. Support is quite fast in response but they also have a wiki which is quite comprehensive and very useful.

name: dimden
review_body: great service, been using it for more than 1 year with no downtime

name: Marvin
review_body: For 2 Years now, I currently host 2 machines here, 1 Cloud VPS acting as a VPN that is used for LAN gaming as we play some games that only work with LAN. this was getting so much more useful since the covid-19 outbreak, we are able to have LAN party's even being home. How cool is that. It also hosts my websites on it without any problems. The network is super reliable. as we're located in the netherlands the ping is pretty good. 25 ms where i'm located. I also have 1 dedicated machine, for the price for those machines and what you get is outstanding. I use that machine for Game servers. including Heavy Modded Minecraft. And it works wonderful. Support is also very helpful.

name: Yathiraj S Padavinangady
review_body: I have created my account on this Friday and I have purchased 1 x Dedicated Root Server EX42-NVMe * Location: HEL1 * For HEL1, support is only available in English. * Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS minimal (English) Reference number: B20200806-1616660 Account Creation number is #K0856431220 After that hetzner asked me the documents for verification. There are 2 options one is documents updates another is PayPal account verification. I uploaded my Indian passport copy. They have rejected and cancelled all my products? Can I activate my account again? Or can I get my payment back

name: Wael Ali
review_body: Best service for long time and i don't face any issue.

name: Christian Bregendahl
review_body: HETZNER A SCAM COMPANY where I pay ‚Ç¨278 per month! The support is extremely weak and they try to keep you as the client in any way. They make it extremely difficult to get my own domain after transferring this to Hetzner. Also, the expensive managed server went extremely slow suddenly (slower than a cheap hosting to $1 a month). can NOT in any way recommend Hetzner. The interface is also super old and it is impossible to figure around. Really bad user experience and the worst I have tried ever.

name: Ashus
review_header: Great Customer service and fast response!
review_body: I'm a beginner (learning on my own) on how to setup a linux server, run it, and pretty much train myself. I chose Hetzner because of their pricing compared to the specced out server they gave. Loved it. I love their customer service, even though everything is very new to me, they resolved every issue I had almost instantly, sending support ticket usually gets resolved within 5-7mins. I'd definitely recommend them for anyone who wants to deploy a server. Their rates what got me, but their customer service is what will make me stick with them!

name: Rocky Desuza
review_body: It's not good i created an account and provided my id for verification and they just disabled my account without any prior notice or reason why they did that i think they are only after people's data this site is scam for stealing your data i haven't even ordered i just created the account and info for verification so i can buy once my account gets verified and how can i fake my own gov id's. i think your way of doing thing is just awesome

name: Fares K.
review_header: Really nice and reliable host but then‚Ä¶
review_body: Really nice and reliable host but when they say not managed they really mean it :)

name: Tomislav Novak
review_header: Quality services, fast and reliable support
review_body: Great prices, quality services, fast and reliable support.

name: andy
review_body: First off will start by Saying i have a lot of services with two big French Companies as well as some with a various others spread around. I wanted to try their cloud offering and literally could not believe what i was seeing. I created a 2 core instance just for trial. And bam, there it is a few seconds later. I SSH in literally within 10 seconds and there it is waiting for me. The main French company it can take upto 5 minutes to get an instance and log in details, the smaller company is about a minute, so this was impressive. Now from point of logging in to having Pritunl up and running was less than 5 minutes. Everything was just so fast, from getting updates to installing, i dont think i saw a single percentage done symbol anywhere. Seriously impressed i came here just to write a review. And lastly, at last a control panel that is fresh looking easy to navigate, fast and has a wealth of info. Fair play to Hetzner, if the stability is as good as the speed i will slowly move over my other services

name: Max Del√©r
review_body: Their cloud is superior. I just LOVE working in it, as compared to AWS or GCP. Instances are created in 1-2 seconds, everything is very straight forward, the interface is blazing fast, and the prices are unbeatable and straight forward. MUCH lower than AWS/GCP prices. The server performance are absolutely phenomenal. I highly recommend it!

name: Angel
review_body: Absolutely amazing. Been with them for over 2 years now and all I can say is their services are top notch and very affordable. The quality and the prices will not be matched anywhere else on the internet, therefore I am confidently saying you can stop your research and go with Hetzner. The support is not that responsive, but if you have the knowledge to get around, you will never need them.

name: Andreas Pofler
review_body: Got an email about missing invoice payment and they said i had until 1/08 to pay I then sent multiple emails about that I wanted to take a backup of my precious data and they completely ignored my request. it was unreplaceable data and yet they ignored my request and deleted my data before the aforementioned last payment date.

name: Nicolas Marot
review_body: Affordable servers with excellent support. Unlimited network.

name: Asperix
review_body: VPS CX11 2GB - very attractive monthly price. I made setup of Centos7+free cyberpanel+free openlitespeed plus openLitespeed cache - almost out of the box installation and ready to go hosting system, and outstanding performance with low RAM use even on multi dynamic sites (even 100/100 on google page insights). Hetzner checks personal documents when registering - very good idea, so I feel safe that there are no psycho abusing users around on servers. Over 2 months of use with 100% uptime. Switched from OVH and very happy since then.

name: Laura Hausmann
review_body: no issues for over a year, dedicated and cloud servers cheaper than anywhere else, network is super fast (when accessing the servers from germany), the free secondary DNS servers are wonderful and everything has a well documented API. 10/10

name: Joe
review_body: Had an account for 2 weeks, I host my personal projects and sites. I got false abuse reported by someone, I don't know who claiming I was hosting content which I was not. I've since been suspended for hetzner and there support tells me I will not be unsuspended and they no longer want my business. Yes that's right, a paying customer who has done nothing wrong was removed from your services because of what I assume was some jealous child abuse spammed my IP address and instead of looking into it, or actually listening to me telling you they are not real you just suspend me.

name: Serghei Burca
review_header: Worst accounting and support ever seen
review_body: We have made 3 payments (wire transfer, because they force us to use only this method) and in the end got the account blocked on Friday. The worst thing is that the support and accounting for Cloud is working only Mo. - Fr., 8am - 6pm (CEST) our working day is starting from 16pm German time, so we couldn't solve the problem with them till Monday what is very frustrating keeping all or service down for 3 days, anyway, I called them on Monday, the person that I have discussed with was very rude and didn't give me any option to pay for the invoice, forcing only wire transfer (we did the transfer 11 day ago) and keep telling me that they don't see the money in there account even if I have presented the confirmation, strange isn't it. After the discussion she told me that will unblock the account only after they will receive the money. Strangely enough, after the call my account was unblocked and I can see the transaction in the balance section, even stranger that the transaction date is 9 July which is 11 days ago. My question is : Why did you blocked my account if you had the money? P.S. Blocking the account on Friday when you know that you don't have any support causing loses for you clients and not having support 24/7 it's ridiculous.

name: Akam
review_body: I just purchased a dedicated server, the hardware was very good and the customer support was very quick. But they confused me with very strange thing, they suddenly blocked my Server and they told me that there was some packets from my server with different MAC address, lol, this is just happening in any environment, there might be millions of traffic from any server and when using VPN to connect to your server then the MAC will be visible, and all those packets because of bad Network configuration, and they told me to cancel my order then I just did it. I think Hetzner is very Good Company and Legit, but they can't grew because they don't know how to deal with the market and how to satisfy their customer. Currently, I have around 10 servers, and 10 VPS in different places, its the first time that someone tell me that my server sent packets which was not allowed, I asked for help but they didn't helped me, I also told support team that I authorize them to login to my server but still no luck. That's it, when IT Security playing a big role it will cause other business side to down, and when there is no security then a big lose will happen, there must a balance between Security and Business all the time to prevent revenue loss.

name: Mohamed M. Hagag
review_body: They are good in everything from prices to specs to support. Perfect for business hosting.

name: Thiago de Siqueira da Silva
review_body: I abandoned the traditional dedicated and vps, and today with cloud (using ceph), my projects have more security to stay on the air. Hetzner today houses my most sensitive projects. Improvement points: - It would be interesting only to have live support at a cost of, for example, 2 euros per month; - List of so-called open support; - Finally, have more agility in accepting new registrations, and have a panel for resellers who want to have several clouds (+20), without risk of cancellation.

name: Sriram
review_body: Amazing Service! Very great support! Love the simpleness of Hetzner. and range of servers is great too!

name: Ens
review_header: Just stay away; before you pay more than expected !
review_body: Let me tell you what is gonna happen to you when you want to cancel an order. Hetzner won't be able to cancel the order before the due,( and of course they will cancel just after the due). And they will charge you for a new full year of payment. As a result; you won't be able to use the order and you will pay full year. I had an order with annual renew date of 26 June and I had cancelled the order on 31 May. I shocked when they sent me an e-mail on 1 July to pay the new annual payment. I said there must be a mistake, but the response was even shocking. "You confirmed this as part of our general terms and conditions when ordering the domain." Quite inspirational right, Yeah Hetzner you are absolutely right, everybody reads those terms and conditions

name: Andrei Burichita
review_body: Always the best.... Have been working now with this server for 3 years and i am still amazed of how good it is compared to other services both inside and outside Germany...

name: UiQ Arena
review_header: Working with them for more than 10 years
review_body: I am working with this company for more than 10 years. amazing quality and they know what they are doing. We have a great latency to the US locations which is really important for our customers. I would definitely recommend this company to all countries. In addition being in Germany would help a lot those who are concerned regarding privacy.

name: Antonis
review_header: We are 100% satisfied with Hetzner Cloud Service.
review_body: We have been using Hetzner Cloud for over two years. We are completely satisfied by the speed and availability of the service. We are also excited that we can spin-up new servers as soon as we need them, and decommission them right after the end of each project. No lengthy commitments and no waiting time. Invoicing has also been a smooth experience. We get the invoice at the start of each month, which explains in detail what we need to pay. No surprises, no strange invoice terms. Customer service is also very good. We needed to contact them once and they responded quickly and to the point.

name: Aleksei Tcelishchev
review_body: Hetzner provides cheap and also rock solid solutions

name: Friedrich
review_body: Support is fast. Super prices.

name: Localhost
review_body: I like it very much! Fast, secure, simple, price !

name: ELHadj Tahraoui
review_header: Stay far away as you can see my review‚Ä¶
review_body: Stay far away as you can see my review below they said you can create an account again you will pass the verification that was a lie they perma ban my account and even didn't tell why just guys stay away and go with contabo much better prices and support. That's my honest review this company shouldn't be a German one. ----reply___ Just state that you don't African / Arabian customers I bet that you don't have a single African or Arabian customers btw I will never go with you or try your services even you provide them for free GTH I'm Soo mad how you treat us.

name: Jason
review_body: I tried to order from them last March. Their system will just ask for your ID (passport) which I complied because I trusted them. Then afterwards what they did is just to suddenly deny me. Tried to contact support either to resolve the issue or if not just to delete my data and ID that I sent to them. But they don't have any response whatsoever. I don't know if I can ever trust this company who just ask for a personal data from you (in this case ID/passport) then afterwards once they get it, poof they will deny you access. Furthermore, I'm not sure about what they are going to do with that passport which I can't remove from their site and which is already a privacy issue on my part. One advice I can give for persons who is looking for hosting, STAY AWAY from this company. Don't give them your ID whatsoever. If I can give this company a zero star, I have done it already :(

name: Georgi
review_body: We have been using Hetzner for over 2 years now and never had any issues with their service. Their Support Team is always helpful and providing us with the best suggestion.

name: Simon
review_body: Have been using them for 3 years now, had no major problems or outages yet. Good experiences with customer support and prices.

name: Isaac Alich
review_header: Wish they'd do more to combat email spam
review_body: Great servers and great prices to go along with them. This being said, I wish they would do more to combat email spam coming out of their servers like blocking port 25 by default and requiring a ticket to unblock it like many other popular platforms. I hosted email with them in the past and I'd occasionally end up with the entire IP blocks on a blacklist because of the endless spam other servers nearby would send out. This is a pretty big problem if you're planning on sending emails, but other than that the servers are good and I had no issues with them.

name: Gergely
review_header: The overall quality is very good
review_body: The overall quality is very good. There is a slight chance that you have to wait for the supports response, but looks like you can manage almost everything through the web interface

name: Angella Noriega
review_body: A top quality service. I tried other cloud services as well but Hetzner is the best. Their prices are also very good.

name: ŒàŒªŒµŒΩŒ± Œ£Œ¨ŒªŒπŒ±œÅŒ∑
review_header: more than 100 sites were down during‚Ä¶
review_body: more than 100 sites were down during weekend, no support at all, no one to reach and suddenly MOnday morning they are up after 5 minutes it took them. I ve lost clients and money. Terrible!!!!

name: Adel Nizamuddin
review_body: Hosting my business on Hetzner and loving it

name: Dennis Paulus
review_body: Hetzner offers Great and Cheap Services. I have all of my Cloud VPS there and they run perfectly. However, the only catch is their Support. They don't have a Livechat and just a Ticket System and E-Mail. And even though it's a German Company, their Support Team replies in a few Minutes in the Morning (5-11AM) but after that you don't get any reply anymore for the day. In addition to that, I'd also love to see technical Support like many other Hosting Providers offer. Yes, technical Support (how to do specific things with Linux) is not really the area of responsibility for a Hosting Provider, but it would still be pretty nice. At least for easy things.

name: Petar Markov
review_body: Very reliable host. I can say with confidence that this is one of the best hosts I've used for Dedicated Servers and Cloud Servers. I am using their Cloud for hosting my applications.

name: Mi≈Çosz M
review_body: //Sorry for my style it's just very chaotic Great experience for a VERY competitive price So far I've had a really pleasant experience with Hetzner, started about two? months ago. It has cloud features, though I'm not a cloud user because what I do is low-end but I'm sure it's enough for bigger customers. It has a really nice and clean UI, and it's been a breeze to use it compared to my ex-host OVH (ovh's panel loads so slow, and you can't migrate easily sandbox instance and many more cons) For low-end it's probably the best price you can get higher up it's very competitive too It is somewhat of a cloud (at least for vpses no experience with bare-metal): supports rescaling, has it's own API, optional private network for communication between servers, daily backups for +20% of price (7 slots), volumes, snapshots (cross-server!), floating ips and recently added load balancers (in beta), also you can create an instance with your ssh key instantly set. 20TB of traffic/?instance? (probably wouldn't let you use that much I guess (idk), who needs that much anyways on a shared vps, for that you should get sth dedicated) Summing up - I think the quote (from themselves) "HIGH QUALITY CLOUD ‚Äì UNBEATABLE PRICES" is very much true

name: WAB BM
review_header: Good server but very bad support.

name: Felix K
review_body: Solid cloud provider for a fraction of the price of AWS & Co. Solid networking and good support. Only the lack of a North American data center keeps us from using them for all our traffic.

name: Buddhi Abeyratne
review_header: Probs best bang for your buck
review_body: been using them for a while. haven't had any issues

name: Ekhtearul Islam
review_header: One of the Bests at your budget
review_body: Tried almost 20 VPSs, this one looks the best ever till now, let's see how it goes.

name: Saif Ur Rehman
review_header: using from last 1 year and i loved it

name: A Brahaj
review_header: Been hosting servers with them since 10‚Ä¶
review_body: Been hosting servers with them since 10 years! Happy customer! I love their infrastructure and their range of products.

name: Faisal Hassan
review_header: cheap prices with more cheap support
review_body: First of all no live chat at all. They answer your support queries when they have time it may take 2-3 days to answer a simple query. So wait please. They know they are cheap but they should not make their support more cheap. Even Contanbo is more cheap prices but they are more then a scoundrel to eat your money. We pray that one day more supportive and cost effective data center offer such services and we can get rid of these cheap tact companies which ruined our hosting businesses.

name: –ê–Ω–¥—Ä–µ–π –û–≤—á–∞—Ä–µ–Ω–∫–æ
review_body: The best service with excellent price!

name: Claudia
review_body: Incredible bad UX, waiting for the setup of the server and instead informing me about something, they block simply my account, without any information to give me the possibility to react and order somewhere else. After reading the other UX, I found that: " Reply from Hetzner Online GmbH Jun 8, 2020 Our team did not tell you the reason for your account's rejection on purpose. It is our policy not to tell customers the reason. Why...? We find that being less transparent about our processes for account authentication actually helps us to prevent abuse more effectively. (If scammers/spammers know more about our processes, it is easier for them to try to work around them.) Our past experience has shown that the more transparent we were in the past about our decisions, the more abuse we had shortly afterwards. So we made a concious decision that preventing abuse was more important. We completely understand and accept that some potential customers may choose to go to our competitors instead. Our low prices attract a lot of suspicious customers. And we have a responsibility to prevent abuse however we can. Our experience shows that being overly careful and having some false positives during the account verification process is very effective. This is why I will not tell you why our order was rejected. Please do not be offended. We do not tell anyone this information. We are simply trying to act as a responsible company and keep others on the Internet safe. There are dozens and dozens of variables for what might make a new order look suspicious. But it certainly does not depend on the colour of your skin whether someone gets an account with us. Also we accept customers from all around the world.. Some countries are rated with a higher risk, but we do not reject orders based only on countries. There are occassionally things in people's account information that look unusual, even if they are accurate. So you might think we are a bit too careful, but actually we are trying to be responsible. --Helena, Marketing" Funny part is 3 years back I rented server from Europe with a Europe Bank. How I'm a digital nomad, now I'm in latin america with a card from another latin country. So instead to ask to identify myself, their politics is simply f*@k colateral damage, f@*ck false positive. There was a time I was glad to use Hetzner, this expirience was so terrible (I needed a server right now and was waiting for there email, and a day later I figure out that they blocked my account as "false positive". Rediculous and disrespectful! Edit: "Please do not take a rejection personally. We are not saying that you are distrustful. We are not saying that you are a scammer." It's not about a rejection, I don't care. Still you are free to choose your customers as far as I know and I'm free to choose whom I contract for my services. "we are actually trying to be responsible." You caused harm. I had a productive vserver (not from hetzner) which was somehow defektive, to fix the problem right I intented to switch to a bare metal server and not lose time. How me and my husband used long ago a lot servers from hetzner and they was fast we went straight to hetzner. I was even talking with the support chat because in Helsinki it was 17:50 and I thought there will nobody work anymore. I asked him after ordering a EX-42-NVMe if it would be faster to order a one from the server auction. First he dind't want to tell me, but finally he told me better to take one of the SB. So I wrote a ticket to cancel the EX in favor of the SB because I need the server as soon as possible. So I was waiting for "few minutes to 1 work day" while my customers had issues. It had be so easy to tell simple "We Don't want you as customer, please get some non-discriminating provider", but you choose to let me in the belief that soon the server will be ready (I max expected an email asking for my Passport and proof of residence). But NOT ONE E-MAIL to inform me to enable me to take immediate action. Next afternoon, your morning still nothing, try to look in the robot: "Your account as been blocked". This is exactly "trying to be responsible" but NOT responsible. Heise is not trustful, and one of this companies which makes it really hard for digital nomads. If you one of them better stay away from hetzner! "Try to Re-do your order." Certainly not! You was not able to send not even a email, except here where it is about your reputation. What makes you thinking that I would ever want to do business with you after this experience? I will also never ever advise my customers to purchase servers from hetzner. "Your order may still be rejected despite you re-doing it." :D I don't understand this culture, jump through X-loops and make this tricks and we will consider if we will be willing to grant you... W T F? Keep your stuff, don't want it, I'm not your dog or slave

name: zombiebros22
review_header: Stay far away from this company
review_body: Stay far away from this company, I have had a terrible experience with their customer service, the spam emails. They took a big portion of my money for the server and never refunded the money back. I highly recommend staying away from these guys

name: Cemal G√úNE≈û
review_body: the best is hetzner :)

name: Dennis Fink
review_body: We used Hetzner as webhost and domain provider for many of our clients. When the time came to close our company and transfer multiple accounts to new owner, Hetzner customer service was extremely incompetent and inflexible. I do NOT recommend to use this provider at all.

name: D. P.
review_header: WE FORWARD ALL your SPAM complaints to the SPAMMER
review_body: hetzner.com FORWARDS ALL SPAM complaints to the SPAMMER! They say they MUST do that. Doing this ONLY allows the spammer to know the email they have is good. NO other company that I report spam to does it this way. Edited to add: Really? Thats the best you have. I HAVE to give my email so the SPAMMER "might" eventually get kicked off your server? If/when the spammer is kicked off that spammer STILL has my email address!! What kind of way is this to run a company? YOU are forcing us to give our email address to a KNOWN SPAMMER!!! Why not do it like a normal company and just get rid of the spammer? Oh I know, its like everyone else says about SPAM and your company. Its ALL ABOUT THE MONEY!! You are in it for the money and NOT to take care of the SPAMMERS! What shows you are also only about the money is all of your CANNED responses! Come on, get real and do like other companies do and just get rid of the SPAMMERS without forcing us to give the spammers our email. Until this happens, YOU WILL NEVER GET A DIME OF MY MONEY AND I'LL MAKE SURE NO ONE I KNOWS WILL USE YOUR COMPANY! Maybe you can't go in there and delete those of us who report the spammers, but you sure as heck can get rid of the spammers without giving them our email. When you force us to give you our email so you can then give it to the spammer, how are you or your company any better than the spammer? You say you stop spam, but giving our email to the spammer ONLY ALLOWS THE SPAMMER TO SPAM US MORE. If not from your company, then from some new company. Be like Amazon in that when I send the the spammers email, they get rid of the spammer almost immediately WITHOUT REQUIRING ME TO ALLOW THEM TO GIVE THE SPAMMER MY EMAIL!!

name: Ray
review_header: Rock solid servers that get the job done
review_body: The technical and operations side of Hetzner is amazing. I use a lot of cloud servers and one dedicated server. Everything is fast and the management interface for the cloud servers is very modern. The dedicated servers are rock solid, but the management Interface a bit dated. Technical support is always quick and helpful. I almost never need them, but when i need them they answer within an hour. The accounting team is a pain in the butt. You usually don‚Äôt need to talk to them because invoicing and payment is automatic, but when you do you only get half answers at best. Which is frustrating. To end positive: what I like is that they don‚Äôt flood you with useless marketing e-mail. I tried DigitalOcean and they sent me daily e-mail about discovering ‚Äúeverything in my account‚Äú for a week. Hetzner just let‚Äôs you install your server and gets out of your way. No upsell or useless marketing. They do have a newsletter but it‚Äôs low frequency and neutral informative.

name: Mihai Sandor
review_body: One of the best cloud provider over around the world!

name: Humanitarian
review_body: Structural Racism in Germany. The people behind the company are racists. We heard before that the company refused several people without a good reason, so we wanted to investigate. I tried with 5 other people to get validated on Hetzner. 3 white, 2 black and one brown. The 3 whites, including me, were quickly validated without any problem, but all the others were refused despite being from the same country as me. We are building our case against the company. If you believe you have been discriminated against by this company, please voice your opinion here and we will reach out to you. We will see how things will go in the court of law. The company is treating people like subhumans and this is unacceptable.

name: daniel faraday
review_body: it's an optimal choice for File Storage

name: Robert Thomas
review_body: I've used server hosted with many, many different providers across the globe. To this day, nobody can compete with the price to performance ratio that Hetzner offers. From their baremetal offerings to their cloud offerings, they've got it all, and they've only continued to amaze me over the years. The cherry on the top? Their social media team. They're incredibly active on various hosting forums (Hosted Talk, LES, even LET), and they're always happy to answer any questions. Thanks, Hetzner.

name: Chris K
review_body: I took out a 32 core EPYC server last month at the Helsinki data center. I have had it running at 99% CPU load continuously for the last 3 weeks doing data processing on Convid19 BOINC apps (Rosetta and WorldCommunityGrid). I have not had any issues or downtime. The only issue I found was that the KVM display did not work 100%, but just enough for me to login to the Ubuntu desktop upgrade that I did via CLI, and install ZohoAssist. I found the cost and service of these servers to be so good I have just ordered a 2nd server of the same specification. In truth when you add up the hardware and electricity costs, they are seriously well priced; in truth no other bare metal server providers even come close. My only gripe would be that it takes 3 working days for the server to be setup, and you have to pay 100% extra setup fee. However if you purchase a server from the auction then you dont have these fees and waits.

name: Alexandros Ntonas
review_body: dedicated servers are beyond the imagination!

name: garrys boys
review_body: Hello, I have 2 servers at your place, an i7-4770 & an i9-9900k. Yesterday I broke down with the I9 after 3 days of rental !! No commercial gesture, nothing at all !! Shameful. Then, at times we have PING high + 100ms, but according to Hetzner it's not their place ... It's never the detzs of hetzner ... While SI! I am really unhappy! Paid more than 80th configuration fee so that it is not the TOP is not cool! My last bills and 200 ‚Ç¨ anyway is not nothing !! Hetzner React !! And quick !! I plan to leave later ...

name: Hamadzee
review_body: The right word, you are the best

name: Jim Dela Cruz
review_header: Best and Fair Cloud VPS Server

name: ermya
review_header: Hetzner Online is perfect DC in the world
review_body: I am network expert and programmer with more than 18 years experience! i had server in many datacenters, like OVH, SoftLayer, Leasweb, dragonara, NXData, Contabo, Voxility, etc ... But now i am "Hetzner Online" customer for more than 3 years and i have around 10 servers there right now, they are so professional, respectful customer support, professional service, best price! i like them too much they are amazing and i recommended them to everyone Some of great feature they have are : Powerfull management panel Set R-DNS facility Automatic OS install Firewall Management Virtual Switch for your private network Rescue System Failover ip Reseller API and all other basic option like other DC do not pay attention to low start feedback , some one says i didn't pay they block my account ( its not true, some times it happening i forgot pay my servers invoice for more than 20 days and they just send me one email about payment problem!) another one says they will send automated email after each ticket! right why not ? because they are professional, in this way you will be sure 100% your message are delivered to Hetzner support team and it is not get stuck in delivery queue so why not ? They implement some kind of delivery, so whats wrong with you ? are you disable your sms delivery in your cellphone ?! This are not problem

name: Jacob Martin
review_body: Terrible, I wasn't able to pay for my first month. So they locked my account which I was fine with, so I contacted support to get it my account back so I could pay for it, well I pay for it and I don't get the server I had. So I contact support, the lady says she is unable to do anything but do partial than she says I wasn't able to get my server back and that she would be better off block my account. Worst company I have dealt with I doubt they are even giving ryzen computers

name: Anass Funnie
review_header: I have no clue as to why the people‚Ä¶
review_body: I have no clue as to why the people below me are freaking out about a "email" Anyway. I have been using Hetzner Online for a month or so and Hetzner is amazing. I have some dedicated servers by them and they are incredibly fast. The hardware that I needed. Sometimes responding to a ticket can take long but, that is sometimes. The most lovely thing is that I can cancel my server and getting my money back (In Hetzner Credit) and can be used to upgrade a server. Mostly they respond on the matter of the ticket. Their servers are very good and I shall be using them in the future (aslong as my project is running) Keep up the great work.

name: ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ú‡•á‡§≤ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•â‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü‡•Ä‡§∏
review_header: Not Capable to Handle Inappropriate Contents By Customers.
review_body: This server hosting service site isnt capable to take appropriate actions if their clients are doing violations during using their services. after sending complaints they are obliged to forward complaint to their clients instead of taking strict actions. they are not even following their own Terms and Conditions.

name: Phoebe Holland
review_header: Servers Deleted After Account Balance was Cleared
review_body: Whilst we were not operational due to the Covid 19 pandemic, I received an email to say I had outstanding invoices from Hetzner. I went on and cleared said invoices via Paypal. After this, I received a notification to say If those invoices were not cleared my account would be canceled. As I had made the payments in advance of receiving this, I didn't take action. Hetzner canceled my account and deleted 2 servers immediately, causing us to lose work. I rang the accounts team to discuss the issue and attempt to reactivate our account. When I explained my situation, the member of the billing team lost her temper, spoke over me, raised her voice, and became quite argumentative. I had to ask her to stop being rude on the phone. The customer service was very disappointing and now we have made payments against time periods servers were not provided for.

name: Magnus
review_body: Servers work perfectly, and support is pretty fast. - Generally great value for the money. Scheduled a KVM session, and they replied within 20 minutes confirming the selected time was avaliable. Recived a email 5 minues before the sheduled KVM session, saying they where going to be a bit late, as they where buning the provided ISO file to a USB stick. It's so nice to get updated like that!

name: Josh
review_body: Perfect ! Best hosting service ever

name: Mohamed Bin Ali Al Marri
review_header: Good service versus money and support
review_body: Good service versus money and support. the servers are stable. the support timing needs to be chnaged to 7 days a week than the weekdays

name: Devon
review_body: Cannot beat their services for the price. I am using their cheapest hosting option for a basic website and it has thus far worked really well. Support has been helpful as well.

name: Jordy Visser
review_header: This hosting gives you a lot value for‚Ä¶
review_body: This hosting gives you a lot value for your money. Good support, good uptime, good hardware. There are some things they could improve such as the virtual mac address nonsense, better cooling for their I9-9900K servers!!!! and DDoS protection. That is just better at their competitors. But pfff for this price, hard to beat... Happy customer :)

name: Hung-Su Nguyen
review_body: Lots of waiting, no communication, and account disabled despite supplying ID. Hetzner asks me for more than any other provider but delivers less. Hetzner Support as well as other Hetzner customers have been unhelpful. I'd give 0 stars for 0 delivery if I could.

name: Bence Bokor
review_header: Our only choice when it's about server hosting
review_body: We decided to give Hetzner a go about 4 years ago after having failed with multiple other providers. We now have 5 dedicated and some cloud servers running there, never had any unprecedented issues so far. Yes, if you order an unmanaged server, you have to do everything or you have to pay for the remote hands. It's not a secret. Their network is very reliable, the datacenter colleagues are also top, should it be replacing a dead SSD or migrating servers. And what's also important: the pricing is solid and plannable. I do find the server-setup costs a bit high, there could be an option to contract with for more than 12 months without (or lower) setup fee.

name: fahad ahmed
review_body: good server with good price

name: Jordan
review_header: We've used Hetzner for many years
review_body: We've used Hetzner for many years, and they have never disappointed.

name: Bewerterx63
review_body: I have servers at Hetzner for more than 1.5 years now and I never had any problems. There were no major issues which caused Server Downtime. All in all it is a solid and good hosting provider

name: Yhteys
review_header: The cloud servers are great for the price.
review_body: The cloud servers are great for the cheap price and contain much power. However when talking about their server auction, the servers are very poor. Hetzner will null route your server when it's getting attacked. Support is not very good at all..

name: AALA
review_body: I am really happy with their services and products

name: Y.V.
review_header: I grew up with hetzner and saw hetzner changing over years... in good way =)
review_body: Hey there! I literally grew up using hetzner services since I was teenager and saw company changing over years, implementing more stuff, new datacenters and even unlimited bandwidth, so no more between 20 and 50 TB traffic (depending on server model) and after 1eur per TB. And fancy hardware you had as well back in days =) Anyway, I think Hetzner became a reliable and professional partner, which is continuously improving. This is something super important, not every company has this. For example I worked for quite long time with LeaseWeb and they are not so bad, but at one moment they took another road for some reason (something like 6 years ago), which forced me and my customers moving their services elsewhere. I suggest Hetzner to everyone, to my customers, colleagues, companies where I'm working, including my current company, and you know what, everyone are quite satisfied. One thing regarding support, I saw that many people are unhappy about support and the only thing I will say, is that all departments are trying to improve as much as possible, after all, we all human beings. As the last thing, thank you Hetzner! :-)

name: Amer
review_header: Good servers. Bad customer support and communication.

name: canberk doƒüancƒ±
review_body: I want to buy too many servers. 15 20 but it was disabled after signing up. Passport, identity, driver's license, card front-back. I sent them all, why don't you approve of me? I want to work with you.

name: Jes√∫s Bocanegra
review_body: Best quality/price balance I could hope for. The only thing missing is more datacenters around the world.

name: Vladyslav
review_body: Strongly not recommend this company and any service to use. All started from the new year. My credit card got expired and I wasn't able to update my payment info due to personal circumstances. I was using the cheapest vps server. Each reputable company will inform the user about expired card info and will simply shut down the server and allow the user to update their own profile. Hetzner instead, was sending invoices from month to month after card expiration, for the service that shouldn't be paid. Disabling your personal account along the way, so you won't be able to update information about your credit card! But they will continue sending you invoices... Answering simply "you have the only one option to pay - via bank/wire". And threatening to spread your information to debt collectors. So, Hetzner, take into account that you have customers, who live outside the EU, where making a bank/wire payment to the EU is really difficult. You can simply allow your customers enter their profile, update payment info in two clicks and that's all. Looks simple. But no. You're forcing your customers to do the things that look abnormally. It's not fair. You're forcing your customers to pay for the period when user can't do anything, even login to his account. You're thinking only for your earnings, not to be at least a good cloud provider. After that, when you've received money for this s**tty period, your customer support asks, whether they should reactivate your account. Of course you should. Just to allow your customers to log into their account and allow them to delete their profile itself, just to forget about your services. And then after a few requests to reactivate your account, customer service answer: "as a gesture of goodwill we reactivated your account for you so you can place new orders". What the f**king gesture of goodwill? You're forcing and threatening your customers and then you say something about a gesture of goodwill. And information for everyone, note that after account remove, which user performed by himself, account hasn't been completely removed. You'll hear from customer service that "Your account is blocked and the data is only stored because we are legally obliged to keep this data." So I don't recommend doing business with this company. Their philosophy is based only on financial profit, not being at least good company.

name: Vladimir
review_header: Great hosting at the unbeatable price
review_body: I have used their service for 6 months now. I'm very happy with their service!

name: Alex
review_body: Awesome service and support. Have been using Hetzner's services for several years now and have always been pleased - be it for a personal LEMP project or hosting solutions like Plesk or Mattermost - they're excellent! Would definitely recommend!

name: yassineim
review_header: Crazy price to performance ratios and‚Ä¶
review_body: Crazy price to performance ratios and very reliable hardware and network. I don‚Äôt know why they aren‚Äôt more known in dev circles.

name: Radyo Hizmeti
review_body: I have been using Hetzner for more than 1 year. And there is Customer support contact problem! pricing provide very good server at low cost.

name: Web Comic
review_body: Very easy way too host a Big Websites in this cloud server.thank

name: Matthieu D.
review_body: This is disappointing. So, I ordered an additional NIC to be able to run ESXI on the server. Today I decided to remove that supplement cause I didn't need it anymore. So when Hetzner Support claimed to removed the NIC the server was not reachable via Putty or via my NGINX website on it. The answer I got was that "You have to go via KVM console and fix the network settings". It was a very cryptic answer and as always, it seems like Hetzner support got a pre-written script cause you get almost the same answer every time. I answered that, how do I do that then? And I got the other dumb answer they LOVE to send to the client in help "Check out Hetzner wiki och forum". And, no. Hetzner Wiki or Forum don't have any guide how to fix the internet setup. It's really disappointing, because if I order a supplement to my server and then want it to be cancelled. I foresee that my server will work as before after I cancelled the supplement. It's like you force me into have the NIC forever. And you guys couldn't even tell me how to fix it, but theoretically, you guys caused it. This is really disappointing and I can say that my servers from you guys will get cancelled very soon. Same on you!

name: Costea Florin
review_body: best hosting services, well done guys!

name: Tryczek Patryczek
review_body: +rep Trusted site good prizes and helpfull staff

name: David Amos Kok
review_header: I Have Been Using them since 2016 but i‚Ä¶
review_body: I Have Been Using them since 2016 but i stopped at around 2017 due to i'm looking for data centre offered many country ip transit. I am back hosting with them in 2018 when i found out that their network has tremendously improved. Been using them since then and have been experiencing great network, uptime and hardware quality. Inone year i could count that i only have like 2 or 3 small outages. Overall their network is top notch and i am in love with their new i7 and i9 coffeee lake servers. That specifications with that price is an offer that you cant resist. I plan to stay for good now. I love Hetzner with all my heart an thanks for helping my business moving again. Sincerely Dave Amos.

name: Veselin
review_body: As a customer, we ordered test dedicated machine. Everything was great, but their DDoS protection is poor. It needs around 1Gbps for the machine to lose connection. It's not that hard to make a proxy server that acts like a firewall and filter the data passing through it. I know a lot of networking and simple home network can have better DDoS prottection then Hetzner. The only thing I like is the cheap prices. And please, don't delete my review, like you did with a friend of mine.

review_body: Best Quality Best Support Ultra Fast Ultra Low Cost

review_body: One of the cheapest options on the server market. We use the hosting for about 5 years already, both dedicated and newly introduced virtual options, and there were no issues with our servers so far. Also, occasional security analysis messages add a level of comfort :)
