review_header: i wanted to make an enquiry about‚Ä¶
review_body: i wanted to make an enquiry about something and by mistake ive placed and order with them due to their site being in german so was hard to navigate , without asking they setup my server and billed me 150E . ive explained to them that i didn't wanted a server just yet and asked them to cancel my service. after a month or more i've decided to actually buy one of their servers but upon placing the order they filtered my ip so i cannot reach their site and never responded to my emails very rude and vengeful people i wonder if their support is the same or if any managers are aware of their support or sale staff behaviour or this is just how this company operates EDIT : well what you are saying might be true but my experience happened in feb so its before your described dates . i did placed an order again and ive been asked to submit verification as my account has been deemed high risk , i guess after the missunderstandig with the first order but lets see , i do expect to be filtered again and account closed tbh as initially i didn't need to provide any documents in order to create my account its just after someone obviously holds a grudge as i canceled my first service after few days

review_body: Overall not deserve any rating! I have placed the order and submitted my passport as KYC. But After 24 hours I have checked, no notification regarding my order or my KYC. But I have the right to know the reason for the suspension. Then I have talked with pre-sell live chat, that support told me he/she doesn't know the reason, may be due to I have ordered an expensive server! I am surprised again, they disabled my account due to order a good quality server. Also, that support suggests me to send mail to support. Then I have sent a mail to support and it's now 7 days, no reply from their side. Really! they don't deserve any rating.

Zero Support! Thanks for the reply. I run a large gaming community (rustops.com) we have multiple machines from OVH and SoYouStart but i wanted some german servers. I would appreciate it if you could take a look here because something clearly is playing up with your system.

name: Utku Zihnioglu
review_body: Best hosting service out there. Fast network, most competitive prices and fast support.

name: Joonas
review_header: Arbitrary account locks with no documented appeal process
review_body: Evaluated Hetzner Cloud for a bit after hearing recommendations from friends. Nice minimal admin console, fast deployments, cheap rates. However, their abuse detection seems to be too trigger happy. Configured one virtual server + one SSH key using a simple Terraform module. Had to re-create the server several times to get my provisioning steps right, which I guess triggered their abuse prevention. After one day, my Hetzner account was disabled without notice. No email, no instructions to get support when trying to login, nothing ‚Äì just a red ‚ÄùAccount is disabled‚Äù. Probably OK for hobby projects but I would not trust them with business critical infrastructure.

name: KHO
review_header: Server of this provider sends pishing mails
review_body: Server of this provider send pishing mails and there is no email-adresse where the receiver can inform the administrator. No info at iplookup and if you send eamil to info oder support to document the pishing mails, it will be rejected as spam. Company is IMHO not trustworthy

name: Java2107
review_header: Hetzner by far are the best hosting‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner by far are the best hosting provider out there. I've currently been a customer with them since February of 2019 and I can say, from my personal and unbiased opinion, that they are the best you can without ripping your wallet open. Their support team, while not being native English speakers, can easily understand what you're trying to say and their response time to tickets is more than satisfactory. If you're looking for a dedicated server or hosting provider, Hetzner are the best way to go.

review_body: This is my sixth year with Hetzner as the web hosting partner. Highly recommended.

name: Ary
review_header: Pretty good services but really bad abuse handling
review_body: I have around 1 year using hetzner services, they're great on terms of: - UPTIME - CHEAP PRICES - TECHNICAL SUPPORT BUT, there is a BAD (hitting worse) thing with them which is THEIR ABUSE HANDLING. At the moment you get +2 abuse reports (legit or not), because maybe you're reselling hosting and had the back luck to get abusers signing up to your site. you become to be threated as a enemy instead of a customer, also you have to write long and annoying statements for everything including any small DOS attacks. And at the end of the day that doesn't guarantee nothing, because if they don't accept your explanations or you get constant abuse tickets (who doesn't? if you handle 500+ customers) them you get your ip blocked or better they just close your account and you lose EVERYTHING. I don't recommend hetzner for any resell purpose or usage which includes third parties where you cannot control what your users do.

name: Abbas G.
review_body: And this hosting provider proved it!

name: John Wright
review_body: They are cheap, I'll say that. You get what you pay for. The reliability is ok, in the past 10 years i've been with them I've only had 3 instances of unreachable servers. I have both virtual (or cloud as they now call it) and root servers there. Their English is pretty bad though, so if you are not fluent in German be prepared for some frustration. They will often misinterpret or twist English support requests, and they come across as quite rude (although I believe this to be in part due to a poor command of English, resulting in bad phrasing of their responses).

review_body: Hosting dedicated server here since 3,5 years for my small business. I can't say much about the support because I never had to use it!

name: The Bedrock BG
review_header: good company its very cheap and reliable

name: Maurice
review_body: I‚Äôve been with Hetzner since 2008. I have 2 root server on which I host my clients‚Äô website and develop applications and websites for new clients. There is no other service prides worldwide that can beat Hetzner, in every aspect: price, performance, availability, security, service and support... you name it. Lately I started looking into Cloud options. I tested Digital Ocean, UpCloud, Ionos, and Vultr. Even for Cloud servers, Hetzner is the best provider in every aspect. Once they will expand their cloud infrastructure to more zones it will be the perfect cloud solution. Many times I tried to test and move to other providers and each time I returned to Hetzner.

review_body: Excellent hardware, Stable and good network. Absolute bang for buck.

review_header: Hetzner customer for 10 years, no regrets
review_body: Hetzner customer for more than 10 years, currently 15 servers, never regretted it. Their no-fuzz service is mostly very quick in providing actual solutions, but the quality and speed of support slightly decreased over the years. The promised server delivery times for customized systems on their website are slightly misleading as it almost always takes a couple more days to get the machines ready, but that's not a big deal for us.

name: Patrick Burgmann
review_body: Always amazing services and friendly support! Thank you Hetzner team !

name: Dicong Guan
review_body: Total discrimination. Can't get passed the account verification with credit cards/passports and ID. Always disable my account application without explaination and never answer support emails. Shame

name: rossiscool123
review_header: For dedicated servers, you cant beat them
review_body: Been using Hetzner for around 3 months after switching from a VPS from Contabo (Good VPS provider for dirt cheap prices) I was very shocked that you could order a server without a deposit or anything and use it for 14 days risk free which is what I did for a few weeks since I had issues migrating and didn't feel like paying over 100 euro for 4 days wasted. This is very good if you want to test them out without paying upfront. However I do feel like this could be exploited for hosting illegal content and using their bandwidth for DDoS attacks. Either way I would highly recommend them if you need a stupid amount of storage, they range from as little as 512 NVMe all the way to 16TB of HDD storage. Just be aware that if you have any software issues they provide no support whatsoever for it, only networking and hardware issues, so if you're a novice Linux user like me and break something you're in the dark my friend.

name: James Pit
review_body: Their support is crap, i am client since 8 years and in the last 2 years they technical support get worst and worst, and this year i started to move server They tech support is useless. They are new guys that they don't know what are talking about, non experience and they don't know nothing about the business.

name: Fƒ±rat Avcƒ±
review_header: Sometimes Quality Cannot Be Measured By Its Price
review_body: When I sign up for an account, the system automatically declined my membership and ask me to proof myself with an ID card scan. Although this seemed strange to me at first, after proving my identity, I realized that this is a fair and effective measure to prevent abuse that every responsible hosting company must follow to do. After my account verified I saw they have a very clean user interface, understandable navigation menus, rich documentations and most importantly cheapest VPS prices around the web. Now I am able to host 4 different static web sites with low number of visitors in a single server and I am more than satisfied. I didn't get my first invoice yet but as a freelance graphic designer and web developer, I am recommending Hetzner for your server neededs definitely.

name: Burke
review_header: Poor pre-sales communication and wrong information about delivery
review_body: Sales persons point you to web page where it says what are delivery times and they are constantly sending the same link for it but delivery times are 4X or 5X longer in reality. Excuses that they have production backlog are not acceptable. Support is fine, but sales persons that respond to tickets on presales are horrible in communication in general and in English language also.

review_header: Hetzner is the best solution to my‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner is the best solution to my business

review_body: After 5 years of experience with Hetzner Online I want to say honestly it's one of the best hosting and datacenter service providers I've ever used before.

name: Ivan Ivanov
review_header: Charge for service that you didn't use
review_body: Yesterday I received the email from Hetzner with the invoice for 0.01Euro that I have to pay for services that I'll never use. As I do some investigation. Before a couple of years I register an account in Hetzner. I had plans to use Hetzner services. But luckily I never ordered a service from them. Then I forgot about my account until yesterday. I was very surprised after receiving an invoice that I had to pay 0.01EURO for a service that I have never used. Followed by a threatening email quote: This is to inform you that our entire contractual relationship will be canceled by us due to non-payment, today. All open claims will be handed over to our collection agency. The server(s) are no longer available by now, and all data will be deleted. Let me remind you again invoice of a 0.01EURO for a service that I have never used. I tried yo solve that with your support but they didn't do anything to understand me.

review_header: Disabled my account for no reason
review_body: I created my account a few days ago, and now it got disabled without any information why and I didn't even got email when it happened! I paid the 20EUR fee at the beginning and yet I got locked out. This company is a pure scam, stay away from them...

review_body: I am completely satisfied with the services, helpful company, cheap prices, and reliable service! My second year as a subscriber! I am fully satisfied with them! I can only recommend them to everyone! :)

review_body: Had some issues with billing after cancelling a server, but they sorted this issue out swiftly. Would definitely recommend

name: Andrew
review_body: Good prices, and very reliable servers with great DDoS protection.

name: Michael de Vries
review_header: We have several servers at hetzner for‚Ä¶
review_body: We have several servers at hetzner for our company. The servers are good and not expensive. I read some bad reviews here. But it seems that some people do not understand what they ordered. If you rent an unmanaged server you are responsible for everything yourself, except hardware failures.

name: Kryo
review_header: The absolute best hoster I have worked‚Ä¶
review_body: The absolute best hoster I have worked with by far. Their "Robot" Interface for Domain/DNS and Server configuration is by far the most excellent and responsive I have seen. You receive complete access to all aspects of your Server and Domain, like editing the zonefile of your domains yourself, thus making editing DNS entries the easiest and fastest expirience I had in that field short of hosting your own DNS Server. Everything you may need to configure on your server or its network can be done over the web interface. The rescue mode and fresh OS installs are automatic after a restart that causes your server to network boot into a special image. The work that has gone into making sure that everything runs smoothly in their data centre is absolutely fantastic and so far I was not able to find anything to annoy me.

name: Michael
review_body: 2021 UPDATE: now that I have been hosting with Hetzner for several years I must say that my opinion has changed a lot (for the better.) Customer service seems to have improved a lot, many tasks in both Cloud and Robot have been automated (very convenient!) and as long as you know which hardware to order it's possible to find excellent deals on dedicated servers, for example. I haven't experienced any downtime in the past couple of years, but in case something goes wrong, I just discovered that Hetzner offers free backup space with some server configurations. That is awesome!

name: M. Electronics
review_body: Very poor service and support. Would not recommend. Service: I you host a lot of servers like we do, expect a lot of down time (not all the servers all the time), they have a ton of problems with routing and outages (see their status page), they offer no SLA so you can't complain or expect compensation either. In the years I have been with them there has been no improvement in this area. Support: open ticket, don't get a response -> repeat until you get lucky. Only way to really get their attention is by posting to them on Twitter. They have to respond if other people are watching. Never had support help out in the weekend either.

name: S√°rk√°ny D√°vid
review_body: I use Hetzner Cloud 1 year ago. The support very good, but only work business hour. The best network I've seen.

name: Unknown
review_body: This is my review of Hetzner.de (Hetzner Online GmbH), a german hosting and co-location provider. Hetzner has very competitive pricing. I'd say among the best prices in Europe as opposed to what you get. I'm currently paying for the "CCX21" package. Priced at ‚Ç¨ 43.63 with 25% VAT included. It's a cloud instance that comes with 4 vCPU at 1.0 GHz each. 16 GB RAM, 160 GB disk space and 20TB traffic. My instance is located in their Finland DC. Excellent speeds to Sweden. My experience so far has been good, not great. No downtime, fast I/O and connection speeds. What I don't like is the low amount of computing power you get. Competitors offer more for the same price. I also don't like that you can't tailor your instance. You are forced to upgrade to another package all together. Something I really don't like is setup fees for dedicated servers. Charging a setup fee for provisioning is part of the "old days". In reality this process is almost 100% automated for Hetzner. I'd rather see a few euros extra per month instead of setup fee. I have decided to give a rating of 4 out of 5.

name: Abdurahman
review_body: I just realized that its not possible to create an account from Ethiopia. I sent my passport, but still they denied my request. Sad. The 3 star is because of my friend told me that your service is great.

name: Ermi
review_body: I highly recommend this service. But i have a question, 3 months ago the cloud vps speed was around 2gbps but now its 1gbps, why is that?

name: Cvetomir
review_body: Very bad hosting provider. They don't provide any ddos protection on their servers. NEVER USE HETZNER

name: jaswanth kumar
review_header: I really like using hetzner in the‚Ä¶
review_body: I really like using hetzner in the company I work because of the price and support you guys provide, but recently I wanted to do some external project work so I started creating hetzner account uploaded my one document for verification, but after 24 hours my account is disabled and I'm not aware why it has been disabled, tried contacting support but no reply from them, please do improve such bad behavior, I look forward to using hetzner. I might have tried logging in with wrong credentials, but this should not disable my account, I should be warned about the number of attempts that I might be making, and every time the email gets removed while logging in which makes me think I might have entered wrong email id

name: AKcryptoGUY
review_body: Was very pleased with how quickly it was possible to create an account and get a virtual server up and running, and the service seemed reliable and stable...at least until Hetzner shut down our account without explanation and did not respond to inquiry.

name: Leonidas Papoulakis
review_body: Great product at great prices. The cloud infrastructure is pretty basic, they shoulda add services like automatic alerts, managed DB and so on...

name: Luke
review_body: I'm a small fish customer with only a single auction server, but nevertheless Hetzner have been exceptionally fast to respond to support queries and exceeded expectations with their degree of assistance. I wish other providers (*cough* OVH) had this same policy of equal support regardless of how big a customer you are. Server has been rock solid for over a year now, hoping for many more!

name: Mac_
review_header: The most convenient and cheapest Cloud provider
review_body: The most convenient and cheapest cloud provider. I use Cloud from Hetzner. It is extremely convenient in terms of resources, very transparent in price. And there is no installation fee. I admit that the Hardware server can be effective in some cases, but I don‚Äôt have such cases yet ...

name: Fluffy Cookie
review_body: A very comprehensive offer. The quality of services at the highest professional level. The consequence of this is that the support is rather for users with some knowledge (I did not check if the case of shared hosting support leads the user by the hand). I used and I use dedicated servers and cloud servers. On the plus side: - professional quality of services, - ecological solutions, 0% CO2 emission, 100% green energy (very important for me). On the downside: - I can't think of anything right now.

name: Jarno
review_body: I really love their products! Been a client for a couple of years. Excellent value and unbeatable pricing. Great service too!

name: Ahmed Al Hafoudh
review_body: - high quality services at affordable price - support team very responsive - minimal outages

name: Davor Veselinovic
review_body: Working with Hetzner for more than a decade now. Superb services and affordable pricing. They are fast, dedicated and trustworthy.

name: Marius Bogdan
review_body: Very good services and cheap. Would be great if they include a LoadBalancer. if it will be free, it will be even better Another thing would be great to have only private ip addresses on some cloud instances. Please add this option. is very good for database instances

name: S M Jobayer Alam
review_body: bad customer support. they have no customer support, I'm not talking about technical support even they don't provide billing support. i have faced issue paying service using card their payment gateway way showed me expired card error even my card has validity till 2021. i have contacted with them to solve this issue but got no support. they even can't understand English

name: Yidi Chat
review_body: Have been using them for a while now, multiple servers including cloud (VPS) and Robot (dedicated). I couldn't be be more happy! superb performance, amazing speed, and still the CHEAPEST prices on the web.. unbelievable and.. great customer support too!

name: Arta Seyzed
review_body: Remarkable services, Unbeatable Prices We've been using Hetzner for quite a while. Happy with their services and quality of Hardware. Please bring more of Threadrippers AMD. We love it.

name: Davor ‚Äúhorza‚Äù Grubisa
review_header: Excellent cloud VMs and dedicated servers
review_body: Wonderful experience with unmanaged dedicated servers over the past 5+ years. Excellent network, excellent rescue system which can be used on ANY server and activated at any time with ease. Precisely what any experienced admin expects from a dedicated server. I have also recently migrated a bunch of stuff from GCE and dedicated boxes to Hetzner's Cloud VMs, and it's by far the best cloud for running your own vm-based infra. Don't expect to see any PaaS or SaaS there - they only do machines, networks and volumes. But they do them waaay more affordable than other cloud providers, with better networking, less vendor lock-in and again - that wonderful rescue system.

name: Den
review_body: Very dissatisfied with technical support. Also the worst flexibility which I've ever seen. Legacy tech solutions, overrated and unclear prices for additional services (move server to another rack - 32 euro, move Dell server - 71 euro. realy? are they more heavy?), many pitfalls and other problems.

name: Catalin - iGamer
review_body: Good hosting, i recommend it! Also, a question.. If i buy a server from server auctions they are like normal servers or what are differences and i have to pay some installing tax or not?

name: Malik
review_body: Thank you for making it painless, pleasant and most of all hassle free!

name: –ï–≤–≥–µ–Ω–∏–π –õ—é–±–∏–º—Ü–µ–≤
review_body: This usless company asking to pay for service which we cant use. Not recommend. "The fact that a volume cannot be used without a server is true but unfortunately that doesn't matter, because you decide for yourself which product you order or not." NEVER USE HETZNER!

name: Denis Kovac
review_header: This company has a terrible attitude‚Ä¶
review_body: This company has a terrible attitude toward its customers, do not give them your business. Our website was down, we were told we are late with payment, and we just need to pay the outstanding amount which was 2 months of hosting, and that they would switch everything back on. Once paid, we were told that the website and our 500GB of data were gone. Unfortunately and stupidly we didn‚Äôt back up our website. So not only that we couldn‚Äôt get our money back, but had to spend a week talking through those ridiculous online robots and it was impossible to get a straight answer as every time we e-mailed the company, someone else would pick up where someone else left it before. We never found out why did they loose all our data. Being a small business we rely on our website more than anything‚Ä¶This company is totally unpro. Don‚Äôt go there!

name: Dong Ha Kim
review_header: Hetzner Online has absolutely been a stellar host.
review_body: I am a user of their EX42 line of servers, which are both extremely affordable given the performance of the hardware. I have found so far that no other host offers this level of performance at this price point. Honestly, I wonder how Hetzner can even turn a profit from renting out their servers at such a low price. I heard concerns that the network and peering of Hetzner are not good, but as far as my experience goes, Hetzner's network was pretty robust and I didn't notice any weird packet loss or bandwidth problems with it. I also didn't notice any overselling on their network, almost all of the time the performance was as advertised. And on top of that, Hetzner's dedicated servers come with unlimited/unmetered 1Gbit speeds. I can't say anything about their DDoS protection because I use a CDN. I tried servers in Germany and Finland, but speaking from experience, the German locations have better 'global' routing. Hetzner's support has a very fast response time, usually, I get a response from them within 30 minutes or less. The support staff was very informed and competent, and also offered solutions to problems pretty quickly. They also ask for confirmation before doing any configuration change on my servers. The tone they use to write their emails does come off as a bit cold, they get to the point without any fluff. Still, as they get their job done quickly I don't have any problems with this. Of course, when renting a dedicated server from Hetzner it is important to note they do not provide support on anything that can't be solved on their end (aka software). Hetzner's support strictly adheres to this 'dedicated server = no software support' principle is probably what angers some new unsuspecting users coming from a managed server. For me, I was expecting this to hold true (because I am paying for a dedicated server, not managed server) so I didn't have any unpleasant surprises. New users of Hetzner MUST note that dedicated servers, by definition and industry practices, do not come with the same level of support as you would expect from a managed server. Still, some other providers are a bit lenient about this‚Äìthey will help with a bit of Linux/Windows networking configuration‚Äìdespite the customer using a dedicated server from them, so if I HAD to suggest a point of improvement this would be it. Oh, their Robot interface (or panel?) used to administer their Dedicated Servers could use a visual upgrade. It does get the job done and is reasonably snappy but for first-time users, I think it is a bit hard to navigate. They updated their Cloud interface to make it look modern, so I hope they do the same thing for their Robot interface as well.

name: Fluffy steve
review_header: I'm a paying customer of over ¬£300 and‚Ä¶
review_body: I'm a paying customer of over ¬£300 and when I asked can they extend the server by a day to get my files as I cant afford to keep it now they said no I have to pay invoice and there is no chance to extend it what a joke Ticket ID 2019090303016511

name: Simon Hoff Kunze
review_header: Best hosting provider on the planet!
review_body: Best hosting provider on the planet. I've been a customer at Hetzner for nearly a decade, both as a private individual, for my business and for my clients, and I've used several of their available products including VPS and dedicated servers. Their customer service is without exception a sublime experience, very quick response times and concise communication. This applies to both phone and email support. Online interfaces for managing products works like a charm and are easy to use. Their documentation/wiki is also a great source of information. Prices are very low, so low that I cannot comprehend how they can offer such high level of quality and service. Hosting providers with comparable service levels often charge 5 to 10 times more for the same product. Newsletters are rare but great in the sense that the information is always relevant to stay up to date. Also in case of changes/maintenance/migration that may affect you as a customer the communication is concise and timely. I can wholeheartedly recommend Hetzner as the only hosting provider you'll ever need, at least as long as their locations in Germany or Finland are relevant to your needs.

name: sensadvert
review_body: Hello, this is our first time with Hetzner and for a while we were analyzing all the specs, especially for their VPS and must say - excellent. The price is great compared to our current hosting provider. We are working since 2012 and already have made many sites hosted on our VPS, but they increased the prices too much and on the other hand, our server started failing lately. Especially in situations when some of our customers publish announcement and draw attention to maybe 50 users on his website, then the entire server is going down and starts to choke. Interestingly, even a month ago we had virtually the same number of users with the same requests as now and everything was fine. But a week ago all the problems started. And all of a sudden we started receiving offers from our host to upgrade the server. We wouldn't go into why this is happening, but we definitely decided to migrate. Today we have had urgent situation with one website for online ticket sales and we have just ordered level 4 shared package from Hetzner. Given the short time... (the website is going live officially tomorrow) we just bought this shared hosting to make this website available for tomorrow (on the previous hosting we almost wasn't able to edit the page). After registration at Hetzner we were asked to provide proof for our company (our registered certificate). No matter what the document is issued in a foreign language, Hetzner responded very quickly ~5min and our account was approved. Their user interface - konsoleH is fast and pretty much easy to use. After dns propagation we can say that our website is literally flying. The speed and all the tests we have done are excellent. Next month we are starting with their manged VPS and we are moving all the accounts with them. We believe that we re going to have positive experience with that also. Thanks

name: Dmitry
review_header: The worst hosting service in the world!
review_body: The worst hosting service in the world! They blocked my account and support doesn't react for last 2 days!

name: Liam
review_header: I have never seen such a poor provider.
review_body: I have never seen such a poor provider. I've been a customer with Hetzner for over a year, with invoices ranging from ‚Ç¨400-‚Ç¨600 each month. I had been leasing over 8 dedicated servers, mostly used for game servers, every time a DDoS attack is launched the game server disconnects for a few seconds, and I have to reconnect, this happens at least 5-7 times a day. When contacting Hetzner for support, I'm simply told to "google how to set up a firewall". I've spent hundreds hiring sysadmins to implement firewall rules on both the server and in the Hetzner control panel. Regardless of what I added or changed, the issue still remains to this day which Hetzner will still not assist me with. I highly do not recommend Hetzner, hence why i'm moving providers. EDIT 21/08/2019: It hasn't got anything to do with managed or unmanaged servers. Hetzner state on the website that the i9 servers are recommended for game hosting, and have DDoS Protection. But how can the servers be recommended for game hosting if whenever a DDoS attack is launched the server disconnects? I have already had system network engineers take a look at your firewall system, and this firewall didn't block any UDP flooding on my server. I would've taken your offer to have an admin take a look, but the last reply I got on my ticket was "I am sorry to inform you that we can not be familiar with every protocol arround in the internet." This is not how you talk to a customer, hence why i've already switched over to a new provider. Thank you for reaching out though.

name: Mihail Suboch
review_body: Good hosting at fair prices. Sadly no invoicing for Russia (. Upd: I need to make payments for my servers via bank transfer, but my bank (Sberbank Russia) has requested a contract with your company. The only contract you are providing is mainly about domain names (can be found on your site under /rechtliches/agb). I was in contact with your support, Julia, but sadly no solution was worked out. Upd2: Yep. Ticket#2019062803011939 Upd3: I would like to add, it is not a contract with our bank. It is a contract between Hetzner and my Firm. The bank needs a contract with the right text to give a go for a payment in a EU country.

name: Giuseppe
review_body: Take your money elsewhere! Buyers beware! Talking about a German company, and forsake, not all German company's are bad but some do it worse than others, i am actually still surprised you are around this long. Anyway the story continues; this one will give you problems and extra++++ invoices! I've never had such bad experience with a hosting company before; the servers, knowledge of the staff and accounting is overall seriously bad! For instance they have the sale out section where you can rent cheap servers but ohh you cannot run vmware on it because the hardware doesn't support it, so you have to slipstream drivers within a cd and place it somewhere where you can reach it with the lara console or hetzner staff can insert it for you; now here comes the problem; everything they do for you wether you need remote hands or some quick help or the console, it costs money, money money and watch out maybe on the first day you might burn a hole in wallet by doing so. They should make the lara console for free for the first time install. Same with payments,, they charge you buy the unit and also when you cancel your server or storagebox vps/hosting check your cancel date because it is set standard a month later. So yes they offer cheap stuff but it is not worthy of your time, money and stress! Useless company! And btw, my last review got deleted because hetzner filed a complaint, the the truth hurts doesn't it? Maybe it's time you start doing something about it? "Treat others as how you want to be treated..."

name: Jiangning Xiong
review_header: I was rejected for using their server‚Ä¶
review_body: I was rejected for using their server auction. I asked my dad to do a test for me. He purchased the exact same service and got rejected too. It's unbelievable since we both have good credit score. I don't know why they see us as high risk lol. I asked their support for reasons. They don't at least have the courtesy to reply to emails. What a rude and arrogant company. They may have an advantage of low price, but i'd rather pay more than dealing with those people who don't know how to respect people.

name: Angelo
review_header: Do not trust or use their services
review_body: People, do not use their service! they made a mistake and (Hetzner themselves) ordered an expensive server which I did not ask for. 5 minutes after I received the email I asked them to remove it 1. because it is a mistake 2. because I couldn't see it in my admin panel. They didn't remove it, yet... 1 month later they send me a huge invoice. I contacted customer service multiple times and they wont help me, I have to pay the invoice for a product I never ordered or used. They have no proof (I asked for it) that I ordered it. They have nothing, yet they want me to pay the invoice. Hetzner is a bad company that tries to take your money, they scam you and offer ZERO customer service. Even after contacting them more then 5 times, explaining them what happened they still refuse to help or compensate me in any way possible. DO NOT trust this company, DO NOT use their services.

name: chamid
review_body: Amazing coud server provider. But why they only got 5.2/10 rating? I hope it's caused by unfamiliar users with unmanaged server and blaming their provider. Hetzner, U Guys Rock!

name: Wout
review_body: I have used Hetzner for a few projects, and I am very satisfied with their services. One root server I had installed back in 2010 and is still running flawlessly today. We never had any serious issues. In those nine years, we had two minor downtime incidents which were resolved very quickly. Support can be a bit short in their replies, seemingly unfriendly, but always quick and efficient. Today, I am again in the market for hosting and Hetzner is my first choice.

name: SergioZ
review_body: Nice website. Objective, Individual, Informative, Nice Looking, Great company to relay on.

name: Enrico D.
review_body: Excellent hosting for dedicated servers. Pros: - Inexpensive and powerful machines - Fast & excellent support - You can rent older machines without setup fees using their server bidding. Very useful if you need a server for a temporary project (say, a couple of months), with no minimum cancellation period. Cons: - They guarantee "only" an annual average of 99.9% network availability (which may correspond to an average of a 1-2 minutes per day of unavailability) instead of 99,95% like some of their competitors (which is half of that time of unavailability) - On cheaper servers the hardware is not enterprise grade - KVMs are limited and you must book them, then wait My 5 stars reflects the fact that the Pros far outweigh the Cons, IMHO.

name: Marco Marcoaldi
review_header: Probably the best hosting for Dedicated Server
review_body: Probably the best hosting for dedicated servers, Cloud and VPS in Europe and certainly among the best in the world. I have about 200 dedicated machines, and customer with over 100 Millions visitor / month on their website. I want to highlight their PROS. 1. Excellent quality / price ratio They have dedicated servers of the latest generation at very good prices. The Cloud instances are very versatile, scalable and expandable, stable and cost less than those of other providers. Being able to have FLAT plans with cuts of 50 or 100 Terabytes makes Hetzner an excellent partner for even the most demanding companies without having to spend crazy amounts of traffic as is the case for example with AWS. 2. Perfect support They have a very prepared and professional technical support, available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year and with an intervention time of about 15 minutes. Even with serious hardware problems at the weekend you can always rely on their expertise that in 10 years that are their customer has always been excellent. 3. DDOS Protection Unlike many other providers that in the face of a volumetric attack disconnect you from the server creating damage, Hetzner automatically (within a few tens of seconds) activates a filter to the input packets in collaboration with Arbor Networks, filtering tens of gigabytes per second and leaving your servers reachable. Coupled with CloudFlare to protect against level 7 attacks (GET / POST http flood) is the perfect solution to have a site always reachable. 4. Network stability A very large network with hundreds of exchange and transport points makes it excellent both for dealing with DDOS attacks and to ensure speed and reachability of networks with a routing always perfect. I find it very strange to read negative comments about them. I think you need to have adequate system administration skills to manage their products and I can not express myself on managed services they offer as I have never used them, but if you are a sysadmin this is the best provider without a doubt. Marco Marcoaldi managedserver.it info (at) managedserver.it

name: F.V.
review_body: I've had a very poor experience with Hetzner. The management interface is very confusing when compared to other services such as OVH. They also practice very bad billing policies, be extra careful when you want to stop using their services because you will be billed more than what you expect, and the support is just rude. Seriously, I would advise to just go with OVH as they are more professional, have better DDoS protection, and a better management interface that doesn't seem to come directly from the nineties. EDIT: Hi Katie, sorry I couldn't care less about your company anymore, and nope I will not help you understanding what's wrong. Try to figure out why you have many bad reviews on trustpilot maybe.

name: App General
review_header: Bad company. there are a lot of good ones, don¬¥t loose time and money
review_body: We wanted to use a server located in Germany, and that was the reason to choose this company, even when we saw a lot of bad reviews. BIG ERROR !!! (our fault) Bad service and prices. Now we user other hosting company (there are a lot of them, just read the reviews of the sites about hosting) and a CDN and that is much better than using a bad hosting company, just to stay in a specific country. I don¬¥t think they will survive much time, with all the good hosting services in USA or other countries.

name: Derek Young
review_body: Speed was bad. Service is even worse. Would not recommend.

name: Robert Reeve
review_body: Wow, what can I say! I email about adding a SSL certificate and they mention they can't help unless they reset the server. So they do that and now my website had been down for four days. I ask if they can fix it but they send back "no, we can't offer support with your package". That was strange as you offered support previously to take my server down. They've cost me four days of revenue and don't care other than send copy and paste responses Absolutely awful company

name: Sneak Okay
review_body: Terrible host, would not recommend this to anyone. The servers are incredibly bad and just cant perform aswell as competitors (understandable for the price). There network though. Wow that is some next level fuckery. The network is so slow and constantly being overwhelmed. I do not know how the are running with the amount of usage on their network. Would definitely recommend going with OVH over these guys as these guys cant control their own network. And my support requests for simple things like OS reinstalls and stuff are answered within 1 days. But as soon as I mention the network I dont get a response for days.

review_body: Bad company !! Constant receiving boatloads of spam for years now. Do u have any idea how much of ur IP adresses are reported for spamming & hacking ? do a search abuseipdbdotcom / anti-hackeralliancedotcom etc) The friendly girls from the marketing/support are contant talking about how they must protect their servers from abusers, but still it doesnt work girls !! So many years of receiving crap e-mails from YOUR servers and doing nothing about it ! shame ! Good luck with protecting ur servers, and oh there are indeed much better hosting companies also in the EU. Avoid this spam factory with their so called super protection. Have a nice day =)

review_body: Maybe their servers are cheap, but seriously, don't run any public site on this hosting. Horrible experience, someone seems to ddos me and Hetzner can't handle this. Host is almost always down and my customers are frustrated. Abuse reports are ignored. Worst hosting ever, please avoid it!

name: Shams
review_body: The worst customer service, I created an account with them, and then they required more verification which I gave and then disabled my account without any given reason, when I called, the support said we can't accept you as a customer and hung up without clarification after I had wasted 45 minutes on their website and the phone.

name: Antonio
review_body: Fantastic value. We are running about 20 dedicated servers for a year and have had only one of them develop issues with the hard drive. Comes with the territory. The networking feels solid, 1 gig/s hookups for each server, no outages. I've talked to customer service a few times and the emails felt very personal and polite. Highly recommended if you're adding capacity to a cluster.

name: Hans klein
review_body: yes - 100% service and speed. what i need more from a vps provider. top and respect for there grow.

name: Ahmed Mohamed
review_body: After Registration , The account needs verification !! I have sent my National ID + Driving License and My account was rejected ! Because the ID is in Arabic !!! They said that they accept Passport Only !! Racist service & Racist Company

name: F Rhm
review_body: Very bad company, staff is rude

name: Chay Pers.
review_header: Poor services and customer care experience
review_body: To be avoided. Worst customer service... Ended up switching to a much better hosting service provider. There are many other alternative with more reliable services and most importantly, better customer service.

name: nurnurhetz
review_body: Better than OVH, Anti-DDoS protection for Hetzner Cloud VPS is 100% better than OVH VPS anti-ddos. Not to mention the cheap price, auto backups, snapshots, everything is very easy to do. Katie, may you tell me your email address where I could contact you? Just if I need some support in the future.. Also I don't know what people are saying by "poor performance"? It performs around 3% CPU usage w/ 20% RAM usage on webserver, and a few gameservers installed on it and yet it's the cheapest plan while in OVH I even get 60% CPU usage by paying 6x times more. You guys probably don't know how to optimize your stuff and yet blaming the provider.

name: Cody ‚ÄúSmurfton‚Äù Burton
review_body: Here are some terrible practices they employ: 1. Misleading marketing material regarding sales 2. Ignoring cancellation requests, even when they are completely valid and within the time allotted 3. Employment of shady payment collection companies, they call you 50+ times a day! Avoid using this company, there are much better (and cheaper!) ones in Germany if you really need it.

name: Ned
review_body: I've canceled the dedicated server from my end before 14 days. However, for whatever reason, it wasn't cancelled on their end. After contacting them several times, they ended up canceling the server, however, they are still wanting to charge me around $230 for it. Even after canceling the server!!! And the customer support has been very unprofessional. It's like they are using a bunch of uneducated teenagers to run their customer support.

name: Linus H
review_body: I've used the Hetzner Cloud VPS since January 2018, and it really outperforms competitors comparing both price and performance in the VPS segment. Had a a few problems with outages this summer, but seems stable since then. The Finland location has great routing to Sweden as well.

name: Snailscape .
review_body: The quality and network is really bad, servers are really slow and support sucks. Does anyone want to use this company? Seriously?

name: Jesper
review_header: I highly recommend their cloud VPS
review_body: I highly recommend their cloud VPS. Low ping times around 25ms and I don't think they're overselling them because I'm getting a nice performance and I don't notice any hiccups. I rented a VPS to test a game server, thinking it would be a good learning experience but I actually think the performance is as stable as bare metal.

name: Jake Adams
review_body: So, recently I used Hetzner as they're a cheap and realiable provider for the most part for what you get. The location isn't the greatest, but it makes up for it in other ways. Well, today I ran into something completely unacceptable and that was the fact I had used their servers for virtualization for a few servers and today I get a notification stating that they've suspended my server for 'illegal activity' of which I tried getting more information about and was not given it. I then asked which one of my allocated IPv4 addresses the report had been in regards to as I could just suspend that server and we would be 100% kosher, but they stated they would not provide such information at all. I feel it's morally wrong to suspend the host server (paid for by mself) over another person that I resell to's decision to do something deemed illegal by them. Won't be dealing with again.

name: Khiman Louer
review_body: Amazing host all around. I rent quite a few VPS from them and I never had a single issue, the support always answered within 2 days at most whenever I had a question for them, prices are great... 100% recommend them.

name: Josh Jameson
review_body: Let me start by saying I have previously been a large heztner customer, spending thousands of euros per year. One day I ordered a new server. It turned out to be immediately faulty that worked for a few days a week without overheating. Support tried everything except replacing the server. New heatsinks, new fans. They couldn't fix the issue. Hetzner have a minimum cancellation notice so they forced me to renew the server, but I did not pay the invoice out of principal. I mean how can they charge me for a server that didn't work in the first place? That's illegal in my EU country. So a year later I tried to order a new server. They refused the service to me because I had an unpaid invoice. I offered to pay the invoice and clear by debt. So they gave me their bank details, but since i'm used to their arrogant support I asked, "Will you accept orders from me in the future once I pay for this invoice?". They replied no. They are fully entitled to do so, however I feel their attitude regarding the whole situation captures the essence of their utterly terrible support.

name: Damian GƒÖsior
review_body: The support is just horrible. 2 days of waiting for a simple answer yes or no and still no response. I've cancelled my server. Never again.

name: GUARDIANS OF THE NACHOS
review_body: So yeah im looking for a cheap vps to run a game server on and find this site signup type my credit card info before I even bought something as soon as im on it just says verifacetion pending or something and it has done that the hole day now I scared and angry they have my credit info and can use it on weird sh1t and I havnt got a server even used my account scam dont buy and they dont replyes on my tickets like W T F dont buy from them trust me I made a mistake

name: Marco Marcoaldi
review_body: Great company, great assistance, good hardware and good price. I think Hetzner is a very good company and understand the quality of service and assistance 24/24h. Better than Contabo, Ovh, online.net and many other big brand. Great control panel (Robots) great service like StorageBox, great price and good assistance. I based my WordPress Hosting Performance company on Hetzner. Im sysadmin on over 200 Server and very big traffic site (over 30 million visitor / month in some website). I u think Amazon is the only solution on high traffic website, i think a good hosting provider like hetzner and skilled sysadmin is the right answer to overrated (and extreme expensive) cloud solutions.

name: leon
review_header: Very happy Good specs for budget price
review_body: Been with Hetzner around a month and im very happy. Ordered from SERVER AUCTION and recived server within minutes . Xeon E3-1246V3 ,16GB ddr, 2x 2,0 TB Enterprise and 20TB bandwidth 26 Euros with vat ? WOW Been paying double that for half the bandwidth and know were near the specs. After a week of testing and sending 2Tb from old server was very please, upload and download around 100 MB/s /800 mbps. Decided to have a look round the SERVER AUCTION again see if i could upgrade.And found Intel Xeon E3-1245 ,2x HDD SATA 3,0 TB Enterprise 32gb DDR3 ECC ,NIC 1 Gbit For the same price 26 euros. order and cancelled the first server and receive full refund to my bank in within 24 hours. Used the support once , Ubuntu issue not server problem. Got a reply within 15 minite from Dennis very helpful in helping me. very happy with Hetzner think i will be sticking with them for long time.

name: Aidan
review_header: I have used hetzner for almost 8 years‚Ä¶
review_body: I have used hetzner for almost 8 years now, they are literally the best host I've used. Their support is fast and they're extremely good at both explaining and aiding in fixing issues, with KVM available if requested. The price is good, they have multiple locations so you can have redundancy and have a very good network. I have experienced downtime once with Hetzner outside of a maintenance time, they responded to my ticket immediately, kept me updated and fixed the three down servers within 1/2 hours. If I recall it was a switch failure in the rack. Even during maintenance times, despite them saying there would be downtime I don't think we've ever experienced it - or noticed it anyway.

name: MohamadAli Ganji
review_body: Horrible experience, not recommended at all. At fist glace looks like very nice data center with cool offers, but when you call support they are very rude and without any answer they will hang on phone on you(4 times), THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT CUSTOMER. they took 20 euros from me and they support did not respond me and hanged phone very simple. if you wanna pay and run after your money to receive no respect and unstable support it`s best place to invest you money

name: Rowan
review_header: Dreadful billing policies and billing support
review_body: The Cloud server itself was solid, no problems there whatsoever! The billing procedures and policies however are absolutely dire as is the helpfulness of billing support. On signup I either missed the Paypal subscription option or it does not exist. As a result I built up a number of unpaid invoices. Completely my fault. The grand total of all overdue invoices however was under 20 euro. Instead of just suspending the account to prompt payment, Hetzner send an email threatening a collection agency, stating that the account will not be reactivated even on receipt of payment. Well fine, I login to the billing system, pay all the overdue invoices via paypal and simply say to myself, well no great loss, there was nothing on the cloud server I needed. However next month I receive another part-month invoice for the few days of the month before they decided to delete the server and send their threatening email. Fair enough, However I now can't login to their billing system to pay via paypal. The new invoice has a payment link for paypal and at this point is not overdue, having only just been raised. No problem, I stupidly think, it's only for a couple of Euro, they'll re-enable the billing account to allow me to clear it as they did for the other invoices. 08/02/2018 - useless email reply from support stating they will not accept payment by paypal, ignoring the account history, where every other overdue invoice was paid by paypal. 08/06/2018 - useless email reply stating they cannot re-enable the billing account because there is an overdue invoice. 08/07/2018 - useless reply stating the account can only be activated after the invoice has been paid 08/08/2018 - Useful reply! they have unlocked the billing account and ask me to please let them know once I have made payment. However, FML, I don't check my email for the rest of that week. At the weekend, when I have time, I see it and I go to login to the billing account. Suspended again! The final straw was the below reply on 08/13/2018, in response to my email that the billing account was suspend still "Dear Client We blocked your account again because you did not initiate the payment. Kind regards" Fair enough you might think, but they send this without unsuspending the billing account or giving any instruction whatsoever. So I'm basically getting trolled now over a two euro invoice. Utterly despicable customer support. Edit 08/17 I've now managed to pay the invoice. My last two replies from customer support were as follows 08/14/2018 - unlocked the billing account, but only for three hours. This was useless to me, as I don't check my personal email that often. 08/15/2018 - A reply to state they would unlock the billing account for an hour as I had requested as I would be at my PC ready to pay. But also stated completely unnecessarily "this is the last time I will unlock your account". Katie, thanks for your response. That's fair enough. However given I was getting in touch with support to pay the sole just generated invoice for under two Euro (none were outstanding at this point) I experienced an undue amount of hassle and attitude given I was only trying to access the billing account. One note: maybe "abuser" is an unfortunate term to use here. having worked in the web hosting industry myself I assume you meant "abuser" in the sense of one who abuses their access to hosting / billing account, but on first reading I think most English speakers would take that to mean a violent or sexual abuser, which I'm sure is not what you meant! 21/08 Katie, again many thanks for your reply. However where you state: "To the best of my knowledge we do not have a separate means of re-accessing customer's accounts just for invoicing or billing purposes. By gaining access to your account again, you also have access to any remaining servers on it." This does seem incorrect in my case. I am currently able to login to your "robot / accounts" used for billing and view my invoices, but cannot login to the cloud console. This states the error " Access restricted Your access to the Cloud Console is being denied. Please contact our support through the following contact form:" This is absolutely fine with me and matches the last invoice I was sent, from which it appears the server was deleted due to the lower number of hours billed. At this point, I would obviously be most displeased to receive another invoice on the 1st September. But I guess we'll see! Thanks for your continued interest in the case.

name: B. Vandeperre
review_body: I've been having a server for two months now after being a OVH customer for a few years. Prices are better and the network is faster. No complaints at all. Their service when you screw up yourself is also great!

name: John Haney
review_header: BAD COMPANY GETTING BLACKLISTED THROUGHOUT THE WEB
review_body: They are hosting dietingnew.com and media-fast.com and other bots and getting blacklisted all across the web. Why would anyone want to do business with a server that is blacklisted around the world? They do nothing to stop spammers they are hosting, they ignore complaints from IT professionals, and are a nuisance to the web administrators who have to block their servers to stop malicious code from spreading. Many concerns about root kits and malicious code being spammed via hetzner servers. Stay away from this rogue company. They should be shut down as a criminal enterprise.

name: Jelle De Loecker
review_header: Can't go wrong for this price
review_body: Overall Hetzner's service is pretty stable. If there is some kind of hiccup their status pages quickly tell you what's going on. I only have experience with their unmanaged servers: those servers are very performant and cheap, but you have to take care of the servers all by yourself, of course. If the terminal scares you, their managed servers are probably a better choice, but it's a relatively new service they provide, so I can't tell you much more about it.

name: Marius
review_header: Hetzner have best dedicated server <3 i‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner have best dedicated server <3 i have 23 serveres to Minecraft hosting satisfied customer. Love you Hetzner <3

name: Danny
review_header: Don't waste your time and AVOID.
review_body: Don't waste your time and avoid this company. Did lots of research as I wanted a samba enabled storage which would allow me to share files very easily between a number of my computers. I signed up, ordered the BX20 product and then to my surprise I was sent an email asking for a copy of my identification. I sent them a photo of my ID (a EU driving license) and I shortly received an email from them stating that my account had been disabled and my orders cancelled because they are 'concerned about some of my updated customer information'. All of the details and ID I submitted are legitimate. It's very unusual for a cloud provider to ask for ID in the first place, let alone reject an account when legitimate details are provided. Do yourself a favor, look elsewhere.

name: PK
review_body: Bad service, no replies to important messages they send out themselves

name: Wojciech Kiczma
review_body: I have been a Hetzner customer for over a year, I have used root servers (EX41-SSD and EX61-NVMe) and some cloud instances, and during that time I have never had any problems or downtime. I am very impressed and I can recommend Hetzner with a clear conscience. I used the services of many providers but never the service was done at such a high level. Low Hetzner prices are the icing on the cake. It is a pity that I can only give 5 stars. Keep it up!

name: Ollie
review_body: They want lots of personal info including pictures of you just so you can order from them! They are supposed to want my business rather than make it impossible to order. They will also delete your account for no reason. Best to avoid and get a server from a proper host! Stay away.

name: Carl Erick Fuglesang
review_header: Hetzner Online hosting fraud and Scam‚Ä¶
review_body: Hetzner Online hosting fraud and Scam sites. I have submitted a complaint to Hetzner Online that they are hosting a website brokersstation.com set up to scam and embezzle their clients funds. They don't seem to care, despite their declared hosting terms and content regulations, and thereby contributing to financial fraud on the as long at they don't investigate the facts

name: Theis Ozzie Egeberg
review_header: Flat out the best server provider I've come across.
review_body: I've used Hetzner for more than a decade now I think, maybe even more. It's been the most reliable server hosting I've ever come across. I've got nothing bad to say. Even their terse german style of support is amazing. The cloud solution they have is one of the easiest I've ever seen. About the terseness, despite them working on it, it's absolutely amazing. I asked whether they thought it was in my interest to get a cloud solution, and they answered that they didn't know what would be in my interest, as they didn't know my demands. And that was that, I got the cloud solution an hour later... In ALL matters I prefer direct terseness when it comes to support. Give me an engineer at all times, rather than a sales-rep. :-) Hetzner just provides what developers need I think... If you're in doubt (and I don't want to sound like a sales-rep myself here) just try to set up an Ubuntu on their cloud solution, it literally takes less than a minute before you're logged in as root.

name: Ben Gough (Terrum)
review_header: Great high-end machines in big datacenters, a lot of improvement in the last few years as well!
review_body: NEW REVIEW: I have been with Hetzner for coming up to 8 years now. I am ordering/renewing about 50 machines a year, and each one has been acceptable to its specifications. Support has also greatly improved in the last few years, albeit unmanaged yet they do still try their best to offer a solution (from my experience anyway), great methods for installing your own custom OS (such as a USB stick) and their best feature being free KVM which other competitors do not have. I've changed it from a 3 star to a 4 star - well done Hetzner for improving your service throughout the last few years! :) OLD REVIEW: I have been with Hetzner for about 5 years now, and I feel it's time I made a review on their auction machines. My first year with Hetzner I started by testing a few of the machines to find the perfect one for my requirements without technical flaws, I can completely understand how they would be wary of this, but due to the way their support had treated the situation and could not offer the necessary solution, I left them without my custom. It was about a day later I was quite surprisingly e-mailed by one of their representatives stating that they would like to help me with getting my machine setup the way I wanted. The main issues I had with the previous machines were that I could not install Windows on them, or that the installations would be very buggy, and there were issues I can't remember as it was so long ago - but overall, I have a working machine now which I've had for nearly a year and has been running flawlessly. The only reason I cannot give 5 stars is simply because of their poor support - all of the workers there have very bad English, a very poor professional attitude and badly formatted e-mails, whilst I understand it is a German company, they should not advertise their products in a language they are not fluent or properly trained in. To add, I've been buying more machines from them the past couple of years and they have gone very well. It is just unfortunate that each machine I order must now go under human verification and I cannot cancel any machine that I order otherwise they will not accept any further orders from me. So whilst they have good machines, their support and trust in a long-term customer needs improvement upon. EDIT: In response to Kate's reply to this review, whilst I can understand everything they have said in the matter, if they calm to 'lose trust in these customers' then with that logic they have lost their trust for me regardless of the fact that I can't even cancel a server when I order it for over 3 years now. I like to think I have had a long/healthy enough relationship with Hetzner to have the limitation lifted.

name: James Carter
review_header: Pricing is good but their anti ddos is‚Ä¶
review_body: Pricing is good but their anti ddos is too bad and Port Speed fluctuates sometimes. Better if they can work on their anti ddos. Else highly recommended

name: Krrish Joy
review_header: DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY, VERY FRAUD
review_body: I have bought hosting from this company and requested to cancel the server and close the account by creating a ticket from the control panel. After 4 months they are sending me an invoice that I need to pay for the server because it's still not cancelled. This is not my fault, i have done what they have asked, on other forums its happen to other people also. DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY, VERY FRAUD, they still haven't responded to my emails.

name: Mike Andreasen
review_body: I had heard great things about Hetzner so I purchased a server and provisioned it for a client. I spent over 10 hours preparing the server and migrating the site over. In the morning my server had disappeared and my account was disabled with no email about why. I emailed support and heard nothing back. I called them and I was told 'you used your company name instead of your real name so the server was deleted'. My only option was to recreate the server from scatch, all of my data and hard work were gone. Completely unacceptable and awful service.

name: Mark Lopez
review_body: Just bought a dedicated server. Good company, you can trust.

name: David Harris
review_body: Top banana. Support a bit impersonal and ruthless at times, no OS software help. You get the middle finger. Which is always rude. This was not always so. Had some great help in the past but they got strict.

name: Andy
review_body: Decent quality servers but they need to make the payment system much clearer.

name: Soulimane Adel
review_header: i need to pay for next month even if i don't use it
review_body: before work woth Hetzner please read correcl are them Tos because they SUCK and their is a lot of extra fees they you don't know about it for me i use a server for on month and the next month my credit card was expired and i can't provide one in the due date so i told them i want to cancel it and they told me the earlier cancelation date possible is the next month and i need to pay this month else they will send me inovice from a dept collector. even if i don't use it and also if you don't cancel it by your self before the end of the month they will renew it for you and ask you paying

name: alan
review_body: Very good prices

name: Theo Deligiannidis
review_body: 7+ years with hetzner and i must say that they know what they do. solid server, clean traffic line, fast support, 100% trusted, rational ToS, free upgrades, ddos protection and more. best value for money EU datacenter.

name: Welite
review_header: Excelent and cheapest dedicated servers in europe
review_body: Excelent prices, excelent network stability, support 24/7 and they respond within 5 minutes even at midnight! Now with their ddos protection they are the best EU Dedicated server hosting!

name: Charles
review_body: I used a VPS from them in the past. While it was working it was fast but one fine morning the disk crashed on the whole node. My VPS was unreachable, not rebooting, unable to reinstall an OS. I believe they use too bad/old hard drives.

name: Craig Minihan
review_body: Good server range, up-time is pretty much faultless, web control panel is pretty aged and limited, but with good prices - you can't have it all. They have always been responsive when I've had an issue.

name: Rene
review_header: State of art support and service
review_body: I can only recommend these guys. High quality and of service. They have a strong technical team that are ready to give support in any situation.

name: Martin
review_header: Best customer support and products at great prices
review_body: Hetzner is great! Good prices and great service. Their products are also fast and reliable.
